33-23-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.53}} |weight= |natural bust= yes |blood= A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= }} {{nihongo|'''Kokoro Amano'''|天野♥こころ|Amano♥Kokoro}}, is an [[AV Idol]] who starred in [[pornography|pornographic]] movies between 2001 and 2004 . She worked mainly for [[Soft On Demand]] and [[Moodyz]]. Noted for her "pure beauty"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD105|title=''Kokoro Amano (R)''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and "sexy eyes"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2056|title=''Sunny Love''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} she became a "popular top idol"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=ENG0059|title=''Tentacle''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} in the Japanese AV field. ==Life and career== Kokoro was born 30 August 1982 in the city of [[Miyako, Iwate|Miyako]], [[Iwate Prefecture]], Japan. She was seeking employment at the time that she was recruited for work in the AV industry. An AV scout found her in the audience of a TV gameshow.{{cite web |url=http://downloadjav.com/actresses/actress.cfm?filename=kokoro_amano|title=Kokoro Amano|accessdate=2007-07-25|publisher=[http://downloadjav.com/ downloadjav.com]}} Her stage name was given to her by comedian Makoto Kitano, who interviewed her on the [[TV Asahi]] variety show [[:ja:トゥナイト2|''Tonight 2'']]. Her AV debut was in the December, 2001 release ''Confusion''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2001.htm|title=2001|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Made for the [[Alice Japan]] label, and directed by Kazuhito Kuramoto, the video told the story of a couple, both of whom aspire to be actors. Amano's character has been secretly appearing in adult videos, and is afraid that her boyfriend will find out.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2051|title=''Confusion''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Critics have often pointed out the documentary-inspired format of many Japanese AVs, which often begin with a lengthy interview with the main actress of the video.{{cite web |url=http://www.midnighteye.com/reviews/round-up_005.shtml|title=''Every Japanese Woman Makes Her Own Curry '' (review)|last=Sharp|first=Jasper|date= |accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=The similarities between the... [documentary and hardcore Adult Video] have been picked up on by critics numerous times before. One further documentary-inspired peculiarity of Japanese AV films is the lengthy interviews that usually precede the sex sequences...}} Amano's second video for [[Alice Japan]] makes use of this format, by including her lengthy network television ''Tonight 2'' interview.{{cite web |url=http://www.videoboy.tv/product/p100001862.html|title=天野こころ日だまりの恋|accessdate=2009-08-23|publisher=[http://www.videoboy.tv/ www.videoboy.tv]|language=Japanese}} Released in January 2002, and titled ''Sunny Love'', Amano's usage of her native Iwate accent in the interview was a selling-point of the video. Further documentary-inspired aspects of the video included outdoor sex in the countryside, and rape scenes. Amano's February 2002 AV for Alice Japan, ''Sealed Love'', returned to the fictional narrative format of her first work. In this video, again directed by Kuramoto, she plays an employee of an IT company who has fallen in love with the best friend of her boyfriend.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2059|title=''Sealed Love''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Some of Kokoro's later videos for [[Alice Japan]] continued in the purely fictional narrative format. In ''My Lovely Nurse Sister'' she plays the role of a nurse who has sex with doctors, and her brother-in-law who is a patient at the hospital where she works.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV161|title=''My Lovely Nurse Sister''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her July 2002 DVD for VIP, ''Kokoro Amano [R]'', is a game in which Kokoro plays the viewer's younger sister. Different endings result depending on selections made during the watching of the story. Kokoro's career took the path of the AV idol who debuts as an inexperienced "new face," and whose sexual performances become progressively more outlandish. Regarding this type of AV career, Kjell Fornander says, "Viewers are invited to follow, from appearance to appearance, her sexual initiation, dawning self-awareness and gradual acceptance of her inner, dark depths."{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-20|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16}} ''Erotic Mind'', her next AV for Alice Japan, had Kokoro making her first steps into the more adventurous themes that her later videos would explore. This video includes scenes of voyeurism, sex in public restrooms, vibrators and a threesome.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2063|title=''Erotic Mind''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her July 2002 video for Cosmos Plan was her wildest venture yet, including sex with four men at once, S&M and saliva-swallowing.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=BR05|title=''Fallen Angel X''|accessdate=2007-05-20|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Later in 2002 she signed exclusive agreement with studio [[Soft On Demand]] and the first movie that came from this relationship was the popular ''24 Hours of Bukkake Anytime and Anywhere''.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=3078|title=ActionJAV 24 Hours of Semen|accessdate=2008-09-23|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}} The ideas that made this movie interesting were: * Kokoro agrees to live 24 hours in an apartment designated by the studio, starting at 1:00PM. * Apartment next door is inhabited by a group of about 20 men who can see Kokoro's activity realtime through a set of seven fixed [[CCD camera]]s installed in her apartment. * Whenever they want (even at night) they can enter Kokoro's apartment and ejaculate on any part of her body ([[Bukkake]]), but they cannot touch her or talk to her. If any indication is required, they have to express it with gestures. Kokoro also worked in the ''[[gokkun]]'' genre in the video ''Gokkun Bazooka 150 Shots (Special 2003)'', in which she swallowed up to 175 [[cum shot]]s.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=4733|title=ActionJAV Gokkun Bazooka 150 Counts Special |accessdate=2008-09-23|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}} She retired from the AV industry in 2004.{{Fact|date=May 2007}} ==Partial filmography== ===AVs=== {| class="wikitable" ! 32-21-34(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.57}} | weight = {{convert|43|kg|lb st|abbr=on}} | shoe size = 23.5 cm | eye color = Black | hair color = Brown | skin color = | natural bust = | blood = B | orientation = | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | alias = | films = | homepage = | iafd = | imdb = | afdb = 25441 }} {{nihongo|'''Minori Aoi'''|葵みのり|Aoi Minori}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] "super popular" [[gravure idol|gravure]] and [[AV idol]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDS017|title=''Dreaming Sailor''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Life and career== ===Debut and early AVs=== Born in [[Tokyo]] on [[March 28]], [[1980]], Minori Aoi was active in tennis during Junior High School and High School.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_48.html|last=Woo|first=Ex-S (translator)|title=Body Park: Aoi Minori (Interview)|accessdate=2007-04-23|language=English|work=www.jmate.com}} She made her AV debut in the February, 1999 release, ''Pure Heart'' (純心).{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1999.htm|title=1999|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her first video was a difficult experience for her. She recalls, "I really hated it at the time. I think I also cried during then... it's the worst one I've been in. It's definitely not something I could recommend to my fans." In November of her debut year, Aoi starred in ''Dreaming Sailor'', a campus drama. ''I Love Big Needle'' from January 2000 had Aoi playing the role of a nurse who is subject to sexual abuse from both the doctors and her patients.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IT02|title=''I Love Big Needle''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In ''Angel'', released later the same month, Aoi acted as an angel who comes to earth to satisfy mortal desires.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDS020|title=''ANGEL''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Fetish Virgin IV'' from March 2000, subtitled ''Costume Play Mania'', featured Aoi in the popular ''[[cosplay]]'' genre.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2183|title=''Fetish Virgin IV''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ===Comeback=== [[File:Minori Aoi 2nd International Healthy City Conference.jpg|thumb|right|Minori Aoi in a promotion for the 2nd International Healthy City Conference in the People's Republic of China.]] Described at the American ''[[Adult Film Database]]'' as having a "melting smile [and] wonderfully white skin,"{{cite web |url=http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=53278|title=''Minori Aoi - Precious Moments'' (review)|accessdate=2007-04-23|language=English|work=[[Adult Film Database]]}} Aoi quickly became a popular star of adult video, image video, photo books, and magazine appearances. However, even after her success, she retained her ambivalent attitude towards the AV profession, saying "I still can't get used to shooting in front of a camera though. There are some that enjoy it or get turned on by it, but I still get nervous even after fifteen tapes. There are times when I ponder about running out." She retired from the AV industry briefly in 2000, and returned in March of 2001 in the video ''Minori Aoi - Underground Job''. The AV had Aoi playing the role of a room service maid.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IT92|title=''Minori Aoi - Underground Job''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Her second come-back video, ''Confinement'' (April 2001), was in the bondage genre.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IT97|title=''Confinement''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Up to this point in her career, Aoi had appeared mainly with the Cosmos Plan label. In June, 2001, she released her first video under Sexia's Try Heart label. Entitled ''I Want To Fellatio'', the video focused on Aoi's oral sex techniques.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA216|title=''I Want To Fellatio''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} The DVD version of this film included an instructional "How to Have an Orgasm" demonstration given by Aoi in a cheerleader costume.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD016|title=''I Want To Fellatio'' [DVD]|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ===Later career=== Aoi was featured in the fashion magazine ''An An'' in 2003, and in November of that year Cosmos Plan re-issued her work for the company in three volumes, and collected into one box set.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDH014|title=''Cosmos Memorial Minori Aoi Complete Box''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Aoi was in the international spotlight in October 2006 when she appeared in a controversial promotional campaign for the 2nd International Healthy City Conference in the [[People's Republic of China]].{{cite web |url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/葵みのり|title=葵みのり (Aoi Minori)|accessdate=2007-04-23|language=Japanese|work=[[Japanese Wikipedia]]}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/葵實野理|title=葵實野理|accessdate=2007-04-23|language=Chinese|work=[[Chinese Wikipedia]]}}{{cite web |url=http://news.hankooki.com/lpage/world/200701/h2007012507574875170.htm|title=중국 포스터 속 '백의천사'의 진실?|date=2007-01-25|accessdate=2008-01-29|language=Korean|publisher=[[Hankook Ilbo]]}} ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Adult bio |name= Kate Asabuki |photo= [[Image:Replace this image female.svg]] |birth= {{birth date and age|1962|7|3}}<{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?asbkit01|title={{nihongo2|朝吹ケイト}} - Asabuki Keito|accessdate=2007-03-03|language=Japanese|work=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ Web I-dic]}} |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= B:85-W:58-H:85 (cm)
B:33½-W:24-H:33½ (inch) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= |blood= |orientation= [[Heterosexual]] |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= 0996396 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Kate Asabuki'''|朝吹ケイト|Asabuki Keito}} is a Japanese actress who appeared in Nikkatsu's ''[[Roman Porno]]'' films of the 1980s, and was an early AV (Adult Video) performer. ==Life and career== Asabuki studied [[French language|French]] and [[English language|English]] in college, and joined [[Nikkatsu]] to work in their ''Roman Porno'' films in 1982, while still attending university. She took her stage name "Kate" from [[Kate Bush]], who was her favorite singer."Kate Asabuki - A pictorial", ''Asian Cult Cinema'' #22, p.32-33 One of her earliest Nikkatsu appearances was in the sixth entry of the ''Female Teacher'' (Onna Kyoshi) series (1977-1983), director Junchi Suzuki's ''Hunting The Female Teacher'' (1982).{{cite book |last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-889288-52-7|pages=150}} At Nikkatsu, Asabuki appeared in several films directed by Atsushi Fujiura, and it is rumored that they were secretly married to each other.Weisser, p.227. She appeared in Fujiura's ''Lady's Triangle'' (''Ojosan No Matagura'') (1983).{{cite web |url=http://imdb.com/title/tt0286859/|title=''Ojosan no matagura'' (1983)|accessdate=2007-03-04|work=[[IMDB]]|language=English}} Fujiura also directed one of Asabuki's most successful films, ''Koichiro Uno's Dancer Of Izu'' (''Uno Koichiro No Izu No Odoriko'') (1984). Nikkatsu's ''Koichiro Uno'' series consisted of humorous sex stories featuring strong female leads. The series was conceived as ''Roman Pornos'' designed to appeal to women, and films that couples could enjoy together. This entry, called the best in the series, was a parody of [[Yasunari Kawabata]]'s famous story, ''[[The Dancing Girl of Izu]]''. In Uno's version, Kawabata's titular classical dancer was instead a stripper. Weisser, p.447-448 Other prominent ''pinku eiga'' directors for whom Asabuki acted were [[Shogoro Nishimura]] in ''Woman with the Pierced Nipples'' (''Chikubi Ni Pierce O Shita Onna'') (1983),{{cite web |url=http://www.citwf.com/film375253.htm|title=''CHIKUBI NI PIERCE O SHITA ONNA / WOMAN WITH PIERCED NIPPLES''|accessdate=2007-03-04|work=[http://www.citwf.com/ Complete Index to World Film]|language=English}} and [[Masaru Konuma]] in ''Stewardess Scandal: Hold Me Like an Animal'' (Stewardess Scandal: Kemono No Youni Dakishimete) (1984).{{cite web |url=http://www.citwf.com/film63131.htm|title=''STEWARDESS SCANDAL: KEMONO NO YOUNI DAKISHIMETE / STEWARDESS SCANDAL: HOLD ME LIKE AN ANIMAL / FLY GIRLS IN ACTION, THE''|accessdate=2007-03-04|work=[http://www.citwf.com/ Complete Index to World Film]|language=English}} When asked to comment on Asabuki, Konuma said, "A nice girl. Very responsive. One of the only actresses who could speak multiple languages. I had her talk English in one of the sex scenes. I liked the way it sounded."Konuma, Masaru. (1998). Interviewed by Thomas and Yuko Mihara Weisser on November 6, 1998, in ''Asian Cult Cinema'', #22, 1st Quarter, 1999. p.22. In the late 1990s Asabuki was an anchor on the weekly TV program ''Tokyo Rock TV''. She continued her studies in [[England]], and hoped to work as an actress in the United States,"Kate Asabuki - A pictorial", ''Asian Cult Cinema'' #22, p.32-33 a country she had visited four times by 1989. In 1999 she made a fifth trip to the U.S. to model for photographer [[Ron Vogel]] for several American magazines, including ''[[Penthouse (magazine)|Penthouse]]'' and ''[[Hustler]]''.Asabuki, Kate. (1999). "Hollywood or Bust - Memoirs of America" in ''Asian Cult Cinema'' #25, 4th Quarter, 1999. p.59 As a result of her appearances in American media, ''Celebrity Sleuth'' magazine named her one of "The 25 Sexiest Women of 2001."[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0996396/publicity Kate Asabuki publicity] at [[IMDB]] ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable" ! {{Adult bio | image= | birth= {{birth date and age|1981|04|15}}Infobox data from [http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?aynkuk00 彩名 杏子 - Ayana Kyouko] Profile at Web I-dic| location= [[Kanagawa]], [[Japan]] | birthname= | death= | measurements= 93(F)-61-89(cm)
36-24-35(inch) | |height= {{height|m=1.54}} | weight= {{convert|45|kg|lb st|abbr=on}} | eye color= | hair color= | blood type= A | orientation= | natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | alias= | homepage= | imdb=2086018 |}} {{nihongo|'''Kyoko Ayana'''|彩名杏子|Ayana Kyoko}}, born [[April 15]], [[1981]] in [[Japan]]'s [[Kanagawa Prefecture]], is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV Idol]] who debuted in [[2001 in film|2001]]. Described as a "shy girl with F-cup boobs,"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV099|title=''TAWAWA'' (DVD)|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} after nearly three years in the field, by 2004 Ayana was being called "the top idol of AV."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=12ID031|title=''NONSTOP / Kyoko Ayana''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} According to Peter Payne, founder of the Japanese popular culture site, J-List,{{cite web |last=Jardin|first=Xeni|url=http://www.wired.com/news/culture/1,63009-0.html|title=Fix for Japan Pop-Culture Addicts|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://www.wired.com/ wired.com]|language=English}} Ayana had "claimed Japan's top big breast idol spot."{{cite web |last=Payne|first=Peter|url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_153.html|title=''4 HOURS of Kyoko Ayana'' (DVD review)|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://www.jmate.com/ jmate.com]|language=English}} ==Career== There are two types of AV studios in Japan, the "pros" and the "indies." The "pro" companies work with Sof-Rin, the Japanese Software Morality Association. Sof-Rin sets rules and guidelines for what can be shown in AVs.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_151.html|title=''Bad Girl -- Ami Ayukawa'' (DVD Review)|accessdate=2007-06-09|last=Leongolo|publisher=www.jmate.com|language=English}} According to Payne, the "indies" companies have greater freedom, and are able to get the best directors and produce a better product.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_161.html|title=''Super Angle of Oppai ~ Premium Edition -- Anna Ohura'' (DVD Review)|accessdate=2007-06-09|last=Payne|first=Peter|publisher=www.jmate.com|language=English}} Ayana has worked with a variety of companies, primarily with the "indies" such as [[Moodyz]], but also with big labels [[Alice Japan]], [[Kuki Inc.|KUKI]], Cosmos Plan and TMA. ===Alice Japan (August - December 2001)=== Ayana made her debut in the August 2001 [[Alice Japan]] video, ''Tawawa''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2001.htm|title=2001|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} In this video and some of her later videos, such as ''Boobies'' (September, 2001), and ''TRY 1.2.3！'', the shyness of Ayana's performance was remarked upon. {{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2041|title=''Boobies''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} {{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2047|title=''TRY 1.2.3！''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} The later video, Ayana's fourth, had the model experimenting with new sexual experiences, including her first [[masturbation]]. Ayana's December 2001 release, ''Memory of Love'', was directed by prominent Japanese big-bust AV auteur and photographer, Akira Takatsuki. This documentary-style video dealt with Ayana's sex life as a high school girl. {{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2050|title=''Memory of Love''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} ===KUKI (January - March 2002)=== In January 2002, Ayana released the first of her three original AVs with [[Kuki Inc.]]. All three were directed by [[Hideto Aki]]. "I love to fuck girls for fun," says Kyoko Ayana. For her first video with the company, Ayana was chosen to star in the first entry in their ''Big Breast Aliens'' video series. {{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JF689|title=''The Big Breast Aliens''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} ''Illusion of F-cup'', released in February, focused on [[breast fetishism]]. {{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JF692|title=''Illusion of F-cup''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} The third video, ''Wet & Wild'' (March 2002) had Ayana engaging in sex with actors at a hotel and ''[[onsen]]''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JF694|title=''Wet & Wild''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} These three 60-minute VHS released were combined onto one DVD entitled ''The Idol Kyoko Ayana'' and released by KUKI in April 2002.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JFD014|title=''The Idol Kyoko Ayana''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} ===Cosmos Plan (April - December 2002)=== Ayana's April 2002 debut with Cosmos Plan had her playing the titular role in the video ''Waitress with Big Breasts''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IG73|title=''Waitress with Big Breasts''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} In May she starred in an entry in the company's "hardcore" ''Fallen Angel'' series.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=BZ94|title=''Fallen Angel X''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} Her work in this video was combined with that of fellow AV idol [[Kokoro Amano]] in the series' November 2002 omnibus release, ''Fallen Angel Ｘ 2002DX''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=FX62|title=''Fallen Angel Ｘ 2002DX''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} The following month she appeared with the award-winning AV idol, [[Ai Kurosawa]], in the December omnibus release, ''Big Breasts 240 minutes''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDS112|title=''Big Breasts 240 minutes''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} ===TMA (December 2003 - October 2004)=== In December 2003, Ayana moved to the TMA company. Before starring in a video for TMA, she appeared in another omnibus video, ''The Big and Extreme Breasts Premium II''. The video again teamed Ayana with Ai Kurosawa. Fellow big-bust AV stars, [[Anna Ohura]] and [[Mai Haruna]] also appeared in this collection.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=TWV051|title=''The Big and Extreme Breasts Premium II''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} Her starring debut for the company, ''Big Breast Fetish Angle/Kyoko Ayana'', was released the same month.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=11ID087|title=''Big Brest[sic] Fetish Angle/Kyoko Ayana''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} Her second starring video for TMA had her working in the popular ''[[cosplay]]'' genre of AVs.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=12ID006|title=''Cos-Ple[sic]/ Kyoko Ayana''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]}} ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 35-23-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.62}} |weight= {{convert|47|kg|lb st|abbr=on}} |eye color= brown |hair color= brown |natural bust= yes |orientation= |ethnicity= Japanese }} {{nihongo|'''Ami Ayukawa'''|鮎川あみ|Ayukawa Ami}}, born February 18, 1981 in the vicinity of the border between [[Tokyo|Western Tokyo]] and the [[Kanagawa Prefecture]] in [[Japan]] is a Japanese [[AV Idol]] starring in [[pornography|pornographic]] movies since 1999. Often referred to as an "AV Queen,"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A01052|title=''COS-PARA''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A02012|title=''Stocking Lovers''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=AVD096|title=''Erotic Beauty''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2269|title=''The Cold Moon''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} she has worked for both "pro" studios such as [[Alice Japan]] and [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]]and independent companies like [[Moodyz]] and [[Wanz Factory]].{{cite web |last=Leongolo|url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_151.html|title=''Bad Girl -- Ami Ayukawa'' (DVD review)|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=In Japan, there are two kinds of adult video studios. The "pro" studios... studios like [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki]], [[Alice Japan]], [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]] and Crystal Eizo are part of this group. Then there are the Indies studios... labels like [[Soft On Demand]], [[Wanz Factory]], and [[Moodyz]]...}} She is highly regarded by fans for her energetic passion and thrashing during sex; often portrayed as a submissive character. Active mainly during the early 2000s, she has been called "the best actress in AV history."{{cite web |url=http://downloadjav.com/actresses/actress.cfm?filename=ami_ayukawa|title=Ami Ayukawa|accessdate=2007-07-25|publisher=[http://downloadjav.com/ downloadjav.com]|language=English|quote=Once dubbed the 'best actress in AV history'...}} ==Life and career== Ayukawa made her AV debut in November 1999 at the age of eighteen with the [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]] Tiffany label.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1999.htm|title=1999|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her first appearance for the MAX-A company's Samansa (Samantha) label was in the August 2000 ''[[cosplay]]''-themed video, ''Scanties''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2199|title=''Scanties''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Ayukawa's entry in MAX-A's ''The Confined Bodydolls'' series, subtitled ''Ami on Verge of Breakdown!'' (November 2000), ventured into the more "hardcore" realms of S&M and bondage.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2208|title=''The Confined Bodydolls''|accessdate=2007-06-24|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In May 2001 she made ''Cos-Para'', her first video with Atlas. Among the attire Ayukawa donned in this ''cosplay'' video, was that of a nurse, a female ninja, a bunny, and [[Barbie]]. Her [[Alice Japan]] video ''Sexy Butt'' (June 2001) again had Ayukawa in the ''cosplay'' genre, this time in the framework of a story in which she played the role of a daydreaming office lady.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2029|title=''Sexy Butt''|accessdate=2007-06-24|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} MAX-A chose Ayukawa to star in the first entry in their ''Witch-Hunt'' series, released in August 2001. This new video series was built around the concept of the question, "Is she an angel or a witch?" The quest for the answer to that question serves as a narrative framework for Ayukawa to endure torture, rape, and assorted other humiliations.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2236|title=''The Witch-Hunt''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Back with the MAX-A label in September of 2001, Ayukawa starred in ''Sexy Widow'', in which she plays the titular character, a sex-hungry widow.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2239|title=''Sexy Widow''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Splash: Wet Mermaid'' (December 2001), for the same label, has Ayukawa in the role of a mermaid seeking love.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2247|title=''Splash''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} When the February 27, 2001 issue of the Japanese magazine ''FLASH'' surveyed the AV industry for the top 30 stars, Ayukawa was ranked number one and dubbed the "Queen of AV".{{cite web |url=http://cosme.allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20010228A/|title=今が旬、AV界のあみ～ご|accessdate=2009-06-29|publisher=[http://cosme.allabout.co.jp/ allabout.co.jp]|date=February 28, 2001|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta|language=Japanese}} Ayukawa's "long beautiful legs" were the star attraction of her January 2002 Atlas release, ''Stocking Lovers''. By February of that year, Ayukawa was still being called one of the top AV idols of the time. Her video ''Legend'', while also "hardcore", included documentary features of the actress talking about her AV career.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A02023|title=''LEGEND''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=Ami Ayukawa is one of the top current AV actresses.}} She was featured twice at [[Tokyo Topless]], Japan's longest-running and most successful big-bust website.{{cite web |url=http://tokyotopless.com/model/|title=Models|accessdate=2007-07-13|publisher=[[Tokyo Topless]]|language=English & Japanese}} Interviewed by ''Asahi Geino'', and reprinted in an October 2001 ''[[Mainichi Shimbun]]'' news story on mishaps in the Japanese AV industry, Ayukawa said that her "most horrific experience" in the profession involved a simulated rape scene. The actress explained, "During our pre-shoot meeting, the director told me he'd make sure I was all right, so I wasn't that worried. But then, suddenly, this guy grabbed me by the hair and started dragging me along the floor. Then he began choking me so hard I could barely breathe. I was almost unconscious. I screamed out for help and started crying, but not one person came across to save me. When the scene ended, I was black and blue. The director came over to me and said, 'That was a good scene. It almost looked like the real thing.'"{{cite news |title=Ups and downs behind the scenes filming 'a bit of the in and out'|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2001/10/20011018p2g00m0dm997000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=October 18, 2001|accessdate=2007-06-18}} In a December 2005 article on the subject, Ayukawa was cited as one of the group of AV idols who maintained a [[blog]].{{cite web |first=Kemuta |last= Ōtsubo|url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/nlbn/NL000500/vl_35.htm|title=女優ブログから、今度は女優SNS？(ガイドメールマガジンバックナンバー Vol.35)|date=2005-12-12|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ allabout.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-03-26|language=Japanese}} In August 2006, Atlas released three of Ayukawa's videos on one DVD (''Ami Ayukawa History'') as a retrospective of her career.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=AVD327|title=''Ami Ayukawa HISTORY''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! She made her photo-book debut at the age of 18 in the October 1996 release, ''Pistil'' {{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/%30d4%30b9%30c6%30a3%30eb%2015%98a8%5439%3042%304d%3089%5199%771f%96c6/dp/4821121123/sr=1-3/qid=1157582430/ref=sr_1_3/249-2766306-2535549?ie=UTF8&s=books|title=''Pistil''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://www.amazon.co.jp/ Japanese Amazon]|language=Japanese}} Fubuki's AV debut was in November 1996 for the [[Alice Japan]] label.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1996.htm|title=1996|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her first video for the MAX-A label was the December 1996 release, ''Dressy'' ''Pink Breath'', her second video for this label, was released in January of 1997. The nervousness of Fubuki's on-camera performance was a selling-point for this video.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2216|title=''Akira Fubuki DX''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=She still becomes so nervous in front of camera.}} This initiation of a young "new face" AV model fits the pattern of AV career which Kjell Fornander describes. He says, "Viewers are invited to follow, from appearance to appearance, her sexual initiation, dawning self-awareness and gradual acceptance of her inner, dark depths."{{cite web Lesson''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and a school-girl who is raped.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1087|title=''Baby Oil''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her farewell to the entertainment world was with the December, 1997 photobook, ''So Long!''{{cite web |url=http://bookweb.kinokuniya.co.jp/guest/cgi-bin/wshoseaohb.cgi?W-NIPS=997098408X&AREA=02|title=''So Long!''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[[Books Kinokuniya]]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/So-Long%2015%98a8%5439%3042%304d%3089%30d5%30a1%30a4%30ca%30eb%5199%771f%96c6/dp/4821121891/sr=1-5/qid=1157582430/ref=sr_1_5/249-2766306-2535549?ie=UTF8&s=books|title=''So Long!''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[[Amazon.com|Amazon]]|language=Japanese}} Fubuki had become the number one AV idol,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV037|title=''Akira Fubuki Special''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and retired, within a year of her AV debut. Her continued popularity inspired retrospective compilations of her works in 2000 (''Akira Fubuki Special'') and 2001 (''Akira Fubuki DX''). Remaining a highly popular model to this day, her products continue to be widely available through video and [[VCD|Video CD]] outlets specializing in Asian video products, as well as the Japanese website of the mainstream, global outlet [[Amazon.com]], and the Japanese bookstore chain, [[Books Kinokuniya|Kinokuniya]]. == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 35-24-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.55}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |blood= B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= }} {{nihongo|'''Mai Haruna'''|春菜まい|Haruna Mai}} is a popular and prolific [[Japan]]ese [[Model (person)|model]] and [[AV idol]]. She debuted in 2002 and performed in a variety of Japanese adult video genres until her retirement in 2005. ==Life and career== Born in [[Tokyo]] on March 20, 1984, Mai Haruna's [[Chronology of adult videos in Japan|AV]] ([[adult video]]) career focuses her large bust. Until Haruna's generation, the women in her family were of a thin build. Both her mother and grandmother were thin, and Haruna and her older sister were the first in the family to have large breasts.{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/203/harunamai-ran.html|title={{nihongo2|春菜まいのランジェリ}}ー (Haruna Mai no Ranjerii) Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=www.b-v.co.jp|language=Japanese|quote={{nihongo2|うちの家系はみんな細い。私とお姉ちゃんだけがなぜか胸が大きいの。... おばあちゃんも細い。}}}} Haruna's bust developed early, beginning before her entrance into junior high school. By her third year in junior high school, she was already a metric F-cup.{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/203/harunamai-ran.html|title={{nihongo2|春菜まいのランジェリー}} (Haruna Mai no Ranjerii) Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=www.b-v.co.jp|language=Japanese|quote={{nihongo2|中学に入った頃から大きくなって中3ではFカップあった}}}} ===AV Career=== Haruna made her AV debut at the age of 18, in September 2002, for the [[Crystal-Eizou]] company.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2002.htm|title=2002|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} In October of that year she appeared in the [[English language|English]]-titled ''HOLIDAYS'', the first of her many photo books.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/HOLIDAYS%E2%80%95%E6%98%A5%E8%8F%9C%E3%81%BE%E3%81%84%E5%86%99%E7%9C%9F%E9%9B%86-%E8%97%A4%E7%94%B0-%E5%81%A5%E4%BA%94/dp/4754215435/ref=sr_1_1/250-3902396-1920202?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1177779432&sr=1-1|title=HOLIDAYS―{{nihongo2|春菜まい写真集 (大型本)}}|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=www.amazon.co.jp|language=Japanese}} Haruna's "cute face"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD314|title=''Mai Haruna Collection''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} and (metric) "H-cup dynamite breasts"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD264|title=''Mai Haruna in Extreme Service Brothel''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} have helped make her a popular and busy actress in Japanese adult videos. As one indication of her prolific output, Japanese Amazon currently lists 185 DVDs, 28 videos and 7 books in which Haruna appears.Japanese Amazon search: {{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/s?__mk_ja_JP=%83J%83%5E%83J%83i&url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=%8Ft%8D%D8%82%DC%82%A2|title={{nihongo2|春菜まい}} (Haruna Mai)|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=www.amazon.co.jp|language=Japanese}} Her busy three-year stint makes Haruna stand out in the Japanese AV field, where an average career spans about a year, with five to ten videos total.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-04-28|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate =2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year-the average life-span of an AV girl-with five or ten videos to her credit and an unknowing family bosom to return to.}} Haruna was honored at the 4th annual [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#4th Takeshi Kitano Awards (2003)|Takeshi Kitano Entertainment Awards]] for 2003 sponsored by the Japanese tabloid newspaper ''[[Tokyo Sports]]'' (東京スポーツ), where she won the Leading AV Actress Award (主演AV女優賞).{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/tsmp/movie.htm |title=第４回ビートたけしのｴﾝﾀｰﾃｲﾝﾒﾝﾄ賞|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/ Tokyo Sports]|language=Japanese}} Haruna has worked in various genres of the Japanese AV including [[Sadism and masochism|S&M]], [[Orgy|orgies]] and [[urolagnia]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP249|title=''Sin and Punishment''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Her December 2004 video, ''Suppin''' follows the classic Japanese AV mock-documentary format pioneered by early AV innovator, [[Toru Muranishi]].{{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|chapter=Chapter 18 (Naked Dissent)|quote=Sometimes the documentary is faked, predictably with sadistic themes, which nonetheless strive to maintain a spontaneous veneer... Regarded as an innovator, the man behind the ubiquitously emulated documentary technique is Toru Muranishi, a former porno actor turned director.|page=608}} Purporting to show Haruna's real life, the video includes scenes of outdoor sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP259|title=Suppin'|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Others of Haruna's documentary-inspired AVs have her learning soap and massage techniques from professionals and then demonstrating her newly-acquired skills for the video audience.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP248|title=''Mai Haruna in One day Soap Lady!''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Haruna's August, 2004 appearance in the popular ''Sin and Punishment'' video series, which focuses on various forms of humiliation, has her assaulted with a candle, forced to drink semen, and concludes with her having sex with "7 fat actors." ===Retirement & Uncensored Videos=== Haruna made a number of videos with AV studio [[Moodyz]] and she retired from AV work with an August 2005 video for them, ''Moodyz Special Mai Haruna - Mai Last Movie'', a 3 hour roundup of her career.{{cite web |url=http://www.moodyz.com/shop/-/detail/=/cid=mdl459/|title=MOODYZ春菜まいスペシャル|accessdate=2008-11-03|publisher=[http://www.moodyz.com/ Moodyz]|language=Japanese}} Compilations of material from earlier in her career still appear including the 2007 video, ''A Band of Nasty AV Actresses''{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD362|title=''A Band of Nasty AV Actresses''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} in the humiliation genre for which her physical attributes have been previously singled out for praise.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD271|title=''Sin and Punishment Perfect Collection / Mai Haruna''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=The hard punishments make her G-cup tits shake so well!!}} Like many other AV Idols, after leaving mainstream Japanese porn Haruna made some "uncensored" movies without the mosaic pixelation used to obscure the genitals in legal Japanese adult videos. Uncensored videos are available online or are sold as DVDs internationally or in underground ("[[urabon]]") outlets in Japan. She appeared in three pay-per-view online videos released in July and December 2006{{cite web |url=http://ppv.xvn.eu/en/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/203|title=Title List> Mai Haruna|accessdate=2008-11-03|publisher=[http://ppv.xvn.eu/en/ ppv.xvn.eu/en]}} and also in two uncensored DVDs released in late 2006.{{cite web |url=http://dvd.xvn.eu/en/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/203|title=List View> Mai Haruna|accessdate=2008-11-03|publisher=[http://dvd.xvn.eu/en/ dvd.xvn.eu/en]}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! She is a 'mature' performer best known for appearing in ''Zoom Vol. 10 Immoral Wife'' (2005, with [[Maki Tomoda]]), ''Indecent Mature Woman 7'' (2006) and ''Mrs Deep Throat'' (2006). Ikehata's video {{nihongo|''Step-Mother's Masochistic Juice 7''|義母のM汁7|Gibo no M-shiru 7}}, released by [[CineMagic Co.|CineMagic Noir]] on November 19, 2004,{{cite web |url=http://www.arzon.jp/item_356358.html|title={{nihongo2|義母のM汁7}} |accessdate=2009-01-14|publisher=[http://www.arzon.jp/ www.arzon.jp]|language=Japanese}} became a block-buster in the SM/incest genre. The major adult video retailer av-channel.com's SM-specialty "SM Channel" or "Channel 15" recorded Ikehata's video as their #1 pay-per-view seller for 2006.{{cite web |url=http://biglobe.av-channel.com/ppv/std/item_ranking/ch=sm?ym=2006|title=Pay Per View Products Best 50!! (2006/01/01～2006/12/31)|accessdate=2009-01-14|publisher=[http://biglobe.av-channel.com av-channel.com]|language=Japanese}} The video remained on the channel's top-50 list, at #40, the following year.{{cite web |url=http://biglobe.av-channel.com/ppv/std/item_ranking/ch=sm?ym=2006|title=Pay Per View Products Best 50!! {{Female adult bio| |photo= |caption= |birth= {{birth date and age|1975|09|15}} Infobox data from: {{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=181|title=Asami (Joh Asami)|accessdate=2007-05-01|format= |publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 85-58-86(cm)
33-23-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.62}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Dark |skin color= |blood= A |natural bust= |underarm hair= Removed |pubic hair= Natural |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |nationality= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |nude= Yes |genitalia= Yes |hardcore= Yes |alias= Yumi Kayama
Ayuko Kunitachi |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= 0433614 }} {{nihongo|'''Asami Jō'''|城 麻美|Jō Asami|born September 15, 1975}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV Idol]] from [[Tokyo]]. [[Tokusatsu]] fans also know her as the villain Shibolena in the [[Super Sentai]] series [[Denji Sentai Megaranger]]. ==Life and career== Jō was born in Tokyo and was a TV commercial model before starting a career in pornography.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV183|title=''No Cut 4 Hours　Asami Jo''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Most Japanese AVs involve some form of documentary style.{{cite web |last=Schönherr|first=Johannes|url=http://www.midnighteye.com/features/company-matsuo-and-the-world-of-japanese-adult-video.shtml|title=Japanese AV - A Short Introduction|date=December 29, 2006|accessdate=2007-05-29|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|language=English}} Asami Jō's videos, however, are mainly in the fictional style of the ''[[pink film]]'' and early AV.Schönherr. "These films, even though shot on video, just continued the pink film tradition and adhered to the pink film rules and limitations." She debuted with the [[Alice Japan]] label in October 1995.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1995.htm|title=1995|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her February 1996 release for the same label, ''Love Potion'', told the story of a woman (Jō) who supports her boyfriend financially while he is studying to become a lawyer. She employs sex as a means to make cosmetic sales.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1778|title=''Love Potion''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Thrilling Club: A Scandalous Night With You'' (April 1996), had Jō as a married woman who meets an old classmate, with whom she and her husband engage in a menage-a-trois.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1786|title=''Thrilling Club''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In ''The Beautiful Slave'' (May 1996), she played the role of a young woman who is unhappy with the marriage her parents have arranged for her.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1789|title=''The Beautiful Slave''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Obscene Model'' (June 1996) had Jō in the role of a woman who acts like a cat in heat. When she is taken to a veterinarian, she engages in animalistic sex with him.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1794|title=''Obscene Model''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In ''Top Secret Is Full Nude'', released in July 1996, she played a woman who is raped by a man who is later hired by her husband, for whose company she also works.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1798|title=''Top Secret Is Full Nude''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Almost Broken'' was an organized crime melodrama with Jō escaping from a gang and becoming involved in telephone sex. Like the previously-described videos, this August 1996 release was an [[Alice Japan]] production.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1802|title=''Almost Broken''|accessdate=2007-07-17|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Asami Jō later appeared in such mainstream TV series as ''Weatherwoman 2'' (1996) and ''[[Denji Sentai Megaranger]]'' (1997) [http://www.qzc.co.jp/DORAMA_CGI/DORAMA1.exe?AFLG=&TARGET1=TITLE%2CNAME&KEY1=&MODE1=SYNONYM&TARGET2=CAST&KEY2=%8F%E9%96%83%94%FC&MODE2=SYNONYM&TARGET3=ENSHUTSU%2CPRODUCER%2CKIKAKU%2CSEISAKU%2CKYAKUHON%2CGENSAKU%2CART%2CTECNIQUE&KEY3=&MODE3=SYNONYM&TARGET4=ETC&KEY4=&MODE4=SYNONYM&TARGET5=GENSAKU&KEY5=&MODE5=SYNONYM&CHK=AND&ACTION=%8C%9F%8D%F5%82%F0%82%B7%82%E9] She became a TV commentator, and from 1995-1998 she was a regular on the nighttime TV show ''[[Gilgamesh Night]]''.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0186748/fullcredits|title=Full cast and crew for "Gilgamesh Night"|accessdate=2007-07-17|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Internet Movie Database]]}} ==Appearances== ===Adult Videos=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Female adult bio| |photo= [[Image:Bunko Kanazawa.jpg|Bunko Kanazawa (1979-)]] |birth= {{birth date and age|1979|4|4}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?knzbnk00|title=金沢文子 – Kanazawa Bunko (Profile)|accessdate=2007-04-21|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=492|title=Bunko (Kanazawa Bunko)|accessdate=2007-04-21|language=English||publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} |location= [[Iwate prefecture]], [[Japan]] (sometimes reported as [[Kanagawa Prefecture]] |birthname= |alias= Fumiko Kanazawa{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV013|title=''Erotic Girls''|accessdate=2007-08-04|language=English||publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} |measurements= 83(C)-57-85(cm)
32-22-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.56}} |weight= {{convert|46|kg|lb|abbr=on}} |eye color= Black |hair color= Black |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] ||blood= O |shoe size= 23.5cm |homepage= http://www.graphix.ne.jp/kanabun/index.html }} {{nihongo|'''Bunko Kanazawa'''|金沢文子|Kanazawa Bunko}} is a prolific and well-known [[Japanese pornography|Japanese adult film]] actress, who has been called "one of the biggest [[AV idol]]s in Japan."{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_10.html|title=A nice chat with one of the biggest AV-idols in Japan (Interview)|accessdate=2007-02-21 |language=English|publisher=www.jmate.com}} ==Life and career== ==Debut== Born [[April 4]], [[1979]] in [[Kanagawa prefecture]]), as a child Bunko Kanazawa was good at [[mathematics]] and [[science]], but horrible in [[Japanese language|Japanese]] and [[English language|English]] studies.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_54.html|title=Kanazawa Bunko Interview|accessdate=2007-04-21|language=English|publisher=www.jmate.com}} Her hobbies as an adult include [[cooking]], [[snowboarding]] and [[karaoke]].{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=492|title=Bunko (Kanazawa Bunko)|accessdate=2007-04-21|language=English||publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kanazawa was introduced to the AV industry by a friend. Her stage name, given to her by her agency, is taken from [[Kanazawa Bunko]], a train station, museum and historic library in Kanagawa Prefecture, where she lived at the start of her career. Her stage name is sometimes shortened to "Kanabun", a nickname which Kanazawa dislikes. Kanazawa made her AV (adult video) debut with the Cosmos Plan label in the August 1997 release ''18 Years Old''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1997.htm|title=1997|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Kanazawa's second video, ''Tough Adolescence'', was a science-fiction sex drama released by the same label in September 1997.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IM78|title=''Tough Adolescence''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDS004|title=''Tough Adolescence''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Speaking of videos such as this one, which required a degree of acting, Kanazawa commented that she does not consider herself a good actress. She says that she especially has difficulty with a leading role and with adlibbing. ''Obscene Model'' (August 1999) was another video in which Kanazawa had to use her acting abilities. She played the role of a [[race queen]] who seduces her sponsor and her cameraman. This video also included a scene in which the actress visits a man's home—an amateur—and performs for him.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1938|title=''Obscene Model''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Kanazawa was still with the Cosmos Plan label for her one-year anniversary video, ''Platinum Fuck'' (September 1998).{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IH31|title=''Platinum FUCK''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==VCDs and DVDs== In addition to videos and DVDs, Kanazawa released several works in the [[Video CD|VCD]] format. She initiated a four-volume "Special Edition" VCD set in December 1997. All of these releases contained selections from Kanazawa's videos and images in the [[Bitmap Image|.BMP]] format. The first VCD ''SUPER BEST'' in this series had highlights of Kanazawa's debut and scenes from ''Tough Adolescence''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MVC019|title=''SUPER BEST''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Her second "Special Edition" VCD, ''Kanabun's Feel'', released in May 1998, was a similar collection of scenes from three of Kanazawa's previous releases.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MVC024|title=''Kanabun's feel''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} The "Special Edition" series continued in September 1998 with the release of ''Kanabun Typhoon Going North'', which had highlights from four of her videos.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MVC028|title=''Kanabun Typhoon Going North''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} A fourth volume in the series was released one year later, in September 1999, due to popular demand. This one also featured highlights from four previously released videos, as well as behind-the-scenes images.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MVC045|title=''Bunko Kanazawa Best 4''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Kanazawa's first DVD release was a reissue of her debut video. Much was made of the visual clarity of the still new medium in advertising the release. It was claimed that the picture was so clear, Kanazawa's pubic hair (the display of which was banned by Japanese censorship laws), could be seen.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MDS002|title=''18 Years Old''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Fetish videos== Kanazawa has also appeared in several [[Sexual fetishism|fetish]] films focusing on particular sub-genres of the AV industry. Her January 1999 entry in [[Alice Japan]]'s popular {{nihongo|''Female Ass''|女尻|Meijiri}} series focuses on various manipulations of the actress's posterior, and includes scenes with panties and lotion.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1912|title=''Female Ass''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV010|title=''Female Ass'' (DVD)|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Inhumanity'' focused on sexual violence, with the actress beaten up, raped and forced to perform fellatio.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV024|title=''Inhumanity'' (DVD)|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Max-A's ''Erotic Opening'' series, which focuses on fellatio, featured Kanazawa in its March 1999 video.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2162|title=''Erotic Opening''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Fetish Virgin III'' had the camera fetishistically centering on individual parts of the actress's body.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2164|title=''Fetish Virgin III''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} A self-titled DVD from September 1999 was a similar work for body-part fetishists.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV003|title=''Bunko Kanazawa''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In September 1999, Max-A chose to star Bunko Kanazawa in the first video in the revival of its popular ''Confined Bodydolls''. Entitled ''The Confined Bodydolls: Bunko Goes Wild'' the video had Kanazawa in bondage on stage.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2171|title=''The Confined Bodydolls''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In magazine shoots, Kanazawa often appears dressed as a [[schoolgirl]]. Her first video to make use of this common theme in Japanese erotica was ''Uniform Indecent Doctrine'', released in October 1998.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IH35|title=''Uniform Indecent Doctrine''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Her appearance in Atlas's popular ''NEO Bloody Uniform Connection'' series—the 51st video in that series—again had Kanazawa in the uniform of a high school girl. In addition, this ''[[cosplay]]''-themed video had Kanazawa wearing the costumes of a nurse, an elevator girl, and a policewoman in a miniskirt.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=9A054|title=''NEO Bloody Uniform Connection 51''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Autobiographical videos== ''Legend Of An AV Idol'' (February 1999) was Kanazawa's first video for Atlas. This release focused on Kanazawa's career and stories of how she reached the number one spot in the Japanese AV industry.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=9A022|title=''Legend Of An AV Idol''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} For [[Alice Japan]], Kanazawa made a two-volume ''Self-Portrait'' series. These videos had the actress photographing herself in private moments, and engaging in sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1922|title=''Self-Portrait #2''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DC074|title=''Self-Portrait #2'' (VCD)|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In 2004, Kanazawa's career was the subject of a five-volume retrospective "Memorial" series from Cosmos Plan. Though Kanazawa dislikes airplane travel, she enjoys filming in overseas locations such as [[Bali]] Her July 1998 release, ''Misfire Erotica'', was filmed in [[Hong Kong]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IH20|title=''Misfire Erotica''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Later career== In 2003, Kanazawa began a series of videos for [[Moodyz]] which included a December 2004 [[gokkun]] title, ''Bunko Kanazawa Drink Sperm Too''. After a January 2005 simulated rape video (''Bunko Kanazawa Will be Violated'') for Moodyz, Kanazawa announced her retirement from the AV industry, although she continued working as a stripteaser.{{cite web |url=http://www.sweatpig.com/bunko-kanazawa-returns-to-jav/.|title=Bunko Kanazawa Returns to JAV |accessdate=2008-07-30|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ www.sweatpig.com]|date=November 21, 2007}} It was reported in 2006 that Kanazawa would start making uncensored movies for a studio/website called Tora Tora Tora.{{cite web |url=http://www16.suppa.jp/toratoratora.html|title=大物AV女優がたくさんTORATORATORA・虎虎虎.紹介ページ (Many great AV actresses/Tora Tora Tora page)|accessdate=2007-08-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www16.suppa.jp/ www16.suppa.jp]|quote=金沢文子、鈴木麻奈美、灘ジュンをはじめとする大物AV女優は勿論...}} These began to appear in September 2006 as pay-per-view videos on the 99b.com website and then later on XVN.JP.{{cite web |url=http://ppv.xvn.jp/ja/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/3147|title=全作品一覧> 金沢文子 (Bunko Kanazawa Complete Works PPV|accessdate=2008-11-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://ppv.xvn.jp/ ppv.xvn.jp]}} Some of the material has been collected in two DVDs released in March 2007 and May 2008.{{cite web |url=http://dvd.xvn.jp/ja/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/3147|title=全作品一覧> 金沢文子 (Bunko Kanazawa Complete Works DVD|accessdate=2008-11-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://dvd.xvn.jp/ dvd.xvn.jp]}} After almost 3 years away from the mainstream Japanese porn scene, Kanazawa made a comeback in December 2007 with a new video for Moodyz (''Hyper-Digital Mosaic Vol.072'') and one in January 2008 for Das (''Semen Urine Human Toilet''). She has continued her career through 2008 including a series for [[Attackers]] with director Kenzo Nagira and the [[AV Grand Prix]] entry for the new studio Ran Maru.{{cite web |url=http://www.ran-maru.com/works/avgl/avgl149.html|title=中にあたるとオカチクなっちゃう！|accessdate=2008-11-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.ran-maru.com/ www.ran-maru.com]}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 37-24-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.68}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= 2210771 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Eri Kikuchi'''|菊池えり / 菊池エリ|Kikuchi Eri}} is an early [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] of the 1980s, and one of the first Japanese AV actresses to be known primarily for her large breasts. ==Life and career== Using other stage names, including {{nihongo|Mai Akimoto|秋本麻衣|Akimoto Mai}}, {{nihongo|Eriko Ishikawa|石川江梨子|Ishikawa Eriko}} and {{nihongo|Yumiko Hino|比野由美子|Hino Yumiko}}, Kikuchi started her adult entertainment career in [[soapland]]s. During this early part of her career she also made appearances in several underground pornographic films. Her official AV debut was in the video ''Beautiful D-Cup Girl, Sister L'', released in September 1985 by [[CineMagic Co.|CineMagic]].{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1985.htm|title=1985|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Kikuchi has been called the first adult video performer whose career was built around her exceptionally large breasts for that time in Japan. {{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/E_KIKUCHI/index.html|title= {{nihongo2|菊池えり}} (Kikuchi Eri)|accessdate=2007-03-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/ xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY]|language=English}} The Big Bust genre, or {{nihongo|"Kyonyu Boom"|巨乳ブーム}}, which Kikuchi pioneered would be set "on fire" at the end of the 1980s with the debut of [[Kimiko Matsuzaka]] in 1989, and become established as a major genre of adult entertainment in Japan in the 1990s.{{cite book |last=Adachi|first=Noriyuki|title={{nihongo2|アダルトな人びと}} (''Adaruto na Hitobito''/''"Adult" People''|year=1992|publisher=Kodansha|location=Tokyo|isbn=4-06-205546-5|pages=p.50|language=Japanese}} Kikuchi's theatrical film debut was with Million Films in their {{nihongo|''Miss 20 Year-Old Momoko''|ミス２０才　快感！百合子の本番}} in 1986.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0072490.htm|title={{nihongo2|菊池えり}} (Kikuchi Eri)|publisher=[http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/ JMDB]|accessdate=2009-07-03|language=Japanese}} In August of the same year, she starred in Shintoho's theatrical ''pink film'', {{nihongo|''Eri Kikuchi: Big Tits''|菊池エリ　巨乳|Kikuchi Eri Kyonyu}}."{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0072490.htm|title={{nihongo2|菊池えり}} (Kikuchi Eri)|accessdate=2007-03-19|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} This film has Kikuchi playing "Eri," a nude model and AV actress who becomes romantically involved with her manager." In 1988 she starred in one of Nikkatsu's last ''Roman Porno'' films, {{nihongo|''Eri Kikuchi: Big Tits Blame''|菊池エリ　巨乳責め|Kikuchi Eri: Kyonyuzeme}}, and in 1993 she would star in another theatrical Big-Bust title ({{nihongo2|巨乳熟女　本番仕込み}}), for Excess Films, Nikkatsu's post-''Roman Porno'' line of theatrical softcore pornography.{{cite web |url=http://194.21.179.166/cecudine/fe_2002/eng/PinkEiga2002.htm|title=Vital flesh: the mysterious world of Pink Eiga|accessdate=2007-02-19|last=Domenig|first=Roland|date= |year=2002|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20041118094603/http://194.21.179.166/cecudine/fe_2002/eng/PinkEiga2002.htm|archivedate=2004-11-18|quote=Excess is an offshoot of Nikkatsu, established in 1988 when Nikkatsu ended Roman Porno production.}} Kikuchi spent some time in Guam with her husband, a foreign (i.e., non-Japanese) dancer. Here she put her AV work on hold for a while, and worked mainly as a stripper. Kikuchi later returned to Japan and the AV industry.{{cite web |url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/菊池えり|title={{nihongo2|菊池えり}} (Kikuchi Eri)|accessdate=2007-05-12|publisher=Japanese Wikipedia|language=Japanese}} In 2003, she was working as a lecturer/demonstrator at the AV Cultures School, a school started by male AV actor, Shinji Kubo, to train future AV directors.{{cite web |url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/06/20030611p2g00m0dm999000c.html|title=Adult video veteran turns porn pedant for new stick flick Profile)|publisher=[http://www.madonna-av.com/ www.madonna-av.com]|accessdate=2009-07-03|language=Japanese}} Her recent videos for the CineMagic company are in their popular "mourning" series which
