32-23-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.51}} |weight= |shoe size= 21cm |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= AB |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Kaori Matsumoto{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1986.htm|title=1986|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} |films= about 70{{cite news |title=Legs open way to 6 billion yen career|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107142509/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[December 13]], [[2003]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|accessdate=2007-10-09}} |homepage= http://web.archive.org/web/20010801151740/http://www.smsm.co.jp/hitomi/ |iafd= |imdb= 0997246 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Hitomi Kobayashi'''|小林ひとみ|Kobayashi Hitomi}} is an important early [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]]. One of the founding figures of the [[Chronology of adult videos in Japan|Japanese adult video]], she has been called indispensable to any discussion of the AV.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KDV024|title=''Topaz''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=We cannot talk about AV without her. She is a legend of AV. She is like a founder of the AV world}} ''[[Mainichi Shimbun]]'' calls her "one of the icons of Japanese adult cinema history." Her unprecedented popularity in the mid-1980s, the early days of the Japanese AV, earned her the title "Queen of AV."{{cite news |title=Legs open way to 6 billion yen career|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107142509/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[December 13]], [[2003]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|accessdate=2007-10-09|quote=Astounding sales of her works in the formative years of the VHS era made her the ruler of the adult video world and led to her being dubbed as the 'AV Queen.'}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP217|title=''Hitomi Kobayashi FINAL Disc1: Nostalgic''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=Here comes the final works of AV Queen Hitomi Kobayashi}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD226|title=''Hitomi Kobayashi　BOX''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=...package DVD of the queen of Adult Video Hitomi Kobayashi...}} {{cite news |title=Porno queen seeks investors' plug as she goes out with a bang|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/07/20030718p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107135116/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/07/20030718p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|date=[[July 18]], [[2003]]|accessdate=2007-10-09|quote=Hitomi Kobayashi, long hailed as Japan's Queen of Adult Video...}}{{cite book |last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-889288-52-7|pages=222|quote=...the AV Queen Hitomi Kobayashi...}} According to an adult entertainment reporter for ''Shukan Shincho'', "She laid the foundations for the golden age of adult video."{{cite news |title=Porno queen seeks investors' plug as she goes out with a bang|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/07/20030718p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107135116/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/07/20030718p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|date=[[July 18]], [[2003]]|accessdate=2007-10-09}} After making her debut as a non-pornographic [[photobook]] and "image video" model, Kobayashi entered the AV field in [[1986 in film|1986]]. Because of her rapid popularity, [[Nikkatsu]], Japan's leading producer of softcore pornography at the time, hired her to appear in theatrical films in [[1987 in film|1987]]. After marriage and a semi-retirement beginning in [[1989 in film|1989]], Kobayashi fully returned to the AV industry in [[1998 in film|1998]]. She announced her retirement in [[2003 in film|2003]] with a big-budget, though controversial, 2-volume farewell adult video.{{cite news |title=Porn star blows wads pumping out final flop|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2004/03/20040325p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107143734/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2004/03/20040325p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[March 25]], [[2004]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|accessdate=2007-10-09}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== According to her official profile, Hitomi Kobayashi was born {{nihongo|Yukari Ishii|石井ゆかり|Ishii Yukari}} in [[Tokyo]] on [[September 2]], [[1965]].{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=408|title=Hitomi (Hitomi Kobayashi)|accessdate=2007-03-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} However, in an interview in the {{nihongo|''Weekly Post''|週刊ポスト}} just before her retirement in 2003, she confessed to have actually been born in 1963.{{cite web |url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/小林ひとみ|title={{nihongo2|小林ひとみ}} (Kobayashi Hitomi)|accessdate=2007-03-19|publisher=[[Japanese Wikipedia]]|language=Japanese}} Her ambition since childhood was to be an actress. She attended acting school, and registered with a talent agency. Kobayashi was not particularly sexually precocious, claiming at the time of her AV debut, "I lost my virginity at 18, which is probably a bit late, and I wasn't very experienced with men." This relative sexual conservatism extended into her AV career. The sex scenes in all but her final video were simulated.{{cite news |title=Legs open way to 6 billion yen career|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060107142509/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/12/20031213p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[December 13]], [[2003]]|archivedate=2006-01-07|accessdate=2007-10-09|quote=I finally agreed to appear, but as long as the sex was only simulated. That's how my stance on never going all the way on film started.}} Even at the end of her AV career, Kobayashi's attitude towards sex remained modest. Interviewed at the time of her retirement, Kobayashi said, "I love sex. But, just because I'm an AV actress, it doesn't mean I'm brim-filled with experience. I've done orgy movies, and lesbian scenes and loads of abnormal stuff, but the world of videos isn't a real world. My normal life is really plain. I couldn't imagine having sex anywhere other than in bed and taking part in an orgy would be unthinkable. I'm happy enough with just the missionary position." Kobayashi made her debut using the stage name {{nihongo|Kaori Matsumoto|松本かおり|Matsumoto Kaori}} in May 1986 in a [[photobook]] and "image video" both titled {{nihongo|''Pounding: 19-year-old Kaori''|ときめき・かおり19歳|Tokimeki: Kaori Jukyusai''}}. However, in spite of these two releases, she believed her career was going nowhere. ===AV debut=== Not long after her debut in the non-pornographic media, Kobayashi was presented with a new opportunity. She says, "I got this offer to do a movie called ''Kinjirareta Kankei (Forbidden Relationship)''. I was told there were nude and love scenes, but nothing steamier than any ordinary movie." Shocked when she found out this was actually an adult video, she was at first reluctant. After a long discussion with her agent she finally agreed to perform in the video only if the sex was simulated. She changed her stage name to Hitomi Kobayashi for the video which was a surprise success, selling 50,000 copies. Her amazing popularity quickly made her the leading AV actress of the mid-1980s, and, not long after her debut, she had earned the title "AV Queen." Japan's censorship laws prevent the display of the sexual organs,{{cite web |last=Schönherr|first=Johannes|url=http://www.midnighteye.com/features/company-matsuo-and-the-world-of-japanese-adult-video.shtml|title=Japanese AV - A Short Introduction|date=[[December 29]], [[2006]]|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=...Japanese porn has the problem that no genitals can be seen in the videos. They are all hidden behind pixels...}} allowing Kobayashi to maintain her insistence on performing only simulated sex on camera throughout her AV career. Kobayashi considered her AV performances to be another form of acting and came up with various techniques for appearing to have actual sex. For example, she says, "I used to get the directors to tickle my feet and then tried not to laugh so it looked as though I was climaxing." Her career was put in danger when an uncensored bootleg copy of one of her videos circulated. When it could be plainly seen that the "AV Queen" was not performing real sex, Kobayashi feared that her fans would abandon her. These fears proved to be groundless, however, and her popularity continued. ===Theatrical career=== By 1987, Kobayashi's popularity had already earned her the title "Queen of AV". [[Nikkatsu]], which had been the leader of Japanese theatrical pornography since the inception of its ''[[Roman Porno]]'' series in 1971, was rapidly losing its audience to the AV industry. Though the studio had publicly condemned the AVs for years, in an attempt to lure some of Kobayashi's AV fans into the theater, Nikkatsu hired the AV Queen to star in her own series of films. The first of these, {{nihongo|''Hitomi Kobayashi's Secret Pleasure''|小林ひとみ 奥戯快感　艶|Kobayashi Hitomi ougi kaikan: tsuya}} was released in January 1987. Thomas and Yuko Mihara Weisser, in their ''Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films'', judge the film as "little more than a Playboy or Penthouse lingerie special." [[Image:Hitomi Kobayashi Hard Petting.jpg|left|''Hitomi Kobayashi's Heavy Petting'']] The second, {{nihongo|''Hitomi Kobayashi's Heavy Petting''|ハード・ペッティング|Hard Petting}}, released in March 1987, was part of Nikkatsu's new "Roman X" line, which was purportedly more "hardcore" than the standard ''Roman Porno''. However, Japan's practice of censorship by fogging out genitals made this move into "hardcore" rather pointless, since, as [[Donald Richie]] put it in his pioneering essay on the ''Pink film'', "none of the working parts are ever shown."{{cite book |last=Richie|first=Donald|title=A Lateral View: Essays on Culture and Style in Contemporary Japan|origyear=1972|year=1992|publisher=Stone Bridge Press|location=Berkeley, California|isbn= |pages=156-169|chapter=The Japanese Eroduction}} Both of these first two films were judged little more than AVs on film, and were not popular with either AV fans or the critics, who preferred Nikkatsu's older ''Roman Porno'' style. [[Image:Hitomi Kobayashi Young Girl Story.jpg|right|''Hitomi Kobayashi's Young Girl Story'']] The third in this series, {{nihongo|''Hitomi Kobayashi's Young Girl Story''|小林ひとみの令嬢物語|Kobayashi Hitomi no reijo monogatari}} (released [[December 19]], [[1987]]), came closest to the old Nikkatsu style, in that it had some semblance of a plot, but by now it was too late for the studio. It would cease production of ''Roman Porno'' in 1988, and declare bankruptcy in 1993.{{cite book |last=Macias|first=Patrick|title=TokyoScope: The Japanese Cult Film Companion|year=2001|publisher=Cadence Books|location=San Francisco|isbn=1-56931-681-3|pages=187-188|chapter=Nikkatsu's Roman Porno}} At the height of her popularity, in 1987, Kobayashi married Toshifumi Yuzawa, who would later become the president of Kobayashi's talent agency. Kobayashi put her AV performances on hold for a few years beginning in 1989 to concentrate on family matters. During this period, she never officially retired, never completely ceased appearing in AVs, and worked occasionally as a stripper. In 1988 she had a major role in the mainstream {{nihongo|''[[Evil Dead Trap]]''|死霊の罠 |Shiryo no wana}}. [[Allmovie]] describes the film as a "sickening but riveting slasher,"{{cite web |url=http://www.allmovie.com/cg/avg.dll?p=avg&sql=1:161835|first=Robert|last=Firsching|title=''Evil Dead Trap''|accessdate=2007-06-05|publisher=[[Allmovie]]}} and author and film critic Patrick Galloway calls the film, "...nothing short of a multicultural terror tour de force, featuring gruesome, brilliantly rendered sound and imagery that will stay with you to your last dying gasp."{{cite book |last=Galloway|first=Patrick|title=Asia Shock: Horror and Dark Cinema from Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, and Thailand|year=2006|publisher=Stone Bridge Press|location=Berkeley, Calif.|isbn=1-933330-12-0|pages=165|chapter=Evil Dead Trap: Shiryo no wana}} Written by [[Takashi Ishii]] and directed by [[Toshiharu Ikeda]], the film inspired two sequels. [[Japan Home Video]], which financed the film, wished to showcase Kobayashi, their top AV star at the time, as the star of the film. Director Ikeda, unsure of Kobayashi's acting abilities, instead put [[Miyuki Ono]] in the lead role of Nami, and gave Kobabayashi the supporting role of Rei. The near adult-video style sex scenes that Kobayashi performs in the film have been criticized by [[horror film]] purists as the element that prevents the film from attaining genre classic status. Galloway, however, points out that ''Evil Dead Trap'' is not pure horror, but a genre-transcending film. About the sex scenes, Galloway comments, "Ikeda handles the steamy segments like a pro, coming as he did from [[Nikkatsu]], where he honed his craft making the studio's signature ''[[List of Nikkatsu Roman Porno films|roman porno]]'' (romantic pornography).Galloway, p.168. In 1996 and 1997 Hitomi Kobayashi starred in two films for pioneering ''pink film'' director Satoru Kobayashi, director of ''Flesh Market'' ([[1962 in film|1962]]) the first ''pink film''.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0181230.htm|title={{nihongo2|小林悟}} (Kobayashi Satoru)|accessdate=2007-10-09|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]|}} ({{nihongo2|小林ひとみ　男狂い有閑マダム}}, released [[1996-07-22]] and {{nihongo2|小林ひとみの快楽熟女とろける}}, released [[1997-07-14]]) In 1997 she played the somewhat autobiographical role of fictional AV actress Mizuki Mahoro in the 1997 [[V-cinema]] film {{nihongo|''Destroying Mosaic''|モザイク崩し}}.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0180630.htm|title={{nihongo2|小林ひとみ}} (Kobayashi Hitomi)|accessdate=2007-03-19|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} Kobayashi's official return to the AV industry was in the November 1998 video ''Love Bond'' or ''Immoral Bonds''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT360|title=''Immoral Baptism''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=She made a come back in November with ''Love Bond''...}} ===Later career=== Over ten years after her debut, Kobayashi was by now a "mature woman" model, and her videos began to reflect the new niche for mature models in AVs which began to appear in the mid-1990s.{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/S_SHINOZAKI/index.html|title=Satomi Shinozaki biography|accessdate=2007-02-18|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/ Shin-Toho History]|quote=...since the middle of '90s when mature women started getting popular in porn movies.}} Her June 1999 release, ''Madame Throat'' ventured into the incest genre. Kobayashi played the role of a woman who engages in sex with her three stepsons.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VKD111|title=''Madame Throat''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her first video in the popular "documentary" genre of AVs{{cite web |last=Schönherr|first=Johannes|url=http://www.midnighteye.com/features/company-matsuo-and-the-world-of-japanese-adult-video.shtml|title=Japanese AV - A Short Introduction|date=[[December 29]], [[2006]]|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=The majority of Japanese AVs employ elements of documentary filmmaking to some degree.}} {{cite web |last=Sharp|first=Jasper|url=http://www.midnighteye.com/reviews/round-up_005.shtml|title=Every Japanese Woman Makes Her Own Curry|date=[[December 29]], [[2006]]|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=The similarities between the two genres [documentary and hardcore Adult Video] - the recording of real, non-simulated action with the rawness of the production a testament to its vérité nature - have been picked up on by critics numerous times before. One further documentary-inspired peculiarity of Japanese AV films is the lengthy interviews that usually precede the sex sequences...}}{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-31|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16|quote=...the AV cult of amateurism... any plot is shattered when a member of the team suddenly passes in front of the camera, or when the director yells at the actress during shooting for faking an orgasm. Often the viewer witnesses the whole creative process, right up to when the makeup woman cleans up the exhausted actress and she walks into her dressing room for a shower. In other words, the documentary illusion is the story.}}{{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|pages=607|chapter=Chapter 18 (Naked Dissent)|quote=...many [videos] exploit their very limitations with a conscious effort at documentary realism: the cinema-verite of pornography.}} was ''Extreme Privacy'' of September 1999.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT397|title=''Extreme Privacy''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In December she released ''Nasty Female Teacher'', another of her purely fictional videos. This video, filmed by a director using the pseudonym [[Hattori Hanzo]], has Kobayashi playing the role of a female teacher at an all-male school.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT413|title=''Nasty Female Teacher''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The turn of the millennium found Kobayashi still at work, satisfying a "new generation of horny guys" in the [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki]] omnibus video, ''KUKI DVD Buyer Boy 01''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KRM050|title=''KUKI DVD Buyer Boy 01''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In the first of a three-video "Stimulant" series, she played a psychiatrist who administers "drastic treatment measures with wishy washy impotent patients" in ''Stimulant: Doctor Hitomi Kobayashi''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT431|title=''Stimulant Doctor Hitomi Kobayashi''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Other post-come-back videos had her playing a spy,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT453|title=''Perfect Sniper''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} an angel,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT461|title=''CRUSH''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} a seductive school teacher,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2234|title=''School Teacher''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and a housewife with Shimizu''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kobayashi teamed up with Japan's first hardcore pornographic actress, [[Kyoko Aizome]],{{cite web |url=http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|title=Porn-star label now a badge of honor for actress|accessdate=2007-03-03|last=Koizumi|first=Shinichi|date=[[December 1]], [[2001]]|publisher=[[Asahi Shimbun]]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20011203120520/http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|archivedate=2001-12-03|quote=Kyoko Aizome is considered the first hard-core porn actress in Japan.}} in the February 2001 theatrical release, {{nihongo|''Kyoko Aizome vs. Hitomi Kobayashi: Sexual Excitement Competition''|愛染恭子ＶＳ小林ひとみ　発情くらべ}}. Aizome both starred in and directed the film, which was released by Nikkatsu's post-''Roman porn'' distributor of theatrical pornography, Excess films.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2001/dy000370.htm|title={{nihongo2|愛染恭子ＶＳ小林ひとみ　発情くらべ}}|accessdate=2007-05-31|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}}{{cite web |url=http://movies2.nytimes.com/gst/movies/movie.html?v_id=249637|title=Bed Partner 1988 (review)|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[[The New York Times]]|quote=...the legendary studio proper [Nikkatsu] (its stepchild, Excess Films, limped along for years thereafter...}} An adult video starring the two legendary actresses and also directed by Aizome followed in March. Entitled ''Lesbian Wives'', the video had Kobayashi and Aizome playing the wives of two ''[[yakuza]]'' bosses who become engaged in a lesbian relationship.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9144|title=''Lesbian Wives''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The same year, Kobayashi and her husband opened a nightclub in [[Roppongi]]. ===''Hitomi Kobayashi FINAL''=== [[Image:Hitomi Kobayashi Final 1.jpg|thumb|100px|left|''Hitomi Kobayashi Final: Volume 1'']] In an industry in which the average career spans only a year and produces five to ten videos,{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-12|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year-the average life-span of an AV girl-with five or ten videos to her credit...}} by 2003, Kobayashi had worked in the AV field for over a decade and a half and appeared in about 70 films. The 39 AVs in which she had starred had sold over 600,000 copies, earning about 6 billion yen. Reflecting on her Adult Video career at this time, Kobayashi commented, "I'm delighted to have led a career where I would be elevated to being called 'AV Queen,' as well as to have lasted in the business until I turned 40." Wishing to retire on a high-note, Kobayashi and her manager/husband advertised for investors in one last, 2-volume, two-and-a-half-hour AV opus. Kobayashi sought 35 investors who would contribute 500,000 yen each, for the privilege of a dinner with Kobayashi, having their names listed in the video's credits, and an exclusive viewing of the video. The video was released in two volumes as ''Hitomi Kobayashi FINAL - Disc1'' ([[December 19]], [[2003]]) and ''Disc2'' ([[December 31]], [[2003]]). The first half of the work was subtitled ''Nostalgic'', and contained highlights from videos made during the early part of her career.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD224|title=''Hitomi Kobayashi FINAL　Disc1: Nostalgic''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The second volume of the set, subtitled ''Love'', was promoted as containing Kobayashi's first and last on-screen real sex scene.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD225|title=''Hitomi Kobayashi FINAL　Disc2: LOVE''|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} [[Image:Hitomi Kobayashi Final 2.jpg|thumb|100px|right|''Hitomi Kobayashi Final: Volume 2'']] Controversy followed in the wake of the release when some of the investors in the video reported they were promised dividends from their investment, but had received none. It was claimed that Kobayashi had got over 50 investors for the project, but that her husband had used the money to pay personal debt and for recreational activities unrelated to the film. Insufficient communication with the investors, the shutting down of the film's website, the company repeatedly changing its name, and changing reports on whether or not the film made a profit added to investor complaints. In 2004, Kobayashi was reported working as a hostess at her nightclub in [[Roppongi]]. ==Filmography== ===Videos=== {| class="wikitable" ! {{Female adult bio |name = Kaoru Kuroki |photo= [[Image:Kaoru Kuroki.jpg|Kaoru Kuroki (1965-)]] |birth= {{birth date and age|1965|1|21}}Info box data from: {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?krkkor00|title=黒木 香 - Kuroki Kaoru|accessdate=2007-04-25|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} |location= [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 83-53-86(cm)
33-21-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.61}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Kaoru Kuroki'''|黒木香|Kuroki Kaoru}}, is one of [[Japan]]'s best-known AV, or [[adult video]] performers, and a multi-media personality whose role as a media counselor expressing outspoken views on sex and society have drawn comparisons to [[Ilona Staller|La Cicciolina]] and [[Ruth Westheimer|Dr. Ruth]].{{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|chapter=Bye-Bye Pink Cinema, Hello Adult Video|page=613}} == Life and career == === Early life === Kaoru Kuroki (whose stage name translates to "Blackwood Fragrance")Bornoff, p.416. was born [[January 21]], [[1965]] to a conservative, comfortably middle-class family. The daughter of an engineer, Kuroki was a naturally gifted child and showed artistic talent from an early age. She left public school at the age of 15 to attend art college, and later studied Renaissance art history at Yokohama National University.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-04-25|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16}}Bornoff, p.610 While still attending [[Yokohama National University]], Kuroki began appearing in AVs, at first considering this to be another form of art. "I wanted to approach it purely as a performance art form, but it turned out to be a lot crazier than that. In fact, if I'd continued to see porno video as art without also acknowledging it as just a fuck film, I wouldn't have gone this far."Bornoff, p.616, 618 (Quotes from Kaoru Kuroki are from interviews conducted by Nicholas Bornoff) She expresses admiration for the films of [[Nagisa Oshima]], [[Ingmar Bergman]] and [[Bernardo Bertolucci]], but, while she continues to view her AV performances as a social mission, she contrasts the AV with film. She says the AV "has a different atmosphere. It's not very sophisticated, in fact it's primitive. It's a bit like eating and menus in restaurants: you're hungry and you have a sudden craving for noodles, so you go and eat noodles. Your appetite is towards a porno video, so you go and rent whatever turns you on. And as with food, viewers can use basic ingredients to 'cook' the desired stimulation from the video themselves."Bornoff, p.611, 614, 616 === AV debut === Kuroki's adult video debut was on October 2, 1986 at the major AV company [[Crystal-Eizou]],{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1986.htm|title=1986|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} under the innovative AV director and former porn actor, Toru Muranishi. Muranishi was the creator of the documentary style often emulated in Japanese AVs. Kuroki, sharing Muranishi's opinion that the AV should have a documentary quality, moved with him when he founded his own company, Diamond Visual. Kuroki's AVs for Muranishi usually began with her seated, sharply dressed, and addressing the camera in an improvised talk on a subject like sexual liberation. This would typically be followed by a modeling segment, either nude or in a swimsuit. The remaining video footage would be taken up with various sexual performances, often involving [[Sadism and masochism|S&M]].Bornoff, p.610-611 Regarding the sex scenes, Bornoff states, "the peripherals in a Kuroki video are fairly violent stuff. She oscillates between abused sexual slave and the epitome of self-assertion with schizophrenic rapidity. To some, the documentary makes for a jarring experience; the feedback she gets from viewers can be surprising. Some say they almost find her frightening; that they can't get a hard-on."Bornoff, p.617 Kuroki responds, "The men who find my videos frightening often recognize the wilder, more uninhibited side of their own girlfriends. In order to liberate themselves, they must first take off their armour. If a man recognizes Kuroki in his wife or girlfriend, he is forced to strip it off in order to deal with her. That's how I liberate both sexes."Bornoff, p.618 === Mainstream breakthrough === Kuroki was engaged in video and magazine appearances typical to being an AV model when she caught the attention of the mainstream media in 1988. Her decision to stop shaving her under-arm hair, as a symbolic protest against Japan's long-standing censorship of the depiction of pubic hair in print or film, gained Kuroki interviews with the mainstream media. Kuroki concedes that her decision to stop shaving her under-arms worked as a gimmick to help set her apart from the mass of AV girls, but considers it also an expression of femininity and identity.Bornoff, p.612 Impressed by her ability to speak intelligently and matter-of-factly about subjects normally considered unmentionable, late-night talk shows began inviting Kuroki as a guest. Soon she had become a popular daytime TV panellist, was appearing in commercials, and served as a large department store's campaign girl. While she was popular with her male audience for her AV appearances, she also appealed to a female audience by expressing feminist view on daytime television.{{cite web |url=http://wwwmcc.murdoch.edu.au/ReadingRoom/7.2/Iwamura.html|title=Letter from Japan: From Girls Who Dress Up Like Boys To Trussed-up Porn Stars - Some of the Contemporary Heroines on the Japanese Screen|accessdate=2007-04-25 |last=Iwamura|first=Rosemary|year=1994|publisher=Continuum: The Australian Journal of Media & Culture, vol. 7 no. 2 }} Reflecting on her popularity, unprecedented for an AV model up to that time, Kuroki points out that there was a social need for someone like her. "I talk about life as a woman, but with my background, obviously the focus is on sex. I seem to have become a spokeswoman for the too many women who are embarrassed to talk about it." In 1988 Kuroki visited [[Italy]] where she met [[Cicciolina]], whom she regards as ''[[sensei]]''. She was pleased to find that many of their opinions coincided, but was surprised by [[Cicciolina]]'s discomfort with Kuroki's masochistic tendencies and preference for the S&M genre. Kuroki attributes this to cultural and personal differences, and does not feel that S&M equates to submissiveness. Indeed, Fornander points out that Kuroki made AVs in general, and S&M in particular a feminist issue in Japan. In 1989, Kuroki appeared with the new AV star and fellow Diamond Visual employee, [[Kimiko Matsuzaka]] in her second AV. In two entries of Diamond's later ''How to Sex - Sexual Information'' series of instructional sex videos, Kuroki served as the instructor/lecturer with Matsuzaka performing the physical demonstrations. After Matsuzaka's retirement from AV appearances in 1990, Kuroki also appeared with Matsuzaka at the [[Akasaka]] club, "Mirukuhooru" ("Milk Hall").{{cite book |last=Adachi|first=Noriyuki|title=アダルトな人びと - Adaruto na Hitobito ("Adult" People)|publisher=Kodansha|location=Tokyo|language=Japanese|isbn=4-06-205546-5|page=51}} ==Retirement and legacy== Kuroki retired from public life in 1994.{{cite web |title=Ex-porn star wins settlement in Japan|archiveurl=http://www.earthtimes.org/articles/show/51935.html|archivedate=2007-04-14|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/national/news/20070414p2a00m0na001000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[April 14]], [[2007]]|accessdate=2008-01-31|language=English}} In the January 2002 issue of the magazine ''Josei Seven'', and the January 2004 issue of ''Shukan Post'', stories and pictures on Kuroki's private life were printed. Kuroki claimed that as an ordinary citizen no longer in the public eye, the magazines needed her permission to print these stories. Kuroki sued the publisher, [[Shogakukan]], for 22 million yen for invasion of privacy. In April, 2007, the presiding judge ruled the articles illegal and awarded Kuroki 1.7 million yen (about $14,000). Shogakukan was reportedly considering appealing the decision. At the height of her popularity, Kuroki's AVs were averaging 17,000 sales a piece, a huge amount by industry standards, exceeding a million dollars. According to Rosemary Iwamura, "Kaoru changed the image of AV girls; she didn't seem to be making videos because of a lack of options but rather as an informed choice." For bringing the AV industry to the attention of mainstream media in Japan, as well as her polite but frank outspokenness on subjects like sex and censorship, Kjell Fornander calls her "the first high-profile AV actress." She permanently changed the way that the AV industry and AV actresses were viewed by the general public in Japan. ==Notes== {{reflist}} == Sources == * {{cite book |last=Adachi|first=Noriyuki|title=アダルトな人びと - Adaruto na Hitobito ("Adult" People)|publisher=Kodansha|location=Tokyo|language=Japanese|isbn=4-06-205546-5}} * {{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|chapter=Bye-Bye Pink Cinema, Hello Adult Video}} * {{cite web |title=Ex-porn star wins settlement in Japan|archiveurl=http://www.earthtimes.org/articles/show/51935.html|archivedate=2007-04-14|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/national/news/20070414p2a00m0na001000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[April 14]], [[2007]]|accessdate=2008-01-31|language=English}} * {{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-04-25|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16}} * {{cite web |url=http://wwwmcc.murdoch.edu.au/ReadingRoom/7.2/Iwamura.html|title=Letter from Japan: From Girls Who Dress Up Like Boys To Trussed-up Porn Stars - Some of the Contemporary Heroines on the Japanese Screen|accessdate=2007-04-25 |last=Iwamura|first=Rosemary|year=1994|publisher=Continuum: The Australian Journal of Media & Culture, vol. 7 no. 2 }} * {{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0121020.htm|title=黒木香 (Kuroki Kaoru)|accessdate=2007-04-25|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/ JMDB]}} * {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?krkkor00|title=黒木 香 - Kuroki Kaoru|accessdate=2007-04-25|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} * {{cite web |url=http://www.zakzak.co.jp/gei/2006_05/g2006052404.html |title=黒木香さんの記事「プライバシー侵害」２２０万賠償命令 (article on privacy suit)|date=2006-05-24 |accessdate=2009-09-23|publisher=[http://www.zakzak.co.jp/ www.zakzak.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} {{Japanese erotic cinema}} {{Persondata |NAME=Kuroki, Kaoru |ALTERNATIVE NAMES= |SHORT DESCRIPTION=[[Japan]]ese [[Pornographic actor|Pornographic actress]] |DATE OF BIRTH=[[January 21]] [[1965]] |PLACE OF BIRTH=[[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |DATE OF DEATH= |PLACE OF DEATH= }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kuroki, Kaoru}} [[Category:1965 births]] [[Category:Female pornographic film actors]] [[Category:Japanese actors]] [[Category:Japanese female adult models]] [[Category:Japanese pornographic film actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[ja:黒木香]]

{{Female adult bio| |name=Ai Kurosawa |photo= |birth= {{birth date and age|1982|12|24}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?krsai_00|title=黒沢愛 - Kurosawa Ai (Profile)|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}} |location= [[Shiga]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 95(F-70)-60-87(cm)
37-24-34(inch) |height= |height= {{height|m=1.67}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |blood= A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= http://www.kurosawaai.com |iafd= |imdb = 1905566 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Ai Kurosawa'''|黒沢愛|Kurosawa Ai}} is a famous award-winning [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[Model (person)|model]] and [[AV idol]]. She made her debut in the adult entertainment field in 2001, and after appearing in dozens of AVs (adult videos), she retired in 2006 but made a comeback in 2007. ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Ai Kurosawa was born in [[Shiga Prefecture]] on December 24, 1982. During high school she was very active in volleyball,{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_40.html|title=Kurosawa Ai: Best Video Interview|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=www.jmate.com}} and her hobbies as an adult include collecting [[Sanrio|Sanrio's]] [[Hello Kitty]] goods.{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=735|title=Kurosawa(Ai Kurosawa)|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kurosawa did not become sexually active at a very early age, later stating, "I was really into volleyball when I was in junior high, so I didn't have time for boys." Her first sexual encounter was during her first year in high school. She says that her first pleasurable experience with sex came later, however. "When I was seventeen," she says, "I went out with my first guy who was good at sex. He made me think 'this is real sex.'" Kurosawa dropped out of high school and worked in a variety of service-sector jobs including waitressing at a coffee shop and a sushi bar. When she was first scouted to appear in an Adult Video she was receptive to the idea. Recalling AVs she had seen in her father's collection, she later explained, "I thought some of the girls were so pretty, and I wanted to have pictures of myself taken like that." ===AV debut=== Ai Kurosawa made her AV debut with the [[Alice Japan]] label in their April 27, 2001 release ''Scenery of Love'' aka ''Love Scene''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2001.htm|title=2001|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} She played the role of a college girl who moves to [[Tokyo]] to be near a man whom she loves. When she learns that he already has a girlfriend, she seduces him.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2022|title=''Scenery of Love''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV078|title=''Love Scene''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} For her appearance in this first video, Kurosawa was described "an innocent cutie pie, who shines like a jewel." Kurosawa says of this first experience in an adult video, "I was really nervous. But it was different than I had imagined... I thought it would be more hard core." Her second video, ''Let's Make Love'', released the following month, was a non-narrative series of sex scenes. Bathtub, bathrobe and blindfolding were featured in this AV.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2025|title=''Let's Make Love''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kurosawa's third video, ''Balloon Breasts'' was released in June. Her "beautiful F-cup breasts"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV142|title=''Bubbly Heaven''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} are highlighted in this video. They are shown off in various costumes, massaged, and put to work for a ''[[paizuri]]'' demonstration.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2027|title=''Balloon Breasts''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} This work and her second video were combined on a single [[DVD]] entitled ''Let's Make Love'', and released in November 2001.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV102|title=''Let's Make Love''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kurosawa's fifth video, ''Dynamite Tits'' (released October 2001), was made with Cosmos Plan, and was her first video made with a company other than [[Alice Japan]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IG39|title=''Dynamite Tits''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In June 2001, after the filming of this AV, and after the release of her second video, Kurosawa was interviewed. When asked to comment on her work in the AV industry up to this point, she replied, "It's pretty fun... Sex in the videos is just different than in private. After all, you usually don't have sex with people watching you." Alice Japan's ''Costume-Play Doll: Sex Doll In School Uniform'' released in August 2001, had Kurosawa playing the role of a spy. By using this story device to put her in various costumes, including a cheerleader and a stuffed animal, the video made use of the popular ''[[cosplay]]'' genre of adult video in Japan.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2033|title=''Costume-Play Doll: Sex Doll In School Uniform''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In January 2002, Kurosawa co-starred with AV actress Shinohara Makoto in another ''cosplay'' video for Alice Japan, ''Costume Play Maniana 2''. Among the costumes she wore in this video were Chinese attire and a military uniform.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV112|title=''Costume Play Maniana 2''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} VIP's ''Black Love'', also from January 2002, was a dramatic mystery involving serial murders in a small village.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP111|title=''Black Love''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD082|title=''Black Love''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Ai Kurosawa [Animation Costume Play]'' (March 22, 2002), Kurosawa took the ''cosplay'' genre into animation. This VIP production featured Kurosawa having sex while dressed as various ''[[anime]]'' characters.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV142|title=''Ai Kurosawa [ Animation Costume Play]''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In September 2003 Kurosawa co-starred in the Shintōhō ''[[pink film]]'', ''Lesbian Politicians'' with Japan's first hardcore pornographic actress, [[Kyoko Aizome]], who also directed the film. Released theatrically on April 25, 2003, it was presented on video by Alice Japan in September of that year. {{cite web |url=http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|title=Porn-star label now a badge of honor for actress|accessdate=2007-06-04|last=Koizumi|first=Shinichi|date=December 1, 2001|publisher=[[Asahi Shimbun]]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20011203120520/http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|archivedate=2001-12-03|quote=Kyoko Aizome is considered the first hard-core porn actress in Japan.}}{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/data/2003/030304/jyokai.htm |title=政界レズビアン　女戒|accessdate=2009-07-13|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P.G. Web Site]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9191|title=''Lesbian Politicians''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Documentary-inspired AVs=== The similarity between many Japanese adult videos and the documentary film has often been pointed out by critics,{{cite web |url=http://www.midnighteye.com/reviews/round-up_005.shtml|title=''Every Japanese Woman Makes Her Own Curry'' (review)|accessdate=2007-06-04|last=Sharp|first=Jasper|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=The similarities between the two genres [documentary and hardcore Adult Video] - the recording of real, non-simulated action with the rawness of the production a testament to its vérité nature - have been picked up on by critics numerous times before.}} and Kurosawa's next video made use of that format. Alice Japan's ''Bubbly Heaven'', from March 2002, is in the popular [[soapland]] sub-genre of these documentary-inspired AVs. The video shows Kurosawa experiencing sexual service from an actor and a professional prostitute.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9165|title=''Bubbly Heaven''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} As Nicholas Bornoff points out, "Sometimes the documentary is faked, predictably with sadistic themes, which nonetheless strive to maintain a spontaneous veneer."{{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|chapter=Chapter 18 (Naked Dissent)|page=608}} Later Kurosawa videos in the mock-documentary genre included VIP's ''Ai Kurosawa's Sex Training'' of April 2003, in which she is tortured and forced to obey the video director's every command.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD161|title=''Ai Kurosawa's Sex Training''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Another video in the mock-documentary format was ''Ai Kurosawa's Hypnotic Fuck'' from Cosmos Plan. This AV has Kurosawa purportedly hypnotized, after which her "deep sexual desires are revealed."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=EMD003|title=''Ai Kurosawa's Hypnotic Fuck''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Atlas21=== In February 2003, after having worked with several companies, mostly [[Alice Japan]], Kurosawa released ''Sexy Pearl'', her first video for Atlas21.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A03023|title=''Sexy Pearl''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''COS-PARA'', of March 2003, was Kurosawa's entry in the company's popular ''cosplay'' series. The costumes worn by Kurosawa in this video include that of a waitress and a nurse.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A03032|title=''COS-PARA''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Atlas21 combined these two videos onto one DVD entitled ''Ai Kurosawa FREAK'', in May 2003.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=AVD139|title=''Ai Kurosawa FREAK''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Later in 2003, Kurosawa appeared in two multi-actress videos for Atlas21. The theme of ''Women On Top'' of August 2003 is explained in the title, and the video featured thirteen AV actresses having sex in the titular position.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A03081|title=''Women On Top''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Erotic Breasts Girls'' of November, 2003 starred seven AV actresses known for the beauty of their breasts.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A03111|title=''Erotic Breasts Girls''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In December 2003, Kurosawa co-starred in ''TMA The Big and Extreme Breasts Premium II'', a similar multi-actress anthology for the TMA label. This video included AV idols [[Anna Ohura]] and [[Kyoko Ayana]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=11ID090|title=''TMA The Big and Extreme Breasts Premium II''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Recognition - Retirement - Comeback=== With her "perfectly proportioned body forged from years of volleyball coupled with a G-cup bust," Kurosawa had become one of the most popular and prominent AV actresses of the early 2000s. The AV industry recognized her career on November 26, 2003, when she was given the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2003 SOD Awards|SOD Award]] for outstanding actress.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_79.html|last=Woo|first=Ex-S (translator)|date=[[2003-11-27]]|title=[[Nana Natsume]] Interview|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=www.jmate.com|quote=...when you saw Ai Kurozawa take the award for outstanding actress yesterday...}} Japanese mainstream media also paid tribute to Kurosawa when she won the "Main AV Actress Award" at the 2nd [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2nd Takeshi Kitano Awards (2001)|Takeshi Kitano Entertainment Awards]] ceremony for her work in 2000.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=ai_kurosawa|title=Ai Kurosawa|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[www.actionjav.com ActionJAV}} Ai Kurosawa retired from AVs in January 2006, but continued performing as a [[striptease]] dancer. She came out of retirement in August 2007 to do a series of videos for [[Crystal-Eizou]].{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/D_BANK/2007NOV/beejin-00588.html|title=Resurrection Goddess|accessdate=2008-10-29|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ JSexNetwork]}} In her second video for Crystal, ''Welcome to Bakunyu Soapland'', she plays a sex industry worker at a [[soapland]] establishment who gives her customers more than a massage.{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/D_BANK/2008JAN/beejin-00682.html|title=Bubble Princess|accessdate=2008-10-29|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ JSexNetwork]}} She also did a photo session for Crystal in September 2007.{{cite web |url=http://www.crystal-eizou.jp/actress/archives/2007/09/2007_0929_1900.php|title=黒沢愛 サイン＆撮影会 (Ai Kurosawa Autograph & Photo Session|date=September 29, 2007|accessdate=2008-10-29|publisher=[http://www.crystal-eizou.jp/ www.crystal-eizou.jp]|language=Japanese}} In 2008, Kurosawa ventured into a new area for her, "uncensored" videos. These do not have the mosaic blurring of the genitals found in all standard Japanese porn and are meant for international markets and underground ([[Urabon]]) Japanese sales. She appeared in a series of online videos for XVN.JP{{cite web |url=http://monthly.xvn.jp/ja/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/4622|title=全作品一覧> 黒沢愛 (Ai Kurosawa Full Works Online|accessdate=2008-10-30|publisher=[http://monthly.xvn.jp/ monthly.xvn.jp]|language=Japanese}} and several DVDs from the same material.{{cite web |url=http://dvd.xvn.jp/ja/list/actor/all/publishdate/picturecomment/10/0/4622|title=全作品一覧> 黒沢愛 (Ai Kurosawa Full Works DVD|accessdate=2008-10-30|publisher=[http://monthly.xvn.jp/ monthly.xvn.jp]|language=Japanese}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Asami Narua
Kirin Junna |homepage= http://www.june2525.com/top.html |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Jun Kusanagi''' / '''June Kusanagi'''|草凪純|Kusanagi Jun|extra=born [[June 5]], [[1978]]}} is a [[Japan]]ese model and [[AV idol]] famous for her metric [[Brassiere measurements|G-cup]]-sized bust.{{cite web |url=http://www.chinapost.com.tw/taiwan/detail.asp?ID=39085&GRP=B|title=Japanese adult-video star's shows banned over permit|accessdate=2008-02-02|date=[[July 5]], [[2003]]|publisher=[[The China Post]]}} Through her appearances in AVs, adult cinema, photobooks, magazines and television, she has been called "a super popular AV actress"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV088|title=''Mizuho Kano Special''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}, "one of Japan's most prolific and popular photo model/AV stars,"{{cite web |last=J.|first=Lee|url=http://www.asian-sirens.com/junkusanagi/bio.html|title=Biography|accessdate=2007-05-19|date=[[May 9]], [[2006]]|publisher=www.asian-sirens.com}} and "one of the biggest AV legends ever."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2220|title=''Body Play: Intoxication of Eros''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=Mizuho Kano is one of the biggest AV legends ever}} == Life and career == ===Early life=== Jun Kusanagi was born in [[Tokyo]] on [[June 5]], [[1978]].{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?knumzh00|title={{nihongo2|加納瑞穂}} - Kanou Mizuho|accessdate=2007-05-14|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} The Japanese term ''kubire'', referring to "the inward dip of a woman's waist" is often applied to Kusanagi's remarkably small waist and large breasts.{{cite web |url=http://www.jlist.com/SEARCH/kusanagi/1/|title=GRDV029 FETISH MODE -- Jun Kusanagi|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=www.jlist.com|quote=well recognized for her all natural curves known as kubire... The legendary Queen of Kubire, Jun Kusanagi...}} When asked to what she attributed her figure, Kusanagi commented, "I go to fitness club, facial cares, and I do exercise at my home too... I did sit-ups a lot of times. When I was high school, I could do 200."{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/alice/MIZUHO/TINT.HTM|title=Forever Mizuho|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp}} ===AV debut=== Kusanagi made the first of her "uniformly excellent hard core videos" in October, 1996.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1068|title=''Pin Pin Girl''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Because publishing companies own model's stage names, it is not uncommon for an AV actress to use more than one name during her career as she moves from company to company. Jun Kusanagi debuted with the MAX-A studio under the name {{nihongo|'''Mizuho Kano'''|加納瑞穂|Kanō Mizuho}}, and continued to use that name in appearances for MAX-A and [[Alice Japan]] even after she had begun using the name Jun Kusanagi for other companies. She has also used the stage names {{nihongo|'''Narua Asami'''|淺海成亞|Asami Narua}}, and {{nihongo|'''Kirin Junna'''|純名きりん|Junna Kirin}}. Her AV debut was in the video ''Pin Pin Girl''. Called a "sensational debut release," the film was directed by Yuji Sakamoto. Kusanagi appeared in five more adult videos during the next six months. She made one more video for MAX-A in November,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1071|title=''Body Play: Intoxication of Eros''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and then moved to the [[Alice Japan]] label in December where she made the other four.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1820|title=''Obscene Model''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kusanagi's first two videos included sex scenes, but focused on featuring her slim figure and large breasts. ''Obscene Model'', her first work for Alice Japan, also directed by Sakamoto, went into more adventurous realms, including S&M and "aggressive vibrator" scenes. In ''Body Report'' of January 1997, Kusanagi's figure is again the focus,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1823|title=''Body Report''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} while ''Sexy Butt'', of April 1997, focuses specifically on one part of her anatomy, and various sexual acts performed upon it. Typical of many Japanese AVs, some bondage is included in this video.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1833|title=''Sexy Butt''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kusanagi's fourth video for Alice Japan, ''Reverse Soap Heaven'', was in the popular genre of a prominent AV actress performing in a [[soapland]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9047|title=''Reverse Soap Heaven''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} After having made six AVs, Kusanagi stopped performing in videos for a time to concentrate on modeling. Her "beauty and volcanic on-screen sexuality" had quickly made her a top AV performer, and as a farewell tribute to the model, Alice Japan issued a compilation video entitled ''Mizuho Kanou Forever'' in July of 1997.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1840|title=''FOREVER''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kusanagi apparently had dental work done soon after her break from AV performance, as her subsequent appearances in [[photobook]]s and magazines show that her teeth, previously slightly crooked, were now straight. Appearing under the stage name Narua Asami, the first of Kusanagi's five [[photobook]]s, ''Queen Bee'', was released in August of 1997,{{cite web |url=http://www.asian-sirens.com/junkusanagi/books.html|title=Books|accessdate=2007-03-03|date=[[February 26]], [[2006]]|publisher=www.asian-sirens.com}} and several magazine appearances under this stage name followed. ===First AV come-back=== Kusanagi's come-back video, again with [[Alice Japan]] under the name Mizuho Kano, was in March 1998 with ''Big Tits Rebirth''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1871|title=''Big Tits Rebirth''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} After this come-back she released about one video a month for the next year and a half.{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=109|title=Mizuho (Kanou Mizuho)|accessdate=2007-05-15|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Upon her return to the AV industry, an observer commented, "Her body is more mature and mysterious now."{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/variety/mon/intervie/W17/|title=Mizuho Kanou: 15 naughty questions; A Maniac course|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp}} For Eichi Publishing, Kusanagi appeared in her second photobook, ''Kubire'', which was released in April of 1998. This was her first appearance under the name Jun Kusanagi. She continued appearing in videos for Alice Japan as Mizuho Kano, while making video and magazine appearances as Jun Kusanagi when working for Eichi during this same period. The photobook ''Kubire 2'' came out in December of 1998. Kusanagi's videos at this time delved into several of the most popular genres in Japanese adult videos, including S&M,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1880|title=''Tits -NYUTON-tNYUTON''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}, ''[[cosplay]]'',{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1874|title=''Big Tits Dynamite''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A083|title=''NEO Bloody Uniform Connection 43''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and a documentary-style video which was filmed in her own apartment.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A074|title=''Legend Of An AV Idol''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Two other documentary-style videos focused on the video audience. In ''Home Delivery Soapland'', Kusanagi makes house-calls for "the poor lonely guy who watches our videos."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=S98096|title=''Home Delivery Soapland''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kusanagi's fans were invited to enter an Internet contest, and the winners appeared with the actress in the January 1999 release, ''Saint Lady Molester''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9090|title=''Saint Lady Molester''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In her February, 1999 video for Alice Japan, ''Super Horny Monsters Legend 3'', she was teamed with fellow big-bust AV model Mai Shiina.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV011|title=''Super Horny Monsters Legend 3''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Second retirement and come-back=== In August 1999, Kusanagi again released a farewell appearance, the photobook ''Jun'', and a calendar for the year 2000. Two years later, with ''[[Playboy]]'' photographer, Kim Mizuno, Kusanagi produced an 80-page, hardcover volume entitled ''Dangerous Curve''.{{cite web |url=http://www.mzwomen.com/junebook.html|title=Dangerous Curve Photo Book featuring June Kusanagi|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=www.mzwomen.com}} Released in April 2001, the photography in the book was called, "right up there with Kim's best work." However Kusanagi appeared to have lost a lot of weight since her retirement, leading to speculation that she may have been suffering from [[anorexia nervosa]].{{cite web |url=http://www.asian-sirens.com/junkusanagi/news.html|title=Great News and Sad News|accessdate=2007-03-03|date=[[May 9]], [[2006]]|publisher=www.asian-sirens.com}} In her diary she expressed disappointment that she felt her career had failed. It could be due to a combination of bad business decisions, and the fact that she passed her prime so quickly.{{cite web |url=http://www.june2525.com/2525d-frame.html|title=香港より・・・|accessdate=2008-02-06|date=[[June 18]],[[2005]]|language=Japanese}} Another retirement from public life during the first half of the 2000s followed, during which time the Alice Japan, Atlas21 and MAX-A labels released several compilations of scenes from Kusanagi's previous work, as well as re-issues of the original videos. In July 2003, Kusanagi followed AV idols [[Ai Iijima]] and [[Madoka Ozawa]] by seeking to expand her career in [[Taiwan]]. She performed at a multimedia show in [[Taipei]]'s World Trade Center. Though her appearance in the country created a media frenzy, she became a subject of countroversy when it was claimed that she was working in the country without a permit. She had to cancel performances on the second day of her planned 3-day tour of the country. Kusanagi's agent in Taiwan claimed that she was not actually working in the country, but that she was only engaging in photo opportunities, shopping and visiting fans. Local Chinese-language newspapers, however, reported that she had been paid.{{cite news |first=Yun-Ping|last=Chang|title=Porn star subject of growing probe|url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/taiwan/archives/2003/07/05/2003058110|publisher=[[Taipei Times]]|date=[[July 5]], [[2003]]|accessdate=2007-08-04}} In May 2006, ten years after her debut, she released a new DVD with [[Crystal-Eizou]] called {{nihongo|''Comeback!! Queen of Kubire Jun Kusanagi''|復活！！くびれの女王 草凪純}}. The June issue of ''Urecco'' magazine devoted a feature to Kusanagi's return to the AV world.{{cite web |url=http://www.jlist.com/SEARCH/kusanagi/1/|title=MGZ643 Urecco June 2006 vol. 259|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=www.jlist.com}} Kusanagi made several more videos after this second comeback, many in the "mature woman" or "madame" genre for [[Madonna (studio)|Madonna]], but also including [[Creampie (sexual act)|nakadashi]] and simulated rape releases for [[Attackers]] and an interracial video (''Black Men And Promiscuity'') for [[Moodyz]]. Kusanagi has been featured in U.S. publications ''[[Playboy]]'' and ''[[Penthouse (magazine)|Penthouse]]'', an unusual achievement for a Japan-based model.{{cite web |url=http://www.shinnihoneizo.co.jp/xces/2009/kaisetu/15-a.html|title= 高校教師 爆乳をもてあそばれて|accessdate=2009-09-14|publisher=[http://www.shinnihoneizo.co.jp/xces/ www.shinnihoneizo.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} She has appeared on various Japanese TV shows including ''[[Gilgamesh Night]]'' and the [[TV Asahi]] variety show [[:ja:トゥナイト2|''Tonight 2'']]. At the height of her career she was called the most popular AV actress{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DC043|title=''Female Ass''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=The most popular AV actress...}}. Jun Kusanagi's successful career has made her "one of the legends of AV".{{cite web |url=http://www.jlist.com/SEARCH/kusanagi/1/|title=GRDV029 FETISH MODE -- Jun Kusanagi|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=www.jlist.com|quote=One of the legends of AV has come back to the spotlight! {{Female adult bio |name = Kimiko Matsuzaka |photo =[[Image:Kimiko Matsuzaka.jpg|Kimiko Matsuzaka (1969-)]] |birth= [[February 10]] or [[October 21]], [[1969]]Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?mtzkmk00|title={{nihongo2|松坂季実子}} – Matsuzaka Kimiko|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} |location= [[Kobe]], [[Japan]] |measurements= 110.7(G-75)-60-90(cm)
44-24-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |eye color= Black |hair color= Black |natural breasts=yes |blood= B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |imdb = }} {{nihongo|'''Kimiko Matsuzaka'''|松坂 季実子|Matsuzaka Kimiko}} is a Japanese [[AV idol]] who was prominent during the late-1980s and early-1990s noted for her large [[breasts]]. Authorities on the AV point to Matsuzaka's career as the beginning of the "Big Bust Boom" in Japan. Adachi, Noriyuki. (1992). {{nihongo|''"Adult" People''|アダルトな人びと|Adaruto na Hitobito}} Kodansha. ISBN 4-06-205546-5. p.50 == Life and career == === AV Debut === Born in [[Kobe]] either February 10, or October 21, 1969, Kimiko Matsuzaka was attending [[Otsuma Women's University]] when she was scouted by AV director {{nihongo|[[Toru Muranishi]]|[[:ja:村西とおる|村西とおる]]}}. She made her debut with {{nihongo|Diamond Image|[[:ja:ダイヤモンド映像|ダイヤモンド映像]]}} in 1989. Her stage name was taken from a combination of "Matsuzaka", from actress {{nihongo|[[Keiko Matsuzaka]]|[[:ja:松坂慶子|松坂慶子]]}}, and "Kimiko" from the actress {{nihongo|[[Kimiko Ikegami]]|[[:ja:池上季実子|池上季実子]]}}. Her bust size was advertised as 110.7 centimeters (43 1/2 inches), but this was a publicity gimmick employing a pun on "ii onna" or "good woman" (110 pronounced "ii o", and "7" resembling the [[Katakana]] "{{nihongo2|ナ}}" – "na"). According to {{nihongo|[[:ja:本橋信宏|Motohashi Nobuhiro]]|本橋信宏}}, her bust size was actually in the upper 90s. Though large breasts had been admired in Japanese erotic cinema since at least the 1950s, with the popularity of actress [[Michiko Maeda|Maeda Michiko]],{{cite book|author=Anderson, Joseph L. and Donald Richie|year=1982|title=The Japanese Film: Art and Industry (Expanded Edition)|publisher=Princeton University Press|location=Princeton, New Jersey|isbn=0-691-00792-6}}, p.266-267 the success of Matsuzaka, and other large-breasted performers of this time, such as {{nihongo|Reiko Kato|[[:ja:かとうれいこ|かとうれいこ]]}} led the establishment of the Big Bust genre as part of the Japanese AV industry. === Success === Originally scheduled for only one video, her debut video, {{nihongo|''Dekkaino, Mekke!''|でっか～いの、めっけ!}}{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1989.htm|title=1989|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} became a huge hit for the Diamond Eizo company, selling several thousand copies shortly after its release on [[February 1]], [[1989]]. Capitalizing on this success, Diamond Image named the first day of the month {{nihongo|"Large Breast Day"|"巨乳の日"|Kyonyu no Hi}}, and released a Kimiko Matsuzaka video on the first day of each month for nearly two years. Noriyuki Adachi singles out Matsuzaka's second AV, ''1107 Millimeter Impression'', as the one that set the {{nihongo|"Big Bust Boom"|巨乳ブーム|"Kyonyu Boom"}} "on fire." The storyline of her fifth video, "Daughter!" (released June 1, 1989), had her playing the role of a news reporter. From this point on, she would be cast in a different profession with each appearance. In her following videos she would play a doctor, an attorney, a journalist, a professional golfer, and even a high government official, among other occupations. {{nihongo|''Popular Weekly''|週刊大衆}} 12/11/1989 "Heisei no Madonna" – contains a review of all her videos up to #10, ''Director Kimiko'' In late-1989 and mid-1990, she appeared with [[Kaoru Kuroki]] in director Toru Muranishi's series of instructional sex videos demonstrating sexual techniques and the use of sexual toys while Kuroki provided the lecture/commentary. By now known internationally as a "queen of pornos", in an interview with [[Associated Press]] in mid-1990, it was reported that Matsuzaka made over five times the average salary for a woman her age. Matsuzaka said that she was happy with her career and commented, "I see myself as a success story."{{cite news |title=Japanese Values Changing|curly=y |agency=[[Associated Press]]|work=[[The Intelligencer (Doylestown, Pennsylvania)|The Intelligencer]]|publisher=[[Calkins Media]]|location=[[Doylestown, Pennsylvania]]|page=27|date=1990-06-19}} Beyond her high-profile AV career, Matsuzaka had by now become a mainstream celebrity. She was one of the voice actresses for two volumes of an adult science-fiction anime video ({{nihongo2|妖獣教室}}), released May 25 and July 27, 1990 by [[Daiei]] through its "dez" label, and was very active appearing in photo books and weekly magazines, having regular appearances in {{nihongo|''Popular Weekly''|週刊大衆}} and {{nihongo|''Tokyo Sports Newspaper''|[http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/ 東京スポーツ新聞]}}. With actor/comedian [[LaSalle Ishii]], she recorded the musical vocal duet {{nihongo|''Soresore dousuruno?''|ソレソレどうするの?}}, which was released on November 25, 1990. ''[[Stars and Stripes (newspaper)|Pacific Stars and Stripes]]'' reported that Matsuzaka had made several appearances in prime-time television dramas, and was a talkshow regular.{{cite news |title=One Japanese Industry That's Not Thriving; Changing Values Are Impediments to Sex Business|curly=y |agency=[[Associated Press]]|work=[[Stars and Stripes (newspaper)|Pacific Stars and Stripes]]|publisher=[[United States Department of Defense]]|location=[[Washington, D.C.]]|page=9|date=1990-06-18}} She was also a regular on television variety shows such as {{nihongo|''All Night Fuji''|オールナイトフジ}}. ''Dolive'' February, 1990, p.59 === Retirement === Matsuzaka made her last AV, ''Sexual Game'', in October 1990. AV director Toru Muranishi called her departure from the industry one of the worst news items affecting the AV industry in 1990.Adachi, p.50 A year and eight months after her debut, she had starred in 21 AVs, helping to build Muranishi's company, Diamond Image, into the largest AV company in Japan. Within a year after Matsuzaka's departure, Diamond Image would declare bankruptcy. Fornander, Kjell. (1992). [http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html "A Star is Porn"] in ''[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]'', July 1992. After retirement from AV appearances, she appeared with Kaoru Kuroki at the [[Akasaka]] club, "Mirukuhooru" ("Milk Hall").Adachi, p.51 She ceased all public appearances in the spring of 1991, citing personal problems. It was later reported that she had taken up work as a commuting office lady. {{nihongo|''Friday''|フライデー}} September 24, 1993 and "Where are They Now" -{{nihongo2|「あの人は今」}}, {{nihongo|''Weekly Post''|週刊ポスト}} July 26th, 1996 ==Filmography== ===AVs=== ''(All for {{nihongo|Diamond Eizo|ダイヤモンド映像}} unless noted)'' # {{nihongo2|でっか～いの、めっけ!}} （2/1/1989） (Debut) (50 min.) # {{nihongo|''1107 Millimeter Impression''|1107（いいおんな）の感動}} （3/1/1989） Co-starring [[Kaoru Kuroki|Kuroki Kaoru]], Aoki Kotomi (50 min.) # {{nihongo2|爆乳エンゼル　乳淫感者}}　（4/1/1989） (50 min.) # {{nihongo|''Breasts and Son''|乳と息子}} (5/1/1989) (50 min.) # {{nihongo|''Daughter!''|"娘よ!!"}} （6/1/1989） (50 min.) # {{nihongo2|乳酷管理法違反}}　（7/1/1989) (50 min.) # {{nihongo|''Woman Doctor * Kimiko''|女医・季実子}} (8/1/1989) (50 min.) # {{nihongo|''Pro Golfer! Kimiko''|プロゴルファー・季実子}} (9/1/1989) (60 min.) # {{nihongo|''Attorney * Kimiko''|弁護士・季実子}} (10/1/1989) # {{nihongo|''Director! Kimiko''|ディレクター・季実子}} (11/1/1989) # {{nihongo|''Woman Teacher * Kimiko''|女教師・季実子}} (12/1/1989) # {{nihongo|''High Government Official * Kimiko * Part 1''|高級官僚・季実子 上巻}} (1/1/1990) # {{nihongo|''High Government Official * Kimiko * Part 2''|高級官僚・季実子 下巻}} (1/1/1990) # {{nihongo|''Journalist * Kimiko''|新聞記者・季実子}} (2/1/1990) # {{nihongo2|代議士妻・季実子}}　（3/1/1990) # {{nihongo|''High Government Official * Kimiko''|高級官僚・季実子 完結編}} (Complete Compilation) (4/1/1990) # {{nihongo2|とてつもないから見てちょうだい}}　（5/1/1990) # {{nihongo2|みやびやかなあげまん}}　（6/1/1990) # {{nihongo2|ふるさと創性論 季実子の玉おこし}}　（7/1/1990) # {{nihongo2|いけないあなた いきすぎる私}} (8/1/1990) (60 min.) # {{nihongo|''Sexual Game''|セクシャルゲーム}} Co-starring Miyuki Saori, Kuroki Kaori (10/1/1990) === "How To" videos === ''(All for Bookman Company)'' * {{nihongo|''How to Sex – Sexual Information #3, Middle Compilation''|性生活の知恵3　中級編}} Co-starring: Kuroki Kaori, Director: Muranishi Touru （December 1989） * {{nihongo|''How to Sex – Sexual Information #4, Last Compilation''|性生活の知恵4　上級編}} Co-starring: Kuroki Kaori, Director: Muranishi Touru (December 1989) * {{nihongo|''Sexual Information #5 – Adult Toys – Toy Catalogue''|性生活の知恵5　大人の玩具　商品カタログ}} Co-starring Takakura Mariko, Nozaka Natsumi, Kashiwagi Yoshimi, Director: Muranishi Touru (May 1990) * {{nihongo|''Sexual Information #6 – Adult Toys – Release of Top Secrets''|性生活の知恵6　大人の玩具　マル秘大公開}} Co-starring Takakura Mariko, Nozaka Natsumi, Kashiwagi Yoshimi, Director: Muranishi Touru, (May 1990)''Sexual Information 1~6 Catalogue'', Bookman Company, 1990 ===Other videos=== * ''Viva! Tahiti'' (1990) Co-starring Takakura Mariko, Director: Touru Muranishi (Beverly Hills Video) ''Orenji'' (オレンジ) magazine, June 1990, p.138 === Adult anime (voice) === * {{nihongo2|妖獣教室}} (5/25/1990, dez) * {{nihongo2|妖獣教室}} 2 (7/27/1990, dez)''Orenji'' magazine, June 1990 ==Magazine appearances== * ''Actress'' November 1990 * ''Appuru'' (アップル通信) May 1989, July 1990, May 1996 * ''Best Camera'' May 1989, October 1990 * ''[[:ja:DoLiVe 月刊ドリブ|DoLiVe]]'' February 1990 p.50-59 ("The Leader * Matsuzaka Kimiko * AV Actress")- Interview & B&W photos, and centerfold * {{nihongo|''Don Don''|ドンドン}} May 1989 * {{nihongo|''Eiga Guide''|映画ガイド}} April 1990 * ''Goro'' June 8, 1989 * {{nihongo|''Jitsuwashi''|[[:ja:実話誌|実話誌]]}} 9/14/1989 * {{nihongo|''Orenji''|オレンジ通信}} April 1989, June 1989 (Video Actress Interview) p.76-78, January 1990, June 1990, September 1996 [http://www.accesstry.com/aidoru/av-TusinOre.html] * {{nihongo|''Playboy Weekly''|[http://wpb.shueisha.co.jp/ WEEKLY プレイボーイ]}} 5/30/1989, 8/29/1989 * {{nihongo|''Popular Weekly''|週刊大衆}} 7/24/1989, 9/3/1990, 12/11/1989 * {{nihongo|''Sukora''|[[:ja:スコラ|スコラ]]}} 9/14/1989 * {{nihongo|''[[:ja:週刊現代|Shukan Gendai]]''|[http://kodansha.cplaza.ne.jp/wgendai/ 週刊現代]}}10/28/1989 == Photo books == * {{nihongo2|でっか～いの、めっけ!}} (9/30/1989) ISBN 4-89405-003-X * ''KIMIKO PART 2'' (12/20/1989) ISBN 4-89405-010-2 * ''KIMIKO PART 3'' (3/20/1990) ISBN 4-89405-022-6 * ''Matsuzaka Kimiko 4'' (8/25/1990) Photographer: Touru Muranishi ISBN 4-89405-044-7 * ''Matsuzaka Kimiko Photo Collection'' (8/30/1993) ISBN 4-88723-003-6 * ''Matsuzaka Kimiko Revival Collection'' (6/20/2003) ISBN 4-8463-0514-7 ==Notes== {{reflist}} ==Bibliography== * Adachi, Noriyuki.
