{{Female adult bio | name = Aika Miura | photo = | birth = {{birth date and age|1975|11|02}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?muraik00|title=三浦あいか - Miura Aika|accessdate=2007-06-11|work=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=271|title=Aika (Miura Aika)|accessdate=2007-06-11|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} | location = [[Kanagawa Prefecture]], [[Japan]] | birthname = Yuu Hasegawa{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VKD019|title=''AIKA x AIKA''|accessdate=2007-06-11|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} | spouse = | death = | measurements = 84-59-83(cm)
33-23-33(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.55}} | weight = | shoe size = | eye color = | hair color = | skin color = | blood = O | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | alias = AIKA{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT159|title=''AIKA''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} | films = | homepage = | iafd = | egafd = | bgafd = | imdb = 0594229 | afdb = |eurobabeindex = | spelling = }} {{nihongo|'''Aika Miura'''|三浦あいか|Miura Aika}} is a popular and award-winning Japanese [[AV idol]] who made a clear mark on the AV industry.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KDH084|title=''AIKA LOVEs YOU 2''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In a remarkably long and prolific career for an AV actress, she released an average of one film a month over a seven year period-- excepting 1998-- before she retired in 2002.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_26.html|title=Special Interview of Miura Aika|year=2001|accessdate=2007-06-11|work=[http://www.jmate.com/ Jmate]}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Aika's birth name is {{nihongo|Yuu Hasegawa|長谷川優|Hasegawa Yuu}}. She was born to a conservative family in [[Kanagawa Prefecture]], [[Japan]] on November 2, 1975.{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?muraik00|title=三浦あいか - Miura Aika|accessdate=2007-06-11|work=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} Though her family did not approve of her working in the AV industry, they remained close to her throughout her career. When her father once scolded her for making money from pleasure, Miura pointed out that some of her performances involved [[Bondage (BDSM)|bondage]] and [[Sadism and masochism|S&M]], and observed, "It's not as fun as you think!" ===Debut and early career=== Miura made her AV debut on [[Kuki Inc.|KUKI]]'s Tank label in the March 1995 release ''I Love You'',{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1995.htm|title=1995|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} ''Summer Memory'' (September 1995) was in the popular but controversial exhibitionistic genre of Japanese adult video which would later earn AV actress [[Asuka Yuki]] an arrest a decade later.{{cite news |title=Naked walk earns bust for actress|url=http://www.upi.com/NewsTrack/Top_News/2006/08/25/naked_walk_earns_bust_for_actress/8133/|work=[[United Press International]]|date=August 25, 2006|accessdate=2007-06-06}} In Miura's video all the sex scenes were filmed outside, including at a beach.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT116|title=''Summer Memory''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Costume Doll'' (October 1995), Miura entered the ''[[cosplay]]'' genre. Among the costumes she wore in this video were those of a nurse, a bride, a high school girl, and a pizza delivery girl.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT122|title=''Costume Doll''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Setting off on a Trip'' (November 1995) had Miura in the role of a young woman who travels to [[Fukuoka Prefecture|Fukuoka]] to meet a famous artist, only to discover that the man is a lecherous old pervert.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT126|title=''Setting off on a Trip''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her December 1995 video, ''Fantasy'', won an award from ''Video Boy'' magazine,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT133|title=''Fantasy''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}"probably the most popular AV mag in Japan".{{cite web |url=http://www.angelfire.com/ms2/jav/magz.htm|title=Japanese AV Magazines|accessdate=2009-08-24|publisher=[http://www.angelfire.com/ www.angelfire.com]}} ''Wet & Deep Love'', released January 1996, had Miura working in the popular rape and S&M genres of Japanese pornography.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT137|title=''Wet & Deep Love''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Short retirement and return=== With ''Countdown'', from February 1996, Miura announced the first of her temporary retirements, which would last only until May.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT143|title=''Countdown''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} During this break, Kuki released ''Aika Miura Maniac'' (April 1996), a collection of never-before-seen scenes from previous videos.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT154|title=''Aika Miura Mania''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In May 1996, Miura returned and adopted the single-name "AIKA", all in Roman-alphabet capitals, as her stage name.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1996.htm|title=1996|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} ''Poison'' (June 1996) had Miura shedding the somewhat innocent personona she had cultivated until then by introducing scenes of anal sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT166|title=''POISON''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kjell Fornander describes the trajectory that Miura's career had assumed at this point. He says, "Viewers are invited to follow, from appearance to appearance, her sexual initiation, dawning self-awareness and gradual acceptance of her inner, dark depths."{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-08-10|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16|language=English}} ''1000 Carat'', released in July 1996, continued this exploration of more adventurous and extreme themes. In this video, Miura takes the dominant role in the sex scenes in this erotic drama in which she plays a challenging and serious role.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT174|title=''1000 carat''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''AIKA Freak'', released the following month, included scenes of outdoor group sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT179|title=''ＡＩＫＡ ＦＥＲＡＫ[sic]''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In October 1996, Miura appeared in the 26th entry in the Atlas label's popular and long-running ''NEO Bloody Uniform'' series of ''cosplay''-themed videos.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=6A105|title=''NEO Bloody Uniform Connection 26''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} At Atlas, Miura made a three-year career retrospective video entitled ''Legend Of An AV Idol''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=7A092|title=''Legend Of An AV Idol''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} [[Alice Japan]]'s ''Inhumanity'' (December 1997), had Miura in the role of a newlywed bride who suffers from amnesia after being hit by a car. Nine different men claim to be her husband, and she must perform fellatio on each one to find out who the real groom is. They all turn out to be imposters when the real husband shows up and the video concludes with Miura engaging in sex with him.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9063|title=''Inhumanity''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} With ''The Last Video -Aika Miura-'', the actress again took a break from appearing in AVs. Though she would continue pursuing her career as a stripper, this vacation from the AV industry would last from January until November 1998.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A011|title=''The Last Video -Aika Miura-''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Final come-back and retirement=== Though she had repeatedly retired and come back, after five years Miura still had a strong following. In 2000 Kuki released several DVD collections of her previous videos for her fan-base.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KDV096|title=''AIKA LOVEs YOU 3''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In 2001, six years after her debut, she starred in the theatrically-released, widescreen film ''Aika Miura - Streetcar Ecstasy'' (三浦あいか　痴漢電車エクスタシー).{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2001/dy002280.htm|title=三浦あいか　痴漢電車エクスタシー|accessdate=2007-06-11|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} Miura retired from AVs the following year. Even in retirement, Miura remained popular enough to warrant further DVD compilation releases,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KDV096|title=''FANTASTIC''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and five years after her final retirement a semi-documentary video featuring scenes from throughout her career, was released in May 2007.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DAJ082|title=''Best of Best, Aika Miura, Deluxe''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 34-23-33(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.50}} | weight = {{height|kg=43}} | shoe size = 23 cm | eye color = | hair color = | skin color = | natural bust = | pubic hair = | blood = O | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | alias = | films = | homepage = | iafd = | imdb = | afdb = }} {{nihongo|'''Haruki Mizuno'''|水野はるき|Mizuno Haruki}} is a popular [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol|AV]], [[gravure idol]], and mainstream media celebrity. ==Life and career== Mizuno was born in [[Tokyo]] on [[July 21]] 1979. She dropped out of high school, and thinks that if she had not become an AV star, she would be working at [[soapland]].{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_28.html|title=Body Park Vol. 111: Haruki Mizuno (Interview)|accessdate=2007-02-22|publisher=www.jmate.com}} Taking her screen name from the actress [[Maki Mizuno]], whom she considers a role model, Mizuno made her AV debut in December 1997.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1997.htm|title=1997|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her first video, ''Barefoot Fairy'', was for the Sexia company's Try Heart label.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA032|title=''Barefoot Fairy''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She quickly a sensation in the AV field,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA036|title=''Take Off The Ribbon''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} as well as a popular [[gravure idol]]. For nearly one year, Mizuno made about one video a month for Sexia.{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=604|title=Haruki (Mizuno Haruki) (Profile)|accessdate=2007-02-22|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AVIdol Directory]}} Playing off her "Lolita" image, her third video, the March 1998 release ''Sweet Baby'', had Mizuno portraying the viewer's younger sister.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA041|title=''Sweet Baby''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her May, 1998 release, ''Pretty Wife 4: Currently In Training'', had Mizuno in the role of a young newlywed who must endure training and discipline not only from her husband, but also from his creditors.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA050|title=''Pretty Wife 4''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Sorry'', from August of 1998, Mizuno appeared in the popular student-teacher theme of Japanese AVs, as a student having an affair with her middle-aged teacher.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA059|title=''Sorry''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} By September 1998, Mizuno felt exhausted physically and mentally, and decided to take a hiatus from the AV industry, which would last two years. During her break from AV performances, Mizuno worked in the Japanese mainstream media, and was a regular on the late night [[TV Asahi]] show, {{nihongo|''Blonde Teacher''|金髪先生}} between 1997 and 1998.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=OSV036|title=''Melody''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her return to AV and Sexia's Try Heart label was with the September 2000 release, ''Reunion''. The AV industry called Mizuno's come-back, "[t]he most shocking event of the last half of this year."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA183|title=''Reunion''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} More comfortable with the AV field after her return, Mizuno began experimenting with genres in which she had previously refused to perform. Her second come-back video, ''Make Love'' (October, 2000), was her first to include [[Bondage (BDSM)|bondage]] and rape scenes.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA187|title=''Make Love''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Nearly ten years after her debut, and eight years after her apparent retirement from the AV field in 2002, her popularity was such that in February, 2007, [http://www.amazon.co.jp/s?__mk_ja_JP=%83J%83%5E%83J%83i&url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=%90%85%96%EC%82%CD%82%E9%82%AB Amazon] still listed over 50 video items to her credit. Sixteen volumes of photo books either devoted entirely to her, such as ''[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4754212002 FAIRY TALE―{{nihongo2|水野はるき写真集}}]'' (released in October, 1998), or in which she appeared with other models were also in print. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Female adult bio| |photo= |birth= {{birth date and age|1970|2|10}} |location= [[Chiba Prefecture]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 124([[Brassiere measurements|Q-cup]])-66-96(cm)
48-26-37(inch){{cite web |url=http://www.av-channel.com/ppv/actress/actress_id=1131|title={{nihongo2|森川まりこ プロフィール}} - ''Morikawa Mariko profile''|accessdate=2008-06-22|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.av-channel.com/ www.av-channel.com]}} |height= {{height|m=1.50}} |weight= |eye color= |hair color= |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= }} {{nihongo|'''Mariko Morikawa'''|森川まりこ|Morikawa Mariko}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV idol]] known for her very large, natural [[breasts]]. Though publicity touted her Japanese brassiere size as a 124-centimeter "Q-cup," her premier video stated that she was a 104-centimeter I-cup. ==Life and career== Mariko Morikawa first appeared in magazine layouts and videos in the early 1990s. She became one of [[Tokyo Topless]]' leading models, appearing in eight layouts there, beginning with [http://tokyotopless.com/model/MarikoMORIKAWA/01/ #1] and concluding with [http://tokyotopless.com/model/MarikoMORIKAWA/07/ #7]. She also served as the hostess of their Internet radio program. Her debut AV was the July 1994 Athena release, {{nihongo|''Tits Way Too Huge''|巨大すぎるデカパイ|Kyodai Sugiru Dekapai}}.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1994.htm|title=1994|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Morikawa starred in a theatrical film which was released [[January 5]], [[1995]]. Released through [[Nikkatsu]]'s post-''Roman Porno'' Excess label,{{cite web |url=http://194.21.179.166/cecudine/fe_2002/eng/PinkEiga2002.htm|title=Vital flesh: the mysterious world of Pink Eiga|accessdate=2007-02-19|last=Domenig|first=Roland|date= |year=2002|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20041118094603/http://194.21.179.166/cecudine/fe_2002/eng/PinkEiga2002.htm|archivedate=2004-11-18|quote=Excess is an offshoot of Nikkatsu, established in 1988 when Nikkatsu ended Roman Porno production.}} ''Big Tit Monastery''' was a big-bust variation on the [[nunsploitation]] genre. Morikawa's fame reached the [[United States]] where she was featured on the front and back covers of the Summer 1999 issue of ''Oriental Cinema''. Reviewing her ''Cho Nyu Densetsu Q Kono Chichi O Kurae - Morikawa Mariko'', author and critic Damon Foster calls the video "just typical pornographic nonsense, with nudity galore..." About the lead actress, Foster says, "Mariko Morikawa may be considered too 'pudgy' for most men's taste, but I think she's an intense beauty."Foster, Damon. (2000). ''Cho Nyu Densetsu Q Kono Chichi O Kurae - Morikawa Mariko'' review in ''Oriental Cinema'' #18 (Summer, 1999), p.29. Morikawa posed and appeared in videos while pregnant before apparently dropping out of sight about 2004. On May 23,2007 Mariko made her reappearance on Tokyo Topless with two additional photo sets ([http://tokyotopless.com/model/MarikoMORIKAWA/08/ #8] and [http://tokyotopless.com/model/MarikoMORIKAWA/09/ #9]). == Selected Appearances == === Videos === * ''Kyodai Sugiru Dekapai'' (Athena) July, 1994 (Debut) * ''124 Centimeter Sister'' * ''Bake-nyu, 123 cm Q-Cup Morikawa Mariko * ''Big Breast Kidnap and Bondage'' * ''Bomber Girl Vol.6'' * ''Boobs Pregnant'' * ''Dynamite Q-Cup'' * ''Legendary Super Tits Q'' (Athena) * ''Nuru Nuru Morikawa Mariko'' * ''Overheat'' * ''Paizuri Battle'' with Chiharu Mizushima * ''Paizuri Tengoku'' * ''Q-CUP! BIG TITS'' * ''Q-Cup Privacy - Dosukebe KyodaiNyu'' (Athena) * ''Q-Cup Slave'' * ''Yureru Bakunyuu'' === Theatrical releases === * ''Big Tit Monastery'' (巨乳修道院) January 5, 1995 (Excess Films, Widescreen, 60 min.){{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/1995/ds000060.htm|title=巨乳修道院|accessdate=2007-07-21|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} === Magazines === * ''D-Cup Japan'' August, 1994 * ''D-Cup Japan'' September, 1994 * ''D-Cup Japan'' October, 1994 * ''D-Cup Japan'' December, 1994 * ''D-Cup Japan'' April, 1995 * ''D-Cup Japan'' May, 1995 * ''D-Cup Japan'' January, 1996 * ''Gals D'' July, 1994 * ''Gals D'' September, 1994 * ''Gals D'' October, 1994 * ''Gals D'' December, 1994 === Photo Books === * ''MARIKO'' (Kasakura) Oct 5, 1994 === Radio === * Host of ''Tokyo Topless''' Internet radio program ==Notes== {{reflist}} == Sources == * Foster, Damon. 35-24-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Black |hair color= Black |skin color= |natural bust= |blood= O |ethnicity= |alias= |films= |homepage= http://blog.dmm.co.jp/actress/murasaki_ayano/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= Ayano_Murasaki }} '''Ayano Murasaki''' (紫彩乃 - Murasaki Ayano) is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[adult video]] (AV) or [[pornographic actress]]. She has been described as one of the top ''jukujo'' (熟女) or "mature" actresses in the AV field.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=PTV360|title=Hotaru Akane and Ayano Murasaki SPLASH HEAVEN - 115 minutes|accessdate=2007-06-06|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=...mature top actress 'Ayano Murasaki'...}} ==Life and career== Ayano Murasaki was born in the [[Ibaraki Prefecture]] of [[Japan]] on March 29, 1969. She made her adult video debut in late 2003 at the age of 34. The market for "mature woman" or "madame" actresses appeared in Japanese AV in the mid-1990s{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/S_SHINOZAKI/index.html|title=Satomi Shinozaki biography|accessdate=2007-02-18 |format= |work=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/ Shin-Toho History]}} and by mid-2009 had grown to the point where the major Japanese video supplier DMM listed over 10,000 items with the mature (熟女) keyword.{{cite web|url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/digital/videoa/-/list/=/article=keyword/id=1014/|title=動画 ビデオ > ジャンル > 熟女 (Video genre: Mature)|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ DMM]|accessdate=2009-05-25|language=Japanese}} Murasaki appeared in such "mature woman" videos for the KMP Million Madams label{{cite web|url=http://www.km-produce.com/works/list3.php?dmy=%94%FC%93%FB&tskey=%8E%87%8D%CA%94T&x=33&y=13|title=Ayano Murasaki Filmography|publisher=[http://www.km-produce.com/ www.km-produce.com]|accessdate=2009-05-25|language=Japanese}} and for [[Madonna (studio)|Madonna]], an AV studio specializing in the genre.{{cite web|url=http://www.madonna-av.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=32/|title=紫彩乃 （むらさきあやの) - Ayano Murasaki Profile & Filmography|publisher=[http://www.madonna-av.com/ www.madonna-av.com]|accessdate=2009-05-25|language=Japanese}} Later in her career, Murasaki performed in videos for the [[CineMagic Co.|Cinemagic]] and [[Dogma studio]]s, known for their hardcore [[Bondage (BDSM)|bondage]] and [[Sadomasochism|S&M]] material. Murasaki also starred in a number of "uncensored" videos released outside of Japan by Sky High Entertainment and Oriental Dream Pictures.{{cite web|url=http://www.avfantasy.com/search_Products.aspx?section=0&searchBy=starring&keyword=Ayano+Murasaki&StudioID=0&Dept_ID=0&videotype=1|title=Starring Ayano Murasaki|publisher=[http://www.avfantasy.com/ AVFantasy]|accessdate=2009-05-26}} These videos lack the mosaic censorship of the genitals which is mandatory for all Japanese porn videos. In 2006 Murasaki was recognized by the AV industry and fans by being nominated for Best Mature Actress at the [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] for her performances in the 2005 broadcast year on Japanese adult TV.{{cite web|url=http://kaori4med.seesaa.net/article/16060476.html|title=日本アダルト放送大賞 2005 (Adult Japan Broadcasting Award 2005) |publisher=[http://kaori4med.seesaa.net/ kaori4med.seesaa.net]|date=April 3, 2006|accessdate=2008-11-07|language=Japanese}} In 2005, Murasaki received an adult film best [[actress]] award for Million Madam. ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 34-23-33(in) |height= 1.52cm (5 feet, 0 inches) |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Kyoko Nakashima |homepage= }} {{nihongo|'''Kyoko Nakajima'''|中島京子|Nakajima Kyouko}} is a "super popular" [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] of the early 2000s.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP209|title=''What I Can Do For You''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP204|title=''Costume Play Mates''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Known for her "[a]ngelic beauty,"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD207|title=''Close-Up/ Kyoko Nakajima''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Nakajima has starred in a variety of popular and innovative videos. ==Life and career== ===AV debut & VIP=== Nakajima was born on [[March 12]], [[1983]] in [[Saitama Prefecture]], [[Japan]]), and her interests include music and tennis.She made her AV debut in May 2003 with the [[Houyuu Media Produce|h.m.p.]] Platinum Tiffany label.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2003.htm|title=2003|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} She debuted with the VIP label in September 2003,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP198|title=''Private''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} and worked exclusively for that VIP label until mid-2004.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=RBN001|title=''Abnormality''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=...VIP exclusive 'Kyoko Nakashima'...}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP225|title=''Kyoko Nakajima in One day Soap Lady!''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=VIP exclusive actress 'Kyoko Nakajima'...}} Her first video for VIP, ''Private'', was in the documentary style popular with Japanese AVs.{{cite book |last=Bornoff|first=Nicholas|title=Pink Samurai: An Erotic Exploration of Japanese Society; The Pursuit and Politics of Sex in Japan|origyear=1991|edition=Paperback|year=1994|publisher=HarperCollins|location=London|isbn=0-586-20576-4|chapter=Chapter 18 (Naked Dissent)|quote=...many [adult videos] exploit their very limitations with a conscious effort at documentary realism: the cinema-verite of pornography. Protagonists, cameramen and directors talk throughout the proceedings even as they are taped. In between the sex episodes, the actors discuss what they feel about what they've just done or are about to do.|page=607}} In this video, Nakajima takes the documentary format to another level, giving the audience a first-person point-of-view by holding the camera and filming her sex scenes herself. Her partners in the video are actors whom she has invited to her home. This debut video was released the following month as a DVD with 60 minutes of bonus material. Her second and third AVs, like her first for VIP, were released first on VHS, and then the following month on DVD with an hour of extra footage.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD211|title=''Changing Clothes''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD222|title=''Strawberry White Paper/Kyoko Nakashima''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Released on October and November 2003, ''Costume Play Mates'', Nakajima's second work, focused on the popular ''[[cosplay]]'' genre of Japanese adult videos.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP204|title=''Costume Play Mates''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Nakajima followed up her first three releases with a trilogy of videos set in schools. The second and third entries in this series, ''Kyoko Nakajima in Play Girl'' (January 2004) and ''Beautiful Teachers/ Kyoko Nakajima'' (February 2004), were multi-story DVDs. The viewer made the choice of which version of the stories were to be played.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD232|title=''Kyoko Nakajima in Play Girl''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIPD235|title=''Beautiful Teachers/ Kyoko Nakajima''|accessdate=2007-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In April 2004 VIP chose Nakajima to star in the first DVD released under its Ribbon label. The idea of personally engaging her viewers was expanded upon in this video, entitled ''I Will Make You Cum''. The DVD included the gimmick of an [[artificial vagina]] modeled on the Nakajima's genitals. {{Female adult bio | name = Nana Natsume | photo = | caption = | birth = {{birth date and age|1980|01|23}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ntmnn_00|title=夏目 ナナ - Natsume Nana (Profile)|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']|language=Japanese}} | location = [[Sakai, Osaka]], [[Japan]] | measurements = 93(G)-58-85(cm)
37-23-34(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.63}} | weight = | eye color = Black | hair color = Black | natural bust = | blood = O |alias= |homepage= http://www.nananatsume.jp/ | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] }} {{nihongo|'''Nana Natsume'''|夏目ナナ|Natsume Nana}} is an award-winning former [[AV idol]] and a well-known celebrity in [[Japan]]. ==Life and career== Natsume was born on [[January 23]], [[1980]] in [[Sakai, Osaka]], [[Japan]] (Her birthdate has usually been reported as 1982 and it is still listed as such on her SOD profile,{{cite web |url=http://www.sodc.co.jp/actress/01139.php|title=夏目ナナ (Nana Natsume)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.sodc.co.jp/ www.sodc.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} but her official website has her birth year as 1980).{{cite web |url=http://www.nananatsume.jp/profile.html|title=Nana Natsume Profile|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.nananatsume.jp/ Official Website]|language=Japanese}} After graduation from high school Natsume worked in various occupations, including as a [[dental assistant]] and in real estate.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_79.html|last=Woo|first=Ex-S (translator)|date=[[2003-11-27]]|title=Nana Natsume Interview|accessdate=2007-04-23|language=English|publisher=www.jmate.com}} She began her entertainment career with appearances in ''On Girls' File'' and ''Cure Sick Night'', local late night television shows in [[Osaka]]. She was first scouted for work in the adult entertainment field in 2002. Moving to [[Tokyo]], she appeared in photo features for several magazines including ''[[Shukan Gendai]]'' and ''Weekly Post''. She was also featured in a photobook entitled ''727'' in July 2002 and in an "image" (non-nude) DVD called ''nana'' which was released in November 2002. ===AV Debut & Career=== Natsume first appeared for the [[Soft On Demand]] adult video company as the host of their [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#SOD AV Awards (2002-2006)|AV Awards]] ceremony held at [[Tokyo]]'s [[Shinjuku]] Century Hyatt hotel on November 26, 2003. Her debut video for the company, entitled simply ''Debut'', was released in January, 2004.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2003.htm|title=2003|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]|language=Japanese}} Relatively sexually conservative and inexperienced, Natsume feels that what stands out in her first video is, "Just how embarrassed I look during the entire thing." She claims that her first experiences with both ''[[Mammary intercourse|paizuri]]'' and [[masturbation]] occurred during AV shoots. One of her videos, ''Final Pussy!'', released in January 2005 is notable for its [[science fiction]] theme. In the movie, directed by [[Noboru Iguchi]], Natsume plays a dangerous character who is the result of a military experiment gone wrong. When sexually aroused, guns burst from her breasts killing whomever she is having sex with. Special makeup effects were by [[Yoshihiro Nishimura]],{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1883583/|title=Yoshihiro Nishimura|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb.com]}} well known in Japanese "gore" cinema.{{cite web |url=http://twitchfilm.net/archives/004830.html|title=Saishû seiki! Natsume Nana - kyûkyoku no erosu|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://twitchfilm.net/ Twitch Film]|date=January 18, 2006}}{{cite web |url=http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/report/report4177.html|title=NIPPON EROTICS plus(R18映画最前線) |accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.walkerplus.com/ MovieWalker]|date=January 12, 2006|language=Japanese}} Later that year in November 2005, she appeared in her first [[bukakke]] movie ''Nana Natsume Showered by Semen'' directed by [[Kazuhiko Matsumoto]], the man who is usually credited with inventing that genre of Japanese pornography.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/detail/=/cid=1sddm716/|title=夏目ナナ 精子浴びる。|accessdate=2009-08-09|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ DMM]|language=Japanese}} Also of interest is her December 2005 video ''Stripper'', a lesbian love story with former SOD star [[Kurumi Morishita]] directed by ex-SOD director [[TOHJIRO]]. Natsume has received recognition for her work several times, from the media, the AV industry, and from fans. She took the Best AV Actress prize at the [[Tokyo Sports]] 5th annual [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#5th Takeshi Kitano Awards (2004)|Takeshi Kitano Awards]] in 2004.{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/tsmp/index.html|title=東京スポーツ映画大賞 (Tokyo Sports Film Awards)|accessdate=2008-11-16|publisher=[http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/ Tokyo Sports]|language=Japanese}} She won multiple awards at the 2005 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#4th Annual SOD Awards 2005|SOD Awards]], one for Best Actress and the SOD Grand Prize for contributions to company sales and image{{cite web |url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20051214A/|title=速報！ＳＯＤ大賞2005＆「AV OPEN」発表 (2005 SOD Awards and AV Open)|accessdate=2008-11-19|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ All About]|language=Japanese|date=December 14, 2005|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta}} and she also was awarded the Best Actress prize at the 2006 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#5th Annual SOD Awards 2006|SOD Awards]].{{cite web |url=http://www.sod.co.jp/demand/news/121.html|title=SOD News 速報！！「2006年　第5回　ＳＯＤ大賞」受賞者 (The 5th SOD 2006 Award winners)|accessdate=2008-11-19|publisher=[http://www.sod.co.jp/ www.sod.co.jp]|language=Japanese|date=December 22, 2006}} In addition, her video ''Face Within Japan, Body Within a Vehicle!!'' was given the Best Video prize at the 2006 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#AV Actress Grand Prix 2006|AV Actress Grand Prix]].{{cite web |url=http://www.asianidols.net/news.php?day.20070107|title=AV Grand Prix 2006 Winners Announced|accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://www.asianidols.net/ Asianidols.net]|date=January 7, 2007}} She also earned mention in a ''[[Mainichi Shimbun]]'' story in 2006 by starring in ''Dirty DVD for Girls'', a pornographic video targeted for women. The newspaper described Natsume as, "one of the biggest stick flick starlets in Japan."{{cite news |first=Ryann|last=Connell|title=Ladies flash the cash, but don't want the money shot in their dirty DVDs|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/06/20060605p2g00m0dm014000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060614023417/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/06/20060605p2g00m0dm014000c.html|work=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[June 5]], [[2006]]|archivedate=2006-06-14|accessdate=2007-10-30}} Natsume remained with SOD for her entire career, usually making about one video a month. Her retirement video, released in October 2007, was an 8 disk, over 16 hour package with scenes chronicling her entire body of work from her debut.{{cite web |url=http://www.sodc.co.jp/detailes/sdms_777.php|title=夏目ナナ　引退 (Nana Natsume Retirement)|accessdate=2008-10-19|publisher=[http://www.sodc.co.jp/ www.sodc.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Tokyo gossip newspapers had previously reported Natsume's announcement that she would retire from the porn industry at the end of October 2007.{{cite web |url=http://d.hatena.ne.jp/turbosk/20070806/1186404652|title=東スポ 夏目ナナ、年齢詐称 ("''Tokyo Sports''" Nana Natsume)|date=[[2007-08-06]]|accessdate=2007-09-01|publisher=[http://d.hatena.ne.jp/turbosk/ hatena.ne.jp/turbosk/]|language=Japanese|quote=2005年の「第14回東京スポーツ映画大賞」で主演AV女優賞に輝いた夏目ナナさん(公式)がAVを引退するそうな。}} ===TV, Radio and Movies=== Throughout her AV career, Natsume was also a regular performer on Japanese TV and radio, including her own radio show ''Garnet Energy'' in 2005 sponsored by SOD (FM NACK5 79.5 MHz).{{cite web |url=http://www.sod.co.jp/demand/natsume/26.html|title=NanaWeek: Nana Natsume Garnet Energy|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.sod.co.jp/ www.sod.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} In 2007, she was a DJ on her FM Chisato radio show ''Nana Natsume's Sparkling Moonbow'' (夏目ナナのキラキラ☆moonbow) in Osaka.{{cite web |url=http://info-fm.sakura.ne.jp/blog/?p=1254|title=Nana Natsume's Sparkling Moonbow|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://info-fm.sakura.ne.jp/ info-fm.sakura.ne.jp]|language=Japanese}} She was also one of the SOD girls on the [[TV Osaka]] variety show ''NeoHappy'' in 2006 and its successor ''DIVA'' in 2007.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/japanese-tv-show-diva-carries-on-from-neohappy/|title=Japanese TV show DIVA carries on from Neohappy|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|language=English|date=November 23, 2007}} She also had a small role in the [[TV Asahi]] comedy-drama ''The Aaah Detective Agency'' (Aatantei jimusho - ああ探偵事務所) which ran for 11 weeks from July to September 2004.{{cite web |url=http://tvdramareview.archino.com/200407/aatan.htm|title=Aaah Detective Agency|accessdate=2008-10-19|publisher=[http://tvdramareview.archino.com/ TV Drama Review]|language=Japanese}} Since her retirement from the AV industry, Natsume has continued her work in mainstream media. She was a regular Thursday reporter on the [[NTV (Japan)]] information variety show ''Johnny Word of Mouth'' (くちコミジョニー) from December, 2007 until the show ended in March 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.ntv.co.jp/kuchikomi/|title=くちコミジョニー (Johnny Word of Mouth)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.ntv.co.jp/ NTV]|language=Japanese}} She also had a featured role playing Rumi Osaki in the [[TV Tokyo]] [[cosplay]] ghost story ''Guren Onna'' (ぐれんオンナ) broadcast in 12 episodes from January 11 to March 28, 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1253.htm|title=Cosplay Yuurei Guren Onna (Guren Onna) |accessdate=2008-10-19|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ JDorama.com]}}Home page at {{cite web |url=http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/guren/cast.html|title=Guren Onna Cast |accessdate=2008-10-19|publisher=[http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/ TV-Tokyo]|language=Japanese}} Natsume had a major role in the low-budget action-horror film ''Samurai Zombie'' (Yoroi) which debuted in 2008 at the South Korean Puchon Fantastic Film Festival. The film was directed by [[Tak Sakaguchi]] and produced by SOD.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1298724/|title=Yoroi (2008)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://imdb.com/ IMDb.com]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.cinematopics.com/cinema/works/output2.php?oid=9369|title=Yoroi Zombie |accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.cinematopics.com/ Cinema Topics Online]|language=Japanese}} She also plays a vicious gang boss in the 2008 movie ''Sasori'' directed by Joe Ma. This Hong Kong-Japanese production is a remake of the Hong Kong exploitation film ''Female Convict Scorpion'' and according to one review "Nana Natsume ... steals every scene she’s in".{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1135983/|title=Sasori (2008)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://imdb.com/ IMDb.com]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.cinemastrikesback.com/?p=2267|title=NYAFF Report 7: Sasori |accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.cinemastrikesback.com/ www.cinemastrikesback.com]|last=Austin|first=David|date=June 29, 2008}} ===Other Activities=== As a singer, Natsume covered the 1982 [[J-pop]] hit ''Sekido Komachi Dokit!'' (赤道小町ドキッ!) in a CD single and DVD [[music video]] released August 2, 2006 by Rock Chipper Records.{{cite web |url=http://www.rockchipper.co.jp/artist/natsume/nat00100.htm|title=夏目ナナ (Nana Natsume)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.rockchipper.co.jp/ Rock Chipper Records]|language=Japanese}} Natsume was the voice of a character in the [[Sega]] [[video game]] ''Ryu Ga Gotoku 2'' (龍が如く2) or ''Yakuza 2'' for [[PlayStation 2]] released on December 7, 2006. Her role as a nightclub hostess in the game was minor but she played a large part in publicity for the game.{{cite web |url=http://kotaku.com/gaming/top/feature-nagoshi-japanese-porn-and-segas-silence-209290.php|title=Feature: Nagoshi, Japanese Porn and Sega's Silence|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://kotaku.com/ Kotaku]|date=October 23, 2006|last=Ashcraft|first=Brian|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://www.famitsu.com/game/news/2006/10/22/103,1161525306,62035,0,0.html|title=大阪、なんばの『龍が如く2』体験イベントに名越稔洋氏と夏目ナナが！(Namba Osaka's Yakuza 2, Hiroshi Minoru and Nana Natsume!)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.famitsu.com/ www.famitsu.com]|date=October 22, 2006|language=Japanese}} She was also engaged to publicize the August 2008 [[Nintendo DS]] supernatural ghost story game ''You Mustn't Look'' (Mitewa Ikenai - みてはいけない) from video game producer Dimple. Part of the campaign was a comic photo series and video at the offices of game reporters Famitsu.{{cite web |url=http://www.dsfanboy.com/2008/05/13/mitewa-ikenai-creepy-photography-both-in-and-about-the-game/|title=Mitewa Ikenai: creepy photography both in and about the game|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.dsfanboy.com/ dsfanboy.com]|date=May 13, 2008|last=Fletcher|first=JC|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://www.famitsu.com/game/news/1215058_1124.html|title=夏目ナナがファミ通.com編集部を訪問！(Nana Natsume to Famitsu. Com office visit!)|accessdate=2008-10-20|publisher=[http://www.famitsu.com/ www.famitsu.com]|date=May 13, 2008|language=Japanese}} In October 2007 she was featured in the popular culture magazine, ''Spa!''. In her article, in which she gave advice to men seeking success in the area of romance, she stressed the virtues of good grooming and personal hygiene to her reading audience.{{cite news |last=Connell|first=Ryann|title=Nose hairs, bad breath ... porn queen fingers filthy turn-offs|url=http://mdn.mainichi.jp/culture/waiwai/archive/news/2007/10/20071030p2g00m0dm004000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[October 30]], [[2007]]|accessdate=2007-12-14|language=English}} Natsume was able to fulfill a long-time wish by opening a "Healing Salon" (ヒーリングサロン) called TORICO in Osaka which uses aromatic massage oils to heal and relieve fatigue. The salon celebrated its one-year anniversary October 13, 2008.{{cite web |url=http://torico-torico.jp/cms/|title=TORICO|accessdate=2008-10-21|publisher=[http://torico-torico.jp/ torico-torico.jp]|language=Japanese}} As part of a campaign against [[sexually transmitted disease]] (STD) in Japan called "STOP! STD" sponsored by AV studio [[Soft On Demand]], Natsume was featured in a large billboard in Tokyo in 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/sanchome/2596961459/|title=Nana Natsume Stop STD|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.flickr.com/ Flickr]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.sod.co.jp/stopstd/|title=Stop STD|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.sod.co.jp/ www.sod.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} And for those who can't live without Nana, there are Nana Natsume-themed apartments available in the [[Nishi-ku, Osaka|Nishi-ku]] area of Osaka. A large picture of her is above the bed and there are more pictures of her in the kitchen and bathroom as well as an "[[Edogawa Rampo]] voyeur beam" in the hallway. Monthly rent is 149,000 yen for a 2-bedroom unit and 480,000 yen for a 3-bedroom suite.{{cite web |url=http://www.aki-club.co.jp/designers_apartments/p_natsume/index.html|title=Theme Park Apartments - Nana Natsume Room|accessdate=2008-10-21|publisher=[http://www.aki-club.co.jp/ www.aki-club.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 39-23-34½(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.57}} | weight = | hair color = Brown | natural bust = Yes | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | homepage = }} {{nihongo|'''Anna Ohura'''|大浦あんな|Ōura Anna}} is a Japanese AV ([[adult video]]) performer and model, known for her prodigious (100-centimeter, metric I-cup) natural breasts.{{cite news ||title=100 Questions with Ohura Anna|url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_39.html|publisher=jmate.com|accessdate=2007-05-02|language=English|quote=In the AV business, Anna is best known for her big breasts.}}{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_161.html|title=''Super Angle of Oppai ~ Premium Edition -- Anna Ohura'' (DVD Review)|accessdate=2007-05-02|last=Payne|first=Peter|publisher=www.jmate.com|language=English|quote=...she's famous for her giant breast[s]...}} In 2003, according to the ''[[Taipei Times]]'', she claimed to have the largest breasts in the Japanese adult film industry.{{cite news ||title=Measuring up|url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/taiwan/photo/2003/08/08/0000060504|publisher=[[Taipei Times]]|date=8 August 2003|accessdate=2007-05-02}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Anna Ohura was born in [[Hokkaidō]], the northernmost of the four main islands of Japan, on May 30, 1980{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?oouann00|title=大浦 アンナ - Ooura Anna (Profile)|accessdate=2007-05-02|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}} to a French father and Japanese mother. Ohura claims that most people think she most closely resembles her father.{{cite news |title=100 Questions with Ohura Anna|url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_39.html|publisher=jmate.com|accessdate=2007-05-02|language=English}} She says that her grandmother is the person she most respects. Ohura is left-handed and has poor eyesight, wearing contact lenses. She enjoys drinking, but smokes only occasionally. She likes [[udon]] noodles, but dislikes [[soba]] noodles. Ohura's favorite subjects in school were social studies and Japanese, while English and mathematics were her worst. As a child, she wished to become a comic book writer, and she has commented that if she had not gone into the adult entertainment field, she would like to have worked as an assistant to a comic book writer. ===AV career=== The AV ([[adult video]]) companies in Japan can be divided into two groups: the "pro" companies, and the "indie" companies. The "pro" companies work with the Japan Software Morality Association, also known as "Sof-Rin", while the "indie" companies work outside of that organization.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/reviews/article_161.html|title=''Super Angle of Oppai ~ Premium Edition -- Anna Ohura'' (DVD Review)|accessdate=2007-05-02|last=Payne|first=Peter|publisher=www.jmate.com|language=English}} Anna Ohura debuted at age nineteen with the "pro" AV company, [[Crystal-Eizou]] on their Venus label, in the 24 February 2000 release ''Delicious Juicy Fruit'' (たわわな果実 - ''Tawawana Kajitsu'').{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1995.htm|title=1995|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}}[http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0000AO8WH?redirect=true たわわな果実] product description at amazon.co.jp. Retrieved February 14, 2007 Ohura's AV-acting style has been described as that of "a traditional Japanese porn star... In true Japanese fashion, Anna-chan acts demure and somewhat shy, even as she's willingly thrusting her chest out to be touched by a porn star, or opening her legs to receive [[cunnilingus]]." After several more videos with Crystal-Eizou during her debut year, she also began working for [[Alice Japan]] in December 2000. Her first video for that company, ''Maximum Bust'', featured [[cosplay]], [[Sadism and masochism|S&M]], and [[bukkake]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2007|title=''MAXIMUM BUST''|accessdate=2007-05-02|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]|language=English}} She also made several videos with the "pro" company, TMA. In 2002, Ohura appeared in a photo book focusing on bondage. During the shooting of this volume of photos, the photographer, "bondage master" Haruki Yukimura, suggested that he and Ohura make a video together. The result of this next Ohura/Yukimura collaboration was the September 2003 DVD, ''Secret Feelings'', which Yukimura directed.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XD-001 |title=''Secret Feelings''|accessdate=2007-05-02|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]|language=English}} Ohura and Yukimura would team up for another bondage video, ''Big Tits Bondage'' for [[CineMagic Co.|Cinemagic]] which was subsequently re-released by Cinemagic on a 2-video DVD compilation in March 2005.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DD130|title=''Big Tits Restrict''|accessdate=2007-05-02|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/main.htm XCity]|language=English}} According to the JList website, in these "pro" videos Ohura's "amazing body and erotic style... won her many fans around the world." As a sign of her international and mainstream fame, Ohura appeared in [[Taipei]] in 2003, where she was a highlight of an international furniture exposition. Some critics claim that the "indie" companies, working outside the "Sof-Rin" system, create a more interesting product. Not only do they have greater freedom, but they are also able to attract the better directors and performers. Ohura's debut with the "indie" label, [[Wanz Factory]], was in the October 2003 DVD ''Super Angle of Oppai''. This DVD was praised by comparing it with Ohura's work for "pro" studios, which were judged, "somewhat vanilla and boring, with straight sex and little innovation on the part of the creators." In contrast, Ohura "really shines in this great new indies release." ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Infobox Playboy Playmate <!-- for more information see [[:Template:Infobox Playboy Playmate/doc]] --> | name = Hiromi Oshima | image = Hiromi Oshima-D.jpg | imagesize = | caption = | issue = June 2004 | birthname = | birthplace = [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | birthdate = {{birth date and age|df=yes|1980|1|6}} | bust = 34 in | waist = 22 in | hips = 34 in | height = {{height|ft=5|in=4|wiki=yes}} | weight = {{convert|108|lb|kg st|abbr=on}} | preceded = [[Nicole Whitehead]] | succeeded = [[Stephanie Glasson]] | pmoy-year = | pmoy-preceded = | pmoy-succeeded = }}
{{nihongo|'''Hiromi Oshima'''|大島 浩美<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.afpbb.com/article/entertainment/news-entertainment/2256644/1809704|title=「Playboy Collection Legacy Reception」 ビバリーヒルズで開催|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Agence France-Presse|AFP]] Japan|date=2007-07-20|accessdate=2008-06-21}}</ref>, オオシマ・ヒロミ<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.shueisha.co.jp/CGI/magazine/rack.cgi/magazine/m_playboy_detail.html?key=detail_b&zashimei=m_playboy&id=0088|title=Monthly Playboy, August 2004|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Shueisha]] (publisher of [[Monthly Playboy]])|date=2004-07|accessdate=2008-06-21}}</ref>|Ōshima Hiromi|born on 6 January 1980 in [[Tokyo]]}} is a [[Japan]]ese model and in June 2004 became the first Japanese ''[[Playboy]]'' [[Playmate]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.playboy.com/specialeditions/directory/models/oshima-hiromi.html|title=Playboy.com|accessdate=2008-09-10}}</ref> At the time of her [[centerfold]], she was residing in [[Miami Beach]], [[Florida]].
In addition to appearing in the June 2004 ''Playboy'' centerfold, she has also starred in a number of [[List of Playboy videos|''Playboy'' videos]] as well as ''[[Playboy Special Editions]]''.
She appeared in the 2005 ''Playmates at Play at the Playboy Mansion'' swimsuit [[wall calendar|calendar]] as calendar girl of January. The calendar was the inaugural ''Playmates at Play'' calendar and it was shot on the grounds of [[Playboy Mansion]] in 2004. It was ''Playboy'''s first attempt at creating a non-nude swimsuit calendar featuring Playmates similar in style with those from the [[Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue|''Sports Illustrated'' swimsuit issue]]. While all Playmates appeared in [[bikinis]] in the calendar, only she and [[Karen McDougal]] were sporting [[Body painting#modern body painting|painted-on]] bikinis.
She has been listed as a Photo Production Coordinator in various issues of Playboy Special Editions.
She appeared in the music video for [[Nelly]]'s "[[Shake Ya Tailfeather]]".<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.playboy.com/girls/playmates/directory/200406.html|title=Playmate Profile}}</ref> She has also appeared in several episodes of ''[[The Girls Next Door]]'' [[reality show]] on the [[E!]] network
She was cast as herself in the 2008 motion picture ''[[The House Bunny]]'' and was in the 2009 motion picture ''[[Race To Witch Mountain]]''.
==Appearances in ''Playboy'' Calendars== * ''Playboy's '''2005 Playmate Calendar''''' - August 2005. * ''Playboy's '''2006 Playmate Calendar''''' - July 2006.
==See also== * [[List of people in Playboy 2000-present]]
==References== {{No footnotes|date=April 2008}} {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{imdb name|id=1734321|name=Hiromi Oshima}} * {{playmate|2004|6}} * {{myspace|officialhiromi}}

{{Female adult bio | name = Madoka Ozawa |photo= [[Image:Madoka Ozawa.jpg|Madoka Ozawa (1978-)]] | caption = | birth = {{birth date and age|1978|3|3}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=490|title=Madoka (Ozawa Madoka)|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ozwmdk00|title={{nihongo2|小沢 まどか}} - Ozawa Madoka|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} | location = [[Image:Flag of Japan.svg|22px]] [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | birthname = | death = | measurements = 83(C)-56-84(cm)
33-22-33(inch) | height = {{height|m=1.56}} | weight ={{convert|45|kg|lb st|abbr=on}} | shoe size = 24cm | eye color = | hair color = Black | skin color = | natural bust = | blood = B | ethnicity = Japanese | alias = | films = | homepage = | iafd = | imdb = 0651529 | afdb = | eurobabeindex = }} {{nihongo|'''Madoka Ozawa'''|小沢 まどか|Ozawa Madoka}} is a [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] and [[V-Cinema]] actress who has been called "a legend in the business."{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=1556|title=''An I Novel''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com/]|language=English}} She became known as the number one AV idol of 1997 after every video she released during her debut year became a hit,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=MVC017|title=''SUPER BEST PART 3''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==AV career== Madoka Ozawa was born [[3 March]], [[1978]] in [[Tokyo]]{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ozwmdk00|title={{nihongo2|小沢 まどか}} - Ozawa Madoka|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} and made her AV debut with the Cosmos Plan label in December 1996.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1996.htm|title=1996|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her debut video, ''Pure Love'', consisted of four sex scenes. 18 at the time, the shyness of her performance was noted.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=1970|title=''Pure Love''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com/]|language=English}} ''18 Dream'' (August 1998) opens with Ozawa discussing her future in an interview, and while walking through streets and posing. The video continues with a scene in which Ozawa is fondled by an actor. The final third of the video has more interview, and moves on to a sex scene.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=1829|title=''18 Dreams''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com/]|language=English}} ''Legend Of An AV Idol'' was a documentary-style AV describing Ozawa's adolescence, her early sex-life, and the story of how she became an AV queen.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=9A053|title=''Legend Of An AV Idol''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Retirements and come-backs== Ozawa made more than one attempt to retire from performing in AVs. ''Requiem'' was touted as Ozawa's farewell video, though she returned to the industry not long after its release. This "beautifully filmed" video includes scenes of her meeting, chatting with and eventually engaging in sex with a fan. Their sex scene ends with the actress thanking the fan for his performance.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=2899|title=''Requiem''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com/]|language=English}} Another "retirement" AV was ''Fallen Angel X'', released in September 1999. The video featured Ozawa engaging in "acrobatic" sex scenes with multiple partners, and with her ex-boyfriend.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=BZ26|title=''Fallen Angel X''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In 2002, Ozawa made a come-back with the [[Moodyz]] company,{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=madoka_ozawa|title=Madoka Ozawa|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com/]|language=English}} and in June 2003, Ozawa starred in another come-back AV, ''Look That Kill''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=LLL006|title=''LOOK THAT KILL''|accessdate=2007-08-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Taiwan and final retirement from AV== In December 2002, Ozawa visited Taiwan for the first time in order to attend an automobile exhibition as a bikini model.{{cite news |first=Yun-Ping|last=Chang|title=Porn star out to prove she's not just a pretty face|url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/taiwan/archives/2003/03/09/197303|publisher=[[Taipei Times]]|date=[[March 9]], [[2003]]|accessdate=2007-08-04|language=English}} Her appearance at this event created such a stir with the public and media in Taiwan that she was invited for a second visit to appear before Taiwanese troops on [[Kinmen|Kinmen Island]], the first time an adult performer entertained the Taiwanese military. Magistrate Lee Chu-feng welcomed Ozawa and predicted that her visit to the island would boost tourism. During this visit to Taiwan, Ozawa was invited to appear in the promotional campaign for Kaoliang Liquor, and to serve as a model in a wedding dress show. In February and March of that year she was back in Taiwan participating in several entertainment and publicity events to heighten her public profile. She was offered opportunities to act in TV dramas, film, and to release popular music albums. With this increasing offer of mainstream work in Taiwan, Ozawa officially retired from adult videos in 2003. Back in Japan, Ozawa's career was the subject of a 3-volume Classic/Memorial series of videos from Cosmos Plan in 2004.{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=490|title=Madoka (Ozawa Madoka)|accessdate=2007-04-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Female adult bio| |photo= [[Image:Naho Ozawa.jpg|Naho Ozawa (1983-)]] |birth= {{birth date and age|1983|1|26}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ozwnh_00|title=小沢 菜穂 – Ozawa Naho (Profile)|accessdate=2007-02-22|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}} |location= [[Kanagawa Prefecture]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 84(D)-55-85(cm)
33-22-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.57}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |blood= AB |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Riho Ozawa{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA285|title=''Obscene Climax''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} |homepage= |imdb= 1905902 }} {{nihongo|'''Naho Ozawa'''|小沢菜穂|Ozawa Naho}} (born [[January 26]], [[1983]]) is a [[Japan]]ese [[Model (person)|model]], singer and a popular and prolific [[AV idol]]. ==Life and career== ===2002=== Ozawa made her AV debut in April 2002 with the Sexia label in the video ''My Birthday''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2002.htm|title=2002|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} She was noted in this premiere release for her "beautiful D-cup breasts and... sexy face."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA265|title=''My Birthday''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She was called "one of the most beautiful of 2002" in her second video, ''Love Story'' released the following month. She played the role of a high school girl suffering from amnesia who is raped in this Sexia Try Heart production.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA268|title=''Love Story''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She entered the ''[[cosplay]]'' genre in ''Cosplasshion'' (June 2002). In this video she is worked on with a vibrator while in the costume of a nurse, a gangbanged while in cat girl costume, and engages in sex with her customers while dressed as a waitress.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA273|title=''Naho Ozawa in Cosplasshion''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot'' (July 2002), Ozawa plays the role of a sex education teacher with a secret.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA273|title=''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her fifth video, ''I Wanna Suck'' (August 2002), allowed Ozawa to display her famous fellatio ability.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA281|title=''I Wanna Suck''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She demonstrates her technique on five actors, and the video includes some ''cosplay'' and a rape scene. The DVD, released the same month, included extra footage of Ozawa's first [[female ejaculation|ejaculation]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD043|title=''I Wanna Suck''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Obscene Climax'' (September 2002) had Ozawa with ten male AV actors, and forced to follow the director's every order. ''Sexia Milk'' from the same month had Ozawa teamed with a variety of AV actresses, including [[Aoi Minori]] in a school uniform and gym shorts-themed video.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA284|title=''SEXIA MILK''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Ozawa's seventh video, ''I Wanna See You'' (October 2002), was filmed entirely from the viewers' perspective, to give Ozawa's fans a chance to feel a closeness to her.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA289|title=''I Wanna See You''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Call Girl'', Ozawa's eighth release, had the actress in the role of a call girl engaging in baby talk and some aggressive sexual play.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA293|title=''Call Girl''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Karami'', her ninth video, and her last for Sexia, Ozawa takes a trip with her filming crew, engages them in conversation and talk, and tries a lesbian scene.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA298|title=''Karami　Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her association with Sexia was concluded with year-end collections ''SEXIA Collection 2002'' and ''ALL That's SEXIA'', both of which paired her with fellow Sexia actress [[Asuka Sakamaki]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA296|title=''SEXIA Collection 2002''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD052|title=''ALL that's SEXIA''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} For her first year in the industry, Ozawa was awarded the 2002 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2002 X City Grand Prix Awards|X City Grand Prix]] Best New Actress Award, which is given by AV fan vote.{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/programs/nighttv/about.html|title=About the Host|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/programs/nighttv/index.html Night TV hosted by Naho Ozawa]}} ===2003=== At the beginning of 2003, Ozawa ceased making videos exclusively with Sexia, and began working for various companies. At the Max-A studio she performed on their Samansa label. ''Sexy Teacher Hunt'' (January 2003), her first release for Samansa, had Ozawa playing the role of a teacher who is raped by her students who torture her and force her to perform fellatio on them.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2281|title=''Naho Ozawa in Sexy Teacher Hunt''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In February 2003, Ozawa released her own entry in [[Alice Japan]]'s popular ''Sexy Butt'' series. This video featured Ozawa in school girl, race model and kimono dress.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV222|title=''Sexy Butt　Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-07-16|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In March 2003, Ozawa formed the P.I.N. (Perfect Idol's Numbers) band with five other AV idols, [[Sayori Kamiya]], [[Cocolo]], [[Hitomi Hayasaka]], [[Rei Itoh]] and Natsuki. The group released an album and a video in March 2003.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=NRO001|title=''P I N''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The same month, Ozawa starred in her entry in Max-A's bondage and S/M-themed ''The Confined Bodydoll''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2287|title=''The Confined Bodydoll''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In [[Alice Japan]]'s incest-genre video, ''Sexy Nurse Fucks Her Brother-in-Law'' (April 2003), Ozawa played the title role, a sexually frustrated wife and nurse.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV237|title=''Sexy Nurse Fucks Her Brother-in-law''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Fuck Naho Ozawa'' (June 2003) had the actress playing three different types of prostitutes: A call girl, a high school girl and an S/M dominatrix.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV250|title=''Fuck Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''One Style'' also released in June 2003, Ozawa hitchikes in Hawaii.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=LLL005|title=''ONE STYLE　Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She played the role of a woman out for vengeance in ''Sexy Jaguar'' (August 2003). In this Try Heart release, Ozawa wears sexually attractive costumes to attract men who wronged her.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA326|title=''Sexy Jaguar''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Max-A's ''Witch Hunt'' video series was initiated by [[Ami Ayukawa]] in August 2001.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2236|title=''The Witch-Hunt''|accessdate=2007-06-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In September 2003, Ozawa starred in the third entry in this series.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2304|title=''Witch Hunt 3''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The concept behind the series is to determine whether the model is a witch or not by submitting her to various forms of sexual torment and humiliation. A year later, in September 2004, [[Sora Aoi]] would follow Ozawa in the fourth entry of this series. It was claimed that "Only charismatic actresses can star in this series."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2358|title=''Witch Hunt IV''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In Max-A's ''My Girl'' (November 2003), Ozawa takes her video crew to a hot springs resort, where all engage in sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2312|title=''my girl''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Ozawa's last release of 2003, ''The Tale of Miss R　Part2'' had her playing the part of a woman who is subservient to all men.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2317|title=''The tale of Miss R　Part2''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===2004=== Ozawa's popularity was still high into the third year of her career, due to the uninhibited nature of her sex scenes.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2321|title=''NATURAL BORN/Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} January 2004 found Ozawa back at Max-A for the video ''Samantha Naho Ozawa vol.3: House of Witch''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV156|title=''Samantha Naho Ozawa vol.3''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Natural Born'' released the same month, Ozawa talked about her career and personal life in the preliminary interview. The sex scenes in this video featured hand-held camera techniques. ''Naho Channel'' (February 2004) takes the idea of Ozawa appearing on every program on a TV channel's schedule to create some unusual sexual situations. Ozawa uses oil and a vibrator during a cooking show, wears no panties while reporting the weather, and engages in explicit sex during a daytime drama.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2325|title=''Naho Channel''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Mirage'' (April 2004) Ozawa and a male actor have sex in a bed surrounded by mirrors. The actress is shown watching herself receive ''[[bukkake]]'', and seeing her own sexual organs become aroused in the mirrors.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2333|title=''Mirage / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Oral Infection'' (May 2004) allowed Ozawa to put her fellatio and other oral skills at the center of attention.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2337|title=''Oral Infection / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Persona'' is another oral-themed video. In this drama, Ozawa plays a woman who is constantly finding herself engaged in oral sex without remembering the events leading up to these encounters. She goes to an old factory to find the truth behind these events.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2343|title=''Per Sona / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In another video with a mystery theme, ''Ugly Dream: The Fate of a Young Wife'' (July 2004), Ozawa plays the role of a newlywed woman who constantly dreams of being raped.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA386|title=''Ugly Dream / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Shooting!'' (August 2004), Ozawa exposes herself in a public park, sexually attacks an AV actor, and then is assaulted by a middle-aged man with a vibrator.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2353|title=''SHOOTING! / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In 2004, Ozawa formed a group called L-Girls with five other AV idols, and released a DVD photo collection. About the time of the release of ''The Lewd Legs'' (September 2004), Ozawa's singing career was gaining popularity. In this video, Ozawa plays a doll and a lesbian queen.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA398|title=''The Lewd Legs　Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Naho's Horny Private Life'' purports to show a typical day in the actress's life with her boyfriend. The two take a bath together and engage in oral sex. They next go shopping for a vibrator, which Ozawa uses on herself after their date is over.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2363|title=''Naho's horny private life''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''New High School Teacher's Training: Memory of a Summer'' (November 2004), Ozawa plays a young woman who visits an old teacher she had a crush on as a girl.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=EDV0062|title=''New High School Teacher's Training''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Stylish Sex'' (December 2004) has Ozawa in a school uniform and glasses, and she engages in a more aggressive sexual style than usual. The video concludes with her masturbating in front of ten men who then reciprocate the act.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2372|title=''Stylish Sex''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In November 2004, Ozawa released a musical DVD and CD through the Sexual Kiss company entitled ''Little Lover''.{{cite web |archivedate=2006-05-01|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060501030405/sexualkiss.net/modules/tinyd1/index.php?id=2|url=http://sexualkiss.net/modules/tinyd1/index.php?id=2|title=Little Lover / 小沢菜穂|publisher=[http://sexualkiss.net/ Sexual Kiss Records official site]|accessdate=2009-03-08|language=Japanese}} ===2005=== Max-A chose to start 2005 out with a new series, and chose Naho Ozawa to star in the first video in that series. Entitled ''Welcome to Max Airline!'', the January release had Ozawa playing the role of a stewardess offering sex to her passengers during flight.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2377|title=''Welcome to Max Airline! Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Ozawa starred in ''The Naked "MAPPA"'', a non-pornographic nude-modeling "image" video the same month.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SFLBK012|title=''The Naked "MAPPA" / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In February 2005 Ozawa starred in the second entry in Max-A's ''Night'' series. In this video, Ozawa engages in sex on two different nights for two different reasons. The first night, she is so lonely and in need of companionship, she pays for sex. On the second night she engages in sex out of physical pleasure on a balcony.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2379|title=''Night / Naho''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''My History'' (April 2005) was Ozawa's last release for the Max-A label. An autobiographical drama, the video marked the end of her two year, four month association with the label.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2389|title=''My History / Naho Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-08-10|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Ozawa also hosted ''Night TV'', an adult cable show featuring interviews with fellow AV idols. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
