{{Female adult bio |name = Nao Saejima |photo= [[Image:Nao Saejima.jpg|Nao Saejima (1968-)]] |birth= {{birth date and age|1968|3|23}}Infobox data from: {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?sezno_00|title=冴島奈緒 - Nao Saejima|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 83(F)-54-83(cm)
33-21-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.58}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://www.saejima.com/ |iafd= |imdb= 0993281 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Nao Saejima'''|冴島奈緒|Saejima Nao}} is a Japanese [[AV idol]] and model of the 1980s and 1990s who also starred in [[photobooks]], [[V-Cinema]], and feature films, including [[Nikkatsu]]'s ''[[Roman Porno]]'' series. == Life and career == ===AV career=== Nao Saejima was born in [[Tokyo]] on [[March 23]], [[1968]]. She began appearing as a gravure idol in 1985 and appeared on the nighttime TV variety show, ''11 P.M.'' in 1987. She made her AV debut with VIP in February of the same year{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=RDA05123|title=''BEST 4 Hours / Nao Saejima''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote='Nao Saejima' who debuted in 1987}} with ''No.1 F-Cup, Nao Saejima - Saejima's Awakening'' (冴島奈緒／FカップNo.1 奈緒の目覚め - ''Saejima Nao/F Kappu No. 1 Saejima no Mezame'').{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1987.htm|title=1987|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} With her slim figure and large breasts she quickly became a popular AV performer, appearing in at least 40 adult videos within two years of her debut.For a filmography of Saejima's Adult Videos, and theatrical and TV appearances, see the Japanese Wikipedia article She ceased AV appearances for five years beginning in 1991. During this time she worked as a nude model while travelling between the United States and Japan. Her AV career resumed in 1996 and concluded with her retirement in 2002. ===Theatrical career=== Saejima appeared in one of Nikkatsu's last ''Roman Porno'' films in 1988. The studio ceased production of this long-running series of theatrical softcore porn films in 1988, and declared bankruptcy soon afterwards.{{cite book |last=Macias|first=Patrick|title=TokyoScope: The Japanese Cult Film Companion|year=2001|publisher=Cadence Books|location=San Francisco|language=English|isbn=1-56931-681-3|pages=187-188|chapter=Nikkatsu's Roman Porno}} Through its Excess Films line, the studio continued to release theatrical pornography for several more years.{{cite book |last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-88928-852-7|pages=p.63|quote=Nikkatsu... dumped money into a new "B" variation of the pinku eiga called Excess Films. With some exceptions, Excess was never taken seriously by the critics, although it managed to survive as an intermittent porn production studio - proudly lensing 35 mm pink films for at least another decade.}} Nao Saejima was hired by Excess Films to star in her own theatrical release, {{nihongo|''Abnormal Excitement: Nao Saejima''|冴島奈緒　異常昂奮|Saejima Nao: Ijo Kofun}} in 1989. Critical reaction to Saejima's performance was surprisingly positive, since AV performers were not thought capable of any genuine acting necessary for performing roles in theatrical films. This film has Saejima as a woman with the ability to communicate with the spirit world. She and her husband use this ability to swindle money out of grieving families of recently deceased. When the king of the spirit world learns of these shady practises, he kidnaps Saejima. Saejima's husband and a Chinese monk travel to the underworld to rescue her, encountering various bizarre sexual escapades on the way.Weisser, p.35. Among several other starring ''[[pink film]]'' and [[V-cinema]] roles in the 1990s, Saejima starred in Okura studio's {{nihongo|''Erotic Ghost Story: Female Ghost in Heat''|色欲怪談　発情女ゆうれい|Shikiyoku Kaidan: Hatsujo Onna Yurei}} ([[1995 in film|1995]]). In this supernatural sex-thriller she plays the role of the wife of a doctor who is haunted by a sex-hungry female spirit.Weisser, p.130. The film was directed by [[Satoru Kobayashi (director)|Satoru Kobayashi]], the director of the first ''pink film'', ''[[Flesh Market]]'' ([[1962 in film|1962]]).{{imdb name|id=0286091|title=Shikiyoku kaidan: hatsujo onna yurei (1995)}} As a result of Saejima's proven acting ability in these theatrical ''pink films'', cult director [[Hisayasu Sato]] chose her for a major role in his second mainstream film, ''Meet Me In The Dream: Wonderland'' ([[1996 in film|1996]]). The prolific Sato's last film for over a year, it was based on Naoki Yamamoto's ''[[manga]]'' about a woman with [[obsessive-compulsive disorder]].{{cite web |url=http://wc03.allmovie.com/cg/avg.dll?p=avg&sql=1:249621|title=Apartment Wife: Mid-Afternoon Love Affair|accessdate=2007-09-11|last=Firsching|first=Robert|publisher=[[Allmovie]]|language=English}} ==Retirement== A woman of many talents, during her AV and acting career Saejima also worked as a writer, a rock group vocalist, and a beauty counselor. After her retirement from public appearances in 2002 it was reported that she was working as an artist.{{cite web |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060305001357/mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|archivedate=2006-03-05|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|title=Porn starlets move on to inspiring second careers|date=[[January 7]], [[2006]]|accessdate=2007-06-04|language=English|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]}} In a sign of Saejima's international popularity, the Taiwan rock band, Goodbye!Nao! was named in tribute to her.{{cite news |title=Events & Entertainment|url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/feat/archives/2006/06/23/2003315200|publisher=[[Taipei Times]]|date=[[June 23]], [[2006]]|page=p.14|accessdate=2007-02-18}} ==Partial filmography== ===Adult videos=== {| class="wikitable" ! 35-24-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |weight= {{convert|47|kg|lb|abbr=on}} |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= White |natural bust= No |blood= B |shoe size= 24.5cm |underarm hair= Removed |pubic hair= Removed (Shaved) |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |nationality= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |nude= Yes |hardcore= Yes |alias= |homepage= |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Asuka Sakamaki'''|坂巻あすか|Sakamaki Asuka}} is a popular [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] from [[Tokyo]] who was born on [[October 8]], [[1982]]. ==AV career== Sakamaki made her AV debut in May 2002 in the video ''First Class'' for [[Sexia]]'s "Try Heart" label,{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2002.htm|title=2002|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} the label under which she has continued to appear in many videos. her debut video employed the concept of having the actress go for one month without masturbating. It is claimed that she normally masturbates daily. After the month-long abstinence, viewers are invited to witness the actress become "a wild sex animal". Sakamaki's performance in this video had commentators predicting she would rise to the top of the AV field.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA270|title=''First class''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her third video, ''The Sensation'' (July 2002), employed elements of the "image" video (non-pornographic nude modeling), and hardcore sex scenes. The sex scenes included fellatio in a car, rape while blindfolded and oil massage. The "image" video scenes included a swimsuit modeling session, and a maid costume section.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD041|title=''The Sensation''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Sakamaki's entry in Sexia's popular ''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot'' series (September 2002), employed a traditional fictional narrative, similar to early AVs and their ''[[pink film]]'' predecessors. The story had Sakamaki as a sex-hungry teacher who seduces both her students and her co-workers.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA286|title=''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her performance in this video was selected to be included in the "best of" the series collection, ''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot BEST SELECTION Vol.1''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA372|title=''Sexy Teacher's Secret Spot BEST SELECTION Vol.1''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''I Wanna Suck'' from October, 2002, returned to the ''cosplay'' genre, with Sakamaki wearing tights, a doctor's uniform, Chinese costume and lingerie. As the title implies, the video also features scenes fellatio, which she performs on more than ten actors.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD048|title=''I Wanna Suck　Asuka Sakamaki''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In the omnibus videos, ''ALL that's SEXIA'' and ''SEXIA Collection 2002'', highlights of Sakamaki's videos for Sexia during the year were combined with other stars for the company, including [[Naho Ozawa]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA296|title=''SEXIA Collection 2002''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SXD052|title=''ALL that's SEXIA''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Cosplasshin'' (August 2002) focused entirely on the ''[[cosplay]]'' genre. The uniforms worn by Sakamaki in this video included those of a school girl, a bunny, Chinese costume, a nurse's uniform and ''[[kimono]]''. Sakamaki engages in three-partner sex while wearing the traditional Japanese costume. After a break from the industry beginning in 2003, she returned for the 2006 video, ''Falling Logic'' for the Kasakura Publishing label. In this one-time come-back video, Sakamaki donned a maid's costume in which she served her master and other male actors.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=NOV1067|title=''Falling Logic / Asuka Sakamaki''|accessdate=2007-08-02|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Asuka Sakamaki is also notably prolific for a Japanese AV actress. The average career of an AV actress in Japan spans about one year, during which the actress will appear in five to ten videos total.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-08-02|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|work=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|publisher= |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate =2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year—the average life-span of an AV girl—with five or ten videos to her credit and an unknowing family bosom to return to. }} Sakamaki's career has spanned over four years during which she has appeared in at least 29 video items and three photo books.[http://www.amazon.co.jp/s?__mk_ja_JP=%83J%83%5E%83J%83i&initialSearch=1&url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=%8D%E2%8A%AA%82%A0%82%B7%82%A9 Amazon search] on 坂巻あすか (Sakamaki Asuka), conducted [[August 2]], [[2007]] == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 40-23-34 inch (32G) |height= {{height|m=1.61}} |weight= |shoe size= 23 cm |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= Type B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://blog.livedoor.jp/anton91/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Miki Sawaguchi'''|沢口みき|Sawaguchi Miki}}, born [[September 1]], [[1975]] in [[Yokohama]], [[Japan]]) is one of Japan's best known [[adult video]] performers, known especially for her large breasts (metric bra size of 70J or 32G in North American sizing). On television she has appeared as a regular cast member on two shows and made several guest appearances on other shows. She has also appeared on radio and made two musical CDs. Her principal work, however, are the countless adult VHS and DVD films in which she has appeared. ==Early life== Prior to her career as an adult entertainer, Sawaguchi was employed at both a coffee shop and a clothing store. She also worked for a private tutoring center.{{cite web |url=http://www.mikisawaguchi.com/about/who-is-miki-sawaguchi.html|title=Who is Miki Sawaguchi|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://www.mikisawaguchi.com mikisawaguchi.com]}} Claiming that she has always loved to be photographed,{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/B_OPEN/Profile/miki/interv.html|title=Miki Sawaguchi Interview|accessdate=2007-06-09|language=?|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ XCity.jp]}} she entered the adult film business in 1996. == JAV Debut == In a country where [[AV idol]]s can become major celebrities, Miki Sawaguchi quickly gained many fans, and became a presence in the mainstream Japanese media. She rose to stardom in the 1990s, soon becoming one of the most popular Japanese big-bust adult video stars in the world. Miki made her porno debut in 1996 with a video entitled {{nihongo|''I Have Found Breasts Larger Than My Face''|顔よりデカイの見っけ}},{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1996.htm|title=1996|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} The video saw her partake in three sex scenes said to be inspired by her real-life love making experiences during and after high school. In an interview on that video Miki says that she was very shy during her first sexual encounter, and had to be guided throughout most of it by her much older partner. One of Miki Sawaguchi's most successful videos was released in 1997 entitled ''Ultra Breasts''. Its cover features a vintage picture of Miki in a small blue bikini, and it has become a collector's item in and outside of Japan in recent years.{{cite web |url=http://auction.yahoo.co.jp|title=yahoo japan|publisher=[http://auction.yahoo.co.jp Yahoo Japan Auctions]|accessdate=2006-03-21 |language=Japanese}} This third production of hers features, again, three sex scenes, where this time Miki is dominated by her different sex partners. This popular and patriarchal performance style of Miki Sawaguchi is what has defined her as a JAV idol throughout her career. == First Retirement == With Miki Sawaguchi's booming popularity as an adult actress/idol in 1997, the Osaka-based comedian talent agency [[Yoshimoto Kogyo]] convinced Sawaguchi to retire from the JAV industry and become a media personality. Such a move was risky considering Sawaguchi's background in porno and the negative influence she might have on children, but the agency was convinced she could pull it off. By 1997, Miki had already had success as a bikini model in weekly magazines and as a piece of eye candy on adult-themed TV shows, so there was nothing to convince Yoshimoto Kogyo otherwise.{{Fact|date=June 2007}} For a short time, in 1998, Miki Sawaguchi held her own radio program and was a guest on several talkshows, like ''Downtown DX''.{{Fact|date=February 2008}} == Second JAV Debut == In 1998, Miki Sawaguchi made her official return to the JAV industry with the production of ''Come Back to Ultra Breasts''. In her opening speech within this video, she describes the Japanese media/entertainment industry as a "dark and dirty world" that unheartedly destroys people's careers. In contrast, Miki describes the porno industry as a place she feels right "at home."{{Fact|date=June 2007}} Throughout all of Miki Sawaguchi's productions following her return to porno, it is apparent that her short time in the media spotlight has enabled her to atriculate herself to a higher degree than in her earlier work. In most of Miki's post-1998 work, she often gives heartfelt speeches to her audience regarding her personal life and her views on sexual intimacy as well. For instance, in ''White Princess'', she explains to us that all of her experinces having sex on film have driven her to develop sexual techniques that can fully satisfy her on-screen partners.{{Fact|date=June 2007}} The summer, 1999 issue of the U.S. magazine ''Oriental Cinema'' featured a review of Miki Sawaguchi's video, ''101 CM: J-Cup'', with images of Ms. Sawaguchi on the front, back and inside covers. The reviewer calls her video, ''101 CM: J-Cup'', "the best X-rated Japanese video I've ever seen...", further stating, "Miki Sawaguchi one of the sexiest women in Japan." Foster, Damon. 1999. ''101 CM: J-Cup'' review in ''Oriental Cinema'' #16 (Summer, 1999), p.39-41. Following her second debut, Miki Sawaguchi also attempted to fulfill her dream of having a musical career. Already an established multi-media star in Japan by 1999, she entered the music industry by releasing her own album, entitled, ''Big Boobs'', on the Alchemy Records label.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00005EYV7|title=(''Big Boobs'')|accessdate=2007-06-09|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Amazon.com]]}} The last song on the album, ''Watashi no Mune de Onemurinasai'' ("Sleep with Your Head in My Chest"), was also the subtitle of the album. The album was successful enough for her to contribute vocals on a second Alchemy release entitled ''Uterus and Human''.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00005HOIW|title=(''Uterus and Human'')|accessdate=2007-06-09|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Amazon.com]]}} With her guitar noise band, Sawaguchi performed in [[New York City|New York]]'s [[Knitting Factory]] on [[November 18]], [[2000]].{{cite news |last= |first= |title=POP AND JAZZ GUIDE: HIJOKAIDAN+SOLMANIA+MIKI SAWAGUCHI, BORBETOMAGUS|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2000/11/17/movies/pop-and-jazz-guide-235571.html?pagewanted=3|publisher=[[The New York Times]]|date=2000-11-17|accessdate=2008-02-07}} == Third Debut == Miki Sawaguchi is currently working infrequently on the JAV scene, making a few videos befitting her "jukujo" (mature lady) status, such as the 2004 release, ''Remembrance of Lewd Tits''{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KK009|title=''Remembrance of Lewd Tits''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|quote=Enjoy a mature woman's indecent scenes}} and a series of videos for the "mature woman" specialist studio [[Madonna (studio)|Madonna]]. In August 2006, Sawaguchi started an online diary which she continues to maintain.{{cite web |url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/anton91/archives/2006-08.html|title=沢口みき公式ブログ「ニャンコな日々」: 沢口みきのニャンコのようにのんびりな日々の日記です☆|accessdate=2008-06-22|publisher=[http://blog.livedoor.jp/ blog.livedoor.jp]|language=Japanese}} Eleven years after her AV debut, ''Tokyo Topless'', a Japanese big-bust website which is updated about once a month, gave Sawaguchi her seventh featured appearance on [[April 27]], [[2007]].{{cite web |url=http://tokyotopless.com/model/MikiSAWAGUCHI/07/|title=Miki SAWAGUCHI|accessdate=2007-05-03|publisher=tokyotopless.com|language=Japanese}} This site also informs us that Miki has become a part-time prostitute at a [[soap land]] in Tokyo. The club's site does promote her as a J-cup former AV star, but lists her age four years younger than she actually is. ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Jewel J |films = 70+ |homepage = http://www.sakurasena.ca/ |imdb = 1087604 |iafd= |afdb= }} {{nihongo|'''Sakura Sena'''|瀬名 さくら|Sena Sakura|January 31, 1975}} is a big-busted [[Japan]]ese [[glamour model]] and [[adult actress]] known for her [[brassiere measurements|32 G]] cup breasts and 23" waist.{{cite web |last=Sena|first=Sakura|url=http://www.babes.net/biography.asp?ID=2315|title= Biography - Sena Sakura|accessdate=2007-05-03|publisher=Babes.net}} ==Biography== ===Early life=== Sena was born January 31, 1975 to a middle-class family in [[Chigasaki, Kanagawa|Chigasaki]], [[Kanagawa Prefecture]]. Her father was a carpenter, and she had two older brothers and one younger brother. After arrival in Tokyo, she was featured in a photo layout in ''Weekly Taishu / Popular Weekly'' (週刊大衆 - ''Shukan Taishu'')Tani, Naomi. Interviewed by Hamamoto, Maki. (1998). "Naomi Tani - An Interview with Nikkatsu's Queen of SM" (Conducted in January 1998 in Kyushu, Japan) in ''Asian Cult Cinema'' Number 19, April 1998. p.39.. This appearance led to offers for roles in "[[Pink film]]s", the low-budget, independent soft-core pornographic films which dominated Japan's domestic cinema at this time. Her debut was in the 1967 film ''Special''. She took her screen name "Tani" from the novelist [[Jun'ichirō Tanizaki]] and "Naomi" from the central character in his important early work ''[[Naomi (novel)|A Fool's Love]]''. "Tani," or "valley," is also a Japanese slang word for the cleavage between the breasts. Consequently, Ms. Tani may have had a variety of puns in mind when she later opened a restaurant calling it the "Ohtani" (Big Breasts or Big Tani).{{cite book |last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-889288-52-7|page=270}} Tani's early films were principally with the small companies that were making ''pink films'' independent of the large studio system in the 1960s. In her pre-Nikkatsu career, she appeared in comedies, dramas, and action films, but it was the S&M genre which would make Tani a star. Her debut film was ''Special'' (スペシャル - ''Supesharu'') for Shin Nihon Eigasha and directed by the prolific ''pink film'' auteur [[Kōji Seki]].{{cite web |url=http://www.citwf.com/film66742.htm|title=''Supesharu / Special''|accessdate=2007-07-02|publisher=[http://www.citwf.com/ Complete Index to World Film]|language=English}} The film had Tani in the role of the mistress of a black marketeer who tries to cheat people at an ''[[onsen]]''. The couple is stopped by the local villagers.{{cite book |last=Cowie|first=Peter (editor)|title=World Filmography 1967|year=1977|publisher=Tantivy Press|location=London|isbn=0-498015-65-3|chapter=Japan|page=411.}} ''Experiments on the Human Body'' (''Zanki: Seitaijikken'' 1967) was a war drama in which Tani played a nurse in China where Japanese doctors are performing experiments on Chinese POWs.{{cite book |last=Cowie|first=Peter (editor)|title=World Filmography 1967|year=1977|publisher=Tantivy Press|location=London|isbn=0-498015-65-3|chapter=Japan|page=422.}} Tani's first experience with an S&M film was in one episode of the omnibus film ''Memoirs Of A Modern Female Doctor'' (1967),Weisser, 269. and her first full-fledged S&M leading role was in director Masanao Sakao's ''Female Bodies in a Brutal Scenario'' (1967), in which she plays a prostitute who repeatedly escapes from, and then captured and tortured by the ''[[yakuza]]''. Tani would play similar roles for Sakao in other films such as ''Virgins With Bad Reputations'', also made in 1967.Weisser, p.139. The same year Tani had a minor role in director [[Mamoru Watanabe]]'s ''[[Slave Widow]]'', which starred major "pink" actresses Noriko Tatsumi and Mari lwai. Impressed with Tani, Watanabe, considered one of the "Pillars of Pink," cast Tani in her first leading role for his next film, ''Bed of Violent Desires'' (1967). Typical of the sex-thriller ''pink films'' made by Koei studio in the years before Nikkatsu took over the genre in the 1970s, in this film, Tani plays the role of a daughter who seeks bloody revenge against her mother and her lover after they kill Tani's father for his money.Weisser, p.62, 394-395. During this early stage of her career, Tani sometimes worked at prominent ''pink film'' producer/director [[Kōji Wakamatsu]]'s independent studio. She worked several times with the prolific director [[Shinya Yamamoto]] in such films as ''Degenerate'' (1967), ''Memoirs Of Modern Love: Curious Age'' (1967) and ''Season For Rapists'' (1969).Weisser, p.113. Also during this period she became friends with the SM author, [[Oniroku Dan]], with whom she would work throughout her film career. Dan was secretly writing S&M film scripts under the pseudonym Matsugoro Kuroiwa while working as a high school English teacher.Tani (Interview), p.39. Tani's "pretty face, beautiful fair skin... and 96cm (38") large breasts"{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/N_TANI/index.html|title=Naomi Tani|accessdate=2007-03-03|language=English|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/}} as well as her acting abilities helped make her a popular actress in the late 1960s. She reportedly appeared in more than 200 films before her work with Nikkatsu, for which she is best known today. Weisser, p.333. Even at this early stage of her career, working for independent studios, Tani had already established herself as the "Queen of Pink."Konuma, Masaru. (1998). Interviewed by Thomas and Yuko Mihara Weisser on November 6, 1998, in ''Asian Cult Cinema'', #22, 1st Quarter, 1999. p.22. As an indication of her growing prominence as a representative of the erotic cinema in Japan, she appeared in the U.S. ''[[Playboy]]'s'' December 1968 issue in their "Girls of the Orient" pictorial article.{{cite web |last=Crossett|first=Andrew|url=http://www.aeolia.net/playboy/pb-t.htm|title=The Playboy Index - T|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://www.aeolia.net/playboy/playboy.htm Index: The Women of Playboy – 1967 – 2007]|year=2007|language=English}} In 1972, she directed two films from Oniroku Dan stories, ''Sex Killer'' and ''Starved Sex Beast''. Commenting on her own directorial style, Tani noted, "I accentuated scenes with a lot of torture and bondage."Tani (Interview), p.44. ===Nikkatsu=== Throughout the 1960s, softcore pornographic "Pink Films" had been produced in Japan by small, independent studios. In 1971, however, Nikkatsu, the country's oldest film studio, had entered the "Pink Film" market with its high-budget and quality "Roman Porno" series.{{cite book |last=Macias|first=Patrick|title=TokyoScope: The Japanese Cult Film Companion|year=2001|publisher=Cadence Books|location=San Francisco|isbn=1-56931-681-3|oclc= |pages=187–188|chapter=Nikkatsu's Roman Porno}} Besides appearing in Nikkatsu's first experiment in the ''pink film'' in 1968, ''Tokyo Bathhouse'' (''Onna Ukiyo Buro''), which featured over 30 sex-film stars in cameo appearances,Weisser, p.434.''World Filmography 1968'', p.411. Tani's first official ''Roman porno'' for Nikkatsu was in a minor role as a nurse in ''Sensuous Beasts'' (1972). Unlike her starring roles for smaller studios, she played a supporting role in this film. Preferring to continue starring in lower-budget films rather than playing supporting roles for Nikkatsu's leading Roman Porno actresses, she did not stay with Nikkatsu at this time.Tani (Interview), p.41.Weisser, p.374-375. Feeling that S&M was her destiny, Tani consented to work at Nikkatsu only on the condition that her first film be based on Oniroku Dan's novel, ''[[Flower and Snake]]''. Nikkatsu agreed. Directed by [[Masaru Konuma]], this 1974 film became a major hit for Nikkatsu, and established the S&M genre of Roman Porno film which would continue to be profitable for the studio throughout the 1970s and early 1980s. It became an even bigger hit than ''Flower and Snake'', and one of Nikkatsu's all-time top five money-makers. Tani's female co-star from ''Wife to be Sacrificed'', Terumi Azuma, would return in the 1975 film, ''[[Cruelty: Black Rose Torture]]'', and the two would be paired in several other films until Azuma began starring in her own films in 1976.Weisser, p.302. The title introduced Nikkatsu's nickname for Tani ("Black Rose"), which would be re-used in later film titles.Weisser, p.66. In Konuma's 1977 parody of the ''Roman porn'' genre, ''In the Realm of Sex'', Tani appears as herself, stalked by a perverted middle-aged fan who wants to perform an S&M session with her. Tani manages to reverse the roles by binding and torturing the fan instead.Weisser, p.209. "Violent pink" director [[Yasuharu Hasebe]] commented, "I regret that I only worked with her once... a very short scene at a greenhouse in ''Rape!'' The segment was only long enough for her to get assaulted by the rapist."Hasebe, Yasuharu. (1999). Interviewed by Thomas and Yuko Mihara Weisser in Tokyo. ''Asian Cult Cinema'' #25, 4th Quarter 1999, p.42. Tani starred in director [[Koyū Ohara]]'s Nikkatsu ''Roman pornos'', ''[[Fascination: Portrait of a Lady]]'' (1977), ''[[Rope Hell]]'' (1978) and ''[[Fairy in a Cage]]'' (1977) which had Tani playing the role of a wealthy business woman who is tortured by the sadistic head of the inquisition branch of the Japanese military during World War II.Weisser, p.136-138. As Tani's farewell performance, Nikkatsu gave this critically-acclaimed yakuza period-piece a big budget.Weisser, p.353. ===Tani's style=== Known for her remarkable dedication to her work, Tani would perform even the most extreme of S&M scenes without complaint. No matter what she did-- her behavior, her attitude, her body-- everything became a perfect picture."Konuma, p.24 In his ''Behind the Mask: On Sexual Demons, Sacred Mothers, Transvestites, Gangsters, Drifters, and Other Japanese Cultural Heroes'', [[Ian Buruma]] describes Tani as the most celebrated porn star of her time, "combin[ing] the savage and the maternal." To explain her popularity he says she "looked like a Japanese mother, her ample breasts tucked into a matronly kimono. She was the ideal object for men to take their anxieties out in, like the patient mother being pummelled by her sons. She was the Mother Goddess in bondage, the passive cross-bearer of masculine inadequacy."{{cite book |last=Buruma|first=Ian|authorlink=Ian Buruma|title=Behind the Mask: On Sexual Demons, Sacred Mothers, Transvestites, Gangsters, Drifters, and Other Japanese Cultural Heroes|chapter=Demon Woman|pages=61–62|year=1984|publisher=Pantheon Books|location=Seattle, WA|isbn=0-39453-775-0}} ===Retirement=== In 1979, after reigning for five years as Nikkatsu's "Queen Of S&M,"{{cite web |url=http://www.wildjapan.co.uk/pinku.php|title=Japanese "Pink Eiga" - A Short History Of The Japanese Sex Film Of The 1970s|accessdate=2007-02-18 |last=Chinchen|first=Jonny|year=2004|publisher=www.wildjapan.co.uk}} Tani retired suddenly and unexpectedly at the height of her popularity. She later gave her reason as, "I never wanted to disappoint my fans by showing an unflattering face. That's why I've always refused to do a ''comeback''. Nobody is free from aging. I want to exist in the audience's memory as a ''forever blooming flower''." Weisser, p.333 She celebrated her retirement by issuing a vocal album entitled ''Modae no Heya.'' On this disc's recent re-release in CD format, a reviewer commented of Tani's vocals, "There’s a worldliness in her voice and a maturity which suggests she’s seen it all... There is however a fragility to her voice, a cracking sense of the truly erotic, the unseen, the taboo which drapes each syllable... hearing music which would usually be readily associated with a mid-70s Samurai movie bedding down with such muted eroticism is more than a winning formula."{{cite web |url=http://www.boomkat.com/item.cfm?id=25412|title=TANI NAOMI - Modae No Heya|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=www.boomkat.com|language=English}} Tani notes that she immediately felt much more relaxed upon retirement. "I didn't have to worry about going out in the sun. I could suddenly enjoy the outdoors, golf and the beach." Her early retirement from film was clouded by difficulty however. In 1981 she was hit by a car while walking her dog, and had to undergo extensive rehabilitation for three years. This difficult period in her life continued with her 1984 divorce from her husband. After the divorce, she opened the Ohtani restaurant in [[Kumamoto, Kumamoto|Kumamoto]], which became highly successful, and which she currently owns.Tani (Interview), p.47 In 1996 she also opened "Yours Naomi", a video store near Hakata which specializes in erotic cinema, especially Nikkatsu's Roman Porno films. She comments that "Many young people (in their 20s and 30s) who used to buy the mindless AV [Adult Video] junk have shifted to 'Roman Porn' after being introduced to it." During the late 1990s Tani's work enjoyed a renewed surge of interest. ''Wife to be Sacrificed'' was released theatrically in the U.S. in 1998, playing in [[San Francisco]], [[Los Angeles]] and [[New York City]].Ranaletta, Ray. (1998). "Wife to be Sacrificed - Coming to a Theater Near You?" in ''Asian Cult Cinema'', # 19 (April 1998), p.49-50 In preparation for this event, Tani was interviewed by the U.S. publication, ''Asian Cult Cinema'' for its April, 1998 issue. Surprised by this attention from the U.S., Tani commented "I didn't think U.S. movie fans were interested in me or my movies. I thought Americans ignored my films because of the SM theme, since these movies give the impression of being abusive toward women. Regardless of the filmmaker's intent - the intellectual or artistic merit - I thought Americans viewed these productions as politically incorrect." This attention from the U.S. again brought Tani to the attention of the domestic Japanese media. At the time, Tani wrote, "the fact that people are still interested in me - after almost 20 years away from the screen - fills me with buoyancy and surprise. It embarrasses me, too." In this retrospective atmosphere, Tani was finally persuaded to return to film in 2000 to appear in [[Hideo Nakata]]'s documentary on director Masaru Konuma entitled ''Sadistic and Masochistic''.{{cite web |url=http://www.cinemasie.com/fr/fiche/personne/taninaomi/portrait.html|title=TANI Naomi|accessdate=2007-03-03|language=French|publisher=www.cinemasie.com}} == Selected Her AV debut was in the May 2000 Cosmos Plan release, ''Venus''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2000.htm|title=2000|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} From her first video appearance, Watase's smile and legs gained particular attention. Throughout her AV career Watase's long and slender legs continued to be singled out for praise in reviews of her videos.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT464|title=''Be My Dutchwife''|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IT27|title=''Venus''|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} {{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=2009|title=''D/L Part One''|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]|quote=Her super long legs are legendary...}}{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=akira_watase|title=Akira Watase (profile)|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]|quote=With sexy long legs and a sweet smile, Akira has become a favorite of many men.}} ''Marionette's Honey'' (July 2000) had Watase in a [[race queen]] and ''[[cosplay]]''-themed story involving middle-aged perverts and maid costumes.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=IT41|title=''Marionette's Honey''|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''Be My Dutchwife'' (August 2000), Watase played the role of a woman having a bad day in which she is sexually assaulted by both a stranger and her doctor. In contrast to these previous videos which featured sex and lurid drama, ''Horny Bunny'', released in December 2000, simply focused on Watase's body. ''No.1'' from January 2001 focused on the ''[[lotion play]]'' genre of Japanese pornography.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JF644|title=''No.1''|accessdate=2007-08-06|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Over the course of her adult film career Watase starred in over 100 releases. Later in her career, she appeared in the [[Moodyz]] video, ''[[Black Semen in L.A.]]'' (ブラックザーメン in L.A. - ''Burakku Zāmen in L.A.'', released on [[July 15]] [[2002]]), which was shot in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]]. In this video she engaged in [[group sex]] with five [[African-American]] men.{{imdb title|id=0781325|title=Black Semen in LA: Akira Watase}} Watase was considered one of the most popular stars of the genre, until she retired from the industry in mid-2005. 33-23-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.50}} |blood= B |shoe size= 23cm |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= |ethnicity= [[Japan]]ese |alias= Aimi Yoshii{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT505|title=''Origin''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} |homepage= |iafd= |imdb=2120543 }} {{nihongo|'''Manami Yoshii'''|吉井愛美|Yoshii Manami|born [[November 11]], [[1981]] in [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]}} is a well-known [[Japan]]ese [[pornographic movie|adult film]] actress. Described as "a super lolita beauty," Yoshii was already popular as a [[gravure idol]] at the time of her AV debut.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT480|title=''Growing Up Journal''|accessdate=2007-04-28|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ==Career== Yoshii's first AV was the November 2000 release, ''Growing Up Journal''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2000.htm|title=1995|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} In this first work in the AV industry, the popular gravure model is given one-on-one instruction from an experience AV actor. ''Water Fruit'' (December 2000) was Yoshii's second adult video. Like her first release, it was made for the [[Kuki Inc.|KUKI]] studio.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=JF641|title=''Water Fruit''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Also made for KUKI, Yoshii's third video, ''I Want to Get Lost'' (January 2001), had the actress at a ranch with a male actor, engaging in horse-back riding and fellatio.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KT494|title=''I WANT TO GET LOST''|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} When asked what was the most difficult thing she's had to do for an AV, Yoshii responded, "I guess it was when I had to play a character that didn't fit me. It felt really awkward to say those lines."{{cite web |first=Ex-S (translator)|last=Woo|year=2002|url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_57.html|title=Best Video: Group Interview|accessdate=2007-08-07|publisher=[http://www.jmate.com/ www.jmate.com]|language=English}} In ''Origin'' (March 2001), Yoshii filmed nude and sex scenes on location at a tropical beach. ''Girls Just Can't Help it: Super High School Girls'' (April 2001) had Yoshii in the role of a young woman who is blackmailed into sex by her substitute teacher. Known for her amorous voice, and angelic countenance, Yoshikawa made her AV debut in the November 1990 [[Alice Japan]] release, {{nihongo|''Can You Turn Around?''|ふりむいても紅色|Furimuite-kurenai}}.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1990_body.htm|title=1990|accessdate=2008-03-20|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Yoshikawa was the star of director [[Sachi Hamano]]'s ''[[pink film]]'', {{nihongo2|いんらん美姉妹　義兄あさり}} released by Exces in April 1991.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/1991/do000750.htm|title=いんらん美姉妹　義兄あさり|accessdate=2009-07-29|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} She became one of the most popular AV idols in Japan during the early 1990s, and retired at the end of 1991 when she got married to Jun Fujioka (藤岡純), a male [[porn star]]. In 2002, she joined former AV actress [[Rui Sakuragi]] in a voice role for the [[anime]] erotic-horror film ''Youjuu Kyoushitsu Chapter 2'' (Demon Beast Invasion Chapter 2).{{cite web |url=http://www.sazuma.com/item_9589_Youjuu-Kyoushitsu-Chapter-2.html|title=Youjuu Kyoushitsu Chapter 2|accessdate=2009-07-08|publisher=[http://www.sazuma.com/ www.sazuma.com]}} More than a dozen years after her retirement, Alice Japan released a DVD, ''No Cut 4 Hours!! {{Female adult bio| |photo= |birth= {{birth date and age|1978|11|28}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ysnsr_00|title=吉野サリー - Yoshino Sarii (Profile)|accessdate=2007-04-23|work=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}}{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_27.html|title=Sally Yoshino Interview|accessdate=2007-04-23|work=www.jmate.com}} |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= Sayuri Yoshinari (吉成小百合) |death= |measurements= 80(F)-53-85(cm)
32-21-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.53}} |weight= {{height|kg=39}} |eye color= Brown |blood= O |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Kirara Tachibana |homepage= |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Sally Yoshino'''|吉野サリー|Yoshino Sarii}} (born November 28, 1978) is a [[Japan]]ese [[striptease]] dancer, [[Model (person)|model]], and [[AV idol]] who has been called "one of the true legends of [[Chronology of adult videos in Japan|AV]] (Adult Video)."{{cite web |url=http://www.downloadjav.com/actresses/actress.cfm?filename=sally_yoshino|title=Sally Yoshino|accessdate=2007-04-23|work=downloadjav.com}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Sally Yoshino was born {{nihongo|Sayuri Yoshinari|吉成小百合|Yoshinari Sayuri}} in [[Tokyo]] on [[November 28]], [[1978]].{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?ysnsr_00|title=吉野サリー - Yoshino Sarii (Profile)|accessdate=2007-04-23|work=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']}} In addition to her stage name of "Sally Yoshino," she has also performed under the name {{nihongo|Kirara Tachibana|立花きらら|Tachibana Kirara}}. Her father was a member of a skate team, and Yoshino began figure skating at the age of three. In order to pursue this interest, she entered an athletic high school. There she also participated in gymnastics and ballet.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_27.html|title=Sally Yoshino Interview|accessdate=2007-04-23|work=www.jmate.com}} Yoshino began working in ''[[enjo kōsai]]'' (paid dating) while still a 17-year-old virgin. It was while engaged in this profession that she claims to have lost her virginity in Okubo Park in Tokyo's [[Kabukichō, Tokyo|Kabukichō]] district.{{cite news |first=Monty|last=DiPietro|title=Welcome to Misery Park|url=http://www.tokyohockey.com/miserypark.php|work="The Zeit Gist" section of [http://www.japantimes.co.jp/ The Japan Times Online] (original source) archived in [http://www.tokyohockey.com/index.php Tokyo Street Hockey Association]|date=2007-01-30|accessdate=2007-02-23}} Her first customer was a talent company president in his 40s. He took her to the park in the middle of the afternoon for their sexual encounter. Recalling her feelings over the incident, Yoshino commented, "I didn't care if I was a virgin or not. If I did, I couldn't do ''enjo kōsai''... I don't think I was taken advantage of. I got something out of it." While still 17 she was the victim of rape. She says, "It was then that it didn't matter if I did this kind of work or not." ===AV debut=== Yoshino entered the entertainment field at the age of 18 with her AV debut in the November 1997 release for the Cosmos Plan label, ''Younger Than Me''{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=AP011|title=''Younger Than Me''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} At the same time she began appearing in magazine features, including one for ''[[Urecco]]'' in November 1998. Her January, 1998 release, ''Cheeky Girl'', had the company still promoting Yoshino as "Tokyo's New 18 Year-Old Girl." This was a documentary-style video, complete with [[hand-held camera]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=AP014|title=''Cheeky Girl''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Striptease=== Her background in athletics and dance was beneficial to her career in [[striptease]] dancing which began in 1998. Though she has performed in many facets of the adult entertainment field, she considers stripping her favorite venue. Though her AV career has been sporadic, her work as a striptease dancer has been continuous. When comparing her affinity for the striptease over AVs, Yoshino explains, "I have been dancing for years. That is more fun... Everyone seems to hate stripping. Girls nowadays quit right away. I never thought of quitting." Yoshino's stripping career occasionally resulted in trouble with the law. A special performance marking her birthday was widely advertised on the [[Internet]], and attracted some under-aged patrons. When the mother of a junior high school student who had attended the performance complained to the police, Yoshino was arrested for [[public indecency]]. ===AV come-back=== She made a come-back to the AV format with the January 2001 release, ''Sally Yoshino''. Her performance was praised as, "much more mature and has an atmosphere of a sexy adult woman. Her sensual eyes and her panting voice are still the same."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1214|title=''Sally Yoshino''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Yoshino's appearance in the ''Female Teacher Hunt'' series the following month continued her "sensational comeback with a vengeance." Yoshino played the role of the teacher in a class of sex-starved males in this MAX-A release.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2219|title=''Female Teacher Hunt in Sally Yoshino''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In January 2006 it was reported that Yoshino, now retired from AVs, was currently working as a striptease dancer.{{cite web |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060305001357/mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|archivedate=2006-03-05|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|title=Porn starlets move on to inspiring second careers|accessdate=2007-04-23|last=Kamiyama|first=Masuo|date=[[2006-01-07]]|work=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]}} In October of the same year, [[Kuki Inc.|KUKI]] issued a career retrospective disk of Yoshino's AV work for that studio entitled ''Playback, Sally Yoshino''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VDF020|title=''Playback, Sali Yoshino''|accessdate=2007-07-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In November, 2006, [[Attackers]] released a previously unreleased video, date of filming unknown. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Adult bio |image=[[Image:Replace this image female.svg]] | |name= Maiko Yūki ||caption = |birth= {{birth date and age|1977|1|30}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?yukmik00|date=2005-08-15|title=夕樹舞子 - Yuuki Maiko|accessdate=2008-01-03|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} |death= |location= [[Niigata]], [[Japan]] |birthname= Maki Wakui |measurements= 84-58-85(cm) |height= {{height|m=1.58}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= |blood= B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= http://www.yuukimaiko.com/ |iafd = |imdb = |afdb = }} {{nihongo|'''Maiko Yūki'''|夕樹舞子|Yūki Maiko}} is a [[Japanese person|Japanese]] [[AV idol]], [[actress]], and [[stripper]]. One of the top AV idols in the mid-1990s, she was named the "AV Girl of the Year" in 1998.{{cite web |url=http://movies.yahoo.com/movie/1800388263/info|title=Maiko Yuuki (1999)|accessdate=2008-01-03|publisher=[[Yahoo!]]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://www.dvdempire.com/Exec/v4_item.asp?userid=&item_id=3234|title=Maiko Yuuki: Japan A.V. Girl Of The Year|accessdate=2008-01-04|publisher=[http://www.dvdempire.com/ www.dvdempire.com]|language=English}} In 2004 Yūki was the star performer in the first Japanese strip show to perform in the [[People's Republic of China]].{{cite web |url=http://www.asiansexgazette.com/asg/japan/japan02news30.htm|first=Masuo|last=Kamiyama|title=People's Republic gets to peek-in at Japanese strip tease|date=[[November 4]], [[2004]]|accessdate=2008-01-03|publisher=[http://www.asiansexgazette.com/ www.asiansexgazette.com]|language=English}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Maiko Yūki was born {{nihongo|Maki Wakui|涌井 麻紀|Wakui Maki}} on [[January 30]], [[1977]] in [[Niigata Prefecture]]{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?yukmik00|date=2005-08-15|title=夕樹舞子 - Yuuki Maiko |accessdate=2008-01-03|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} to a family in the construction business.{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/interviews/Maiko_Yuki/|date=2005-08-15|title=Maiko Yuki Interview|accessdate=2008-01-03|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/main/ www.jsexnetwork.com]|language=English}} Both of her parents had been gang members, and Yūki was also a rowdy student who claims to have never lost a fight with a girl or boy. Family difficulties led her to run away from home several times by the eighth grade. Expelled on her first day in high school for fighting with the teacher, she returned home and began working as a golf caddy at a club. She had been determined to keep her virginity until marriage, however, at the age of 17 she was raped by her boyfriend's brother, the leader of a local gang. Shattered by the experience, she developed a fear of men. ===AV debut=== Yūki entered an acting school, where she met an AV actress manager. She made the decision to perform in an AV as a way of confronting and resolving her fears. Her debut video was the April 1995 [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]] Tiffany release, ''Shojokyu Sotsugyo ~Graduation~''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1995.htm|title=1995|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her first day on the set was difficult, and the shooting was delayed for five hours due to her emotional state. Yūki says that the AV staff were understanding, and this helped her to overcome her difficulties with her first video. She contrasts the AV staff's sympathetic attitudes with the more impersonal treatment she has had on television programs and for magazines. At first, her family was against her AV career, but they came to lend support for the signing event after her first AV release. For the next year, Yūki mostly alternated monthly videos for h.m.p. and another studio Cosmos Plan until her final work for h.m.p. ''Good-bye'' in May 1996.{{cite web |url=http://www.hmp.jp/portal/catalog/goods/JH-NTF-009/|title=さよなら夕樹舞子.|accessdate=2009-08-05|publisher=[http://www.hmp.jp/ www.hmp.jp]|language=Japanese}} ===Comeback=== She retired from the AV industry for a time, but, principally due to requests from her [[Hong Kong]] fans for new photobooks and videos, she came out of retirement. In a come-back appearance in Hong Kong, she was surprised by the enthusiasm of the local press and her fan-base there. An autograph-signing drew a crowd of over 8,000, and she required six bodyguards while in Hong Kong. Her experience in Hong Kong caused her see her work in AVs as a life's calling, and she decided to move to [[Tokyo]] to pursue this career full-time at age 21. She began her comeback in April 1998 with a series of videos for the [[Crystal-Eizou]] studio starting with ''Venus Return''. Her retirement work for Crystal-Eizou was the January 1999 video ''Final Maiko - Forever Angel'' but she later appeared in some S&M productions for the Attackers and [[CineMagic Co.|CineMagic]] studios. In 2004 Yūki was the star performer in the first Japanese strip show to perform in the [[People's Republic of China]]. An "uncensored" video (one without the mosaic pixelation to obscure the genitals required in videos sold legally in Japan) with Yūki was released by Samurai Porn in July 2006.{{cite web |url=http://www.avfantasy.com/product_lists.aspx?product_id=28265&videotype=1|title=SAMURAIPORN VOL.3 : Maiko Yuuki|accessdate=2009-08-05|publisher=[http://www.avfantasy.com/ AV Fantasy]}} == Partial filmography == {| class="wikitable" ! Tina Kashiwagi |homepage= http://blog.livedoor.jp/rio_carnival/ |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Tina Yuzuki'''|柚木ティナ|Yuzuki Tina}}, also known as '''Rio''', is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV idol]] who debuted in 2005 and quickly rose to stardom. Known for her chirpy character and cute antics, she has in a short time become one of the most productive actresses in the Japanese adult video industry. She has appeared in videos produced under the Max-A and [[S1 No. 1 Style|S1]] labels. After starring in AVs in various genres during her first year in the industry, in December 2006 she was called, "the most talked about actress this year,"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV455|title=''Max-A Anniversary''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and the Japanese AV industry named her Best New Actress for 2006.{{cite web |url=http://www.sexasian18.com/actress.php?id=1252#tab=2|title=Tina Yuzuki 柚木ティナ|accessdate=2007-07-18|publisher=[http://www.sexasian18.com/ www.sexasian18.com]}} Since late 2007, she has used the stage name of Rio. ==Life and career== Tina Yuzuki was born in [[Tokyo]] on [[October 29]], [[1986]]. Like fellow AV idols [[Maria Ozawa]], [[Meisa Hanai]] and [[Anna Ohura]], Yuzuki is of mixed-race parentage. Her father is Japanese and her mother is [[Portuguese people|Portuguese]], and she learned to speak [[Portuguese language|Portuguese]] from her mother.{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/228/yuzukitina.html|title=柚木ティナの部屋へようこそ (''Yuzuki Tina no Heya e Youkoso'') Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://www.b-v.co.jp/ www.b-v.co.jp]|language=Japanese|quote=母とはいつもポルトガル語で喋ってますね。}} Her hobbies include [[karaoke]].{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=1166|title=Yuzuki (Tina Yuzuki)|accessdate=2007-02-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===AV debut and Max-A=== Yuzuki's AV debut was in the November 2005 release for MAX-A's Calen label, ''Hot Wind'',{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2005.htm|title=2005|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Filmed before her 19th birthday, her peppy personality and blushing skin tones were used as selling points for this documentary-style AV release.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1415|title=''Hot Wind / Tina Yuzuki''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The director of Yuzuki's premier video uses the name 'Toshio,' and has continued to work with the actress throughout her AV career. Yuzuki and director Toshio's most recent collaboration was in the March 2007 release, ''High School Uniform and Machine-Gun''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XC1415|title=''High School Uniform and Machine-Gun''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Yuzuki's second video, ''Feel Refreshing'' (December, 2005) left the popular documentary style for a narrative fiction story in which she played a sexually-curious high school student.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV316|title=''Feel Refreshing / Tina Yuzuki''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her third video had her playing the role of an office lady.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV329|title=''Dramatic Love''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In ''IMPRESSIVE / Make My Dream'' from March 2006, Yuzuki worked in the popular ''[[cosplay]]'' genre. The costumes worn by Yuzuki in the video included that of a nurse, a maid, and a "Gothic Lolita."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV329|title=''IMPRESSIVE / Tina Yuzuki: make my dream''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She donned the nurse and waitress costumes again in her entry in Max-A's popular ''Welcome to Max Cafe!'' series, released in April 2006.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV365|title=''Welcome to Max Cafe! / Tina Yuzuki''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The following month, Max-A chose Yuzuki to star in their May 2006 release, ''My Wife Is Tina!'', the first video in the company's newlywed housewife series.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV378|title=''My wife is Tina!''|accessdate=2007-06-04|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Confined Body Doll X - ascription'', released in June, had Yuzuki in a "psycho thriller" mystery involving missing girls.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV390|title=''Confined Body Doll X - ascription''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She would again star in a suspense-drama in the January 2007 release ''High School Girl Abducted'',{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV484|title=''High School Girl Abducted, Tina Yuzuki''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and in a crime-drama in the March 2007 release, ''High School Uniform and Machine-Gun''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV484|title=''High School Uniform and Machine-Gun''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In July 2006, Yuzuki made her first foray into the incest genre with ''Sister's Secret''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV401|title=''Sister's Secret / Tina Yuzuki''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Passion: Tina's Mystery Tour'' is an adventure involving a treasure hunt for a gigantic [[vibrator]], a guide who demands [[fellatio]], and tribe of sex-hungry natives.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV421|title=''Passion: Tina's Mystery Tour''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} At the end of 2006, Max-A again picked Yuzuki to star in the first entry in a new series. Entitled ''Urekko'', the video was released in December 2006.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SRXV460|title=''Urekko''|accessdate=2007-06-09|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Another of Yuzuki's appearances was in the July 2007 release, ''Tina and Her Friends'', where she plays a space girl who flies down to Earth and after some harrowing experiences finds love.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV556|title=''Tina and Her Friends''|accessdate=2007-07-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Rio and S1=== Beginning with her October 12, 2007 release, ''Endless Ecstasy Fuck'', for Max-A, Yuzuki adopted the stage name of Rio.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=xv585|title=''Non-Stop Extreme Fucking''|accessdate=2008-11-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} This is the name she has used in all original videos since. After spending two years making videos exclusively for Max-A, Yuzuki left that company early in 2008 to join [[S1 No. 1 Style]], part of Japan's largest porn company, the [[Hokuto Corporation]]. She released her first video with them, ''Risky Mosaic Rio'', directed by [[Hideto Aki]], in February 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=16380/|title=Rio - S1 Profile & Filmography|accessdate=2008-11-18|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}} She continued working for S1, producing one video per month, through the beginning of 2009 when she once again began performing for Max-A. In another entertainment area, Suzuki along with other S1 actresses [[Sora Aoi]], [[Yuma Asami]] and [[Mihiro]] was a regular on the late night TV variety show {{nihongo|''Please Muscat''|おねがい マスカット|Onegai Muscat}} which began airing on [[TV Osaka]] in April 2008.{{cite web|url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/jav-stars-maria-ozawa-and-sora-host-osaka-tv-variety-show/|title=JAV stars Maria Ozawa and Sora Aoi host Osaka TV Variety show|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|accessdate=2009-06-16|date=March 20, 2009}} Rio appeared in her first mainstream movie in 2009, the schoolgirl prostitute revenge erotic thriller ''Stop the Bitch Campaign'' (Enjo-kosai bokumetsu undo or 援助交際撲滅運動) directed by Kosuke Suzuki with [[Kenichi Endo]] as the evil villain. The film, the third in the series, debuted at the [[Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival]] in February 2009 followed by a series of screenings in March at the Cinema Rosa in the [[Ikebukuro]] district of Tokyo. A DVD was released in June 2009.{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1363366/|title=Enjo-kôsai bokumetsu undô (2009)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-05-06}}{{cite web|url=http://www.spopro.net/stbc/|title=Stop the Bitch Campaign Official Site|publisher=[http://www.spopro.net/ www.spopro.net]|accessdate=2009-05-06|language=Japanese}} Also in 2009, she was one of three AV Idols appearing in the joint Japanese-Korean production ''Korean Classroom'' which was broadcast on Korean TV in May 2009. Along with her fellow stars [[Sora Aoi]] and [[Mihiro]], she traveled to Korea to promote the four part series.{{cite web|url=http://www.allkpop.com/index.php/full_story/aoi_sora_and_mihiro_promote_korean_classroom/|title=Aoi Sora and Mihiro promote Korean Classroom|publisher=[http://www.allkpop.com/ AllKPop]|accessdate=2009-07-16}} ===Popularity and recognition=== Yuzuki stands out in the AV field, where an average career spans about a year, with five to ten videos total,{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-06-04|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2007-03-20|quote=If [an AV actress is] only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year-- the average life-span of an AV girl-- with five or ten videos to her credit...}} while since her AV debut Yuzuki has appeared in one or two video releases per month for more than three years. The Japanese AV industry recognized Yuzuki by naming her the Best New Actress at the 2006 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#AV Actress Grand Prix 2006|AV Actress Grand Prix]] awards.{{cite web |url=http://www.asianidols.net/news.php?day.20070107|title=AV Grand Prix 2006 Winners Announced|accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://www.asianidols.net/ Asianidols.net]|date=January 7, 2007}} She was further honored by being crowned Best Actress at the 2008 [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] for the Cherry Bomb adult TV channel on [[SKY PerfecTV!]] satellite television.{{cite web|url=http://www.tokyoreporter.com/2008/03/30/her-name-is-rio-and-she-won-best-actress-at-the-2008-adult-awards/|title=Rio claims top prize at 2008 Adult Broadcasting Awards |publisher=[http://www.tokyoreporter.com/ Tokyo Reporter]|date=March 30, 2008|accessdate=2008-11-11}} In addition, her November 2008 film, ''Double Risky Mosaic, Rio & Yuma'', with [[Yuma Asami]], was the S1 studio's entry in the 2009 [[AV GrandPrix]] contest. The video took the top GrandPrix Award and also won in several other categories: DVD Sales, Retailers Award, Package Design, and Best Featured Actress Video.{{cite web|url=http://www.av-gp.com/news/avgp_result/bottom.html|title=AVGP 2009 Result announcement|publisher=[http://www.av-gp.com/ www.av-gp.com]|accessdate=2009-03-02|language=Japanese}} == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 35-24-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.57}} |weight= |eye color= |hair color= |natural bust= | blood = O |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= |imdb= 0464788 |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Yuri Komuro'''|小室友里|Komuro Yuri}} (born [[July 28]], [[1976]] in [[Kanagawa Prefecture]], [[Japan]]) is a [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]], actress, and author. She was one of the top actresses in the AV field during the late 1990s.{{cite news |first=Masuo|last=Kamiyama|title=Porn starlets move on to inspiring second careers|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060305001357/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2006/01/20060107p2g00m0dm017000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[January 7]], [[2006]]|archivedate=2006-03-05|accessdate=2008-01-19}} ==Life and career== ===Early life and AV career=== Yuri Komuro was born in Japan's [[Kanagawa Prefecture]] on [[July 28]], [[1976]], Komuro comments, "I've always had a strong sexual awareness, even as a kid." While still in [[kindergarten]] she asked a neighborhood boy to play with her breasts. Komuro recalls once, still at an early age, inviting a university student to give her a [[blow job]] before she knew what the term meant. She comments that the resultant experience with [[cunnilingus]] would today be considered a sex crime. Komuro began studying for a career as a travel agent before she began work in the adult entertainment field.{{cite news |title=Japanese porn star, 20, losing gleam after 10 films|url=http://nl.newsbank.com/nl-search/we/Archives?p_product=ST&s_site=dfw&p_multi=ST&p_theme=realcities&p_action=search&p_maxdocs=200&p_topdoc=1&p_text_direct-0=0EAF914747630F09&p_field_direct-0=document_id&p_perpage=10&p_sort=YMD_date:D&s_trackval=GooglePM|publisher=[[Fort Worth Star-Telegram]]|page=p.14|date=[[October 26]], [[1997]]|accessdate=2008-01-19|language=English}} Her decision to work in the AV industry was based on a desire to do something more unusual. "I thought if I did this," she comments, "I could change my life, Otherwise, I figured my future would be pretty predictable." Komuro made her AV debut with [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]] on their Tiffany label in January 1996, the same month as fellow AV Idol, [[Miki Sawaguchi]]. Komuro continued working for h.m.p. for her first two years in the AV industry.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1996.htm|title=1996|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]|quote=小室友里／新・官能姫 第2章 （ティファニー）}} ===Later AVs=== In January 1998 Komuro made her debut with [[Alice Japan]]. In the video, ''Sexy Butt'', Komuro portrays an extraterrestrial who inspires interest in inter-galactic sexual activity from earthlings.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA1865|title=Sexy Butt|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Alice Japan's ''Saint Prostitute'' had Komuro as a woman who plans to molest men on a train, but becomes a victim herself instead.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9076|title=Saint Prostitute|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} The same company's ''Inhumanity'' had Komuro attempting to shed her humanity through continual sexual activity. She performs fellatio on ten actors, has sex with ten actors, and concludes the video by sharing childhood memories with the AV audience.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV006|title=Inhumanity|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In ''Anal Fuck'', Komuro takes up a challenge to concentrate solely on activities dealing with her rear end. Examination, shaving, vibrators and enemas ensue until the video concludes with the actress fainting.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kr9094|title=Anal Fuck|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} The concept behind Alice Japan's ''Queen Slut'' was to have Komuro seducing hapless men. The project goes awry, however, when Komuro herself becomes the victim of a "powerful group of molesters" before she can act her part.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DC065|title=Queen Slut|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In May 1998, Atlas21 director Kei Morikawa made Komuro's career the subject of the documentary ''Legend Of An AV Idol''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A055|title=Legend of an AV Idol|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Morikawa again directed Komuro in the September 1998 ''[[cosplay]]''-themed video ''NEO Bloody Uniform Connection 44''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A093|title=NEO Bloody Uniform Connection 44|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Atlas21's November 1998 release, ''The Serial Fuck'' had Komuro as a bicyclist attacked by a gang of rapists.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=8A112|title=The Serial Fuck|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} At the height of her AV career, Komuro took advantage of her popularity to engage in a business venture. She lent her name to the advertising of a perfume which, it was claimed, was based on the smell of a pair of panties she had worn for several days without changing. The perfume was called "Asoko," literally meaning, "That place," a Japanese euphemism for the genitals.{{cite news |title=Porno world spreads its legs and shoots out a few secrets|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/09/20030914p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060322081536/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/09/20030914p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archivedate=2006-03-22|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[September 14]], [[2003]]|accessdate=2008-01-19}} In spite of her high earning, however, after retiring from the AV field, Komuro realized that she had not been very wise with her money. "I blew my money in all kinds of spectacular ways, What was left, I used to buy a car and personal computer. If I had saved the income from just three films, things wouldn't be so tight now. Life is hard for AV actresses once they retire." ===Post-AV career=== By the time Komuro announced her retirement plans from the AV industry in 1999 with ''Last Scene'', it was claimed, with perhaps some hyperbole, that she had spilled the sperm of some 20 million Japanese men.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/japan/info.html?id=ka1942|title=LastScene|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English|quote=日本全国の成人男子２千万人（推定）のスペルマを絞り採ったＡＶクィーン・小室友里...}} Komuro later commented of this part of her life, "When I look back at my acting days, it was lots of fun. Just by following somebody's instructions to disrobe I could make millions, or even tens of millions of yen. I think back on the opportunity with a sense of gratitude." Komuro's AV industry past was reflected in her role in director Masato Ishioka's debut feature film, {{nihongo|''Scoutman''|ペイン|Pain}}. In this gritty depiction of Japan's AV industry, Komuro played the role of Miki, a former ''tantai'' (star-quality) AV actress whose adult video career is kept a secret from her husband.{{cite web |url=http://www.midnighteye.com/reviews/scoutman.shtml|title=Scoutman|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com/ midnighteye.com]|language=Japanese}} Kei Morikawa, Komuro's AV director from her Atlas days, has a role as an AV director.{{imdb title|0266945|Scoutman (2000)}} The film was presented at several international film festivals, including the [[Venice Film Festival]] and the [[Toronto Film Festival]].{{cite web |first=David|last=Strattona|url=http://www.variety.com/review/VE1117788700.html|title=Scout-Man|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://www.cinematopics.com/cinema/works/output2.php?oid=857|title=PAIN／ペイン Scoutman|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://www.cinematopics.com/ Cinema Topics Online]|language=Japanese}} It was nominated for Best Asian Feature Film at the [[Singapore International Film Festival]], and won Ishioka the Directors' Week Special Jury Award at the Fantasporto competition.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0266945/awards|title=Awards for Scoutman (2000)|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[[IMDB]]|language=English}} Komuro starred in pioneering porn actress and director [[Kyoko Aizome]]'s April [[2002 in film|2002]] film, ''Kyoko Aizome's Molester's Hospital''. Komuro played the role of a lawyer trying to solve a case of serial rapes at a hospital run by Aizome. [[Alice Japan]] released the film in October in AV format with the title ''Molester In a Hospital''.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9172|title=Molester In A Hospital|accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Though she concedes, "Most of what I do has some sort of connection with eroticism," writing had always been one of Komuro's interests. During her AV career she had written a series of essays expressing her thoughts on topics such as friends, family, work, love, the AV industry, and sex. In December of 1998 a collection of these essays were published under the title {{nihongo|''Bare Faced''|素顔}}.{{cite web |url=http://webcatplus-equal.nii.ac.jp/libportal/DocDetail?txt_docid=jBKID%3AB9849673|title=素顔 |accessdate=2008-01-18|publisher=[[Webcat Plus]]|language=Japanese}} When fellow AV idol Runa Hoshizaki gave Komuro an introduction, she began pursuing writing as a career. Komuro wrote sex-advice articles, conducted interviews with sex industry workers, and wrote pieces which were serialized in journals. In 2006, it was reported that Komuro had moved on to a second career in journalism, covering the field of erotic entertainment.{{cite news |first= Antonio R. |last= Samson|title=Fence Sitter|url= |work= BusinessWorld|location= Manila|publisher= |date= 2006-01-17|accessdate=18 March 2009 }} In spite of her life-long involvement with erotic entertainment, looking back on her AV career, Komuro says, "I never had an orgasm during a film shooting. Except when somebody worked on me with a vibrator." In 2006, seven years after retirement from the AV industry, Komuro stated, "I'm finally at the stage where I can really enjoy sex." ==Appearances== === Selected filmography === {| class="wikitable" ! As an actress she portrayed Sadako Yamamura in the 1995 Japanese TV movie ''[[Ring (film)|Ring: Kanzenban]]''. Miura has appeared in several [[V-Cinema]] films. In 1996 she appeared in an entry in the popular ''Rapeman'' series. Telling the saga of Rapeman Services, a company of professional rapists whose motto is "Righting wrongs through penetration", the original film inspired six sequels and two spin-off films. In their ''Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films'', the Weissers write that the series director, Takao Nagaishi, took "a patently offensive premise and twisted it into a wickedly funny black-comedy for adults... His camerawork is slick, and the music is hypnotic. Plus he has co-authored clever scripts with surprisingly intricate plotlines. And, most importantly, Nagaishi has taken the time to develop a group of characters who are actually very likable."
