33-24-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.61}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |blood=B |orientation= [[Heterosexual]] |ethnicity= Japanese |alias= Kyōko Aoyama |homepage= http://www.actressworld.co.jp/actressworld/index.html |iafd= |imdb=0014954 }} {{nihongo|'''Kyōko Aizome'''|愛染 恭子|Aizome Kyōko}} is a Japanese erotic [[actor|actress]], singer, AV director, and writer{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/HISTORY/K_AIZOME/index.html|title=Kyōko Aizome|accessdate=2007-03-03|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp/SHIN-TOHO/}} who has been called, "the first [[Hardcore pornography|hard-core]] porn actress in Japan."{{cite web |url=http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|title=Porn-star label now a badge of honor for actress|accessdate=2007-03-03|last=Koizumi|first=Shinichi|date=[[December 1]], [[2001]]|year= |month= |publisher=[[Asahi Shimbun]]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20011203120520/http://www.asahi.com/english/weekend/K2001120100409.html|archivedate=2001-12-03}} ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Kyōko Aizome was born Kyōko Yamazaki on February 9, 1958 in Noda, Chiba Prefecture. Aizome grew up in a troubled household. Her father was a police officer who beat his wife, and her parents divorced about 1974, when Aizome was 16 years old. Soon after graduation from high school, Aizome was scouted in Tokyo's [[Shinjuku]] neighborhood by a photographer for nude magazines. She saw nude modeling as a stepping-stone into a career in entertainment. First taking the stage name Kyōko Aoyama, she was soon appearing in films such as director [[Shinya Yamamoto]]'s ''Molester's Subway'' and "violent pink" director [[Yasuharu Hasebe]]'s [[1978 in film|1978]] [[Nikkatsu]] ''[[Roman Porno]]'', ''Raping!'' (''Yaru!'').{{cite web |url=http://www.citwf.com/film5931.htm|title=''YARU! / RAPING!''|accessdate=2007-03-04|publisher=[http://www.citwf.com/ Complete Index to World Film]}} She had a leading role in one of director [[Noboru Tanaka]]'s major ''Roman Porno'' films, ''Pink Salon: Five Lewd Women'' (1978), based on the erotic novel, ''Five Licentious Women'' aka ''Five Women Who Loved Love'' by [[Ihara Saikaku]].{{cite book |last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|date= |year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-88928-852-7|page=312}} She appeared in the seventh episode of Nikkatsu's [[Koichiro Uno]] series, director [[Akira Kato]]'s ''Koichiro Uno's Moist And Steamy'' ([[1979 in film|1979]])Weisser, p.449., and the following year she worked under director Noboru Tanaka again for his ''Nami'' ([[1980 in film|1980]]), the third entry in Nikkatsu's ground-breaking ''[[Angel Guts]]'' series.''Angel Guts – The Nikkatsu Series – 5 Disc Collector's Edition – High School Co-ed; Red classroom; Nami; Red Porno; Red Vertigo''. 2005. www.artsmagicdvd.com ATU 017. Disc three: Nami; Biographies: Kyōko Aoyama. ===''Daydream''=== Pioneer ''[[pinku eiga]]'' director [[Tetsuji Takechi]] noticed Aizome in one of her nude photo magazine appearances. ''Pinku eiga'', or "pink films", are the softcore genre of sex-film which dominated Japan's domestic cinema during the 1960s and 1970s. Tetsuji had made ''[[Daydream (1964 film)|Daydream]]'' ([[1964 in film|1964]]), the first big-budget ''pink film''. He chose Aizome to star in his hardcore remake of this film, also called ''[[Daydream (1981 film)|Daydream]]'' ([[1981 in film|1981]]), giving the actress her leading-role debut. Japan's first theatrically released film featuring hardcore sex, Aizome added to the controversy surrounding the film by admitting to having performed actual sexual intercourse on camera. Though, as Japanese law required, sexual organs and pubic hair were fogged on screen, the [[Asahi Shimbun]] calls it Japan's first hardcore [[pornographic]] movie. By 1981, hardcore [[Chronology of adult videos in Japan|AVs]] (adult videos) were already starting to win over the adult entertainment audience in Japan,Weisser, p.29 but the film became a hit with theatrical audiences. Uncensored copies of the film were also circulated illegally.Weisser, p.91 Aizome gained national notoriety from her status as Japan's first porn-movie superstar, comparable to the U.S.'s [[Linda Lovelace]] and [[Marilyn Chambers]]. She made her debut in the still-young AV industry in November 1981, making her one of Japan's earliest [[AV idols]].{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1981.htm|title=1981|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Her name became a marketing tool and was used in the titles of such later theatrical releases as ''Kyōko Aizome's Somber Reminiscence'' (''Aizome Kyōko Kareinaru Tsuioku'') ([[1983 in film|1983]]){{cite web |url=http://www.allmovie.com/cg/avg.dll?p=avg&sql=1:249618|last=Firsching|first=Robert|title=''Aizome Kyōko Kareinaru Tsuioku''|accessdate=2007-04-19|publisher=[[Allmovie]]|quote=This softcore pinku eiga film from Joy Pack Film and director Tadashi Yoyogi was made to capitalize on the notoriety of starlet Kyōko Aizome. She had attracted some notice by breaking the Japanese film taboo of displaying pubic hair in Tetsuji Takechi's 1981 remake of his 1964 classic Hakujitsumu.}} and [[Shinya Yamamoto]]'s ''Kyōko Aizome's Widow's Boarding House'' (''Aizome Kyōko no Mibōjin Geshuku'') ([[1984 in film|1984]]).Weisser, p.230 Aizome's fame resulting from ''Daydream'' also led her to embark on a successful live-performance career in [[striptease]] which lasted until her retirement in July 1994. While engaged in stripping, she was arrested twice in 1983 for indecent exposure. She used her jail time to review her career and re-dedicate herself to a life in adult entertainment. She also resolved to build a two-story, six-bedroom house in Chiba Prefecture, which she gave to her mother. Takechi Tetsuji filmed ''Daydream'' for the third time in 1987, as ''Daydream 2'' (''Hakujitsumu Zoku''), and again hired Aizome for the lead role. According to the Weissers, each filming of ''Daydream'' had become progressively more exploitive, with the last, imported to the United States under the title ''Captured For Sex'' having the lowest production values and focusing most on sex and a torture orgy.Weisser, p.102-103 ===After ''Daydream''=== Since ''Daydream'', Aizome has been active in acting and directing in Japan's prolific [[adult video]] and ''[[softcore]]'' porn-movies. About 1986, in one of her more remarkable performances, Aizome had her hymen surgically restored so that it could be broken during the film. Previously a common procedure, hymen restorations went out of favor in Japan about the time of Aizome's use of it. The doctor who performed the restoration reports that the last time he did this surgery was on a couple in their 50s who, after seeing Aizome's film, wished to undergo the operation for their second honeymoon. In an article on the procedure, Aizome told ''Shukan Bunshun'', "They strung a thread almost like a piano wire through the entrance to my vagina and pulled it like a drawstring to recreate the hymen. They give your privates a local anesthetic, so the operation itself doesn't really hurt. I really felt like a virgin again."{{cite news |first=Ryann|last=Connell|title=Surgeon says demise of hymen restoration operations no skin off his, er... nose?|url=http://mdn.mainichi.jp/culture/waiwai/archive/news/2006/12/20061204p2g00m0dm003000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|publisher= |date=2006-12-04|accessdate=2007-03-03}} Aizome gained an international audience in the 1986 [[Traci Lords]] film, ''[[Traci Takes Tokyo]]''. With her name mis-credited as "Kyōko Izoma", the porn-video was shot in Tokyo before Lords' scandal, and is therefore now illegal in the U.S. Her lesbian scene with Lords was reused in ''[[Beverly Hills Copulator]]''. She retired from regular performances in pornography in 1994, but continued to act in erotic films occasionally. She continued working behind the camera in the industry in various capacities including writing and directing.{{cite news |title=Hell hath no fury like a porn star scorned -- just ask her niece|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/national/news/20070512p2a00m0na014000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=2007-05-12|accessdate=2007-05-14|quote=After retiring from the porn world in 1994, Teranishi became a sex counselor and a porn film director.}}Film credits at: {{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0025220.htm|title=愛染恭子 (Aizome Kyouko)|accessdate=2007-05-14|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} In 2001 Aizome was writing a sex- and health-advice column for women in Japan, titled "Auntie Agony". She teamed up with "[[AV idol|AV Queen]]" [[Hitomi Kobayashi]] in the February 2001 theatrical release, ''Kyōko Aizome vs. Hitomi Kobayashi: Sexual Excitement Competition'' (愛染恭子ＶＳ小林ひとみ　発情くらべ). Aizome both starred in and directed the film, which was released by Nikkatsu's post-''Roman porn'' distributor of theatrical pornography, Excess films.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2001/dy000370.htm|title=愛染恭子ＶＳ小林ひとみ　発情くらべ|accessdate=2007-05-31|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}}{{cite web |url=http://movies2.nytimes.com/gst/movies/movie.html?v_id=249637|title=Bed Partner 1988 (review)|accessdate=2007-05-31|publisher=[[The New York Times]]|quote=...the legendary studio proper [Nikkatsu] (its stepchild, Excess Films, limped along for years thereafter...}} An adult video starring the two actresses and also directed by Aizome followed in March. Entitled ''Lesbian Wives'', the video had Aizome and Kobayashi playing the wives of two ''[[yakuza]]'' bosses who become engaged in a lesbian relationship.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9144|title=''Lesbian Wives''|accessdate=2007-05-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Two years later, she directed the AV ''Lesbian Politicians'' ([[2003 in film|2003]]), in which she also co-starred with the popular award-winning AV actress [[Ai Kurosawa]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KR9191|title=''Lesbian Politicians''|accessdate=2007-06-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In October 2005, she starred in the [[Madonna (studio)|Madonna]] hardcore AV ''Widow's Obscene Desire'' (愛欲の未亡人) which won her a Madonna Best Actress Award at the 2005 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#Moodyz Awards (2001-2008)|Moodyz Awards]].{{cite web |url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20060119A/index2.htm| title=ムーディーズ＆ドグマ年末イベントレポート|accessdate=2009-08-02|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ All About]|date=January 19, 2006|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta|language=Japanese}} She also appeared in a further video for Madonna, ''Mother and Son Incest'' (近親相姦 母と息子) with Yume Imano in May 2006 when Aizome was 48 years old.{{cite web |url=http://www.madonna-av.com/works/-/detail/=/cid=juk400/|title=近親相姦 母と息子|accessdate=2009-08-02|publisher=[http://www.madonna-av.com/ www.madonna-av.com]|language=Japanese}} After several years out of the public eye, Aizome's name was in the news again in 2007 when she was arrested for beating her niece. Aizome admitted to the allegations and was fined 500,000 yen. She explained, "I hit my niece to punish her for dating my boyfriend. Kazumi Kawashima |homepage= |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Azumi Kawashima'''|川島和津実|Kawashima Azumi}}, born August 8, 1979 in Tokyo, Japan, is a [[Japanese idol]] and Adult Video actress (or so-called "[[AV idol]]")."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=OSD108|title=Complete Azumi Kawashima|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Kawashima was already known as a "gravure princess" at the time of her AV debut in December of 1998.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA081|title=PROMISE|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} By May, 1999 she was called one of the most popular AV idols,{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA105|title=Pretty Wife 7|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} and "the number one AV idol" by August of that year.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA121|title=Azu-mi-x|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA185|title=Azu-mi-x II|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ==Life and career== Azumi Kawashima was born in Tokyo on August 8, 1979, and enjoys swimming and walking.{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=589|title=Azumi (Kawashima Azumi)|accessdate=2007-06-13|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She became a favorite among fans of the Japanese AV principally because her "classical elegant beauty", as her appearances are not as extreme or hardcore as many other such videos.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=azumi_kawashima|title=Azumi Kawashima|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}} Kawashima's debut video was ''Promise'' released under Sexia's Try Heart label in December 1998.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1998.htm|title=1998|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV {{nihongo2|研究所}} (AV Research Laboratory)]}} In January 1999, Kawashima starred in ''Naive'', for the Shy label. Her next video for Sexia, ''I Want To Hold You'' (February 1999), was a sex-oriented drama.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA092|title=I Want To Hold You|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She was back at Shy for the April 1999 release, ''Natural''. This video was judged a well-acted drama with great sex scenes, involving gangsters and an assassination plot.{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=1116|title=Natural|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}} Kawashima followed popular AV idol [[Haruki Mizuno]]{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA050|title=''Pretty Wife 4''|accessdate=2007-06-23|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} in Sexia's ''Pretty Wife'' series. Kawashima's entry, the seventh in the series, was subtitled ''Dangerous Love Triangle'' and released in May 1999. She played the role of a woman who is the victim of her wicked mother-in-law. Hoping to save her son from what she believes to be his wife's demoralizing influence, the mother hires two men to rape her. She hopes that if her son witnesses his wife having sex with other men, he will then divorce her. Instead, the entire group join up to scold the mother for being too controlling. The video ends with the mother awakening, discovering it's all been a dream, and taking it as a message to leave her son's house. ActionJAV judges this video "Another great action packed movie performed by the legendary Azumi Kawa{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/title.cfm?iid=2058|title=Pretty Wife 7|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA105|title=Pretty Wife 7|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Less than a year after her debut, Kawashima's popularity prompted Sexia to release a retrospective video, ''Azu-mi-x'', which included scenes from her first video as well as new material. Sexia's February 2000 multi-star video, ''ALL STARS: Erotic Lips Selection'', had Kawashima on the same tape as fellow ''Pretty Wife'' veteran, Haruki Mizuno.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA153|title=ALL STARS|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} A second retrospective video, ''Azu-mi-x II: Wazumi's Filmography'', was released in September 2000 in a "permanent collector's edition". Kawashima's last releases, a video entitled ''Memory'', and a DVD named ''Complete Azumi Kawashima'', came out in July 2003.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=SEA332|title=Memory: Azumi Kawashima|accessdate=2007-07-29|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} In addition to her video career, Kawashima's portfolio includes the release of 9 photobooks released from 1999 to 2003.{{cite web |url=http://jans-web.com/profiles/n0438&mode=books2|title=Azumi Kawashima 川島和津実 Books |accessdate=20090-06-20|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator]}} Outside of her adult work, Kawashima also had a major part in the 1999 [[V-Cinema]] horror film ''Demon Killer'' or ''Junreiki'' 殉霊鬼（じゅんれいき) directed by Seki Akitsugu where six men and women staying at a villa are attacked by a killer.{{cite web |url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=234168|title=殉霊鬼（じゅんれいき）(1999)|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=20090-06-20|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/j/t6/64.html|title=殉霊鬼 (VIDEO)|publisher=[http://www.fjmovie.com/ Japanese Horror Movie Database]|accessdate=20090-06-20|language=Japanese}} == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{nihongo|'''Nozomi Kurahashi'''|倉橋のぞみ|extra=born 1975}} is an alias chosen by {{nihongo|'''Yoshizawa Ayumi'''|吉沢 あゆみ}} following her debut as a nude [[gravure idol]]. She published nude photo collections every year mainly during her time when she was known to be a middle school student.
Since the compilation of [[Lolita]] [[photobook]]s in the 1980s was not yet illegal in [[Japan]], readers were able to see Nozomi's body in explicit detail and she soon gained immense popularity as an ideal Lolita model.
Furthermore, Nozomi Kurahashi was two years younger than declared at the time of the publication of her 1980's photobooks, her actual age being 11 instead of 13 in 1986. At age 13, she had her last photobook published before her disappearance from the idol world which lasted until the turn of the century when, at age 24, she announced another nude photobook.
Her book ''Nozomi Kurahashi, age 24'' contains many retaken photographs from her younger years.

In [[1986 in film|1986]] she made her theatrical film debut in the [[Nikkatsu]] [[Roman Porno]] ''Romanko Club - Lots of Sex''. She followed this with ''Invisible Human - Hymen Examination'' ([[1987 in film|1987]]), and retired from AV after ''Ecstasy Part 5'' ([[1989 in film|1989]]). In [[1988 in film|1988]], Keiko became among the first Japanese adult video actresses to perform [[anal sex]] in an adult video. Keiko was also a regular feature in various Japanese erotic magazines during the mid and late-1980s. She was recognized for her work in the adult video industry when she won the third GORO Tish Madonna Award. Keiko Nakazawa retired in 1989 and got married and gave birth to a child not long afterward. Keiko reported in a subsequent magazine interview that [[childbirth]] was a rewarding, but strenuous experience for her. Keiko's second stage labor required nearly ten hours of rigorous pushing for her to deliver her child. This magazine interview was the final, to date, public communication from Keiko Nakazawa. ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable" ! Anna Syugetsu |films= |homepage= http://blog.livedoor.jp/akanehotaru/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Hotaru Akane'''|紅音ほたる|Akane Hotaru}} ''aka'' {{nihongo|'''Anna Akizuki'''|秋月 杏奈|Akizuki Anna}} is a popular and award-winning Japanese [[Model (person)|model]] and [[AV idol]]. She is active in many media formats in Japan including a role in a mainstream theatrical film, and is a popular blogger.{{cite web |url=http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sekiryu/cast/cast.html|title=Sekiryû no onna official subsite: Cast|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp]}} Her adeptness at [[female ejaculation]] has earned Akane the title, "''Shiofuki'' Queen".{{cite news |title=ハテナ芸人|url=http://www.ntv.co.jp/hatena/onair/13.html|publisher=[http://www.ntv.co.jp/hatena/index.html www.ntv.co.jp/hatena]|date=2007-12-03|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|quote=紅音さんは「潮吹きクィーン」としても有名。 "Miss Akane is famous as the "Shiofuki Queen".}} (Interview) She retired from AV work in 2008. ==Life and career== ===Early life and career=== Hotaru Akane was born in [[Osaka]] on 25 October 1983.{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?aknhtr00|title=紅音 ほたる - Akane Hotaru|date=2005-08-15|accessdate=2008-04-30|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} At the time that she joined the AV industry, she was studying as a nursing student.{{cite news |last=Mr. Pig|title=15 Interesting Facts about Hotaru Akane|url=http://www.sweatpig.com/facts-hotaru-akane/|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20080204204652/http://www.sweatpig.com/facts-hotaru-akane/|archivedate=2008-02-04|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ sweatpig.com]|date=2007-07-25|accessdate=2009-05-08|language=English}} Akane's early appearances were under the stage name Anna Akizuki, and she debuted in AV using this name in an ensemble performance in the February 2004 adult video (AV), ''Faithful Dog 'Saseko''',{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=ext015|title=Faithful Dog 'SASEKO'|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} which won the award for Best AV Title at the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#Takeshi Kitano Entertainment Awards (2000-2006)|5th Takeshi Kitano Awards]].{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/tsmp/backnumber.html|title=東スポ映画大賞 過去の授賞一覧 (Tokyo Sports Film Awards - Summary)|accessdate=2008-11-16|publisher=[http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/ Tokyo Sports]|language=Japanese}} Not originally a solo actress, Akane's attractiveness led to her first starring video, ''G Guy!'' in July 2004.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=fe695|title=G Guy! / Anna Akitsuki|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Akane's September 2004 video ''Super Idols'', rapidly achieved "legendary" status, and was re-released on DVD in November as the first entry in the ''Super Idols'' series.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=ss548|title=Super Idols 1 / Anna Syugetsu|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=sds017|title=Super Idols 1 / Anna Syugetsu|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ===AV Academy Awards' "Newcomer of the Year"=== The ''[[cosplay]]''-themed ''Uniform Collection / Anna Syugetsu'' had Akane donning a variety of school uniforms, a popular form of [[garment fetishism]] in AVs.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=god270|title=Uniform Collection / Anna Syugetsu|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} Another ''cosplay'' video, ''Sister Maid'' from December 2004, starred the prominent AV actress, Shuri Himesaki. Akane played the role of Himesaki's sister, and together they gave erotic performances in maid costumes.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=twd133|title=Sister Maid / Syuri Himesaki・Anna Akizuki|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In spite of her very prolific AV career, Akane says that she finds the time and energy to masturbate every day, and owns ten adult toys.{{cite web |url=http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sekiryu/cast/cast.html|title=Sekiryû no onna official subsite: Cast|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp]|quote=オナニーはしますか？... 「毎日します」 ("Do you masturbate?... "I do it every day.") 大人のおもちゃを見せてもらうことに。...10個はありました。 ("She displayed her adult toys... There were ten...")}} In 2005, ''[[Weekly Playboy]]'' recognized Akane's career by awarding her the "Newcomer of the Year" title in their "AV Academy Awards".{{cite news |title=紅音ほたる、エイズ問題「女の子も性に関心持って」|url=http://www.ohmynews.co.jp/news/20080415/23506|publisher=[http://www.ohmynews.co.jp/ ohmynews.co.jp]|date=2008-04-17|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|quote=週刊プレイボーイ「AVアカデミー賞新人賞」受賞。}} She also won a Best Actress Award for Excellence at the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#5th Annual SOD Awards 2006|2006 SOD Awards]].{{cite web |url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20061216A/|title=第５回SOD大賞は範田紗々！ (5th SOD Awards)|accessdate=2008-11-19|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ All About]|language=Japanese|date=December 16, 2006|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta}} [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki's]] January 2006 release, ''Cutie Clips'' gave the viewer the experience of having a "virtual love story" with several top AV actresses. Akane's segment is a "virtual date" at the beach.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=arrd008|title=Cutie Clips|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In ''Temptation; 7 Ultimate Queens Attack Me!!'', Akane joined with [[Nana Natsume]] and five other the top AV idols of 2006 in competition for the honor of serving as top hostess at "the most luxurious and the most lecherous club in the world."{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=sdms015|title=Temptation; 7 Ultimate Queens Attack Me!!|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ===The "''Shiofuki'' Queen"=== For her ability to perform ''shiofuki'' or [[female ejaculation]], Akane became known as the "''Shiofuki'' Queen" of Japanese adult videos. Videos focusing on this talent include such titles as ''Hotaru Akane - Shiofuki Climax'' and ''Hotaru Akane - Paipan Mega Shiofuki Fuck''.{{cite web |url=http://jans-web.com/?p=mcard&id=0371|title=Hotaru Akane - Shiofuki Climax|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator 1997-2006]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://jans-web.com/?p=mcard&id=4776|title=Hotaru Akane - Paipan Mega Shiofuki Fuck|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator 1997-2006]|language=English}} Akane says that she prepares for her ''shiofuki'' demonstrations by drinking an entire bottle of water before performing in these scenes.{{cite web |url=http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sekiryu/cast/cast.html|title=Sekiryû no onna official subsite: Cast|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp]|quote=紅音さんは試行錯誤した結果「水を飲むと潮吹ける！」という荒技をあみ出したようです。そこで、いつも撮影前にやっていると言う「ペットボトル一気飲み」...}} In the June 2006 video, ''Hotaru Akane and Ayano Murasaki: Splash Heaven'', Akane competed with top ''jukujo'' or "mature" actress, [[Ayano Murasaki]] in this area of specialty. In a contest to decide, "Who is the best squirter in the AV industry," the two actresses reportedly, "splash love juice like a fountain!!"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=PTV360|title=Hotaru Akane and Ayano Murasaki SPLASH HEAVEN - 115 minutes|accessdate=2008-05-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} ''Love Splashing'', released the following month, was a ''shiofuki''-themed omnibus collection grouping Akane with such notable practitioners of the technique as [[Ai Kurosawa]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=rbnd110|title=LOVE Splashing! RIBON 4 Hours BEST|accessdate=2008-05-05|work=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In January 2007, Akane was chosen to be the actress in the inaugural entry of the new ''Ultimate Ecstasy'' series on the Real Works label.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=reca003|title=Ultimate Ecstasy, Hotaru Akane|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} In September 2006, Akane appeared in her first "uncensored" video, without the mosaic pixellation which is used to disguise the genitals in most Japanese porn films. She has subsequently made four more original uncensored videos, all released by Sky High Entertainment.{{cite web|url=http://www.aventertainments.com/ActressDetail.aspx?languageID=1&actressname=Hotaru+Akane|title=AV Entertainments PROFILE:Hotaru Akane|accessdate=2008-06-20|publisher=[http://www.aventertainments.com/ www.aventertainments.com]|language=English}} Akane takes pride in her career as an AV idol,{{cite web |url=http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sekiryu/cast/cast.html|title=Sekiryû no onna official subsite: Cast|accessdate=2008-05-05|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ hasesyo-et.hp.infoseek.co.jp]|quote=「仕事は仕事。プライドを持ってやっている。」 "Work is work. I have pride."}} and, her January 2007 video, ''Gals' Battle Royal ～Hotaru Kurenai X Chihiro Shina～'', makes a theme of that professionalism. The video has two accomplished AV performers trying to outdo each other in a competition of sexual acts. Practices employed in the contest include [[fellatio]], ''[[paizuri]]'' and urination.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=t28074|title=Gals' Battle Royal ～Hotaru Kurenai X Chihiro Shina～|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} The video was re-released in [[Blu Ray]] format in July.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=hitma04|title=～Hotaru Kurenai X Chihiro Shina～|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} A similar competition-themed video was ''Versus, Hotaru Akane vs. Satoko Tachibana'', which pitted Akane against another top AV idol in a competition over who is the most skilled erotic performer.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=dv825|title=Versus, Hotaru Akane VS. Her success and confidence makes her the envy of her co-workers, who rejoice when she falls into a slump and is fired by the company's boss. Akane then sleeps with the head of a rival insurance company in order to be hired there. When compromising photos of Akane begin to circulate, her old co-workers again take pleasure in her humiliation.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=iesp330|title=Insurance Salesperson Raped Hard|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} After a long and extremely prolific career, Akane released her retirement video ''Final Gusher - Akane Hotaru's Retirement Work'' with [[CROSS studio|Cross]] in October 2008{{cite web |url=http://www.crosscross.jp/works/-/detail/=/cid=crpd264/|title=紅音ほたる引退作品ファイナル潮吹き顔射浣腸ぶっかけスペシャル|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://www.crosscross.jp/ www.crosscross.jp]|language=Japanese}} but her blog is still open and she continues a chronicle of her busy event schedule. ===Personality=== Unlike many other adult video actresses who carefully guard their private lives, Akane has kept a fairly high public profile. In addition to her AV appearances, Akane has become known as a popular blogger. Her frank blog, "Hotaru's Life," quickly achieved a high blog-ranking, which it has continuously maintained. In another sign of Akane's widespread media recognition, she played a role in director [[Toru Ichikawa]]'s mainstream theatrical film, {{nihongo|赤龍の女|Sekiryû no onna}} (2006).{{cite web |url=http://twitchfilm.net/archives/007853.html|title=Yû Misaki & Hotaru Akane in Tôru Ichikawa's SEKIRYÛ NO ONNA|accessdate=2008-05-05|publisher=[http://twitchfilm.net/ twitchfilm.net]|language=English}} As a high-profile celebrity in the sex industry, Akane was invited to speak at a "World AIDS Day" event in [[Tokyo]]'s [[Shibuya, Tokyo|Shibuya]] Ward on 1 December 2007.{{cite news |title=「AVのマネしないで」AV女優・紅音ほたるが呼びかけ |url=http://news.livedoor.com/article/detail/3419929/|publisher=[http://news.livedoor.com/ news.livedoor.com]|date=2007-12-07|accessdate=2008-04-30|language=Japanese}} In March 2008, Akane made her debut as a singer in a celebrity compilation CD titled ''Mero Raba (Melodic Lover)'' targeted at a female audience. She provided the lyrics for the song she sings: ''Ai no Kuni''. Other contributors to the CD include fashion models and popular singer TSUKASA, Akane is the only AV actress included.{{cite web|url=http://www.tokyograph.com/news/id-2818|title="Gal" compilation album includes AV actress| publisher=[http://www.tokyograph.com/ TokyoGraph News] |year=2008|month=March|accessdate=2008-09-01|language=English}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable" ! 33-24-35" |height= {{height|m=1.68}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= Black |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= O |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Satoko Tachibana |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Riko Tachibana'''|立花里子|Tachibana Riko}} ([[November 10]], [[1984]] - ) is a popular and award-winning [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV idol]]. Taller than average, Tachibana debuted in 2003 and starred in many adult videos which emphasized her height. An extremely prolific actress, Tachibana had performed in over 200 AVs when she was awarded for Most Appearances at Japan's [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] in 2007. Tachibana retired in March 2008. ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Riko Tachibana was born in [[Tokyo]] on [[November 10]], [[1984]].{{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=1082|title=Tachibana (Riko Tachibana)|accessdate=2008-06-21|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} Tachibana is tall for a Japanese woman, reportedly standing 172 cm (nearly 5' 8") in early publicity,{{cite news |title=Porno starlet tied to bizarre murder-suicide pact|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2002/10/20021024p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=[[October 24]], [[2002]]|accessdate=2007-06-21}} though her height was later reported to be 168 cm (5' 6"). Tachibana was not comfortable with her above-average size, saying, "I used to have a real inferiority complex about my height. I always thought guys liked little girls better." Tachibana's inferiority complex began to dwindle as she noticed that many men were attracted to her because of her height, wanting her to baby them. For example, when she was in a relationship with a high-level salaryman in his 30s, he asked her to pat his head while he lay in her lap, and tell him, "Good boy, good boy." ===AV debut=== Like many AV stars, Tachibana was found by a talent scout in Shinjuku.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-01|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|work=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16|language=English|quote=Most careers start on the streets. Shibuya, Shinjuku and Roppongi are the hunting grounds where talent scouts prowl...}} Tachibana was shopping at the time, and, contrary to her usual habit, turned to hear what the scout had to say.{{cite news |last=Mr. Pig|title=Virgin Fans Fuck Riko Tachibana!|url=http://www.sweatpig.com/virgin-fans-fuck-riko-tachibana|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ www.sweatpig.com]|date=[[April 4]], [[2002]]|accessdate=2007-06-21}} She made her AV debut in 2003. The first volume in the Hibino label's ''Women Taller Than 170cm'' series was released in November 2003, and became a huge hit with AV audiences, reflecting a demand for taller models. Tachibana's height helped her get the starring role in the third entry in the series, released in May 2004. When interviewed for the video release, Akinori, the director of the video, commented, "You've got no idea how hard it is to come up with tall actresses... the demand is just too great to fill." ==="Riko-pin"=== As she gained in popularity, Tachibana acquired a nickname, ''Riko-pin'' (リコぴん).{{cite news |title=2007年１月16日（火）、都内某所で「日本アダルト放送大賞2007」の記者会見が開かれた。|url=http://www.adultaward.net/interview.html|publisher=[http://www.adultaward.net/ www.adultaward.net]|date=[[January 16]], [[2007]]|language=Japanese|accessdate=2007-06-21}} (link is now dead) She became a notably prolific star of AVs, performing in a variety of themes and roles. Tachibana says that her favorite roles are those in the "Older Sister" and "Perverted Woman" stereotypes. In one of her earliest roles, Hibino's cosplay ''Super Knight Atliger'', Riko plays one of a trio of Power Ranger type heroines. In VIP label's ''Popular Old People's Home'', released in December 2004, Tachibana was part of the female staff at a rest home populated by sexually aggressive senior citizens.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=god271|title=Popular Old People's Home|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} ''AV Actress Is A Receptionist'', released in January 2005, was part of a humiliation-themed series on the Hot Entertainment label. The situation, claimed to have been rehearsed for two months and employing thirty extras, has Tachibana taking a job as a receptionist at a job fair. While she is engaged in the duties of her job, an actor has sex with Tachibana from behind. The video records Tachibana's embarrassed efforts to maintain a straight face while performing her receptionist role.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=het378|title=AV Actress Is A Receptionist|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} ''Female Prisoner Amazons'' from September 2005 was a [[women in prison]]-themed DVD with Tachibana heading a large cast of AV idols.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=nfxv001|title=Female Prisoner AMAZONES|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} In her starring role in the ninth entry in [[CineMagic Co.|CineMagic's]] ''Bondage Doll'', Tachibana underwent training designed to lead her to the pleasures of [[masochism]]. Bondage, gagging, and blind-folding ensue.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=dvs046|title=BONDAGE DOLL IX / Riko Tachibana|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} In July 2006, Tachibana was again the star of a humiliation-themed DVD, ''Lesbian Teachers' Water Spanking''. In the DVD, she played the role of a teacher who is tied up and dowsed with bodily fluids.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=14id043|title=Lesbian Teachers' Water Spanking / Riko Tachibana|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} ''I'm Her Pet'' from November 2006 had Tachibana in the role of the humiliator, as she embarrasses her male co-star. A scene in which Tachibana provokes her partner's genitalia with cotton swabs and a toothbrush is singled out as a highlight.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=rwrk179|title=I'm Her Pet, Riko Tachibana|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} Among the many DVDs exploiting Tachibana's height, ''Tall Actresses vs. Small Actors'' joined Tachibana with eleven other tall AV idols to engage in sex with diminutive men.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=godr147|title=Tall Actresses vs. Small Actors|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} The October 2007 DVD, ''Lewd-1 Grand Prix'', pitted Tachibana against AV actress Noa. In the DVD, these two highly skilled AV performers compete for the title of "Lewdest" in Japan.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=remu009|title=Lewd-1 Grand Prix, Noa vs. Riko Tachibana "Who's The Lewdest In Japan!"|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} The two actresses were again paired in the January 2008 DVD, ''Double Dream Super Special'', this time working together, rather than in competition, in lesbian-themed performances.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=real289|title=Double Dream Super Special, Noa, Riko Tachibana|accessdate=2008-06-27|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity]|language=English}} ===Career recognition and retirement=== Within four years of her debut, Tachibana had appeared in over 200 titles, a remarkably large number considering the average AV actress appears in only five to ten videos in her entire career.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-12|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|work=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year-the average life-span of an AV girl-with five or ten videos to her credit and an unknowing family bosom to return to.}} In recognition of her highly prolific career, Tachibana was given the award for Most Appearances at Japan's [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] in 2007. When accepting the award, Tachibana impressed the audience by lifting her dress and squatting with her legs apart. She promised the crowd that she would continue her work in the industry, saying, "I still want to make other people orgasm, and me as well. So why don't we orgasm together again?"{{cite web |url=http://www.bigempire.com/sake/honoka_adult.html|title=Honoka Takes Top Prize at Adult Broadcasting Awards|accessdate=2008-06-21|publisher=[http://www.bigempire.com/ www.bigempire.com]|language=English}} Tachibana acted her favored "Perverted Women" role for the last time in her farewell video, released on the Real Works label in March 2008. In the title of the video, an entry in the "Perverted Woman from Hell" series, Tachibana proclaimed herself the "Eternal Strongest Perverted Woman".{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/detail/=/cid=172emu028/|title=地獄痴女スペシャル 引退・立花里子 私が永遠の最強痴女よ！|accessdate=2008-06-26|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ dmm.co.jp/]}} ==Partial filmography== ===2004=== {| class="wikitable" ! 34-22-34(in) |height= {{height|m=1.48}} |weight= |blood= A |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Japan]]ese |alias= |homepage= |iafd= }} {{nihongo|'''Nozomi Momoi'''|桃井望|Nozomi Momoi}} (September 23, 1978 – October 12, 2002) was a popular and prolific [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] known for her "baby face that topped off a huge set of boobs"{{cite news |title=Porno starlet tied to bizarre murder-suicide pact|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2002/10/20021024p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060109005947/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2002/10/20021024p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=October 24, 2002|archivedate=2006-01-09|accessdate=2007-10-10}} She appeared in over 100 movies, appearing in up to ten releases per month.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_55.html|title=Momoi Nozomi Interview|accessdate=2007-03-21|publisher=[http://www.jmate.com/ www.jmate.com]}} (contains nudity). In an incident that shocked the nation, she was murdered at the age of 24. ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Nozomi Momoi was born in [[Tokyo]] on September 23 of either 1978 or 1980. She attended junior high school in [[Nagano Prefecture]], and remained in touch with friends there, visiting them on vacation, for the rest of her life. Before beginning work in the AV field, Nozomi worked in what she called "a very normal job." Describing her daily routine at this time, she said, "I used to wake up at 5:30 in the morning to get ready for work and I didn't have time to put on make-up or do my hair... It was the type of job where I was alone most of the time so I didn't bother with it." She wanted a different lifestyle, and to make more money, but she was unable to decide what sort of work she wanted to do. She was in this frame of mind when she was scouted by a representative of the AV industry in [[Tokyo]]'s [[Shinjuku]] neighborhood. ===AV debut=== When she made her AV debut in April 2001,{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2001.htm|title=2001|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} AV director [[Tohjiro]]'s advice to Nozomi was, "You should be a bit more perverted." Nozomi claimed that she took this advice to heart and that it helped her to be less inhibited both on screen and off. In December of her debut year, Nozomi was the star of the fourth entry in VIP studios' documentary-style ''Monthly'' series.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=VIP103|title=''Monthly Nozomi Momoi''|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Her January 2002 video, ''Virtual Brothel'' had Nozomi playing the role of a young prostitute who learns the trade from the more experienced Yukari Sakurada. Viewers were invited to compare Sakurada's veteran technique with Nozomi's fresh innocence.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=BZ84|title=''Virtual Brothel''|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Nozomi enjoyed her new occupation. About her early videos, Nozomi recalled, "I was having so much fun at first that I didn't feel tired at all." Unlike many AV actresses who are happy to have time off, Nozomi became known for actively seeking out new chances to perform.{{cite news |title=Porno starlet tied to bizarre murder-suicide pact|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2002/10/20021024p2g00m0dm999000c.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060109005947/http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2002/10/20021024p2g00m0dm999000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=October 24, 2002|archivedate=2006-01-09|accessdate=2007-10-10|quote=...a porno industry source tells Asahi Geino... 'Nozomi was also keen on working. Where most other girls in this business are glad not to have work, she was well known for going around asking for her next job.'}} In May of 2002, Nozomi appeared in the third entry of the ''Forceful Exhibitionistic-Play Maniax'' video series. In this video, Nozomi and two other AV actresses engage in exhibitionistic acts at a [[pachinko]] parlor, a public park, and an office building.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=CAO026|title=''Forceful Exhibitionistic-Play Maniax 3''|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Later career=== Towards the end of her life, she had become tired of the rape themes and school-girl roles which were common in her videos, but she enjoyed the fact that she was getting more dominant roles in her later AVs. "Making men play along to me is something new so it's fun to do. I think that's the type of thing I want to do more of." Nozomi's July, 2002 video release, ''Popular Actresses Fucking Virgin Boys'', was in this genre. As the title implied, the video had Nozomi and two other AV actresses have sex with amateur virgin males, including a college student and a middle-aged man. Her video ''Home Delivery Call Girl'', from August 2002, worked with a similar documentary-style concept. In this case, the actress appears at a male amateur's home to perform sex with him.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=A02082|title=''Home Delivery Call Girl''|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} A posthumously-released compilation DVD from 2006, entitled ''La Vie En Nose'', includes one of Nozomi's videos. This was the first in a series of DVDs focusing on a nose fetish, indicating that Nozomi had worked in that genre also.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DD202|title=''La Vie En Nose''|accessdate=2007-07-05|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} Nozomi continued to enjoy sex both within and outside of the AV setting, and stated that she didn't mind having it every day. Nevertheless, the intense pace of her career was beginning to tire her. She had been making up to ten videos a month, and expressed fatigue with the AV work both in interviews and in private conversations. She told an interviewer, "...it was a lot of fun at first, but I'm really tired nowadays. To tell you the truth, I think I'm over-exerting myself right now. So I want to take a decent vacation rather than get paid." She continued, "Like I said before, I enjoy the shoots a lot. There are times when I think it's hard and tiring, but the fun part is a lot greater!" A friend later reported that Nozomi was planning to get married, quit the AV industry and become a stage actress. In another sign that she was seeking to expand her career out of the AV industry, Nozomi formed a musical group with some other AV idols, and released a musical CD in 2002. ===Death=== Nozomi's career was still on the rise when her life came to a sudden end while visiting Nagano Prefecture. On October 12, 2002, she was found dead by the Narai River, which runs through [[Shiojiri]]. A nearby burned-out car contained the remains of her male companion. Nozomi had been stabbed at least six times, covered with gasoline and set on fire about 10 meters from the car. Nozomi's killer was a company employee in Nagano Prefecture. In what the police called a possible murder-suicide pact, the killer also burned himself to death inside the car. The remains were so badly charred that it took hours of testing before investigators could even determine that the remains belonged to a male. According to the ''[[Mainichi Shimbun]]'', "Nozomi seemed to have something Japan's myriad other porno starlets lacked and, at just 24, she was on her way up in the world before her tragic end." ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! In Japan, these actresses are referred to as [[AV Idol]]s. ==Life and career== ===Early career - "Uncensored Movies"=== ''[[AVN (magazine)|Adult Video News]]'' has described Sakura Sakurada as having "a fantastic body - lithe, but totally buxom."{{cite web |url=http://www.avn.com/movies/58240.html|last=Katz|first=Nathalie|title=''Welcome Back Sakura'' (review)|month=April|year=2005|accessdate=2008-09-05|work=[[AVN (magazine)|Adult Video News]]|language=English}} Making her AV debut in 2003,{{cite web |url=http://www.nx1020.com/actress/sa/sa-003.htm|title=桜田さくら プロフィール (Sakurada Sakura profile)|accessdate=2007-04-06|format= |work=www.nx1020.com/|language=Japanese}}, Sakurada became known for starring in so-called "uncensored movies" i.e. the genitalia are not [[Pixelization|pixilated]] to disguise them. This technique, known as "[[Fogging (censorship)|fogging]]," or "mosaic" is used in most Japanese porn movies.{{cite news |first=Ryann|last=Connell|title=Exposed genitalia makes breakthrough on Japan's silver screens|authorlink=Ryann Connell|url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/news/20061204p2g00m0dm003000c.html|work=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|publisher= |date=2005-08-05|accessdate=2007-04-06|quote=Japan's Eirin, the name commonly used for the Administration Commission of Motion Picture Code of Ethics, has traditionally taken a hard line against the display of reproductive organs on celluloid, requiring moviemakers to blot them out of view by using a digital mosaic.}} Sakurada has appeared in about 40 original "uncensored movies" in her career but that figure has been greatly magnified by numerous re-releases, compilations and online pay-per-view and streaming versions.Including {{cite web|url=http://www.1pondo.tv/list_search.php?q=%BA%F9%C5%C4%A4%B5%A4%AF%A4%E9|title=Sakura Sakurada on1pondotv website|accessdate=2008-09-05|publisher=[http://www.1pondo.tv www.1pondo.tv]|language=Japanese}} and {{cite web|url=http://www.caribbeancom.com/listpages2/sakurada_sakura.htm|title=Sakura Sakurada on caribbeancom website|accessdate=2008-09-05|publisher=[http://www.caribbeancom.com/ www.caribbeancom.com/]|language=Japanese}} Besides performing in numerous films in the more common genres, such as [[bukkake]], [[gokkun]], [[creampie (sexual act)|naka-dashi]], sex in public, and erotic [[cosplay]], Sakurada has also performed in several unusual projects. Among these, she has taken part in a number of fetish productions (primarily for Giga in 2003 and 2004).{{cite web| url=http://www.giga-freeks.net/new/giga/html/actress_eng/profile/sakuradasakura.htm| title=Giga-Freeks Profile Sakura Sakurada|accessdate=2008-09-28|publisher=[http://www.giga-freeks.net www.giga-freeks.net]|language=English}} featuring [[scat]] and [[omorashi]] (watersports). In one video for Natural High (''Hot Horny Shemales Fucking Crazy'') her costars were two transsexual woman actresses.{{cite web| url=http://www.naturalhigh.co.jp/r1/detailes.php?id=NHDT-091| title=Naturalhigh Official Web Site - Title Details|accessdate=2008-06-14|publisher=[http://www.naturalhigh.co.jp/ www.naturalhigh.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} She has also made a video (''Mother-Daughter Rice Bowl'') with an actress, Satsuki Sakurada, who is identified as her mother and who also performs.{{cite web |url=http://www.marx.co.jp/works/detail.cgi?id=62|title=母子どんぶり号泣乱交 (Mother-Daughter Rice Bowl)|accessdate=2008-04-26|publisher=[http://www.marx.co.jp/ www.marx.co.jp]|language=Japanese|quote=娘はベテランＡＶ女優。片や、母は新人ＡＶ女... 母・さつき... 娘・さくら... Daughter: Sakura)}} In a second video (see ''Incest Chapter'' released [[2004-11-01]] in the Filmography) they appear only in separate scenes. In addition, she has appeared in one film (''The Dog Game'') involving rape and a scene of [[bestiality]].{{cite web |url=http://www.av1.jp/detail.php?no=MAXD-04|title=The Dog Game|accessdate=2008-04-26|publisher=[http://www.av1.jp/list.php?top AV1 Alpha International]|language=Japanese}} ===Later career=== After a brief retirement in mid-2005, she returned to the adult video scene but from that point appeared almost exclusively in "censored" movies - she has not done an original "uncensored" video since late 2005. Many of her movies since then have been lesbian oriented and several have had [[Sadomasochism]] and [[Bondage (BDSM)]] themes, including the [[Attackers#Series|''Les Noir'']] series and others for [[Attackers]] {{cite web |url=http://www.attackers.net/cgi-bin/search/msearch.cgi?query=%BA%F9%C5%C4%A4%B5%A4%AF%A4%E9+les-noir|title={{nihongo2|キーワード：桜田さくら les-noir}} (Search on Sakura Sakurada les-noir)|accessdate=2008-04-26|publisher=[http://www.attackers.net/ www.attackers.net]|language=Japanese}}. In these videos, she often appears as the older woman dominating younger girls or men. For most of her career, Sakurada has been a freelance performer not connected with any one studio, but since early 2006, she has been closely associated with the video producer [[Cross (studio)|Cross]]{{cite web |url=http://www.crosscross.jp/works/-/list/=/article=actress/id=7581/|title={{nihongo2|桜田さくら作品一覧}} (List of Sakura Sakurada products)|accessdate=2008-04-26|publisher=[http://www.crosscross.jp/top.html www.crosscross.jp]|language=Japanese}}. In March 2008 she made her debut with them as a director in the DVD ''The Maniac Lesbians' Filming Party''. Sakurada's other recent activity has been for the new label Zeus, a division of Giga, the studio for which she did a number of fetish videos early in her career. Zeus specializes in fetish material including Heroine torture, [[scat]], enemas, and [[omorashi]]. She has starred in two of their videos, ''Sadi-Scream Vol. 4'' and ''Heroine Cruel Story Vol. 7'' which indulge in torture, gore and copious amounts of fake blood, with little or no sex content. Additionally, she has also played minor non-sex, non-scat roles in several other Zeus videos in 2008, especially in their "Heroine Excretion Hell" series.{{cite web|url=http://www.zeus-web.net/index02.html|title=Zeus Website|accessdate=2008-07-27|publisher=[http://www.zeus-web.net/ www.zeus-web.net]|language=Japanese & English}} Otherwise, her appearances as an actress in 2008 and 2009 have been very limited and mostly in lesbian roles. ===Other activities=== In addition to her hardcore career, Sakurada has also acted in a number of softcore films, including starring in direct-to-video [[V-Cinema]] and theatrical [[Pink film]]. In three of her softcore films, she worked with noted Japanese erotic and horror film director [[Naoyuki Tomomatsu]]{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1381841/|title=IMDB - Naoyuki Tomomatsu|accessdate=2008-06-28|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ www.imdb.com]|language=English}} and in another with cult horror and science-fiction director Daisuke Yamanouchi (山内大輔).{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1399618/|title=IMDB - Daisuke Yamanouchi|accessdate=2008-09-08|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ www.imdb.com]|language=English}} In December 2005, Sakurada was cited in an article on AV idol-[[blog|bloggers]] as a member of that group.{{cite web |first=Kemuta |last= Ōtsubo|url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/nlbn/NL000500/vl_35.htm|title=女優ブログから、今度は女優SNS？(ガイドメールマガジンバックナンバー Vol.35)|date=2005-12-12|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ allabout.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-03-26|language=Japanese}} Sakurada demonstrated her singing abilities in the [[Cross (studio)|Cross]] hardcore video ''3 Days Recording Training Camp with AV Actress Rock Band'' (2006).{{cite web|url=http://www.crosscross.jp/works/-/detail/=/cid=crpd055/|title={{nihongo2|AV女優ロックバンドとイク！！レコーディング合宿3日間}} (3 Days Recording Training Camp with AV Actress Rock Band)|accessdate=2008-07-22|publisher=[http://www.crosscross.jp www.crosscross.jp]|language=Japanese}} The plot involves the training of an all-girl rock band "The Skinless" and finishes with the four actresses performing a music video of a song "Body and Soul" with lyrics and vocals by Sakura Sakurada. ===Popularity and recognition=== It is a measure of the fame that her uncensored movies have brought her in countries outside of Japan that author [[Stephen Hunter]] uses a fictionalized Sakurada as a character in his 2007 novel, ''The 47th Samurai''. The character "Sakura" appears in Hunter's novel while filming the video ''Woman Teacher in Black Sakura,'' one of the real-life Sakurada's works. Hunter knows Sakurada's work well enough to make reference to the gap in her front teeth in her early videos which disappeared in later appearances. In the acknowledgements section of the novel, he also acknowledges Sakurada as one of his muses.{{cite book |last=Hunter|first=Stephen|authorlink=Stephen Hunter|title=The 47th Samurai: A Bob Lee Swagger Novel|pages=pp.140-143, 371.|year=2007|publisher=[[Simon & Schuster]]|location=New York|isbn=0-743238-09-5}} In another instance of Sakurada's popularity in the United States, her video ''Sakura's Squirt Tunnel Adventures'' (released in the US by Oriental Dream Pictures) was nominated in the category "Best Ethnic-Themed Release, Asian" at the 2008 Annual [[AVN Award|AVN Awards Show]] in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]]. {{cite web |url=http://www.avnawards.com/index.php?content=nominees|title=AVN Awards Nominees|accessdate=2008-09-10|publisher=[http://www.avnawards.com/ www.avnawards.com]|language=English}} Sakura Sakurada is also notably prolific for a Japanese AV actress. The average career of an AV actress in Japan spans about one year, during which the actress will appear in five to ten videos total.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-04-06 |last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|work=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|publisher= |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate =2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year—the average life-span of an AV girl—with five or ten videos to her credit and an unknowing family bosom to return to.}} Sakurada's career has spanned over five years during which she has appeared in some 250 original videos reaching a peak in 2004 when she was in nearly 100 titles. 30-22-33 (inch) |height= {{height|m=1.50}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust= |blood= A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://blog.livedoor.jp/chihiro661/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Chihiro Hasegawa'''|長谷川ちひろ|Hasegawa Chihiro}} (born [[September 23]], [[1984]]), also known as '''Nami Funakura''' (船倉奈美), is a popular and award-winning [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV idol]] who has starred in many AVs on various labels (a search on Amazon reveals 180 videos listed for her).[http://www.amazon.co.jp/s/ref=nb_ss_d?__mk_ja_JP=%83J%83%5E%83J%83i&url=search-alias%3Ddvd&field-keywords=%92%B7%92J%90%EC%82%BF%82%D0%82%EB%2C] search at amazon.co.jp [[September 18]], [[2008]] ==Life and career== Hasegawa began her adult video career in 2004 in unusual fashion for a new AV actress - her first movies involved [[anal sex]] (''Loli PaiPan M Anal''){{cite web | url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/monthly/playgirl/-/detail/=/cid=3ia101/|title=DMM - ちょ～かわいい長谷川ちひろの*ロ○ータパイパンMアナル* |accessdate=2008-09-19|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}, [[urolagnia|watersports]] (''Urination Class''){{cite web | url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/monthly/playgirl/-/detail/=/cid=42vspds011/ |title=DMM - 排尿教室 水野礼子 |accessdate=2008-09-19|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} and [[bestiality]] (''Beast King 11''){{cite web | url=http://www.gloryquest.tv/public_html/detail.html?id=gq_mad-20&PHPSESSID=896de8c6e36c8862adb7574c85a627f4|title=GloryQuest Official Site MAD-20 |accessdate=2008-09-19|publisher=[http://www.gloryquest.tv/ www.gloryquest.tv]|language=Japanese}}. Although she has also made a number of more mainstream adult videos in her career, Hasegawa has often been involved in the more unusual aspects of Japanese pornography from mixed urine and semen drinking (''Drink Urine Depth Charge and Gokkun W Maid''){{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/D_BANK/2007FEB/beejin-00238.html|title=Drink Urine Depth Charge|accessdate=2008-09-20|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ www.jsexnetwork.com]|language=English}} to an appearance in one movie (''Chihiro Hasegawa - New Half and I''){{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/detail/=/cid=krfv020/|title=DMM - 僕と長谷川ちひろとニューハーフ 女同士の嫉妬？密室劇場、世にも奇妙な三角関係。|accessdate=2008-09-19|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} with a transsexual actress, Moe. Beginning in 2005 she made a number of movies with the Japanese AV studio [[Dogma studio|Dogma]] which is known for its extreme fetish videos which include bondage, urination, [[fisting]], forced [[fellatio]], and vomiting.{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=89|title=JAV News - Popular Series and Actors from Dogma Studio|accessdate=2008-09-14|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]|month=August|year=2008|language=English}} She appeared in most of the Dogma series including playing a "hermaphrodite".{{cite web |url=http://www.dogma.co.jp/modules/webshop/serch.php?dat=5&serch=DDN-153&sy=1&pd=download&next=0|title=Dogma - Hermaphrodite Lesbian 3|accessdate=2008-09-14|publisher=[http://www.dogma.co.jp www.dogma.co.jp]|language=English}} Hasegawa also participated in a live SM-Night show with other Dogma studio actresses - known as director [[TOHJIRO]]'s M (Masochist) Women - for 200 Dogma fans.{{cite web |url=http://www.dogma.co.jp/htmls/7m/sm_night/loft.html|title={{nihongo2|『SMナイト』}}[SM Naito]|accessdate=2008-09-18|publisher=[http://www.dogma.co.jp/ www.dogma.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} In 2006, at the second [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2nd D-1 Climax Awards 2006|D-1 Climax Award]] ceremony, Hasegawa was given the ''Erotic Cinderella'' (エロシンデレラ) award for Best Actress, along with [[Maki Tomoda]] and [[Mayura Hoshitsuki]].{{cite web |url=http://www.dogma.co.jp/htmls/d-1/openrepo/report3.html|title=第3回 D-1 CLIMAX Official Site|accessdate=2008-09-18|publisher=[http://www.dogma.co.jp/ D-1 Climax Official Site]|language=Japanese|quote=星月まゆら、長谷川ちひろ、友田真希の歴代エロシンデレラが選ぶ 【ベスト女優賞】瞳れん。}} Her 2007 Dogma video ''Best of Chihiro Hasegawa'' commemorated this award with scenes from 5 of her earlier movies and a 30 minute interview ("'Each film is very special to me,' says Chihiro").{{cite web |url=http://www.dogma.co.jp/modules/webshop/serch.php?dat=5&serch=DDT-160&sy=1&pd=download&next=0|title=Dogma - Best of Chihiro Hasegawa|accessdate=2008-09-18|publisher=[http://www.dogma.co.jp/ www.dogma.co.jp]|language=English}} Also, one of her videos, ''Dream School 10'', done with 7 other actresses, was the Moodyz entry in the 2006 [[AV Open]] contest where it took the 2nd Place Award.{{cite web|url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20060712A/index.htm|title=速報！AV OPEN結果発表 (Preliminary AV Open results)|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ All About]|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta|date=July 12, 2006|accessdate=2008-10-01|language=Japanese}} Chihiro Hasegawa announced her retirement from the adult video industry and closed her official blog in July 2008.{{cite web |url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/chihiro661/ |title=Chihiro Hasegawa Official Blog|accessdate=2008-09-17|publisher=[http://blog.livedoor.jp/ blog.livedoor.jp] |language=Japanese}} However, she did release two lesbian titles ''Shaved Lesbian Special Edition'' and ''School Girl Lesbian Vol.1'' in January 2009. Apart from her hardcore career, Hasegawa also had a small part in Episode 4 of the [[TV Asahi]] romantic comedy series アンナさんのおまめ (Anna-san no Omame){{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1027778//|title=IMDb - "Anna san no omame" (2006)|accessdate=2008-09-21|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb.com]|language=English}}, "The Best Friend of Beautiful Anna", in the Fall of 2006.{{cite web |url=http://talent-schedule.jp/Drama_39592|title=Talent Schedule アンナさんのおまめ|accessdate=2008-09-21|publisher=[http://talent-schedule.jp/ talent-schedule.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://tisen.jp/pukiwiki/index.php?%A5%A2%A5%F3%A5%CA%A4%B5%A4%F3%A4%CE%A4%AA%A4%DE%A4%E1|title=アンナさんのおまめ |accessdate=2008-01-10|publisher=[http://tisen.jp/pukiwiki/ tisen.jp/pukiwiki]|language=Japanese}} Her hobby is playing the piano. She has a teacher's license for kindergarten in Japan.{{Fact|date=March 2009}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! She has also appeared in soft-core "gravure" videos, [[V-Cinema]], ''[[pink film]]''s and TV dramas. ==Life and career== ===S1 and Alice Japan=== Asami was born in Tokyo on March 24, 1987 and made her AV debut in October 2005 at the age of 18.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2005.htm|title=2005|accessdate=2009-07-06|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]|language=Japanese}} She has been under contract from 2005 with two large Japanese AV studios, [[Alice Japan]]{{cite web |url=http://www.alicejapan.co.jp/actress.php?actress_id=96ad56c1dbbc6ebefc58593d622861a2 |title=Alice Japan Official Website - Yuma Asami|accessdate=2008-09-24|publisher=[http://www.alicejapan.co.jp/ www.alicejapan.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} and [[S1 No. 1 Style]]{{cite web |url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=15365/ |title=S1 Website - Yuma Asami|accessdate=2008-09-24|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}}. The 12 week series aired on [[TV Tokyo]] beginning in April 2006. She plays the character ''Komori Miha'' in the series which is based on the [[manga]] of the same name and revolves about a [[Rōnin (student)|ronin]] student moving to Tokyo and sharing a house with several beautiful women.{{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1150.htm|title=Shimokita GLORY DAYS [下北GLORY DAYS]|accessdate=2008-09-26|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ www.jdorama.com]|language=English}} ===Other activities=== Asami showed off her singing voice by releasing her first [[J-pop]] CD, ''Resolution'' in January 2008. {{nihongo|'''Masumi Miyazaki'''|宮崎 萬純 ''or'' 宮崎ますみ|Miyazaki Masumi}} is an [[actress]] and [[Model (person)|model]] born on [[1968-01-26]] in [[Nagoya]], [[Aichi Prefecture]], [[Japan]].<ref name="imdb">{{en icon}} {{imdb name|1185736|Masumi Miyazaki}}</ref> She graduated from the private Horikoshi High School, and made her film debut in the 1983 release ''Aiko 16-sai'', and was selected as the 11th [[Clarion Girl]] in 1985. Miyazaki has appeared [[Nudity in film|nude]] in multiple films, including {{nihongo|''XX Utsukushiki Kyōki''|ＸＸ美しき凶器|}} and {{nihongo|''Yaneura no Sanpōsha''|屋根裏の散歩者|}}. She has also released nude photo books and appeared in the Japanese edition of ''[[Playboy]]''.
In 1996, Miyazaki married and ceased work on her entertainment career. She now lives in the [[United States]] where she is a [[housewife]] and a [[lecture]]r. She resumed work as an [[entertainer]] in 2005. In November of that same year, Miyazaki announced that she had [[breast cancer]].<ref name="sankei">{{ja icon}} {{cite web|url=http://www.sankei.co.jp/news/051130/bun054.htm|title=宮崎ますみさん「乳がん」公表、手術へ|author=Sankei Web（文化・芸能・特集）|publisher=[[Sankei Shimbun]]|date=2005-11-30|accessdate=2005-11-30}}</ref><ref name="sanspo">{{ja icon}} {{cite web|url=http://www.sanspo.com/geino/top/gt200512/gt2005120103.html|title=宮崎ますみ、乳がんを告白…手術は２日に予定|author=SANSPO.COM|publisher=サンケイスポーツ|date=2005-12-01|accessdate=2005-12-01}}</ref><ref name="chunichi">{{ja icon}} {{cite web|url=http://chuspo.chunichi.co.jp/00/hou/20051201/spon____hou_____003.shtml|title=宮崎ますみ、乳がん告白|publisher=中日スポーツ|date=2005-12-01|accessdate=2005-12-01}}</ref>

44-23-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.58}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust=Yes |blood= |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://www.aokirin.com/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Rin Aoki'''|青木りん|Aoki Rin}} is a popular Japanese model and adult video actress. She began as a [[Gravure idol]] and later moved to hardcore video work. Her extraordinary bust, which has been reported at various times as anywhere from an H-cup to an K-cup, helped her to become both an acclaimed model and an award-winning [[AV idol]]. ==Life and career== ===Gravure Idol=== Aoki was born in [[Yamagata Prefecture]] on February 28, 1985. She was first scouted in [[Harajuku]] as a gravure model in 2002 at the age of 17.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/busty-japanese-av-model-aoki-rin-%E9%9D%92%E6%9C%A8%E3%82%8A%E3%82%93/|title=Busty Japanese AV model Aoki Rin 青木りん|month=September|year=2007|accessdate=2008-09-29|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|language=English}} Her first gravure video, ''Burst'', appeared in 2003 and she soon became a popular [[Gravure idol]]. After two years as a glamour model, Aoki decided to enter the adult video scene and signed with the major Japanese AV company [[S1 No. 1 Style]], one of the [[Hokuto Corporation]] group of companies.{{cite web |url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=15687/ |title=S1 Website - Rin Aoki|accessdate=2008-09-29|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}} It is reported that her contract guaranteed her an estimated 13,000,000 yen (about $130,000), a sum greatly above the average even for top AV idols.{{cite web |url=http://news.ameba.jp/2007/05/4558.php |title=アイドルのAV転向は「お金のため」だけなのか (Converting to an AV Idol - for the money?)|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://news.ameba.jp/ Ameba News]|date=May 8, 2007|language=Japanese}} ===AV Actress=== Her first AV production with S1, ''K-cup Active Idol Risky Mosaic'', appeared in May 2006 and was directed by [[Hideto Aki]] who also directed most of her subsequent videos with S1. She says she was comfortable with her first AV work but was embarrassed about showing her nipples because they were small and pale colored.{{cite web |url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20060502A/index.htm |title=現役アイドル青木りんＡＶデビューの真相 (The truth about the AV Idol debut of Rin Aoki)|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ All About]|date=May 2, 2006|language=Japanese}} After making ten original videos with S1 in almost a year, she left the studio along with [[Maria Ozawa]] and other fellow S1 actresses to join the startup company Das. In contrast to S1 which specializes in the "softer" type of pornography with mostly straightforward boy-girl sex scenes,{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=26 |title=JAV News - Things to Know about S1 Studio |month=August|year=2008|accessdate=2008-09-24|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]|language=English}} Das videos ventured into more extreme areas such as simulated [[rape]], [[Creampie (sexual act)|creampie]] and [[urolagnia|watersports]]. Aoki starred in the first video of the DAS series DASD, ''20 Shots Creampie!'', released on April 25, 2007. She has made 6 more movies for Das including her first inter-racial role in the Das "Black Gang Rape" series.{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/index.php/black-males-x-japanese-females-adult-video-series/ |title=JAV News - Black Males X Japanese Females Adult Video Series|month=September|year=2008|accessdate=2008-09-29|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]|language=English}} By August 2008, Aoki was with a new start-up studio, OPPAI, which publicized her first video for them, ''108cm Kcup Rin'', with a signing and modeling event.{{cite web |url=http://blog.dmm.co.jp/kouhou/oppai_kouhou/archives/064487.html|title=OPPAI (おっぱい)初イベントレポート (Oppai First Event Report)|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://blog.dmm.co.jp blog.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Although continuing to make movies for OPPAI, she has also appeared in videos for [[Attackers]] and yet another new studio, Ranmaru. ===Popularity and Recognition=== Aoki is one of the latest examples of the very popular genre of "Big-Bust" models in the Japanese AV industry going back to [[Kimiko Matsuzaka]]. As a measure of her popularity in Japan, the listing of the top 100 actresses by sales from the DMM website shows Aoki ranked #3 in 2006 and #9 in 2007.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2006/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2006年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2007/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2007年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Aoki had a small preview appearance in the S1 compilation video ''Hyper – Barely There Mosaic'' (ハイパーギリギリモザイク) with AV idols [[Sora Aoi]], [[Yua Aida]], [[Yuma Asami]], [[Maria Ozawa]] and [[Honoka]] which won the 2006 [[AV Open]] competition among Japanese porn studios.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/japans-av-open-contest-2008/|title=Japan’s AV Open contest 2008|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=June|year=2008|language=English}} The original source http://www.av-open.com/ranking/index.html is closed. At the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#7th Takeshi Kitano Awards (2006)|7th annual Takeshi Kitano Entertainment Awards]] for 2006 sponsored by the Japanese tabloid newspaper ''[[Tokyo Sports]]'' (東京スポーツ), Aoki was honored with the Star AV Actress Award (主演AV女優賞).{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/tsmp/movie.htm |title=第７回ビートたけしのｴﾝﾀｰﾃｲﾝﾒﾝﾄ賞|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/ Tokyo Sports]|language=Japanese}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
