{{Female adult bio |photo=[[Image:Replace this image female.svg]]| |name = Honoka ||birth= {{birth date and age|1983|6|20}}Infobox data from [http://jans-web.com/profiles/n1186 {{nihongo2|穂花}} - Honoka] Profile at Urabon Navigator |location= [[Tarumizu, Kagoshima]] , [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 85-56-88(cm)
33-22-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust=Yes |blood= O |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://www.es-honoka.net/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Honoka'''|穂花|Honoka}} is an award-winning Japanese [[adult video]] (AV) actress and popular TV personality and actress. She retired from the AV industry in 2008. ==Life and career== Honoka was born in [[Tarumizu, Kagoshima]] , [[Japan]] on June 20, 1983. She is a [[licensed practical nurse]] and has appeared as a [[race queen]] at the 2004 Suzuka 8 Hours endurance race (July 2004). She plays the guitar, enjoys swimming and volleyball, going to [[Kabuki]] theatre and walking her dog.{{cite web |url=http://web.mac.com/ozawaoffice/iWeb/Site/honoka.html|title=Booking Department - Honoka|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://web.mac.com/ozawaoffice/ Ozawa Office Talent Agency]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=honoka|title=ActionJAV - Honoka|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]}} Like fellow [[AV Idol]]s [[Sora Aoi]] and [[Nana Natsume]], she has been able to combine a career as an AV actress with mainstream movie and TV appearances. Before she started in AV, Honoka had a small role as a female android secretary in the [[TV Tokyo]] [[cosplay]] drama ''The Ultimate Venus Angel Healing Force'' (究極癒し戦隊ヴィーナスエンジェル) which she was in from February 16 to March 29, 2004.{{cite web |url=http://qvarie.hp.infoseek.co.jp/var/minor/venusang.htm|title=究極癒し戦隊ヴィーナスエンジェル|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://qvarie.hp.infoseek.co.jp/ Tqvarie.hp.infoseek.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} ===AV actress=== Honoka began her adult video career in June 2004 with the studio Try-Heart on their Sexia label.{{cite web |url=http://www.sexia.tv/actress/-/detail/=/id=9537/|title=Honoka Try-Heart Profile & Filmography|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.sexia.tv/ www.sexia.tv]|language=Japanese}} She made 10 videos with Try-Heart over the next 18 months including a six month hiatus at the end of 2005 when she made no videos. In March 2006, she debuted with videos for two new AV studios, at [[S1 No. 1 Style]] with ''Sell Debut x Risky Mosaic'', directed by [[Hideto Aki]],{{cite web |url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=9537/|title=Honoka S1 Profile & Filmography|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/D_BANK/2006MAY/debut.html|title=Honoka|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ JSexNetwork]}} and ''Deep Impact - Honoka Sell Debut'' for the Premium Glamour label.{{cite web |url=http://www.premium-beauty.com/works/-/list/=/article=actress/id=9537/|title=Honoka Premium Profile & Filmography|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.premium-beauty.com/ www.premium-beauty.com]|language=Japanese}} She continued working with the two studios usually appearing in one video every other month for each studio. Her last original work with S1 was released in January 2008, but she continued to make films with Premium until her retirement. Both S1 and Premium are affiliated with Japan's largest producer of adult videos, the [[Hokuto Corporation]]. Honoka's AV career has been quite conservative, she has worked for studios which specialize in softer, more glamour-oriented types of pornography,{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/D_BANK/2006MAY/selldebut.html|title=Sell Debut - Deep Impact|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ JSexNetwork]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=26 |title=JAV News - Things to Know about S1 Studio |month=August|year=2008|accessdate=2008-09-24|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]}} and she has never ventured into the more extreme genres of Japanese porn. She is a very popular actress in Japan and in the DMM list of the top 100 actresses by sales, she placed #2 in 2006 and #3 in 2007.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2006/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2006年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2007/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2007年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Honoka was part of the S1 compilation video ''Hyper – Barely There Mosaic'' (ハイパーギリギリモザイク) with AV idols [[Sora Aoi]], [[Yua Aida]], [[Yuma Asami]], [[Maria Ozawa]] and [[Rin Aoki]] which won the 2006 [[AV Open]] competition among Japanese porn studios.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/japans-av-open-contest-2008/|title=Japan’s AV Open contest 2008|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=June|year=2008}} The original source http://www.av-open.com/ranking/index.html is closed. She was also the recipient of the "Best Actress" prize at the 2007 [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] for the 2006 broadcast year. After pressing her tongue against the phallus-shaped prize statuette, she declared "I never thought I would be selected. I'd like to say that it was 'my pleasure' to my fans." In closing, she added "I want to be more famous in the AV field" and "I also want to encourage other girls to strive to be the best.{{cite web |url=http://www.bigempire.com/sake/honoka_adult.html|title=Honoka Takes Top Prize at Adult Broadcasting Awards |accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.bigempire.com/ www.bigempire.com]|month=March|year=2007}} Reprinted June 8, 2008 in [http://www.tokyoreporter.com/2008/06/18/honoka-takes-top-prize-at-adult-broadcasting-awards/#more-119 Tokyo Reporter] Honoka was again honored by fans by winning the Best Actress award in the 2006 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#AV Actress Grand Prix 2006|AV Actress Grand Prix]].{{cite web |url=http://www.asianidols.net/news.php?day.20070107|title=AV Grand Prix 2006 Winners Announced|accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://www.asianidols.net/ Asianidols.net]|date=January 7, 2007}} Another of her S1 videos, ''Hyper Risky Mosaic - Special Bath House Tsubaki'' (ハイパーギリギリモザイク 特殊浴場 TSUBAKI 貸切入浴料1億円), with 11 other S1 actresses was the First Place winning entry in the 2007 [[AV Open]] contest.{{cite web|url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/avopen/avopen02_result.html|title=2nd AV Open Results|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|accessdate=2008-10-02|language=Japanese}} {{cite web|url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=95|title=JAV News - Are There Japanese Adult Video Awards Like AVN Awards in USA?|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]|date=August 26, 2008|accessdate=2008-10-01}} Honoka announced in her Official Blog that she was retiring in December 2008 and that her December 7, 2008 video for Premium, ''Pleasures of Education'', would be her last.{{cite web|url=http://honoka620.exblog.jp/m2008-12-01/|title=Honoka Blog 2008年 12月|publisher=[http://honoka620.exblog.jp/ honoka620.exblog.jp]|accessdate=2009-02-15|language=Japanese}}{{cite web|url=http://javstars.wordpress.com/2008/12/13/honoka-announces-retirement/|title=Honoka Announces Retirement!|publisher=[http://javstars.wordpress.com/ JAV Stars]|accessdate=2009-02-16|date=December 13, 2008}} She participated in one final event for Premium by making a round of publicity appearances at Tokyo shops on December 20, 2008. She also acted as co-host with mainstream actor Nagare Hagiwara for the 2009 [[AV Grand Prix]] ceremony.{{cite web|url=http://www.av-gp.com/news/avgp_result/bottom.html|title=AVGP 2009 Result announcement|publisher=[http://www.av-gp.com/ www.av-gp.com]|accessdate=2009-03-02|language=Japanese}} She has continued to keep her blog open. ===TV appearances=== Honoka was in the [[Japanese television drama|J-dorama]] ''Shimokita GLORY DAYS'' (下北GLORY DAYS) along with fellow S1 actresses [[Sora Aoi]] and [[Yuma Asami]]. The 12 week series aired on [[TV Tokyo]] beginning in April 2006. She plays the character ''Nishina Natsume'' in the series which is based on the [[manga]] of the same name and revolves about a [[Rōnin (student)|ronin]] student moving to Tokyo and sharing a house with several beautiful women.{{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1150.htm|title=Shimokita GLORY DAYS [下北GLORY DAYS] |accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ www.jdorama.com]}} She was also in the TV romantic comedy ''Cupid no Itazura'' (クピドの悪戯) on [[TV Tokyo]] which ran for 11 weeks beginning October 13, 2006 and concerned a young man with the rare disease of "rainbow balls" which limits the number of times he can have sex in his life.{{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1063.htm|title=Cupid no Itazura [クピドの悪戯]|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ www.jdorama.com]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/cupid/|title=クピドの悪戯|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/ TV Tokyo]|language=Japanese}} In addition, Honoka played the character of Keiko in the third episode ("OL Manager") of the [[Fuji TV]] drama ''Unusual Story Fall '06 Special Edition'' (世にも奇妙な物語 '06秋の特別編) on October 2, 2006.{{cite web |url=http://drama.cheerful.pupu.jp/?eid=371557|title=世にも奇妙な物語　'06秋の特別編|accessdate=2008-10-13|publisher=[http://drama.cheerful.pupu.jp/ Drama House Cheerful]|language=Japanese}} She has also appeared as a guest on a number of TV variety shows. ===Movie appearances=== In addition to softcore [[V-Cinema]] videos, Honoka has also been featured in mainstream movies. She starred in award-winning director Toru Kamei's film ''Watching TV All the Time Makes You Stupid'' ([[Terebi Bakari Miteruto Bakani Naru]] - テレビばかり見てると馬鹿になる) based on the [[manga]] of the same name by [[Naoki Yamamoto]].{{cite web |url=http://www.cinematopics.com/cinema/works/output2.php?oid=8063|title=テレビばかり見てると馬鹿になる (Watching TV All the Time Makes You Stupid)|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.cinematopics.com/ CinemaTopics]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://es.geocities.com/eiga9/japanesecinemanews.html|title=JAPANESE CINEMA NEWS 2007 [30-3-2007]|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://es.geocities.com/ es.geocities.com]}} The film was first released June 9, 2007 at a late show at the Pole Pole cinema in Higashi-Nakano and later (July 25, 2007) as a DVD.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%83%86%E3%83%AC%E3%83%93%E3%81%B0%E3%81%8B%E3%82%8A%E8%A6%8B%E3%81%A6%E3%82%8B%E3%81%A8%E9%A6%AC%E9%B9%BF%E3%81%AB%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B-%E4%BA%80%E4%BA%95%E4%BA%A8/dp/B000QJLVGC|title=テレビばかり見てると馬鹿になる (Watching TV All the Time Makes You Stupid)|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.amazon.co.jp/ www.amazon.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} She also had a major role in [[Noboru Iguchi]]'s over-the-top action-horror gorefest {{nihongo|''[[The Machine Girl]]''|片腕マシンガール|Kataude mashin gâru}} which premiered at the [[Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival]] on March 22, 2008 and was released as a DVD on June 3, 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1050160/|title=IMDb - Kataude mashin gâru (2008)|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.spopro.net/machinegirl/|title=Official Site - The Machine Girl|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.spopro.net/ /www.spopro.net]|language=Japanese}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 35-24-35 (in) |height= {{height|m=1.60}} |hair color= black |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |imdb = 0594720 }} {{nihongo|'''Kei Mizutani'''|水谷 ケイ|Mizutani Kei}} (born May 7, 1974) is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[adult film]] actress. She has appeared in multiple photo books, movies, and TV series in Japan and her DVD sets are popular in Japan, the United States, and Europe. ==Career== Mizutani was born in [[Aomori Prefecture]] where she was also raised. She began her modelling career as a swimsuit and nude model for magazines, and began making TV appearances. She became a regular on the late-night adult-oriented TV program variety, ''[[Gilgamesh Night]]''.{{cite web |url=http://www.dvdvisionjapan.com/kei.html|title=Kei Mizutani Interview (English)|date=|accessdate=2007-02-17 |format= |work=www.dvdvisionjapan.com}} ===''Weather Woman''=== Mizutani's first movie, ''Weather Woman'' was one of the most surprising successes in Japanese cinema of the 1990s.Weisser, Thomas and Yuko Mihara Weisser. (1998). ''Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films''. Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications. Miami. (ISBN 1-88928-852-7), p.492. Based on a popular adult manga which had been made into an anime series, ''[[Weather Report Girl]]'', the movie tells the story of a woman who becomes a phenomenally successful TV weatherwoman by exposing her panties on the air. Bandai Home Video financed the film, but, considering it a minor production, released it directly to video in 1995. The video quickly developed a large cult following. Bandai, mistakenly attributing the video's success to its sexual content, produced a sequel which emphasized the sex and concentrated less on the storyline and dark humor of the original. After reading the script, Mizutani refused to appear in the sequel, which proved to be a failure. However the reputation of the original video continued to grow. It won both the [[Oslo Films from the South Festival|Oslo Film Festival]] and the [[Stockholm International Film Festival]] in 1996. Bandai responded by pulling the original video from the market and releasing the film theatrically.Weisser, p.493. After its [[August 16]], [[1996]] theatrical debut, ''Weather Woman'' became one of the most successful releases of the year in Japan. Besides its popularity with audiences, the critics also praised the film, and several put it on their top 10 lists for 1996. Kinema Jumpo named the film #26 for the year. In 1997, a television series based on the movie was produced for Asahi TV Network. === After ''Weather Woman'' === Following in the rise of her ''Weather Woman'' popularity, Mizutani recorded a CD single in 1996 entitled ''He Loves Me'' ([http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B000064DRJ ヒー・ラヴズ・ミー]). In 1998, she played the role of Shelinda, a villain on the ''[[Super Sentai]]'' show ''[[Seijuu Sentai Gingaman]]'', which was adapted in [[North America]] as ''[[Power Rangers: Lost Galaxy]]''. In July 2000, she was a guest at the San Diego Comic Con, where the English version of ''Weather Woman'' received its premier.{{cite web |url=http://www.keimizutani.com/KeiSanDiego.cfm|title=My Trip to San Diego|date=2002|accessdate=2007-02-17 |format= |work=[http://www.keimizutani.com/ Kei Mizutani Official Website]}} ==Filmography== *''Weather Woman'' (お天気お姉さん - 39-23-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.57}} |weight= |blood= A |eye color= brown |hair color= black |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= [[Yamato people]] |alias= |films= |homepage= |iafd = |imdb = |afdb= |afdb name= |spelling = US }} {{nihongo|'''Meisa Hanai'''|花井メイサ|Hanai Meisa}} is a [[Japan]]ese [[AV idol]] famous for her exotic looks and her natural H-cup bust. ==Life and career== Hanai was born on July 20, 1986 in Japan. Like only a few other Japanese AV actresses, among them [[Maria Ozawa]], [[Tina Yuzuki]] and [[Anna Ohura]], she is of mixed heritage. Her father is Japanese and her mother is Bulgarian.{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/index.php/mixed-blood-half-caucasian-japanese-av-stars/|title=Mixed Blood: Half-Caucasian Japanese Adult Video Stars|date=August 28, 2008|accessdate=2008-10-28|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]}} She made her AV debut in November 2007 with [[S1 No. 1 Style]], a major Japanese AV studio associated with the [[Hokuto Corporation]] group of companies, and known for dealing only with popular actresses.{{cite web |url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=23502/|title=Meisa Hanai Profile & Filmography|accessdate=2008-10-28|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=26 |title=JAV News - Things to Know about S1 Studio |month=August|year=2008|accessdate=2008-10-28|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]}} She continued making one movie per month for S1 through the end of 2008. Despite being a newcomer to the AV industry, she broke into the DMM list of the Top 100 Actresses by sales from their website for the last half of 2007, ranked at #8,{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/term=last_2007/mode=actress/|title=DMM 2007年 上半期 DVD AV女優 ランキング ベスト100 (Top 100 actresses last half 2007)|accessdate=2009-07-28|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} amd for the first half of 2008, ranking at #23.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/term=first_2008/mode=actress/rank=21_40|title=DMM 2008年 上半期 DVD AV女優 ランキング ベスト100 (Top 100 actresses first half 2008)|accessdate=2009-07-28|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Hanai also did a "gravure" (non-sex) shoot for Vol. 178 of ''Bejean'' magazine, published in August 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.jlist.com/PRODUCT/MMG127|title=Bejean Aug 2008 vol. 178|accessdate=2009-01-20|publisher=[http://www.jlist.com/ JList]}} She debuted with Kawaii, another Hokuto company specializing in glamour videos, in the appropriately titled ''Kawaii Debut'' in January 2009. She also began appearing in a series of videos for [[Moodyz]] in 2009.{{cite web |url=http://www.moodyz.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=23502/|title=花井メイサ(はないめいさ)|accessdate=2009-07-10|publisher=[http://www.moodyz.com/ www.moodyz.com]|language=Japanese}} In addition, she has been on GyaO TV's show ''Ero Para'' (エロ生☆パラダイス).{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/meisa-hanai-appears-on-bejean-and-kawaii/|title=Meisa Hanai appears on Bejean and Kawaii|accessdate=2009-07-28|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|date=May 22, 2009}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Kanori Kadomatsu | films = | homepage = | iafd = | egafd = | bgafd = | imdb = 0951216 | afdb = |eurobabeindex = }} '''Ryōka Yuzuki''' (柚木 涼香 ''Yuzuki Ryōka'', born [[January 10]], [[1974]]) is a [[seiyū]] who was born in [[Anjo, Aichi|Anjo]], [[Aichi]], [[Japan]]. Her younger sister is adult comic strip artist [[Sayumi Sakuragi]] ([[w:ja:桜木さゆみ|桜木さゆみ]]). She used to do a lot of live action work when she was a teen under the name '''Ayumi Nagashii''' (永椎 あゆみ ''Nagashii Ayumi''). She later became an idol under the name '''Kanori Kadomatsu''' (角松 かのり ''Kadomatsu Kanori''), appearing in men's magazines and [[V-Cinema]]. Several of the films were very explicit in violence, sex and nudity. Trying to break out of the [[horror film|horror]]/[[exploitation film|exploitation]] genre and back into legitimate cinema, she briefly changed her name back to '''Ayumi Nagashii''' (永椎 あゆ美 ''Nagashii Ayumi'') and began working on the occasional anime as a voice actress. On November 1, 1998 she changed her name to Ryōka Yuzuki and currently focuses mainly on voice work. ==Performance== Leading roles in '''bold'''. ===Anime=== *''[[Air (visual novel)|Air]]'' ('''[[List of Air characters#Main characters|Minagi Tohno]]''') *''[[Angel Links]]'' ('''Meifon Li''') *''[[Armitage III: Poly-Matrix]]'' ('''Naomi Armitage''') *''[[Brigadoon: Marin & Melan|Brigadoon]]'' (Midori Mano, the Momoi sisters, Chiasa Kurihara, Kushatohn) *''[[Buso Renkin]]'' ('''[[List of characters in Buso Renkin#Tokiko Tsumura|Tokiko Tsumura]]''') *''[[Candy Boy|Candy☆Boy]]'' ('''Yukino Sakurai''') *''[[Cardcaptor Sakura]]'' ([[Ruby_Moon_(Cardcaptor_Sakura)#Ruby_Moon|Nakuru Akizuki/Ruby Moon]]) *''[[Chobits]]'' ([[Chobits Characters#Takako Shimizu|Takako Shimizu]]) *''[[Cool Devices#Operation 01: Curious Fruit|Cool Devices Operation 01: Curious Fruit]]'' ('''Ai Yūki''') *''[[Daphne in the Brilliant Blue]]'' (Claire Mitsunaga) *''[[Dual! (Sanae Ishihara) ===Dubbing=== *''[[Archie's Weird Mysteries|The Archies]] in Jugman'' ([[Betty Cooper]]) *''[[Barbie as Rapunzel]]'' ([[Barbie]]) *''[[Barbie in the Nutcracker]]'' ([[Barbie]]) *''[[Barbie of Swan Lake]]'' ([[Barbie]]) *''[[Beast Wars]]'' & ''[[Beast Machines|Beast Wars Returns]]'' ([[Blackarachnia|Black Widow]], NaviCo, & Una) *''[[Miss Congeniality (film)|Miss Congeniality]]'' (Gracie Hart) *''[[Miss Congeniality 2]]'' (Graci Hart) *''[[Mr. Men and Little Miss]]'' ([[Little Miss Magic]], [[Little Miss Stubborn]], [[Little Miss Sunshine]]) *''[[Swimfan]]'' (Amy Miller) *''[[The Exorcist (film)|The Exorcist: Director's Cut]]'' (Regan McNeill) *''[[The New Adventures Of Madeline]]'' (Nicole) *''[[Thirteen (film)|Thirteen]]'' (Tracy Louise Freeland) *''[[Van Helsing (film)|Van Helsing]]'' (Aleera) ==External links== *{{imdb name|id=0951216|name=Ryoka Yuzuki}} *{{ann name|id=545|name=Ryouka Yuzuki}} ==References== * [http://www.81produce.co.jp/list.cgi?lady+7323128275030 Official 81 Produce page ] * [http://www001.upp.so-net.ne.jp/kazaka/yuzuki/index.html KAZAKA-NET 柚木涼香さんのページ] {{DEFAULTSORT:Yuzuki, Ryoka}} [[Category:1974 births]] [[Category:81 Produce]] [[Category:Japanese female adult models]] [[Category:Japanese gravure idols]] [[Category:Japanese actors]] [[Category:Japanese voice actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Aichi Prefecture]] [[es:Ryōka Yuzuki]] [[fr:Ryōka Yuzuki]] [[ko:유즈키 료카]] [[ja:柚木涼香]] [[ru:Юдзуки, Рёка]] [[zh:柚木涼香]]

{{Female adult bio |photo=[[Image:Replace this image female.svg]]| |name = Nao Oikawa ||birth= {{birth date and age|1981|4|21}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://www.oikawanao.jp/profile.html| title=Oikawa Nao Profile|accessdate=2008-11-15|publisher=[http://www.oikawanao.jp/ Official Web Site]|language=Japanese}} |location= [[Hiroshima Prefecture]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 86-56-88(cm)
34-22-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.61}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust=Yes |blood= A - |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://www.oikawanao.jp/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Nao Oikawa'''|及川奈央|Oikawa Nao}} is a former Japanese [[adult video]] actress who won an Award for Excellence, Best Actress category at the 2005 [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]]. Since retiring from the adult entertainment field, Oikawa has become a popular TV personality and singer. ==Life and career== Nao Oikawa was born in [[Hiroshima Prefecture]], [[Japan]] on April 21, 1981. In an interview from early 2002 she says that she had already done most of the things she performs in her adult videos with her high school boyfriend, including [[anal sex]], [[Sadomasochism|S&M]], and public sex.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmate.com/interviews/article_57.html|title=Best Video: Group Interview|accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://www.jmate.com/ Jmate]}} But she says she had never used a [[vibrator (sex toy)|vibrator]] before her AV work, and at least in early 2001, her lovers in private life were only a few (less than double digits).{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/171/oikawanao.html|title=及川奈緒の部屋へようこそ|accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://www.b-v.co.jp/ www.b-v.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} ===AV debut=== Oikawa made her adult video debut at age nineteen for the Media Station Cosmos label in September 2000.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2000.htm|title=ＡＶ年表 2000|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/ homepage3.nifty.com]|language=Japanese}} Her second movie, ''Indecent Woods'', in documentary form, has her and the director getting her boyfriend's approval for her AV work.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=it59|title=Indecent Woods|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} In her third video, ''Sister-in-Law is Beautiful Nurse'', Oikawa is a divorced woman who returns to work as a nurse and has sex not only with a doctor but also her ex-brother-in-law.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kr9139|title=Sister in law is beautiful nurse|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} Her next video, ''Uniform Doll'', is [[cosplay]] with Oikawa dressed as a schoolgirl, bus conductor, waitress, and in a [[yukata]].{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=ka2010|title=Sex Doll In Different Uniforms|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} In her first year of adult work, she made only a few more videos, includung a softcore [[V-Cinema]] movie, ''Virgin Teacher Hinako'' in September 2001,{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2001/ov129120.htm|title=処女教師　日菜子|accessdate=2008-11-12|publisher=[http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/ JMdB]|language=Japanese}} but her career took off in late 2001 and 2002 when she made a number of videos with both large mainstream companies such as [[Alice Japan]] and smaller independent producers (Momotaro). In her December 2001 video for Alice Japan, ''Inhumanity Nao Oikawa'', 10 amateur men come to the video studio and do their best at being porn actors by having sex with Oikawa, using a quiz game to decide the sex position.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kr9160|title=Inhumanity|accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} Her video ''Fallen Angel X'' (February 2002) features a 12-man orgy scene, anal sex, and vaginal insertions.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=bz86|title=The Fallen Angel X|accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} ===KMP and later career=== In May 2002, Oikawa began an association with the the new KMP Million label which continued until her retirement. Although she continued to work for other video producers, the majority of her films were with KMP, most of them under the direction of Goro Tameike. Her first video with KMP and Tameike, ''Another Side of Nao Oikawa'', involved anal sex and forced [[fellatio]]. One of her male partners is famed porn actor [[Taka Kato]]{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=milv005|title=REVERSE / Nao Oikawa |accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/digital/videoa/-/detail/=/cid=84milv005/|title=裏 及川奈央 |accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} A second volume of the same series, ''Another Side of Nao Oikawa 2'', was even more hardcore with lesbian [[strap-on dildo|strap-on]] sex, forced fellatio and vomiting, multiple partner fellatio and vibrator play. Once again [[Taka Kato]] takes part in the action.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=rmild086|title=Another Side of Nao Oikawa 2 |accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]}} She also made a [[bukkake]] and [[gokkun]] video for [[Soft On Demand]] (SOD) in November 2002.{{cite web |url=http://megaasians.net/updates/preview/sddm200.htm|title=SDDM-200 A veteran of the adult industry in Japan gets splattered. |accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://megaasians.net/ megaasians.net]}} On a gentler note, Oikawa appeared with [[Kurumi Morishita]] in a June 2003 production by KMP entitled ''Forest in Nude''. Directed by [[TOHJIRO]], this lesbian genre video is a "soft, bittersweet story of two friends who remember the days of their youth and the sexual experiences they had".{{cite web |url=http://www.lezlovevideo.com/product_details/default.asp?cat=jav&scat=1173&mscssid=76D979A916864E4DB87D2DE8904E5808&ProductGroupID=9A4450B86C8C46E291C2566447A71F62|title=Forest In Nude |accessdate=2008-11-13|publisher=[http://www.lezlovevideo.com/ LezLoveVideo]}} She appeared in two JAV cosplay videos for JoyDel: ''Teacher Nao'' (December 2003),{{cite web |url=http://www.xonair.com/detail.cfm?id=10028138&lang=US|title=JDA Series: Teacher Nao (Joydel) (Nao Oikawa) (jda001)|accessdate=2009-01-24|publisher=[http://www.xonair.com/home.cfm?lang=US X On Air]}} and ''Nurse Nao'' (January 2004).{{cite web |url=http://www.xonair.com/detail.cfm?id=10031175|title=JDA Series: Nurse Nao (Joydel) (Nao Oikawa) (jda003)|accessdate=2009-01-24|publisher=[http://www.xonair.com/home.cfm?lang=US X On Air]}} These two videos are notable for lacking the mosaic censoring typical of most JAV releases. Oikawa's final video, for KMP, was ''The Woman Called Nao'', released June 2004, with the actress nao, but there have since been numerous re-issues and compilations of her earlier videos. ===Popularity and recognition=== At her peak, Oikawa was one of the most popular and well-known [[AV Idol|AV Idols]] in Japan. In 2003 (the earliest date available) she was #1 in the DMM list of the 100 top-ranked actresses by sales on their website.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2003/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2003年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} In 2004, even though she had retired in mid-year, she was still ranked #2,{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2004/article=actress/rank=1_20 |title=DMM 2004年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} and even in 2005 she made the top 50 at #42.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/ranking/=/mode=year/aetas=2005/article=actress/rank=41_60 |title=DMM 2005年 DVD AV女優 年間ランキング ベスト100|accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} Oikawa was also one of the top paid actresses in Japan as well - according to men's magazine ''[[Shukan Jitsuwa]]'', "Top blue movie actresses such as Nao Oikawa ... can command as much as 5 million yen [about $50,000] per flick".{{cite web |url=http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2003/09/20030914p2g00m0dm999000c.html|title=Porno world speads its legs and shoots out a few secrets |accessdate=2007-08-16|publisher=[http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/ Mainichi Shimbun]|year=2003|month=September}} Oikawa has been honored for her AV performances several times. She was runner-up to [[Ryōko Mitake]] in fan voting for the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2002 X City Grand Prix Awards|2002 AV Grand Prix]] Best Actress Award from X City.{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/CITY_ORG/grandprix2002/PRIZE/result.html|title=A.V.G.P. Adult Video Grand Prix 2002 |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} At the 2005 [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] for satellite TV broadcasts in 2004, Oikawa's video ''Fan Appreciation Hot Springs Bus Tour'' won the Grand Prize for Original Programming and she also gained an Award for Excellence in the Best Actress category.{{cite web|url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/nlbn/NL000500/vl_16.htm|title=2004年度ＣＳアダルト番組アワード開催 (CS 2004 year Adult Awards Show)|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ AllAbout]|date=February 28, 2005|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta|accessdate=2008-10-27|language=Japanese}} However, Oikawa has said that she did not always find working in the AV industry to be pleasant. In one early video shot outdoors, she reported that she was "abused on camera both physically and mentally, with the men at the sides enjoying that. Getting hurt mentally is really hard. Much worse than any physical pain. Especially when you see the director getting off on it." Although many AV stars are ostracized by their families, in a 2005 article in the magazine ''Tokusatsu Shinsengumi'', Oikawa credits her mother with giving her the help she needed: "Without the support from my mother, I never would have made it as an adult video performer"{{cite web |url= http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/waiwai/archive/news/2005/12/20051214p2g00m0dm012000c.html|title=Turning tricks helps keep desperate families together |accessdate=2007-08-16|publisher=[http://mdn.mainichi-msn.co.jp/ Mainichi Shimbun]|year=2005|month=December}} ===TV appearances=== Like AV Idols [[Nana Natsume]] and [[Sora Aoi]], Oikawa has been able to use her fame in the AV industry to enter mainstream media work. Soon after her retirement from adult videos, she acted in and directed an episode of the Japanese TV horror series ''Fantazuma: Cursed House'' or ''Fantazuma: Noroi no yakata'' (ファンタズマ〜呪いの館〜) which aired on [[TV Tokyo]] in July 2004.{{cite web |url=http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/t12/25.html|title=Fantazuma: Noroi no yakata (TV series) |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/ Japanese Horror Movie Database]}} She also played a role in the 2004 comedy-horror TV series {{nihongo|''[[The Great Horror Family]]''|怪奇大家族|Kaiki daikazoku}} directed by [[Takashi Shimizu]] on [[TV Tokyo]] {{cite web |url=http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/t11/20.html|title=Kaiki daikazoku (TV Series) |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/ Japanese Horror Movie Database]}} and appeared in Episode 7 of ''Hell Girl'' or ''Jigoku shoujo'' (地獄少女) on [[Nihon TV]] in December 2006.{{cite web |url=http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/t11/71.html|title=Jigoku shoujo (2006) (TV series) |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.fjmovie.com/horror/ Japanese Horror Movie Database]}} On the [[TV Asahi]] after midnight massage-parlor drama ''Kaikan Shokunin'' (快感職人), Oikawa joined regular cast member [[Sora Aoi]] when she guest-starred as the cabaret club girl in Episode 1 (July 8, 2006){{cite web |url=http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/kaikan/story01.html|title=Episode 1|accessdate=2009-01-24|publisher=[http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/ Japanese www.tv-asahi.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} On November 9th, 2007 she made a guest appearance in the 6th episode of Tsuburaya Productions mini-series {{nihongo|''[[Ultraseven X]]''|ＵＬＴＲＡＳＥＶＥＮ Ｘ（ウルトラセブン エックス）|Urutorasebun Ekkusu}} playing a bartender named "Alisa". Oikawa was cast as Negi's advisor "Shizuna Minamoto" in the 2007-08 late-night [[TV Tokyo]] series ''[[Negima!: Magister Negi Magi]]'' (魔法先生ネギま！) based on the [[manga]] of the same name about a young male wizard from Wales (Negi, played by a 13-year old girl) and his 31 female students.{{cite web |url=http://www.starchild.co.jp/special/negima-drama/|title=Magister Negi Magi |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.starchild.co.jp/ www.starchild.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2007-09-05/negima-live-action's-negi-played-by-13-year-old-girl|title=Negima! Live-Action Drama's Negi Played by 13-Year-Old Girl |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/ AnimeNewsNetwork]|date=Sept. 5, 2007}}{{cite web |url=http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=8334|title=Negima! Magister Negi Magi (live-action TV drama) |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/ AnimeNewsNetwork]}} More recently, she played the role of villainess "Kegalesia" in the [[TV Asahi]] [[tokusatsu]] TV series ''[[Engine Sentai Go-onger]]'' (炎神戦隊ゴーオンジャー) which ran until February 2009.{{cite web |url=http://en.tokusatsu.de/s/4/engine-sentai-go-onger/|title=炎神戦隊ゴーオンジャー - Engine Sentai Go-onger |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://en.tokusatsu.de/ Tokusatsu]}} In the September 21, 2008 episode, Oikawa and her co-stars [[Rina Aizawa]] and [[Yumi Sugimoto]] teamed up as the one-off G3 Princess singing group.{{cite web |url=http://gaijinheart.blog100.fc2.com/blog-entry-197.html|title=Ex-Porn Actress Oikawa Nao finally becomes an idol |accessdate=2008-11-14|publisher=[http://gaijinheart.blog100.fc2.com/ gaijinheart.blog100.fc2.com]}} ===Personal life=== Her hobbies are [[Tarot]] divination and [[East Asian calligraphy|calligraphy]] and she enjoys all types of Japanese food, especially with a glass of [[sake]].{{cite web |url=http://www.oikawanao.jp/profile.html| title=Oikawa Nao Profile|accessdate=2008-11-15|publisher=[http://www.oikawanao.jp/ Official Web Site]|language=Japanese}} As for her sex life, she said in a 2002 interview "I want something normal. I don't want any weird sex ... We do weird things for work anyway." Oikawa first met Japanese comedian Tomonori Jinnai (阵内智则) sometime in 2003 when he was an unknown. Their relationship continued after his success - Jinnai invited her to be a guest on his radio program “Jinnai Tomonori No Hitoribancho" in October 2005 and they even joined a celebrity curry connosieur's club together. Their relationship soured when Jinnai began dating actress [[Norika Fujiwara]] in the summer of 2006 and in November of the same year, Jinnai and Fujiwara announced their engagement. Oikawa was reportedly very upset over the situation.{{cite web|url=http://archive.japantoday.com/jp/shukan/376|title=Former porn star Oikawa still has thing for Jinnai |publisher=[http://archive.japantoday.com/ Archive - Japan Today]|date=December 27, 2006|accessdate=2008-11-14}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{Female adult bio | name = Asa Akira | photo = [[Image:Asa Akira 2009.jpg|200px|thumb]] | caption = Asa Akira attending the [[X-Rated Critics Organization|XRCO]] Awards, Hollywood, CA on April 16, 2009. | birth = {{birth date and age|mf=yes|1986|1|2}} | location = [[New York City]], [[United States]]<ref name=Vouyer/> | birthname = | spouse = | death = | measurements = 32C-24-32 <ref name=iafd>[http://www.iafd.com/person.rme/perfid=AsaAkira/gender=f/Asa-Akira.htm Profile at IAFD]</ref> | height = {{height|ft=5|in=2}}<ref name=iafd /> | shoe size = | eye color = Brown | hair color = Black | skin color = | natural bust = Yes | blood = | ethnicity = Asian | alias = | films = | website = http://www.asaakiraxxx.com | iafd = AsaAkira | egafd = | bgafd = | ismdb = 2990250 | afdb = 48707 |eurobabeindex = | spelling = US }} '''Asa Akira''' (born January 2, 1986 in [[New York City]], [[United States]]) is a Japanese-American [[pornographic actress]] and model.
Between the ages of 6 and 13 she lived in Japan, where she attended American schools. In 2006–07 she was a regular on the [[Bubba the Love Sponge]] radio show for about a year, and was known as the "Show Whore".<ref name=Vouyer>{{cite web | title = Vouyer Media Ships Asa Akira Release| author=Jared Rutter | publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/30908.html | date = 2008-06-24| accessdate = 2008-12-23}}</ref> Her first boy-girl scene was with [[Travis Knight (porn actor)|Travis Knight]] for [[Gina Lynn]] Productions, after having already done several girl-girl scenes, mainly with Lynn.<ref name=Vouyer/> As of June 2008 she resided in [[New York]].<ref name=Vouyer/>
==Awards== *2009 [[XBIZ Award]] nominee – New Starlet of the Year<ref name=2009XBiz>{{cite web | title =XBIZ Announces 2009 Awards Nominees | author=David Sullivan | publisher = AVN.com| url = http://business.avn.com/articles/33645.html| date = 2008-12-05| accessdate =2009-08-30 }}</ref>

{{notability|Biographies|date=December 2008}} {{Female adult bio |photo=[[Image:Replace this image female.svg]]| |name = Runa Akasaka ||birth= {{birth date and age|1967|4|07}}Infobox data from [http://www.moodyz.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=4251 moodyz.com] |location= [[Kanagawa]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 88-58-87(cm) |height= {{height|m=1.61}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= |blood=A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Luna Akasaka |films= |homepage= http://a-runa.com/ A-Runa.com
|iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Runa Akasaka'''|赤坂ルナ|Akasaka Runa|born April 7, 1967}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[actress]] who is best known for her appearances in [[pornographic film|adult video]]s (AV). In the AV field, where an average career spans about a year, with five to ten videos total,{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2008-12-29|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|work=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2007-03-20|quote=If she’s only out for money, she will studiously avoid publicity and quit inside a year-the average life-span of an AV girl-with five or ten videos to her credit and an unknowing family bosom to return to.}} Akasaka's career in AV has lasted nearly four years, with 70 to 90 videos listed for her at two major retailers.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/s/ref=nb_ss_d?__mk_ja_JP=%83J%83%5E%83J%83i&url=search-alias%3Ddvd&field-keywords=%90%D4%8D%E2%83%8B%83i&x=11&y=19|title=DVD › "赤坂ルナ"|accessdate=2008-12-28|publisher=[http://www.amazon.co.jp/ www.amazon.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/list/=/article=actress/id=4251/|title=DMM - Runa Akasaka Filmography|accessdate=2008-12-27|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} at the end of 2008. Asakusa has also starred in titles in the ''[[pink film]]'' and [[V-Cinema]] genres. ==Career== Runa Akasaka made her AV debut in 2003, at the age of 36, in the [[Mother I'd like to fuck (MILF)|''jukujo'']] or "Mature woman" genre of Japanese adult entertainment. She worked with a number of different studios for the first few months of her career but at the end of 2003 she joined the major Japanese AV studio [[Moodyz]] where she starred in such Mature-woman AV titles as {{nihongo|''A Friend's Mother''|友人の母|Yuujin no haha}}, and {{nihongo|''The Room Of Two Sexy Madams''|W美熟女の部屋|Double bijukujo no heya}} for noted AV director Goro Tameike.{{cite web |url=http://jans-web.com/?p=mcard&id=0705|title=Runa Akasaka - A Friend's Mother|accessdate=2008-12-29|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator 1997-2006]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://jans-web.com/?p=mcard&id=0705|title=Runa Akasaka - The Room Of Two Sexy Madams|accessdate=2008-12-29|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator 1997-2006]|language=English}} In Spring 2004 she began appearing in videos for [[Madonna (studio)|Madonna]],{{cite web |url=http://www.madonna-av.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=105/|title=麻生ひかり （あそうひかり|accessdate=2008-12-29|publisher=[http://www.madonna-av.com/ www.madonna-av.com]|language=Japanese}} an AV studio specializing in the mature woman genre. She made one video a month for Madonna until the end of 2004 when she changed studios again, this time going to KMP.{{cite web |url=http://www.km-produce.com/girls/detail.php?gid=2666|title=赤坂ルナ (Runa Akasaka Profile & Filmography)|accessdate=2008-12-29|publisher=[http://www.km-produce.com/ www.km-produce.com]|language=Japanese}} In August 2005, Akasaka participated in a unique project for the huge AV conglomerate [[Soft On Demand]] (SOD), playing the mother in a full-length dramatic adult video, ''Nightly Continuous DVD Novel''. The movie, also starring first-time actress Satozakura Hinata, Aoi, and porn legend [[Taka Kato]], was described by SOD as an industry first at a special screening in Tokyo in July 2005.{{cite web |url=http://www.sod.co.jp/demand/news/54.html|title=夜の連続DVD小説　おまん|accessdate=2008-12-29|publisher=[http://www.sod.co.jp/ www.sod.co.jp]|date=July 22, 2005|language=Japanese}} Unusually for a mature actress, she appeared in the mainstream men's entertainment magazine ''[[Weekly Playboy]]'' in 2005.{{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?aksrn_02|title={{nihongo2|赤坂 ルナ}} |accessdate=2008-12-26|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} In 2006, AV Research Laboratory-- a non-commercial site specializing in the history of Japanese adult videos-- described Akasaka as a popular "veteran" performer in the mature-woman genre, with three years in the industry and over 40 works to her credit.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/title/a/akasaka_runa.htm|title=赤坂ルナ (DVD review)|accessdate=2008-12-26|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)|quote=ここまで３年間に４０本以上の作品があるベテラン人気熟女女優だ。]}} Her AV appearances led to a leading role in the Okura Films/O.P. Films theatrically-released ''[[pink film]]'', {{nihongo|''Pervert Train: Skillful Fingers, Wet Feeling''|痴漢電車　いい指・濡れ気分|Chikan densha: iiyubi*nure kimochi}} (2004),{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2004/eb005220.htm|title={{nihongo2|痴漢電車　いい指・濡れ気分}} |accessdate=2008-12-26|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} an entry in the parent company, [[Shintoho]]'s ''Molester's Train'' train series which [[Academy Award]]-winning director [[Yōjirō Takita]] started in 1982. By 1997 there had been 25 films made in this long-running ''pink film'' series. In their pioneering English-language work on the Japanese erotic cinema, the Weissers write, "Most of the episodes are reminiscent of early American [[nudie-cuties]], especially the voyeuristic titty-flicks like [[Russ Meyer]]'s ''[[Eve and the Handyman]]'' and ''[[The Immoral Mr. Teas|Immoral Mr Teas]]'', or [[Herschell Gordon Lewis]]' ''[[The Adventures of Lucky Pierre|Adventures Of Lucky Pierre]]''."{{cite book |chapter=MOLESTER series including MOLESTER'S TRAIN|last=Weisser|first=Thomas|coauthors=Yuko Mihara Weisser|title=Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia: The Sex Films|pages=276-279|year=1998|publisher=Vital Books : Asian Cult Cinema Publications|location=Miami|isbn=1-889288-52-7}} ==Partial filmography== ===Adult videos=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Female adult bio |birth= {{birth date and age|1985|10|10}}Info box data from: {{cite web |url=http://www.jans-web.com/profiles/n0829|title=Risa Coda 倖田梨紗|accessdate=2009-01-02|publisher=[http://www.jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator]}} |name = Risa Coda |location = [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname = Arisa Kikuchi |measurements= 82-58-84(cm)
32-23-33(inch) |height = {{height|m=1.63}} |weight = |blood = B- |eye color = Brown |hair color = Brown |natural bust = Yes |ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias = Risa Koda
Risa Kouda
Lisa Coda |homepage = http://blog.livedoor.jp/risa_c/ |iafd = }} {{nihongo|'''Risa Coda'''|倖田梨紗|Coda Risa}}, also known as '''Risa Koda''' and '''Risa Kouda''' (for softcore appearances), is an award-winning former Japanese model and [[adult video]] (AV) actress. ==Life and career== ===AV debut and career=== Coda made her debut in adult videos in May 2005, at the age of 19, with the prominent AV studio [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]]{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2005.htm|title=2005|accessdate=2009-01-02|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]|language=Japanese}} She continued making adult videos exclusively with h.m.p for almost two years, releasing about one original movie per month. One of her productions from May 2006, ''I Ecstatically Pleasured Myself in Front of My Boyfriend'', uses the documentary format popular in many Japanese adult videos. The plot focuses on her life as an AV actress and contrasts having sex with her boyfriend in private versus sex with an actor in a video scene.{{cite web|url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?AID=1251|title=I Masturbate Before Boy Till Climax|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/ AV Idol]|accessdate=2009-01-02}} In another h.m.p. video, ''She Loves Outdoor Sex!'', released in February 2007, she leaves the studio for some outdoor locations.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=hrdv00497|title=Outdoor Mania: I'm More Lusty If Watched|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/ AV Idol]|accessdate=2009-01-02}} Coda also was part of a controversial venture by h.m.p. to offer adult videos for [[Universal Media Disc|UMD]] media, the proprietary disc format used in the [[Sony]] [[Play Station Portable]] (PSP).{{cite web |url=http://au.gamespot.com/news/2005/06/02/news_6126863.html?sid=6126863|title=PSP procures porn in Japan|publisher=[http://au.gamespot.com/ GameSpot.com]|date=June 2, 2005|accessdate=2009-01-06}} She starred in 5 UMD videos released between September 2005 and April 2006.{{cite web |url=http://www.hmp.jp/portal/actress/detail/J061/?b=005|title=倖田梨紗　Risa Koda UMD|publisher=[http://www.hmp.jp/ www.hmp.jp]|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}} Coda received recognition for her work with h.m.p. from both fans and the AV industry. She was nominated for Best Actress at the 2007 [[Adult Broadcasting Awards]] for appearances on adult satellite TV in 2006{{cite web|url=http://allabout.co.jp/entertainment/adultvideo/closeup/CU20070201A/|title=ＡＶニュースチャンネル２月号 (February AV News Channel)|publisher=[http://allabout.co.jp/ AllAbout]|date=February 1, 2007|last=Otsubo|first=Kemuta|accessdate=2008-10-27|language=Japanese}} and she won one of the Best Actress Awards for Excellence at the 2006 [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#AV Actress Grand Prix 2006|AV Actress Grand Prix]].{{cite web |url=http://www.asianidols.net/news.php?day.20070107|title=AV Grand Prix 2006 Winners Announced|accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://www.asianidols.net/ Asianidols.net]|date=January 7, 2007}} Her last video for h.m.p. was released in March 2007 and she then signed with one of Japan's largest AV firms, [[Soft On Demand]] (SOD).{{cite web |url=http://www.sodc.co.jp/actress/02821.php|title=倖田梨紗|publisher=[http://www.sodc.co.jp/ www.sodc.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}} She made four original videos with SOD including her playing a massage girl in ''Super High-Class Soap Lady'' which contains a lesbian scene,{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=star038|title=Super Hot Massage Girl, Risa Koda|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/ AV Idol]|accessdate=2009-01-06}} and ''Super Fucking, Orgasm Climax, 24 Hours 10 Fucks'' with several group sex scenes including a seven person orgy.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=star052|title=Fuck and Ecstasy For 24-hour 10 Sex, Risa Koda|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/ AV Idol]|accessdate=2009-01-06}} In February 2008, she announced her retirement from AV work in her blog{{cite web |url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/risa_c/|title=Official Blog|publisher=[http://blog.livedoor.jp/ blog.livedoor.jp]|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}} and her retirement video, ''Ultra-Climax Nakadashi Orgasm'', was released for SOD on February 21, 2008. ===Other activities=== Coda tried to launch a career as a [[J-pop]] singer with Sexual Kiss records in late 2006 with a CD single featuring the [[Eurobeat]] song "Paradiso" (パラディソ).{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/risa-coda-starts-a-singing-career/|title=Risa Coda starts a singing career |publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|date=January 5, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06}} She used the stage name Lisa and the [[Maxi single|Maxi CD]] released on November 29, 2006 also included two other cuts "Baby.It’s all" and "Eternity".{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%83%91%E3%83%A9%E3%83%87%E3%82%A3%E3%82%BD-LISA/dp/B000K2QLM4/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1230848584&sr=1-1|title=パラディソ [Single] [Maxi] |publisher=[http://www.amazon.co.jp/ www.amazon.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-01-06}} In addition to her hardcore AV career, Coda also has an extensive list of "gravure" videos where she models partially nude or in a bikini. Her softcore videos were usually made under the name Risa Kouda.{{cite web |url=http://www.sazuma.com/results.php?mode=4&mid=94183|title=Movies with Risa Kouda|publisher=[http://www.sazuma.com/ www.sazuma.com]|accessdate=2009-01-07}} Coda also starred in a softcore erotic [[kunoichi]] (female ninja) action movie directed by [[Yoshikazu Katō]] and released in Japan in 2007 as ''Youen Kunoichi Den: Yamame Hen''.{{cite web |url=http://www.sazuma.com/item_161996_Youen-Kunoichi-Den:-Yamame-Hen.html|title=Youen Kunoichi Den: Yamame Hen|publisher=[http://www.sazuma.com/ www.sazuma.com]|accessdate=2009-01-06}} It was subsequently released in November 2008 by Switchblade Pictures with English sub-titles under the name ''Twin Blades of the Ninja''. A reviewer describes it as "not bad as it features three very attractive women who can’t act and roll with it as best as they can."{{cite web |url=http://www.mania.com/twin-blades-ninja_article_110843.html|title=Twin Blades of the Ninja|publisher=[http://www.mania.com/ Mania]|date=October 31, 2008|last=Beveridge|first=Chris|accessdate=2009-01-06}}{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.ca/Twin-Blades-Ninja-Risa-Koda/dp/B001GTFP22|title=Twin Blades of the Ninja (2006) |publisher=[http://www.amazon.ca/ www.amazon.ca]|accessdate=2009-01-06}} ===Arrest and trial=== In November 2008, Coda and her boyfriend, Japanese tennis pro [[Joji Miyao]], made news for having been arrested for drug possession on October 10. Police found "a small amount of drugs - 0.027 grams of stimulants and about 0.7 grams of marijuana" in Coda's apartment in Tokyo. She said she bought the marijuana to use together with her boyfriend because he enjoyed it. She and Miyao met in May 2007 but only started dating in September when he began spending several nights a week at her apartment. According to her statement, she had started using stimulants in August 2007 after breaking up with a former boyfriend and had been buying small amounts from a local dealer. She said that she bought marijuana for Miyao from the same dealer. She was working at a "high-class cabaret club in [[Roppongi]]" at the time of her arrest.{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyograph.com/news/id-4016|title=AV actress, tennis pro arrested for drugs|publisher=[http://www.tokyograph.com/ www.tokyograph.com]|date=November 9, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06}} Story source in Japanese from Nikkan Sports: http://www.nikkansports.com/entertainment/news/p-et-tp0-20081109-427604.html{{cite web |url=http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime/081108/crm0811081146010-n1.htm|title=【拡大大麻汚染】大麻所持でプロテニス選手と元ＡＶ女優を逮捕|publisher=[http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime/ sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime]|date=November 8, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime/081123/crm0811231151015-n1.htm|title=【衝撃事件の核心】孤独な元ＡＶ女優がたどり着いた「クスリ」と「オトコ」|publisher=[http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime/ sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/crime]|date=November 23, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}} At her trial in Tokyo District Court in December 2008, Coda, who admitted the charges, was found guilty and sentenced to 18 months, suspended for 3 years. She said her drug use was precipitated by a number of factors: loneliness, her grandfather's death, her mother being diagnosed with Parkinson's disease and her breakup with her boyfriend in 2007. She planned to return to her parent's home and might go back to her studies. Her mother, who testified for her at the trial, promised to aid in her recovery. No mention was made of Miyao who had a separate trial.{{cite web |url=http://www.tokyograph.com/news/id-4130|title=Risa Coda receives suspended sentence|publisher=[http://www.tokyograph.com/ www.tokyograph.com]|date=December 4, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06}} Story source in Japanese from ZAKZAK: http://www.zakzak.co.jp/gei/200812/g2008120409_all.html{{cite web |url=http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/trial/081204/trl0812041508005-n1.htm|title=【法廷から】寂しさを紛らわすため…元ＡＶ女優が薬物に手を出した理由|publisher=[http://sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/trial/ sankei.jp.msn.com/affairs/trial]|date=December 4, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-06|language=Japanese}} A couple of months after her December trial Coda was once again arrested on drug possession charges. At her trial in Tokyo in April 2009, the prosecution asked for two years but the judge imposed a 16 month prison sentence telling her that this was a good time for her to get off drugs. Her fiance testified at the trial as a character witness.{{cite web |url=http://www.nikkansports.com/entertainment/news/p-et-tp0-20090423-486178.html|title=元ＡＶ女優倖田梨紗被告に懲役１年４月|publisher=[http://www.nikkansports.com/ www.nikkansports.com]|date=April 23, 2009|accessdate=2009-08-31|language=Japanese}} ==Partial filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! 34-23-34(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.58}} |weight= |shoe size = 24.0 cm |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |blood= O |orientation= [[Heterosexual]] |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb = 2463583 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Ran Asakawa'''|朝河蘭|Asakawa Ran}} is a famous and extremely prolific [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[Model (person)|model]] and [[AV idol]] who made her debut in the adult entertainment field in 2001. In 2003, after making more adult videos than any other AV idol in Japan within one year, she and her agency petitioned the ''[[Guinness World Records]]'' for inclusion in their book.{{cite web |url=http://avstars.jsexnetwork.com/AV_Listing/english/_R/Ran_Asakawa/|title=Ran Asakawa Jsexnetwork Profile|accessdate=2007-08-13|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ www.jsexnetwork.com]|format=Webpage|language=English}} ==Life and career== Ran Asakawa was born in [[Kanagawa]] [[Prefecture]], Japan on 4 September 1980. Her first sexual encounter happened when she was 19 and was with a businessman. She says, however, that her first fully pleasurable experience wasn't until about the 10th time.{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/interviews/Ran_Asakawa/|title=Ran Asakawa Jsex Interview |accessdate=2007-08-13|publisher=[http://www.jsexnetwork.com/ www.jsexnetwork.com]|format=Webpage |language=English}} Asakawa finished high school and began junior college. When she realized that she couldn't make much money doing part time work she decided to start doing adult videos, and later explained, "I wanted to study to get a decent wage but I can't do that while I have a regular 9-5 job, right? So I picked AVs." She had thought about stripping but decided that the hours were too long. She says she cried after making her first video "wondering what I was doing to myself". She finally got to like sex on camera but keeps her eyes closed from embarrassment. At first she was not a popular performer because of her mature looks at a time when very young looking girls were the fashion in porn and she did only about 10 videos in her first six months. However, that changed and Asakawa and her modeling agency submitted an application to the ''Guinness Book of World Records'' for making 212 adult videos within the year of 2002, a number unprecedented in the 20-year history of AV in Japan.{{cite web |url=http://tantai.net/nats/ran/guinness.html|title=Guinness Record Application Form|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://tantai.net/ tantai.net]|language=Japanese}} The next year (2003), she outdid her previous record by appearing in 304 videos but announced her retirement at the end of the year.{{cite web |url=http://tantai.net/nats/ran/|title=Ran Asakawa|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://tantai.net/ tantai.net]|language=Japanese}} Her total output in Japan including later re-issues and compilations numbers nearly 800 videos.{{cite web |url=http://s7.artemisweb.jp/tanukitune/asakawa.html|title=朝河蘭 (Ran Asakawa) Videography|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://s7.artemisweb.jp/ s7.artemisweb.jp]|language=Japanese}} In late 2003 the ''[[Taipei Times]]'' reported that Asakawa had come to [[Taiwan]] with the hopes of expanding her career there.{{cite news |first=Max|last=Woodworth|title=Pop Stop|url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/feat/archives/2003/09/05/2003066622|publisher=[[Taipei Times]]|date=5 September 2003|accessdate=2007-08-16}} Although Asakawa retired from Japanese AV work, in 2004 she did appear in a number of "uncensored" videos - those without the mosaic pixellation to obscure the genitals found in all standard Japanese adult videos. At least some of the videos were produced in [[Taiwan]].{{cite web |url=http://www.aventertainments.com/search_Products.aspx?section=0&searchBy=starring&keyword=%E6%9C%9D%E6%B2%B3%E8%98%AD&languageID=2|title=朝河蘭 (Ran Asakawa)|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://www.aventertainments.com/ AV Entertainments]|language=Japanese}} Asakawa is quite a popular performer in Chinese-speaking areas where she is known as Wu Tenglan (武藤兰) and she has an entry under that name in the Chinese language Wikipedia.{{cite web |url=http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%9C%9D%E6%B2%B3%E5%85%B0|title=武藤兰 (Ran Muto)|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://zh.wikipedia.org/ zh.wikipedia.org]|language=Chinese}} In 2006, rumors began circulating on Chinese websites that Asakawa had died in June 2006 of either cancer or renal failure.{{cite web |url=http://www.mtime.com/group/AVshow/discussion/244328/|title=AV女优档案]回忆武藤兰 (AV Actress Archives - Memories of Ran Muto)|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://www.mtime.com/ MTime]|language=Chinese}} One entry ran: "2006年6月武藤兰病逝" (Ran Muto died June 2006) The rumors were quickly answered by Asakawa's agent on her official website assuring Chinese fans that she was alive and well.{{cite web |url=http://www.wretch.cc/blog/mocear/6546063|title=朝河蘭的訃聞－－造口業比「ＳＹ」更多的「偽」道人士 (Ran Asakawa's False Obituary)|accessdate=2008-10-10|publisher=[http://www.wretch.cc/ www.wretch.cc]|date=July 13, 2006|language=Chinese}} The response was given in English as: "We don't understand Chinese. Though we would like to make corrections, we don't know hot to write in Chinese. 33-23-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.57}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust=Yes |blood= O |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Miruku Ichigo |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Milk Ichigo'''|苺みるく|Ichigo Milk}}, also often billed as '''Miruku Ichigo''', is an award-winning Japanese [[adult video]] (AV) actress who has had an exceptionally long career. ==Life and career== Milk Ichigo was born in Hokkaido on February 2, 1981. Her name, which literally translates as "strawberry milk", is also the name of a Japanese dessert and candy. Ichigo says she was eating ice cream while trying to think up a stage name and decided "Ichigo Miruku" sounded good.{{cite web|url=http://www.jmate.com/mt/2005/03/ichigo_miruku.html|title=Milk Ichigo Interview|publisher=[http://www.jmate.com/ JMate]|accessdate=2009-01-27}} Her first sexual experience was at age 16 with her boyfriend who was 3 years older. In an interview in late 2001, she said she had slept with about ten men but hadn't had sex for two years. ===AV debut and early career=== She got started in the field when she met an agent while she was working at a cabaret club.{{cite web|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/CITY_ORG/grandprix2001/interview/interview.html|title=Interview Miruku Ichigo|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ XCity]|accessdate=2009-01-27}} She at first refused the offer but then decided to "give it a shot". She began with magazine work and then went into videos. Ichigo's first video, ''I Love You Ichigo Milk'', was released December 25, 2000 for the [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki Tank]] label. She says she was nervous at her debut and had to take "lots of breaks". The actors and director were angry with her and she was thinking of giving up and going home. She remembers that first director as being a "really weird man by the name Happy Yamada", a very unique person. She would go on to work with Yamada in numerous videos over the next two years. Many of her video titles for Kuki played on her name with various combinations including the word "strawberry". ''Strawberry Club'' from March 2001 is nurse uniform [[cosplay]]{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt504|title=Strawberry Club|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} while the April 2001 release ''Strawberry Sherbert'' has her dressed in a diaper.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=kt509|title=Strawberry Sherbert|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} Her 6th video ''Wet Strawberry'' takes place at a hot spring.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt515|title=Wet Strawberry|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} Ichigo said she ended up a bit dizzy from spending too much time in the water during the shoot. Her July 2001 video ''A Summer Strawberry'' took her to a summer resort in Okinawa to have sex on the beach and at the hotel.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt524|title=A Summer Strawberry|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} ''Strawberry Gathering'' (November 2001) uses the documentary format common in Japanese porn to reveal Ichigo's secret past including sex with a middle-aged man and some mild bondage.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt546|title=Strawberry Gathering|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} In another documentary style video, ''A Snow Strawberry'', she returns home to Hokkaido to visit her ex-boyfriend but ends up having a one-night stand with a stranger.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt552|title=Snow Strawberry|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} Another video, ''Strawberry Call'', gives Ichigo the chance to play three different sisters, a tough one, a bright one, and a cute school girl. The three fight off the kidnappers of one of the customers of their coffee shop.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt556|title=Here Is Milk Ichigo|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} Ichigo was recognized by fans for her work in 2001 by being given the Best Actress Award at the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2001 X City Grand Prix Awards|X City Grand Prix Awards]] ceremony.{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/CITY_ORG/grandprix2001/PRIZE/result.html|title=Adult Video Grandprix 2001|accessdate=2008-11-16|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ X City]}} Her last video for Kuki, issued in April 2002 and entitled simply ''Goodbye'', has her as a teacher having sex with her students.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=kt572|title=Goodbye|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} While with the Kuki Tank label, Ichigo had also been making videos with Max-A Samansa and [[Alice Japan]], both part of the large [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki]] associated group of AV companies. In one of them, ''Splash'', she plays a mermaid.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=xs2242|title=Splash|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AVIdol]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} Ichigo has said that the cover from this video box is her favorite. ===Later career=== In late 2002, Ichigo switched studios, going from the Kuki group to [[Moodyz]], one of the constituent companies in the [[Hokuto Corporation]]. Her first two videos for Moodyz were with her first director, Happy Yamada. Ichigo continued with Moodyz for almost a year and then essentially stopped making original videos for mainstream Japanese porn. Beginning in late 2003, Ichigo began making a number of "uncensored" videos. These uncensored videos lack the mosaic pixelation which is used to obscure the genitals in standard Japanese AV. These videos are only marketed internationally outside of Japan or in underground ([[urabon]]) venues in Japan. Among these videos was ''Japanese Superidols Gold Vol. 19''{{cite web|url=http://www.japanx.com/detail.cfm?ID=10032507|title=JapanX Milk Ichigo|publisher=[http://www.japanx.com/ JapanX.com]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} from March 2004 and the September 2005 super-heroine cosplay adventure ''Akiba-Troops! Cutie Rangers!'' co-starring [[Sakura Sakurada]] and Tsumiki Shindo.{{cite web|url=http://www.aventertainments.com/product_lists.aspx?product_id=11989&languageID=1|title=Akiba-Troops! Cutie Rangers! |publisher=[http://www.aventertainments.com/ AV Entertainments]|accessdate=2009-01-28}} ===Suicide attempt=== In July 2005, Japanese news sources reported that Ichigo had attempted suicide in her Tokyo apartment.{{cite web|url=http://japanese-adult-movie.blogspot.com/2005/08/japanese-adult-movie-idol-ichigo.html|title=Japanese adult movie idol - Ichigo Miruku |publisher=[http://japanese-adult-movie.blogspot.com/ Japanese Adult Movie]|Date=August 4, 2005|accessdate=2009-01-28}} According to the sources, on July 13, 2005, she tried to commit suicide by taking 20 sleeping pills and then slashing her wrists. A suicide note said it was due to [[Shintaro Yoshitake]] ([[:ja:吉武真太郎|吉武 真太郎]]). Yoshitake was a relief pitcher for the [[Fukuoka SoftBank Hawks]] baseball team with whom Ichigo was having an affair. Ichigo had only known Yoshitake (who was married) for a short time but had developed a deep attachment for him and became despondent when he broke off their relationship.{{cite web|url=http://tvmania.livedoor.biz/archives/28419583.html |title=AV女優苺みるく自殺未遂！「私を弄んだソフトバンク吉武投手を許さない！」|publisher=[http://tvmania.livedoor.biz/ tvmania.livedoor.biz]|date=July 19, 2005|accessdate=2009-01-28|language=Japanese}} Ichigo was taken to the hospital by police who had been alerted by Ichigo's mother who was worried by her daughter's hints about suicide.{{cite web|url=http://www.zakzak.co.jp/gei/2005_07/g2005072101.html|title=ＡＶ女優の苺みるく自殺未遂 |publisher=[http://www.zakzak.co.jp/ Zakzak]|date=July 21, 2005|accessdate=2009-01-28|language=Japanese}} Ichigo appeared soon afterwards in a magazine photo showing her scarred wrist. As an aside, in an interview years before, Ichigo had declared jokingly that she didn't expect to live past 24 - her age at the time of her suicide attempt. ===Retirements and comebacks=== From late 2005, Ichigo was seen only infrequently in the adult video industry. She made two videos for the newly formed [[CROSS studio]]{{cite web|url=http://www.crosscross.jp/works/-/list/=/article=actress/id=997/|title=苺みるく 出演作品一覧|publisher=[http://www.crosscross.jp/ www.crosscross.jp]|accessdate=2009-01-29|language=Japanese}} and then returned in November 2006 to make two [[Sadomasochism|S&M]] [[Bondage (BDSM)|bondage]] movies with [[Attackers]].{{cite web|url=http://www.attackers.net/actress/-/detail/=/id=997/|title=苺みるく ( いちごみるく ) - Milk Ichigo Profile & Filmography |publisher=[http://www.attackers.net/ www.attackers.net]|accessdate=2009-01-28|language=Japanese}} However, almost two years passed before she made her next video, ''Comeback'', with Moodyz in December 2008. 47-24-35(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.53}} |weight= |shoe size=23.5cm |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= Yes |ethnicity= Japanese |alias= Love |homepage= http://blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/ }} {{nihongo|'''Fuko'''|風子|Fūko}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[gravure idol]] and [[AV idol]], known for her 47-inch bust. ==Career== Fuko first appeared in [[soapland]]s under the name "Love" (らぶ ''Rabu''), a name she used for topless photos at the [[Tokyo Topless]] site in 2005.{{cite web |url=http://tvmania.livedoor.biz/archives/50732453.html|title=フラッシュ「“Pカップグラドル”風子クンはカリスマ風俗嬢だった」] ("Flash: P-Cup Fuko was a sex industry-girl)|date=[[2007-01-16]]|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=tvmania.livedoor.biz/|language=Japanese}} {{cite web |url=http://ilovefuko.awardspace.com/index.html/bio/bio.html|title=Fuko Biography|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=ilovefuko.awardspace.com/|language=English}} In the year 2006, Fuko rapidly achieved fame in Japan, appearing in a number of Japanese magazines and on television. She started her Japanese-language blog, [http://blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/ 風子の風まかせ～♪] in September of 2006.{{cite web |url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/archives/2006-09.html|title=風子の風まかせ～♪ (Fuko's Blog, September 2006 entry)|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/|language=Japanese}} On [[November 21]], [[2006]], Fuko appeared on the Japanese television program ''Narutomo!'' (なるトモ!) with [[Yuzuki Aikawa]] (愛川ゆず季).{{cite web |url=http://hotnawadai.seesaa.net/article/30198989.html|title=グラビアアイドル・芸能人・有名人のホットな噂 (Gravure Idol, Show Business People, Famous People's Hot Rumors)|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=hotnawadai.seesaa.net|quote=ネット上で話題になるPカップグラビアアイドルの風子を2006年11月21日放送回「なるトモ!」で風子の名前は挙げなかったが「この前、Pカップの子と仕事をしたんですよ。|language=Japanese}} She appeared in an eponymously titled DVD (''Fuko P!'') which was released on [[March 9]], [[2007]].{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000LZ69DG|title=風子 P!|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=[[Amazon.com]]|language=Japanese}} A second DVD, ''Mix Juice'', released [[March 16]], [[2007]], featured Fuko with two other models.{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000N3SYIE|title=ミックスジュース|accessdate=2007-04-11|work=[[Amazon.com]]|language=Japanese}} ''Bachelor Magazine'', a Japanese big-bust publication, included a 20-minute DVD entitled ''Busty Angels'' featuring Fuko in its March, 2007 issue.{{cite web |url=http://aov.gijo.org/2007/04/29/fuko-bachelor-magazine-presents-busty-angels/|author=JustMeMike|title=''Busty Angels - Fuko: Bachelor Magazine'' (DVD Review)|date=[[April 29]], [[2007]]|accessdate=2007-05-02|work=aov.gijo.org|language=English}} The DVD ''Dekaroman'' (デカロマン), was released on [[May 25]], [[2007]].{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000P0I8FE|title=デカロマン (Dekaroman)|accessdate=2007-05-02|work=[[Amazon.com]]|language=Japanese}} In her blog, Fuko states that this DVD was filmed in Okinawa.{{cite web |url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/archives/50697258.html|title=風子の風まかせ～♪ (Fuko's Blog, April 14, 2007 entry)|date=[[April 14]], [[2007]]|accessdate=2007-05-02|work=blog.livedoor.jp/you_got_served/|language=Japanese|quote=タイトルがなんと「デカロマン」・・・・... 沖縄で撮影してきた作品だよ}} The model's first [[photobook]], ''KYO-P!!'' was released on [[June 25]], [[2007]],{{cite web |url=http://www.saibunkan.co.jp/index2.html|title=''KYO-P!!''|accessdate=2007-06-23|work=[http://www.saibunkan.co.jp www.saibunkan.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} the same day as her fourth DVD, ''Chidarake'', another work in which she appeared with two other models..{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/%E4%B9%B3%E3%81%A0%E3%82%89%E3%81%91-%E9%A2%A8%E5%AD%90-%E5%B2%A1%E7%94%B0%E7%9C%9F%E7%94%B1%E9%A6%99-%E6%BD%A4%E9%9F%B3/dp/B000RE642M/ref=sr_1_4/503-3031006-9327137?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1182726926&sr=8-4|title=乳だらけ 風子,岡田真由香,潤音|accessdate=2007-06-24|work=[[Amazon.com|Amazon]]|language=Japanese}} Fuko's next two DVDs, ''Fuko Kyo-P!!'' and ''Fuko - Pineapple'', were released in July and September respectively. In November 2007 she released her first DVD for the Layful company. Entitled ''Fuko - Eight Vol. 1'', Volume 2 in the series was released on [[December 16]], [[2007]]{{cite web |url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000WEPQ5S|title=風子EIGHTvol.2 (DVD付)|accessdate=2007-12-04|work=[[Amazon.com]]|language=Japanese}}, with Volume 3 soon after, released [[January 26]], [[2008]]. In interviews, Fuko credits her unusually large bust to her [[mother]], whom she states also has large breasts.
