{{Adult bio | name = | gender = female | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birth = {{birth date and age|df=yes|1985|8|19}}Infobox data from: {{cite web |url=http://actress.dmm.co.jp/-/detail/=/actress_id=13384/|title=亜紗美（あさみ） (Asami - Actress information)|accessdate=2009-04-08|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/top/ www.dmm.co.jp]|language=Japanese}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/info.html?aid=1126|title=Asami |accessdate=2009-04-08|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html XCity AV Idol Directory]|language=English}} | location = [[Tokyo]], Japan | birthname = | spouse = | death = | height = {{height|m=1.60}} | weight = | measurements = 86(D-65)-58-86(cm)
34-23-34(in) | shoe size = | eye color = | hair color = | skin color = | blood = A | ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] | alias = | number of films = | homepage = | iafd = | egafd = | bgafd = | imdb = 1995372 | afdb = | eurobabeindex = | spelling = US }} {{nihongo|'''Asami Miyajima'''|亜紗美|Asami}} is an award-winning Japanese model, actress and [[AV Idol]] who is more commonly known in her AV career simply as '''Asami'''. She has also used the name {{nihongo|'''Asami Sugiura'''|杉浦亜紗美|Sugiura Asami}} in her non-pornographic movies. ==Life and career== Asami was born in [[Tokyo]], Japan on September 19, 1985. At age 19, she appeared in the theatrical film {{nihongo|''Kiss Me or Kill Me''|kiss me or kill me　届かなくても愛してる|Kiss me or kill me: Todokanakutemo aishiteru}}, directed by [[Naoyuki Tomomatsu]] and released March 12, 2005 by TMC.{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0781041/|title=Kiss me or kill me: Todokanakutemo aishiteru (2005)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-20}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=321902|title=kiss me or kill me　届かなくても愛してる (2005)|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-20|language=Japanese}} She also made a gravure (non-sex) video in March 2005 titled ''Wash Me!''{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=hgv100|title=Wash me! |publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-20}} and she made her debut as an adult video (AV) actress in the April 2005 [[Kuki Inc.|Kuki]] Tank release ''In Love''.{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2005.htm|title=2005年 （平成17年）|accessdate=2009-04-08|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} She continued working for Kuki through 2005, most often with director Harry Sugino, before moving on to other studios. Asami also appeared in several [[V-Cinema]] releases and theatrical films including starring in the February 2006 film {{nihongo|''Sukeban Boy'' or ''[[Oira Sukeban]]''|おいら女蛮 スケバン|Oira sukeban}} where she played a boy with a girl's face who decides to join a girl's school.{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1080767/|title=Oira sukeban (2006) |publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-20}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=323719|title=おいら女蛮（スケバン）(2006)|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-20|language=Japanese}} One reviewer commented that she is "a woman playing a boy playing a girl. Which isn’t easy to pull off. However, she actually does a thoroughly decent job of it."{{cite web|url=http://filmjournal.net/mjocallaghan/2007/04/28/sukeban-boy-2006/|title=Sukeban Boy (2006)|publisher=[http://filmjournal.net/ filmjournal.net]|accessdate=2009-07-20|date=April 28, 2007}} In 2008 she also had a lead role playing the title heroine's sidekick Miki in [[Noboru Iguchi]]'s gore-fest {{nihongo|''[[The Machine Girl]]''|片腕マシンガール|Kataude mashin gâru}} which premiered at the [[Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival]] in March 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1050160/|title=IMDb - Kataude mashin gâru (2008)|accessdate=2008-10-14|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=330189|title=片腕マシンガール The Machine Girl|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-21|language=Japanese}} She reprised her role (billed as Asami Sugiura) in the January 2009 V-Cinema sequel {{nihongo|''[[Shyness Machine Girl]]''|hajiraiマシンガール|Hajirai mashin gāru}}.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1319567/|title=The Hajirai Machine Girl (2009) (V)|accessdate=2009-07-21|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]}}.{{cite web|url=http://www.spopro.net/machinegirl/news.htm|title=スピンオフ短編『hajiraiマシンガール』詳細|publisher=[http://www.spopro.net/machinegirl/news.htm Machine Girl News]|accessdate=2009-07-21|language=Japanese}} In between, she also had a part in [[Yūdai Yamaguchi]]'s horror film ''Tamami: The Baby's Curse'' released in August 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1188674/|title=Akanbo shôjo|accessdate=2009-09-21|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]}} For her performances in such ''[[pink film]]''s as {{nihongo|''Female Prisoner Ayaka: Tormenting and Breaking in a Bitch''|女囚アヤカ　いたぶり牝調教|Joshū Ayaka: itaburi mesu chōkyō}},{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/data/2008/080910/080919ayaka.htm|title=女囚アヤカ　いたぶり牝調教|accessdate=April 8, 2009|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P*G Website]|language=Japanese}} Miyajima won 3rd place in the "Best New Actress" category at the [[Pink Grand Prix]] for the year 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/best10/2008.htm|title=2008年度ベストテン (Best 10 of 2008)|accessdate=April 8, 2009|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P*G Website]|language=Japanese}} Asami's adult video with three other actresses, ''Three Sisters Ninja Sex'', a period costume female ninja ([[kunoichi]]) piece, was the Kasakura entry for the 2009 [[AV Grand Prix]] contest.{{cite web |url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/-/detail/=/cid=66avgp110/|title=三姉妹vs女剣士 くノ一凌辱秘奥義外伝|accessdate=2009-07-21|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ DMM]|language=Japanese}} At the end of 2008 and the beginning of 2009, Asami also acted in three other elaborate historical [[cosplay]] AVs for Cosmos Plan.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=rmd781k|title=Girl Ninja Hot and Brave Story|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-20}}{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=rmd790k|title=COSPLAY OF MAIDEN AT THE SHRINE|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-20}}{{cite {{Adult bio |image= | |name= Sora Aoi ||caption = |birth= {{birth date and age|1983|11|11}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?aoisr_00|title=蒼井 そら - Aoi Sora (Profile)|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic']|language=Japanese}} |death= |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |measurements= 90(G Cup)-58-83(cm)
35-23-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.55}} |weight= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |natural bust= |blood= B |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Sola Aoi |homepage= http://www.aoisola.net/ |iafd = |imdb = 1855682 |afdb = }} {{nihongo|'''Sora Aoi'''|蒼井そら|[[wikt:Aoi|Aoi]] [[wikt:Sora|Sora]]}} (also known as '''Sola Aoi''') is a [[Japanese person|Japanese]] [[AV idol]], nude model, and media personality who is best known for her large breasts.{{cite web |last=Nemoto|first=Yū|url=http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/report/report3380.html|title ={{nihongo2|ピンク映画初出演で、第17回・2004年度ピンク大賞新人賞受賞の蒼井そら直撃インタビュー}} (Interview with Sora Aoi on her pink film debut, at the 17th Pink Grand Prix Awards)|date=2005-05-16|accessdate=January 22, 2009|publisher=[http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/ www.walkerplus.com]|language=Japanese|quote=蒼井そらさんは、155cmと小柄な体にGカップのバストで大人気のアイドル ("Miss Sora Aoi, a petite, 155cm tall idol popular for her G-Cup bust"}} One of the top, award-winning actresses in the AV field of her time, she attained mainstream media recognition. ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Sora Aoi was born November 11, 1983 in [[Tokyo]]. As a student she worked at various part-time jobs in the food-service industry, such as pizza parlours, pubs and sushi bars.{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/195/aoisola.html|title=蒼井そらの部屋へようこそ - Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=www.b-v.co.jp|language=Japanese|quote=いろいろやってましたよ。居酒屋さんとか、すし屋さんとかピザ屋さんとか……。}} While in her third year in high school, Aoi was scouted in [[Shibuya, Tokyo|Shibuya]] by a talent agency for [[Gravure idol|gravure]] modelling.{{cite web |url=http://www.b-v.co.jp/back-number/195/aoisola.html|title=蒼井そらの部屋へようこそ - Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=www.b-v.co.jp|language=Japanese|quote=渋谷で友だちと待ち合わせしていたときにスカウトされたんです... 高校３年生でした。}} When asked how her stage name was chosen, Aoi explained, "My agency asked what color I liked. I said blue ("ao" in Japanese). He also asked what I like in general. I said sky ("Sora" in Japanese). So, he chose Sora Aoi (means "Blue Sky" in Japanese)."{{cite web |url=http://www.jsexnetwork.com/interviews/Sora_Aoi/|title=Sora Aoi Interview|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=www.jsexnetwork.com}} Aoi made her debut as a nude model in November 2001. Her "big eyes[,] cute smile,"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XV095|title=''Samantha: Sora Aoi''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} "young girl's face and... large breasts"{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2292|title=''Sister's Secret: Sora Aoi''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} quickly made her a popular magazine model.{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/grandprix2003/aoi/main.html|title=Grand Prix 2003 Sora Aoi|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp}} Her bust was at first reported as a metric F-cup, but had become a G-cup within a year of her acting debut. Aoi made two adult movies, ''Summer Break'' and ''Twinkle Twinkle'' which were supposedly aired on a subscription porn TV service, although details have not been confirmed yet.{{fact|date=May 2007}} She then signed with the [[Kuki Inc.]] group, one of Japan's largest producers of pornography at the time,{{cite web |url=http://www.avn.com/index.cfm?objectID=ED9EE0D6-1372-4B41-C47D18660792FF49&slid=312746|title=Cross-Cultural Porn Digressions With Kuki Group's Tadasu Isogawa|date=January 1, 2004|accessdate=2008-01-10|last=Ochs|first=Stephen|publisher=[[AVN (magazine)|AVN]]}} which includes the Samantha and [[Alice Japan]] companies. ===Documentary-influenced AVs=== Critics have often pointed out the documentary format employed in many Japanese adult videos,{{cite web |url=http://www.midnighteye.com/reviews/round-up_005.shtml|title=''Every Japanese Woman Makes Her Own Curry'' (review)|accessdate=2007-05-01|last=Sharp|first=Jasper|publisher=[http://www.midnighteye.com Midnight Eye]|quote=Matsue has said that his twin interests in movies are documentary and hardcore Adult Video. The similarities between the two genres - the recording of real, non-simulated action with the rawness of the production a testament to its vérité nature - have been picked up on by critics numerous times before.}} Aoi's second AV, her first for the MAX- A company's Samantha label, follows this format, pursuing the common theme of the actress' sexual initiation taking place on tape. By witnessing the actress' sexual awakening as it is occurring, the on-screen sexual activity is given added meaning to the video audience.{{cite web |url=http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|title=A Star is Porn|accessdate=2007-05-01|last=Fornander|first=Kjell|year=1992|month=July|publisher=[http://www.tokyo.to/ Tokyo Journal]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20060516235928/http://www2.gol.com/users/coynerhm/pornborn.html|archivedate=2006-05-16|quote=The first appearance for an AV girl is as a so-called "new face." At this stage, says [Yusei] Maeda [AV manager], inexperience and innocence are her most important attributes. Viewers are invited to follow, from appearance to appearance, her sexual initiation, dawning self-awareness and gradual acceptance of her inner, dark depths.}} This video, ''The Blue Sky: Sora Aoi'', makes use of the sexual awakening theme by purportedly showing Aoi using a sex toy for the first time in her life.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2268|title=''The Blue Sky: Sora Aoi''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Facial'', released in August 2002, employed hand-held camera techniques to get a "realistic and wild" effect.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2278|title=''facial　 Sora Aoi''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The story has Aoi having sexual encounters in a hotel hot spring. xcity.jp's reviewer commented at the time that Aoi was "getting wilder and wilder in each video."{{cite web |last=Willis|first=Brief|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/MAX_A/021225/XS2278.html|title=''facial　 Sora Aoi'' (AV review)|date=[[December 25]], [[2002]]|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} Another of Aoi's videos in the documentary format is the August 2003 entry in the ''Bubbly Heaven'' series. This video series has popular AV actresses learning [[soapland]] techniques from professionals, and then demonstrating their new skills for the video audience.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV268|title=''Bubbly Heaven: Sora Aoi''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Fictional AVs=== Though the mock-documentary format is popular in Japanese adult videos, purely fictional films in various genres also remain popular. ''50/50'' (December 2002) tells the story of a woman who works at a restaurant and a cabaret club in order to earn rent money for the apartment in which she and her boyfriend live.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=DV204|title=''50/50''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The story gave Aoi a chance to wear a French maid costume, and to engage in sex with three different actors. xcity.jp reviewer "Bug" comments that the film is given a "sweet" quality by Aoi's frequent kissing of the actors during these scenes.{{cite web |last=Bug|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/ALICE/030122/KA2101.html|title=''50 /50'' (AV review)|date=January 22, 2003|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} ''Sola-Graph'', released in January 2003, was Aoi's fourth appearance for the Samantha label.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2283|title=''SOLA-GRAPH''|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The video has Aoi engaging in sex with several prominent AV actors. Vegetables and fruit are involved in some of the encounters.{{cite web |last=Bug|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/MAX_A/030219/XS2283.html|title=''SOLA-GRAPH'' (AV review)|date=February 19, 2003|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} Aoi's last partner in the video is [[Taka Kato]], a legend in the Japanese AV world, whose ability to make women ejaculate through his manual dexterity has earned him the nickname, "Goldfinger".{{cite news |first=Ryann|last=Connell|title=Japan's biggest male porno star finds his career going flaccid|url=http://mdn.mainichi.jp/culture/waiwai/archive/news/2007/05/20070528p2g00m0dm007000c.html|publisher=[[Mainichi Shimbun]]|date=May 28, 2007|accessdate=2007-07-19}} Typically for Kato, female ejaculation is featured in the final scene. In February 2003's ''Wet and Tender'', Aoi plays the role of a prostitute pursued by both her boyfriend and a stalker until she is rescued by one of her regular customers, whom she then rewards with free sex.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2109|title=''Wet and Tender''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}}{{cite web |last=Fukutome|first=Daisuke|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/ALICE/030312/KA2109.html|title=''Wet and Tender'' (AV review)|date=March 12, 2003|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} The April 2003 release, ''Sexy Fruit'', had Aoi as an aspiring celebrity who gives sexual favors for singing and acting lessons.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2115|title=''Sexy Fruit''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ''Little Sister's Secret'' of May 2003 made use of a story in the incest genre. The sex scenes include ''[[paizuri]]'' with her boyfriend, face-sitting for her school teacher, and a sexual encounter with her brother-in-law. Aoi acted out a variety of emotions as demanded by her role in this drama, which the Kuki Group calls her best video.{{cite web |last=Fukutome|first=Daisuke|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/ALICE/030702/KA2122.html|title=''Sister's Secret'' (AV review)|date=June 11, 2003|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} ''Sexy Butt'' of the following month had Aoi in love with a TV stuntman.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2122|title=''Sexy Butt''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} She fantasizes being manually satisfied by this actor, and has sexual encounters with a [[screenwriter]], and a man who owes a large debt. Despite the video's title, Aoi's posterior region was not given much emphasis in this video.{{cite web |last=Yusaku|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/ALICE/030702/KA2122.html|title=''Sexy Butt'' (AV review)|date=July 2, 2003|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} ===Other genres=== In contrast to these urban-drama stories, some of Aoi's videos are in a more adventurous porno-science-fiction genre. Her October 2002 release for [[Alice Japan]], ''Cosmic Girl'', was an "erotic comedy" in which she played a super-heroine battling, and having sex with, aliens from the Vibe-star.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=KA2094|title=''Cosmic Girl''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} The video included costume-play, with ''[[yukata]]'', and singing.{{cite web |last=Bug|url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/review/ALICE/021120/KA2094.html|title=''cosmic girl'' (AV review)|date=November 20, 2002|accessdate=2007-07-19|publisher=[http://xxx.xcity.jp/ xxx.xcity.jp]}} Her July 2003 video, ''Splash'', has Aoi living in the near future, at which time humanity is enslaved by the "Ocean Species". Inter-species sexual encounters follow.{{cite web |url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=XS2298|title=''Splash''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/index.html AV Idol Directory]}} ===Popularity and mainstream recognition=== For her work in adult videos during her first year, Aoi won the "Best Breasts Award" at the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#2003 X City Grand Prix Awards|AV Grand Prix]] awards ceremony of 2003. The same year, Aoi starred in the theatrically released ''[[pink film]]'' ''High School Teacher'' ([[2003 in film|2003]]). In this film she played two roles, the title character, and a girl who had committed suicide the year before the high school teacher arrived.{{cite web |url=http://xxx.xcity.jp/city_org/grandprix2003/aoi/movie.html|title=''High School Teacher''|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=xxx.xcity.jp}} For her role in another ''pink film'', {{nihongo|''[[Tsumugi]]''|制服美少女　先生あたしを抱いて|Seifuku bishōjo: Sensei atashi wo daite}}, Aoi was given a Best Actress Award at the 2004 [[Pink Grand Prix]] ceremony.{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/best10/2004.htm|title={{nihongo|Best Ten of 2004|２００４年度ベストテン}}|accessdate=January 21, 2009|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P*G Website]|language=Japanese}} The film was ranked the fourth best ''pink film'' release of the year.{{cite web |last=Toda|first=Miho|url=http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/report/report3435.html|title={{nihongo|"Pink Prize": What Should Be Called the Academy Awards of the Pink Film World: Sora Aoi, Yumika Hayashi Among Those Present, Close Coverage of this Yearly Festival|ピンク映画界のアカデミー賞というべき“ピンク大賞”蒼井そら、林由美香らが来場する、年に一度の祭典に密着！|Pinku eigakai no akademii shou to iubeki "Pinku taishou" Aoi Sora, Hayashi Yumikaraga raijousuru, toshi ni ichido no saiten ni mitchaku}}|date=2005-05-06|accessdate=January 21, 2009|publisher=[http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/ www.walkerplus.com]|language=Japanese}} While continuing to perform in hardcore AVs, Aoi appeared in the first video release of the Shuffle company's new label Believe. Entitled ''The Naked Body'', this June 2003 release was an "image video," which has nude modeling but no sex. ''Naked / Sora Aoi #2'' was Aoi's second "image video" for this company. This February 2004 release had Aoi modeling in [[Guam]]. By this time Aoi had become one of the most popular AV idols in Japan. Her name was the second-most popular [[Internet]] search on a female celebrity in Japan for 2005,{{cite web |url=http://www.japan-zone.com/news/archives/2006_12.shtml|title=Beauty and the Beast|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=www.japan-zone.com}}; [http://web.archive.org/web/20070323001503/http://www.japan-zone.com/news/archives/2006_12.shtml archive] and she was the most-searched AV idol.{{cite web |url=http://avstars.jsexnetwork.com/AV_Listing/english/_S/Sora_Aoi/|title=Sora Aoi (Aoi Sola)|accessdate=2007-05-01|publisher=avstars.jsexnetwork.com}} Aoi's popularity enabled her to enter mainstream entertainment, including television and radio, and singing on some [[punk rock]] albums.{{fact|date=May 2007}} Her popularity even extended to [[South Korea]], where the Korean hip-hop group, [[Epik High]] used one of her nude pictures to promote their concerts during their underground days. They were caught by the police, and publicly apologized to her years after.[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XOSgrH2WTuo] 3'20" Aoi continued to work for [[Alice Japan]] and Max-A's Samantha label until November 2004, when she moved to the newly formed studio, [[S1 No. 1 Style]], part of the large [[Hokuto Corporation]]. Her first video for S1, ''Sell Debut'', directed by [[Hideto Aki]], was released November 11, 2004. She has remained at S1, but has appeared in only six or fewer original videos per year since the beginning of 2006. One of her S1 videos, ''Hyper Risky Mosaic - Special Bath House Tsubaki'' (ハイパーギリギリモザイク 特殊浴場 TSUBAKI 貸切入浴料1億円), with 11 other S1 actresses won the First Place Award at the 2007 [[AV Open]] contest.{{cite web|url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/mono/dvd/avopen/avopen02_result.html|title=2nd AV Open Results|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ www.dmm.co.jp]|accessdate=2008-10-02|language=Japanese}} {{cite web|url=http://www.superjav.com/blog/?p=95|title=JAV News - Are There Japanese Adult Video Awards Like AVN Awards in USA?|publisher=[http://www.superjav.com/ JAV News]|date=August 26, 2008|accessdate=2008-10-01}} ===Current life=== By 2006, Aoi was appearing regularly on television, including often appearing on variety shows and acting in several dramas including the popular 2007 [[J-dorama]] detective show ''Galileo'' (ガリレオ){{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1207.htm|title=Galileo [ガリレオ]|accessdate=2009-01-23|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ www.jdorama.com]}}. and the 2006 midnight-drama ''Shimokita GLORY DAYS'' (下北GLORY DAYS) along with fellow S1 actresses [[Yuma Asami]] and [[Honoka]] where she plays the character "Nozomi Ichimonji" in the [[manga]] based series about a [[Rōnin (student)|ronin]] student moving to Tokyo and sharing a house with several beautiful women.{{cite web |url=http://www.jdorama.com/drama.1150.htm|title=Shimokita GLORY DAYS [下北GLORY DAYS]|accessdate=2008-01-23|publisher=[http://www.jdorama.com/ www.jdorama.com]}}. She also had a part (non-nude) in a mainstream [[Cinema of Thailand|Thai]]-[[teen]] [[movie]], ''[[Hormones (2008 film)|Hormones]]'' (Pid Term Yai, Hua Jai Waa Wun), released in March 2008. She plays a Japanese tourist who brings one character to the brink of infidelity to his girlfriend. Director [[Songyos Sugmakanan]] was criticized for using an AV star in a movie aimed at teens and Aoi was originally not included in promotional materials for the film. Sugmakanan defended his choice of Aoi as "the average Thai man's dream" and described Aoi as "terrific" and "very professional". ''Hormones'' won the Jury's Special Prize at the fourth Asian Marine Film Festival in Japan which journalist Wise Kwai ascribed to Aoi's presence.{{cite web|url=http://thaifilmjournal.blogspot.com/2008/09/with-help-from-sora-aoi-hormones-wins.html|title=With help from Sora Aoi, Hormones wins jury prize at Japan's Asian Marine Film Festival |publisher=[http://thaifilmjournal.blogspot.com/ thaifilmjournal.blogspot.com]|accessdate=2009-01-13|date=September 12, 2008}} Aoi made her debut in another Asian entertainment market when she appeared in a Korean TV drama ''Korean Classroom'' in May 2009. The four part series follows three Japanese girls traveling to Korea and co-stars fellow AV Idols Mihiro and [[Tina Yuzuki|Rio (Tina Yuzuki)]]. Aoi was subsequently scheduled to appear on several Korean variety shows while in Korea to promote the series.{{cite web|url=http://www.allkpop.com/index.php/full_story/aoi_sora_and_mihiro_promote_korean_classroom/|title=Aoi Sora and Mihiro promote Korean Classroom|publisher=[http://www.allkpop.com/ AllKPop]|accessdate=2009-07-16}} According to a December, 2006 issue of ''Friday'' magazine, Aoi was having a love affair with renowned ''[[owarai]]'' (comedic) artist [[Jiro Hachimitsu]]. Aoi and Hachimitsu were reportedly living together at the time. Their relationship ended in January 2009 as reported in their blogs according to Tokyograph News.{{cite web|url=http://www.tokyograph.com/news/id-4299|title=Sora Aoi breaks up with comedian|publisher=[http://www.tokyograph.com/ Tokyograph News]|accessdate=2009-01-23|date=January 16, 2009}} ==Filmography== ===Adult videos=== {| class="wikitable" ! 35F-23-34(US) |height = {{height|m=1.62}} |weight = {{convert|48|kg|lb st|abbr=on}} |blood = A |eye color = Brown |hair color = Black |natural bust = Yes |ethnicity = [[Japanese people|Japanese]] and [[French Canadian|French-Canadian]] |alias = Miyabi |School = Christian Academy in Japan (Tokyo) |homepage = http://blog.livedoor.jp/ozawa_maria/ |iafd = }} {{nihongo|'''Maria Ozawa'''|小澤マリア|Ozawa Maria}}, who used the name {{nihongo|'''Miyabi'''|みやび}} early in her career, is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[adult video]] (AV) actress known in Japan as an [[AV idol]]. ==Life and career== Ozawa was born in [[Hokkaido]], [[Japan]] on January 8, 1986. Her mother is [[Japanese people|Japanese]] and her father is [[French-Canadian]]{{cite web |url=http://www.actionjav.com/model.cfm?actress_filename=maria_ozawa|title=''Maria Ozawa''|accessdate=2007-07-23|publisher=[http://www.actionjav.com/ www.actionjav.com]|language=English}}. Since she attended an international school from Primary School to High School, she claims that her English reading and writing ability is better than her Japanese.{{cite web |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20080204222553/http://www.sweatpig.com/maria-ozawa-debut-interview/|archivedate=2008-02-04|url=http://www.sweatpig.com/maria-ozawa-debut-interview/|title=''Welcome to Maria Ozawa's Room'' Video Idol Interview|accessdate=2008-01-23|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ Sweat Pig: Japanese Adult Video News]|language=English}} While at school, she played hockey every day, and often went to [[karaoke]] after class. {{cite web|last=Sweat Pig|title=18 Interesting Facts about Maria Ozawa (小澤マリア)|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ Sweat Pig: Japanese Adult Video News]|date=[[July 27]], [[2007]]|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20080205083527/http://www.sweatpig.com/maria-ozawa-facts/|archivedate=2008-02-05|url= http://www.sweatpig.com/maria-ozawa-facts/|accessdate=2009-05-08}} Ozawa had her first sexual experience at the age of 13, and learned the "48 sexual positions" through a book that she bought herself. In 2002, while still in high school, Ozawa appeared in a short (30 second) Japanese TV commercial for DARS Chocolate with the two members of the Japanese pop group [[KinKi Kids]]. The commercial has her sharing chocolate with one of the duo while secretly holding hands with the other.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-with-kinki-kids-in-dars-chocolate-ad-2002/|title=Maria Ozawa with Kinki Kids in DARS chocolate ad 2002|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=December|year=2007|language=English}} ===AV debut and S1=== She first encountered AVs ([[adult videos]]) by watching several tapes that belonged to a friend's brother. Unlike most AV actresses, Ozawa was not scouted. Instead, she was introduced to the AV industry through a friend that was working in AVs. Ozawa was interested in the industry, and researched companies until she found B-open, a model agent which she liked. She applied for an interview with the company and was accepted. She started modeling as Miyabi for the pornographic site Shirouto-Teien.com in [[June 2005]], which resulted in several sets of photographs and a short hardcore [[Gonzo pornography|gonzo]] video released in CD-R and DVD-R formats.{{cite web |url=http://www.shirouto-teien.com/shopping/cd/main/contents/073_miyabi/index.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20061123093743/http://www.shirouto-teien.com/shopping/cd/main/contents/073_miyabi/index.html|title={{nihongo2|みやび}} (Miyabi profile)|accessdate=2008-03-30|archivedate=2006-11-23|publisher=[http://www.shirouto-teien.com/ shirouto-teien.com]|language=Japanese}} She was then signed by [[S1 No. 1 Style]], an AV studio that produces light hardcore pornography, premiering for them as Maria Ozawa on October 7, 2005 with the video ''New Face – Number One Style'' (新人xギリモザ ナンバーワンスタイル) directed by [[Hideto Aki]].{{cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_2005.htm|title=2005|accessdate=2007-07-21|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} Ozawa remembers that she was so nervous during the filming of her first AV that she could not look the male actor in the face. At S1, Ozawa subsequently appeared in one original video per month until February 2007. She was involved in several S1 compilation videos including the company’s entry in the 2006 [[AV Open]], a competition between Japanese porn studios for the best selling video. The S1 video ''Hyper – Barely There Mosaic'' (ハイパーギリギリモザイク), featuring Maria Ozawa along with other AV idols [[Sora Aoi]], [[Yua Aida]], [[Yuma Asami]], and [[Honoka]] (plus a short preview for [[Rin Aoki]]), won first place.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/japans-av-open-contest-2008/|title=Japan’s AV Open contest 2008|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=June|year=2008|language=English}} The original source http://www.av-open.com/ranking/index.html is closed. ===DAS and other studios=== Maria Ozawa and S1 parted ways in early 2007.{{cite web |url=http://s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=15187/|title={{nihongo2|小澤マリア}} (S1 profile and filmography)|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=[http://s1s1s1.com/ s1s1s1.com]|language=Japanese}} Along with Rin Suzuka, Reina Matsushima and [[Rin Aoki]], she moved from the safe, but popular S1 to a new startup company, Dasdas (DAS).{{cite web |url=http://www.dasdas.jp/actress/-/detail/=/id=15187|title={{nihongo2|小澤マリア}} (Dasdas profile and filmography)|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=[http://www.dasdas.jp/ www.dasdas.jp]|language=Japanese}} On April 25, 2007, Dasdas released the first videos of the company, one of which (''Beautiful Eurasian News Anchor Maria Ozawa Desiring Nakadashi Rape'') featured Maria Ozawa. Dasdas videos contain scenes of [[rape pornography|rape]], [[creampie (sexual act)|creampie]], [[urolagnia]], [[enema]] and [[BDSM|physical torture]], themes not featured in the light hardcore style of her S1 videos. Her first "[[Ethnicity of performers in pornography#Interracial pornography|interracial]]" title ''Multiple Black Rape'' (黒人輪姦) was released from Dasdas in [[May 2008]]. By the end of 2007, she signed (not exclusively) with [[Attackers]] (アタッカーズ), an established AV studio that specializes in thematic rape pornography.{{cite web |url=http://www.attackers.net/actress/-/detail/=/id=15187/|title={{nihongo2|小澤マリア}} (Attackers profile and filmography)|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=[http://www.attackers.net/ www.attackers.net]|language=Japanese}} In June 2008 she changed studios once again, going to the small start-up studio Ran-maru{{cite web |url=http://www.sweatpig.com/author/admin/|title=Sweatpig: Ranmaru July Releases|accessdate=2008-06-22|publisher=[http://www.sweatpig.com/ www.sweatpig.com/]|language=English}}{{dead link|date=May 2009}} {{cite web |url=http://www.ran-maru.com/actress/ozawa_maria/bottom.html|title={{nihongo2|女優紹介: 小澤マリア (OZAWA MARIA)}} (Ran Maru actress profile and filmography)|accessdate=2008-06-22|publisher=[http://www.ran-maru.com/ www.ran-maru.com]|language=Japanese}} which released her first video with them on July 19, 2008. Ran-maru, along with Ozawa's previous studios, S1, Dasdas and [[Attackers]], are all part of Japan's largest group of AV companies, the [[Hokuto Corporation]]. The latter part of 2008 has seen Ozawa in a variety of videos from different producers including her first exclusively [[lesbian pornography|lesbian]] (''Rezu'' - レズ) video (''W Cast Premium Lesbian'') for LADYxLADY, a division of the Japanese porn conglomerate [[Soft On Demand]] (SOD). In a more drastic career move, Ozawa decided to appear in her first "uncensored" movies which do not have the mosaic pixelation which is used to obscure the genitals in all standard Japanese porn videos. Four uncensored 45-minute videos of Ozawa and a single male actor were released online at XVN in September 2008.{{cite web |url=http://monthly.xvn.jp/ja/x1/maria_ozawa.html|title=XVN：X-1 小澤マリア 初無修正の超S級AV女優が毎月登場！(XVN: X-1 AV Idol Maria Ozawa First Uncensored Videos)|accessdate=2008-10-04|publisher=[http://monthly.xvn.jp/ monthly.xvn.jp]|language=Japanese}} (The XVN website was closed on December 15, 2008. See http://www.xvn.com/index_en.html) The material from the first two videos was edited for a 90 minute DVD (''Tora-Tora Platinum Vol.49 Maria Ozawa'') released September 26, 2008,{{cite web |url=http://dvd.xvn.jp/ja/detail/d20066|title=Tora-Tora Platinum Vol.49 小澤マリア|accessdate=2008-10-04|publisher=[http://dvd.xvn.jp/ dvd.xvn.jp]|language=Japanese}} and the second two videos were combined as ''Tora-Tora Platinum Vol. 52 Maria Ozawa'' (December 31, 2008).{{cite web |url=http://www.aventertainments.com/product_lists.aspx?product_id=26889&languageID=1&dept_id=0|title=Tora Tora Platinum Vol.52 : Maria Ozawa|accessdate=2009-01-12|publisher=[http://www.aventertainments.com/ www.aventertainments.com]}} For the 2009 [[AV GrandPrix]] three studios (DAS, [[Moodyz]], and M's Video Group) all selected videos starring Ozawa as their entries in the contest. The DAS compilation ''The Queen of DAS'' won the Best Violence Video Award and the M's Video Group entry ''Oral Venus'' took one of the Special Awards in the Featured Actress Video category.{{cite web|url=http://www.av-gp.com/news/avgp_result/bottom.html|title=AVGP 2009 Result announcement|publisher=[http://www.av-gp.com/ www.av-gp.com]|accessdate=2009-03-02|language=Japanese}} In January 2009, Ozawa returned to DAS to film ''Shemale Orgy Gangbang Rape'' (集団ニューハーフ輪姦乱交レイプ小澤マリア) with three transsexual actresses and in March 2009 made her debut in the Japanese porn genre of [[tentacle rape]] with ''Monster Swallowing Ecstasy Maria Ozawa'' (触獣丸呑みアクメ 小澤マリア) for [[Soft On Demand|SOD]]. ===Other activities=== Besides adult videos, she has appeared in [[V-Cinema]] films, a [[photobook]] and several glamour ("[[gravure idol|gravure]]") videos. In 2007, she played the character Anita (ｱﾆｰﾀ) on the popular Japanese TV drama [[Tokumei Kakarichō Tadano Hitoshi]] (特命係長・只野仁) on [[TV Asahi]].{{cite web |url=http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/tadanohitoshi/i/04cast/018.html |title=Cast ｱﾆｰﾀ/小澤ﾏﾘｱ (Anita / Maria Ozawa)|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp www.tv-asahi.co.jp|language=Japanese}} In addition, Ozawa was on a 2007 episode of the Japanese variety show ''Megami no hatena'' ("The Goddess of What Is That") on [[Nippon Television|Nihon TV]] as part of a series with AV actresses telling why they went into AV work.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1262995/|title=IMDB - "Megami no hatena" (2007)|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ www.imdb.com]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://search.japantimes.co.jp/cgi-bin/fd20070401cs.html|title=Comedy interview variety show|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://search.japantimes.co.jp The Japan Times Online]|month=April|year=2007|language=English}} She has also appeared on Japanese [[MTV Japan|MTV]] with the [[hip hop]] artist [[SEAMO]], who is also a fan, and in the 2007 [[music video]] ''Summer Time in the D.S.C.'' with the [[Yokohama]] [[Japanese hip hop|hip hop]] group ''DS455''.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-%e5%b0%8f%e6%be%a4-%e3%83%9e%e3%83%aa%e3%82%a2-in-japanese-ds455-hip-hip-video/|title=Maria Ozawa 小澤 マリア in Japanese DS455 hip hip video|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=April|year=2007|language=English}} Ozawa could be seen in 2007 performing twice at the [[Shinjuku]] striptease bar "Shinjuku New Art". She took dance lessons to prepare but was still very nervous. She danced in a variety of outfits including appearing as a belly-dancer, a [[geisha]] and a cowgirl. Three videos were released of her performance and a behind-the-scenes interview.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-dances-at-japanese-strip-club/|title=Maria Ozawa dances at Japanese strip club|accessdate=2008-09-30|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=June|year=2008|language=English}} Has links to sample videos on AmebaVision She followed up on her Shinjuku experience by starring in a cabaret show in [[Macao]]. The show, called "Tokyo Nights", ran at the Rockza night club in the Grand Lisboa Hotel from August 16 to September 6, 2008 and featured Ozawa and several other Japanese performers. The shows received mixed reviews. Promotional materials show her with a (temporary) tattoo.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-does-stint-as-a-macau-showgirl/|title=Maria Ozawa does stint as a Macau Showgirl|accessdate=2009-01-29|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|date=December 5, 2008}} In 2008, Ozawa acted in her first mainstream movie, ''Invitation Only'', billed as "Taiwan's First-Ever Slasher Horror".See official site {{cite web |url=http://www.invitation-movie.com/|title=Invitation Only|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://www.invitation-movie.com www.invitation-movie.com]|language=English}} The film is produced by Three Dots Entertainment in [[Taipei]], [[Republic of China|Taiwan]] and co-stars Julianne Chu. Ozawa plays a supermodel and has dialog in English and Japanese. Her professionalism impressed her co-workers and her role was expanded to include further scenes. The film was released in Taiwan in August 2008.{{cite web |url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1229821/|title=IMDB - Invitation Only (2008)|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ www.imdb.com]|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-stars-in-taiwan-slasher-film-invitation-only/|title=Maria Ozawa stars in Taiwan slasher film Invitation Only|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|month=April|year=2008|language=English}}{{cite web |url=http://jasongray.blogspot.com/2008/03/invitation-only-japanese-adult-star.html|title=Invitation Only: Japanese Adult Star Maria Ozawa Grows Up|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://jasongray.blogspot.com Weblog of Jason Gray - Tokyo]|month=March|year=2008|language=English}} Ozawa, who is very popular in Taiwan, also did a photoshoot for the Taiwan version of [[FHM]] magazine in May 2009.{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-fhm-taiwan-video-photoshoot/|title=Maria Ozawa FHM Taiwan video photoshoot|accessdate=2009-06-05|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|date=May 18, 2009}} ===Personal life=== Her hobbies include cooking and watching AVs on her flatscreen television set. She also enjoys playing video games, and owns a pink [[Nintendo DS Lite]],{{cite web|url=http://www.gameops.net/2007/04/maria-ozawa-plays-nintendo-ds.html|last=Jepoy|title=Maria Ozawa Plays Nintendo DS|publisher=[http://www.gameops.net/ GameOPS]|date=April 29, [[2007]]||accessdate=2008-09-30}} and a pink [[PlayStation 2]] console.{{cite web|url=http://www.gameops.net/2007/06/maria-ozawa-owns-pink-playstation-2.html|last=Jepoy|title=Maria Ozawa Owns a Pink PlayStation 2|publisher=[http://www.gameops.net/ GameOPS]|date=June 19, 2007|accessdate=2008-09-30}} Ozawa has been fairly open about her private life granting several interviews and keeping a very detailed text and picture blog of her life and activities dating back to October 2005.{{cite web| url=http://blog.dmm.co.jp/actress/ozawa_maria/| title={{nihongo2|小澤マリア 公式ブログ}} (Maria Ozawa Official Blog)|accessdate=2008-09-12|publisher=[http://blog.dmm.co.jp/ blog.dmm.co.jp/]|language=Japanese with occasional English}} During a 2007 interview, Ozawa reported that her interest in the AV industry remains high, and her video cabinet contains nothing but AVs. She makes a good living from the industry, living in a ''mansion'' (a high-class apartment) with a [[US$]]1,682-per-month rent, and earning a minimum of $8,000 per month. However, while she says that she would quit the industry only if she is forced to do something else, she would try to prevent a friend from beginning work in the AV industry. Ozawa's family and friends are against her chosen profession in spite of her apparent pride in her work. When she brought several of her videos home to show her parents, they refused to watch them and told her to get out. In mid-2008, it was reported in the Japanese tabloid newspapers ''[[Bungeishunjū|Shūkan Bunshun]]'' and ''[[Tokyo Sports]]'' that Ozawa was dating [[J-pop]] star [[Koki Tanaka]] from the group KAT-TUN. According to the reports, Ozawa neither confirmed or denied the rumours, saying only "If I’m dating someone I will stay devoted to him! I have a rule against sex friends. It’s not a good thing, plus having one boyfriend is enough".{{cite web |url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/maria-ozawa-dating-koki-tanaka/|title=Maria Ozawa dating Koki Tanaka?|accessdate=2009-03-26|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ JapanSugoi]|date=February 27, 2009}} ==Filmography== See [[Maria Ozawa filmography]] == Photobooks == *小澤マリア1st.写真集 X・Star（Maria Ozawa's {{Female adult bio |photo= |name = Rinako Hirasawa ||birth= {{birth date and age|1983|05|18}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url=http://pinkeiga.com/HTML/Actresses/rinako_hirasawa.html|title=Rinako Hirasawa|accessdate=2009-07-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://pinkeiga.com/ pinkeiga.com]}} ''and'' {{cite web |url=http://actress.dmm.co.jp/-/detail/=/actress_id=8597/|title=平沢里菜子（ひらさわりなこ）|accessdate=2009-07-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/top/ www.dmm.co.jp]}} |location= [[Miyagi Prefecture]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 80-58-82(cm)
32-23-32(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.56}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= |hair color= |skin color= |natural bust= |blood= A |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= |films= |homepage= http://d.hatena.ne.jp/rinarinako/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Rinako Hirasawa'''|平沢里菜子|''Hirasawa Rinako''}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[AV idol]] and ''[[pink film]]'' actress. She has appeared in award-winning ''pink films'', and was herself given a "Best Actress" award for her work in this genre in 2007.{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/best10/2007.htm|title=Best Ten of 2007 (２００７年度ベストテン)|accessdate=January 18, 2009|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P*G Website]|language=Japanese}} == Life and career == Hirasawa had a part-time job at the video arcade in Tokyo's Ōkura Theater, a long-running venue for ''pink film''s, and became curious about the genre through the posters.{{cite web |date=2006-12-06||url=http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/report/report4582.html|title= 女優・平沢里菜子インタビュー (Interview with Actress Rinako Hirasawa)|accessdate=2009-07-02|publisher=[http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/ www.walkerplus.com]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web |url=http://www.cinema-st.com/adalut/d003.html|title=野オークラ劇場 |accessdate=July 4, 2009|publisher=[http://www.cinema-st.com/ www.cinema-st.com]|language=Japanese}} She entered the entertainment field in 2003 through [[Japanese_pornography#Video|AV]]s, in which she specialized in the S&M genre.{{cite web |url=http://pinkeiga.com/HTML/Actresses/rinako_hirasawa.html|title=Rinako Hirasawa|accessdate=2009-07-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://pinkeiga.com/ pinkeiga.com]}} After she had appeared in over 40 AVs, Hirasawa made her ''[[pink film]]'' debut in director [[Shinji Imaoka]]'s ''[[Frog Song]]'' (2005). The film was named the Best Film of the year, and Hirasawa was given the Best Actress award, second place, at the [[Pink Grand Prix]].{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/best10/2005.htm|title=Best Ten of 2005 (２００５年度ベストテン)|accessdate=January 18, 2009|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P*G Website]|language=Japanese}} Director [[Osamu Sato]]'s 2007 film ''[[New Tokyo Decadence - The Slave]]'' was reportedly based on Hirasawa's own experiences. The film was named 9th best ''pink'' release of the year, and Hirasawa won the Best Actress award for her performance. ==Bibliography== ===English=== * {{Amg name |533669 |Rinako Hirasawa}} * {{imdb name|id=2424801|name=Rinako Hirasawa}} * {{cite web |url=http://pinkeiga.com/HTML/Actresses/rinako_hirasawa.html|title=Rinako Hirasawa|accessdate=2009-07-02|publisher=[http://pinkeiga.com/ pinkeiga.com]}} * {{cite book |last=Sharp|first=Jasper|title=Behind the Pink Curtain: The Complete History of Japanese Sex Cinema|pages= 175, 326, 339, 345, etc.|year=2008|publisher=FAB Press|location=Guildford|isbn=978-1-903254-54-7}} ===Japanese=== * {{cite web |url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_p.php?num_p=765723|title=平沢里菜子 ひらさわ・りなこ|accessdate=2009-07-02|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ www.allcinema.net]|language=Japanese}} * {{cite web |url=http://actress.dmm.co.jp/-/detail/=/actress_id=8597/|title=平沢里菜子（ひらさわりなこ）|accessdate=2009-07-02|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/top/ www.dmm.co.jp]}} * {{cite web |date=2006-12-06||url=http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/report/report4582.html|title= 女優・平沢里菜子インタビュー (Interview with Actress Rinako Hirasawa)|accessdate=2009-07-02|publisher=[http://www.walkerplus.com/movie/ www.walkerplus.com]|language=Japanese}} ==External links== * [http://blog.dmm.co.jp/actress/hirasawa_rinako/ Hirasawa's blog at DMM] ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{start box}} {{s-ach}} |- ! colspan="3" style="background: #DAA520;" | [[Pink Grand Prix]] |- {{succession box |title=[[Pink Grand Prix|Pink Grand Prix for Best Actress]]

{{Female adult bio |photo= |name = Mihiro ||birth= {{birth date and age|1982|5|19}}Infobox data from [http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?mhr___01 I-Dic] |location= [[Niigata Prefecture]] , [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 82-59-84(cm)
32-23-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.53}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Brown |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= A - |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Mihiro Taniguchi |films= |homepage= http://www.mihiro.tv/ |iafd= |imdb= |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Mihiro'''|みひろ|Mihiro}}, also known as {{nihongo|'''Mihiro Taniguchi'''|朝美穗香 みひろ|Taniguchi Mihiro}}, is a Japanese model, singer, TV personality and award-winning [[adult video]] (AV) actress. Her long career as a featured actress and her popularity mark her as a true [[AV Idol]]. ==Life and career== Mihiro was born in [[Niigata prefecture]] on May 19, 1982. She began a career as a softcore nude model as early as May 2002 when her video ''Dream'' (どりーむ) was released followed by the publication of the similarly named photobook ''Dream'' (夢) in August 2002.{{cite web|url=http://jans-web.com/books/5910|title=Mihiro Photobook: Dream|publisher=[http://jans-web.com/ Urabon Navigator]|accessdate=2009-06-16}}{{cite web|url=http://www.bk1.jp/product/02201162|title=夢|publisher=[http://www.bk1.jp/ www.bk1.jp]|accessdate=2009-06-16|language=Japanese}} She appeared in a number of other softcore nude modeling videos and photobooks over the next year and a half. Mihiro also acted in softcore [[V-Cinema]] productions during this time including the January 2004 movie ''Heisei Sekuhara Bushidou'' directed by [[Naoyuki Tomomatsu]].{{cite web|url=http://www.sazuma.com/item_74522_Tasogare-Sukebeee:-Heisei-Sekuhara-Bushidou.html|title=Tasogare Sukebeee: Heisei Sekuhara Bushidou|publisher=[http://www.sazuma.com/ www.sazuma.com]|accessdate=2009-06-30}} She was also featured as a singer in a [[J-Pop]] [[Maxi single]] titled ''Sunflower'' (ヒマワリ) for Dream Robot in October 2004.{{cite web|url=http://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%83%92%E3%83%9E%E3%83%AF%E3%83%AA-%E3%81%BF%E3%81%B2%E3%82%8D/dp/B0002Y4M94|title=ヒマワリ [Maxi] |publisher=[http://www.amazon.co.jp/ www.amazon.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-06-27|language=Japanese}} ===AV debut - Alice Japan & MAX-A=== Mihiro made her debut as an AV actress on January 28, 2005 when [[Alice Japan]] released her video ''Little Angel''.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=ka2204|title=Little Angel|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-26}} Her transition from nude model to adult actress was described as "The biggest news for 2005!!" in the world of Japanese porn. A month later, she made her first video for the MAX-A studio, ''Super Star''.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv220|title=Super*Star / Mihiro|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-26}} For the next two and a half years until mid-2007, Mihiro made about one AV a month alternating between Alice Japan and MAX-A. Her next two videos took her out of the studio: the March 2005 title for Alice Japan, ''Love Dreamer'', takes her to [[Saipan]] to look for a scene she has dreamed about{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=dv455|title=Love Dreamer / Mihiro |publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-26}} while in her April MAX-A entry ''Kitsch'', she travels to [[Hokkaido]].{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv233|title=Kitsch / Mihiro |publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-27}} At the same time, Mihiro was also appearing on TV in the [[TV-Asahi]] drama {{nihongo|''[[Tokumei Kakarichō Tadano Hitoshi]]'''|特命係長·只野仁}} or ''Mission Section Chief Hitoshi Tadano''. She was in Episode 10 of the second year series of the program broadcast on March 18, 2005.{{cite web|url=http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/channel/contents/dorama/0066/|title=特命係長　只野仁　2ndシーズン|publisher=[http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/ TV-Asahi]|accessdate=2009-07-01|language=Japanese}} Also in 2005, Mihiro starred in two of MAX-A's popular series, ''Welcome to Max Cafe!'',{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv251|title=Welcome to Max Cafe! / Mihiro|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-27}} a [[cosplay]] role where she dresses as a schoolgirl, a "bunny girl" and a nun, and ''Welcome to Max Airline!'' where she is a flight attendant who services passengers and pilots.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv302|title=Welcome to Max Airline! / Mihiro |publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-06-27}} She began 2006 with a regular role in [[TV Tokyo]]'s romantic comedy, ''2nd House'' (2ndハウス or 2nd Hausu), which ran in 12 episodes from January to March of 2006.{{cite web|url=http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/2ndhouse/|title=2ndハウス|publisher=[http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/ www.tv-tokyo.co.jp]|language=Japanese}}{{cite web|url=http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/2ndhouse/cast.html|title=2ndハウス Cast|publisher=[http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/ www.tv-tokyo.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-07-08|language=Japanese}} In April 2006, she was one of the leads in the V-Cinema horror film, ''Zombie Self-Defense Force'' (ゾンビ自衛隊 or Zonbi jieitai) directed by [[pink film]] and horror movie director [[Naoyuki Tomomatsu]].{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0879265/|title=Zonbi jieitai (2006) |publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-07}}{{cite web|url=http://www.sazuma.com/item_136440_Zombi-Jieitai.html?mysazuma=58fe95fb4214f66f2adace54fd97ece9|title=Zombi Jieitai|publisher=[http://www.sazuma.com/ www.sazuma.com]|accessdate=2009-07-07}} Throughout 2006, she also continued alternating monthly adult videos including appearing in MAX-A's ''Welcome to Max Soap!!'' series and Alice Japan's long-running ''Sexy Butt (Mejiri)'' series.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv352|title=Welcome to Max Soap!! / Mihiro|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-05}}{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=dv575|title=Sexy Butt / Mihiro|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-05}} With [[Akiho Yoshizawa]] and others, she also appeared in two elaborate adult video [[Edo period]] historical dramas, ''The Inner Palace: Indecent War'', and the sequel ''The Inner Palace: Flower of War'' both released by Max-A under the DoraMax label in 2006.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=dmx001|title=The Inner Palace - Indecent War|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-05-30}}{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=dmx002|title=The Inner Palace - the war of Buds|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-05}} In addition to the hardcore videos, they were both released in shorter softcore versions.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?ID=pmx005|title=The Inner Palace - Indecent War (R-15)|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-05-30}}{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=pmx006|title=The Inner Palace - the war of Buds (R-15)|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-05}} In another genre, Mihiro was the star of the November 2006 V-Cinema release ''Yo-Yo Sexy Girl Cop'' (スケパン刑事　バージンネーム＝諸見栄サキ Sukepan deka: Bājin nēmu = Moromie Saki), an erotic parody of the [[manga]]-inspired movie [[Yo-Yo Girl Cop]]. She plays a teen-aged undercover government agent armed with a steel yo-yo and see-through panties.{{cite web|url=http://www.allmovie.com/work/yo-yo-sexy-girl-cop-469700|title=Yo-Yo Sexy Girl Cop|publisher=[http://www.allmovie.com/ AllMovie]|accessdate=2009-07-15}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=325921|title=スケパン刑事　バージンネーム＝諸見栄サキ(2006)|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-15|language=Japanese}} One reviewer commented that Mihiro's was "the only performance of note". The DVD was released in the US with English subtitles in November 2008.{{cite web|url=http://10kbullets.com/reviews/y/yo-yo-sexy-girl-cop/|title=Yo-Yo Sexy Girl Cop |publisher=[http://10kbullets.com/ 10kbullets.com]|last=Den Boer|first=Michael|date=January 15, 2009|accessdate=2009-07-15}} Her last video in 2006 was the "psycho suspense" ''Woman In The Forest'' for Max-A.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv463|title=Deep Forest, Mihiro|publisher=[http://avidol.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-05}} At the [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#AV Actress Grand Prix 2006|AV Actress Grand Prix Awards]] held at the end of 2006, Mihiro won one of the Best Actress Awards for Excellence for her performances in 2006.{{cite web |url=http://www.asianidols.net/news.php?day.20070107|title=AV Grand Prix 2006 Winners Announced|accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://www.asianidols.net/ Asianidols.net]|date=January 7, 2007}}{{cite web |url=http://avdisuki.1.dtiblog.com/blog-entry-1621.html|title=ヒロリン大賞２００６！ |accessdate=2008-11-17|publisher=[http://avdisuki.1.dtiblog.com/ AV Actress Hirorin Fan Blog]|date=December 20, 2006|language=Japanese}} Mihiro continued her singing career with an all AV Idol group, the Man-zoku ディーバ Divas which originally consisted of Mihiro, [[Akiho Yoshizawa]] and [[Naho Ozawa]]. Ozawa later left the group which was eventually expanded to five singers.{{cite web|url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/japanese-av-idol-group-man-zoku-%e3%83%87%e3%82%a3%e3%83%bc%e3%83%90-divas/|title=Japanese av idol group Man-Zoku ディーバ Divas|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|accessdate=2009-07-08}}Official website: {{cite web|url=http://av.manzoku.or.jp/|title=マンゾクディーバ (Manzoku Divas)|publisher=[http://av.manzoku.or.jp/ av.manzoku.or.jp]|accessdate=2009-07-08}} The beginning of 2007 saw her in the Alice Japan feature ''Ani-Cos Japan / 4 Characters X 4 Sexes'', a cosplay work where she plays four different [[anime]] characters{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=dv730|title=4 Characters X 4 Sexes, Mihiro |publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-08}} as well as an S&M "suspense-drama" for MAX-A, ''Uniform Hunted, Mihiro''{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv498|title=Hunting Girls in High School Uniform, Mihiro |publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-08}} Her final videos for the two studios were the Alice Japan [[creampie (sexual act)|"nakadashi"]] video ''Real Idol, Cum Inside!''{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=dv789|title=Real Idol, Cum Inside! Mihiro|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-08}} and the appropriately titled ''Last Chapter'' for MAX-A released in June 2007, 16 months after her debut with the studio.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=xv548|title=Last Chapter, Mihiro|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-08}} Mihiro returned to TV work in 2007 in the [[TV Asahi]] suspense drama ''Tissue'' (ティッシュ) which was broadcast April-June 2007.{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=328126|title=ティッシュ(2007)|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-08|language=Japanese}}{{cite web|url=http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/tissue/cast/body.html|title=Tissue Cast|publisher=[http://www.tv-asahi.co.jp/ www.tv-asahi.co.jp]|accessdate=2009-07-08|language=Japanese}} ===Later career - Maxing & S1=== From July 2007, Mihiro began making videos with two new AV studios, Maxing{{cite web|url=http://www.maxing.jp/shop/ac/ACT10023.html|title=みひろ出演DVD一覧 (Mihiro Filmography)|publisher=[http://www.maxing.jp/ www.maxing.jp]|accessdate=2009-07-08|language=Japanese}} and [[S1 No. 1 Style]]{{cite web|url=http://www.s1s1s1.com/actress/-/detail/=/id=581/|title=みひろ|publisher=[http://www.s1s1s1.com/ www.s1s1s1.com]|accessdate=2009-07-08|language=Japanese}}. She kept to her previous pattern of doing one movie per month, alternating between the two companies. Her second feature for Maxing, ''Super Rider'', had her performing in the "[[Cowgirl position]]" throughout the video.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=mxgs035|title=SUPER RIDER, Mihiro|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-14}} At the 2007 Vegas Night [[Japanese Adult Video Awards#Moodyz Awards (2001-2008)|Moodyz Awards]], Mihiro took the 2nd Place Award for Best Actress and her debut video for S1, ''Hyper-Risky Mosaic Mihiro'', directed by [[Hideto Aki]], won the Best Title Award.{{cite web|url=http://www.dmm.co.jp/vegasnight/index.html|title=VEGASNIGHT 2007|accessdate=2009-02-10)|publisher=[http://www.dmm.co.jp/ DMM]|language=Japanese}} Mihiro began 2008 with a video for Maxing in their flagship "Dirty Talk" series, ''Mihiro Will Make You Cum With Full Dirty Language'', where she plays a variety of characters, including an insurance agent and a young wife, who excite men with dirty language.{{cite web|url=http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/info.html?id=mxgs068|title=Mihiro' Dirty Talks Makes You Get Finished|publisher=[http://vinfo.xcity.jp/english/ AV Idol Directory]|accessdate=2009-07-14}} Through 2008, she also appeared in several of the popular S1 series: "Massive Ejaculation on Her Face", "Costumes Pakopako!", "Endless Climax! Ultra Ecstasy Fuck", "Big Magnum Fuck" and "Hyper-Risky Mosaic". In the mainstream film arena, she starred as Ms Lin, the owner of a dumpling shop with a "secret ingredient", in director Koji Kawano's 2008 V-Cinema erotic horror-comedy ''Cruel Restaurant'' (Zankoku hanten).{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1295032/|title=Zankoku hanten (2008)(V)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-14}}{{cite web|url=http://www.horrornews.net/asian_shock/html/Review_Cruel_Restaraunt.htm|title=Cruel Restaurant (Zankoku hanten) (2008)|publisher=[http://www.horrornews.net/ www.horrornews.net]|accessdate=2009-07-14}} Along with other S1 actresses [[Sora Aoi]], [[Yuma Asami]] and [[Tina Yuzuki|Rio (Tina Yuzuki)]], Mihiro was one of the regular cast members doing songs and comedy on the late night [[TV Osaka]] variety show {{nihongo|''Please Muscat''|おねがい マスカット|Onegai Muscat}} which began broadcasting in April 2008.{{cite web|url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/jav-stars-maria-ozawa-and-sora-host-osaka-tv-variety-show/|title=JAV stars Maria Ozawa and Sora Aoi host Osaka TV Variety show|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|accessdate=2009-06-16|date=March 20, 2009}} She has also done a number of TV skits with Japanese comedian [[Ken Shimura]].{{cite web|url=http://japansugoi.com/wordpress/mihiro-and-ken-shimura-comedy-skits//|title=Mihiro and Ken Shimura comedy skits|publisher=[http://japansugoi.com/ Japan Sugoi]|accessdate=2009-07-16|date=June 19, 2009}} In 2009 Mihiro continued her AV career with S1 and Maxing but she also appeared in major roles in theatrical movies, the first being in March, in the drama {{nihongo|''SR: Saitama's Rapper''|ＳＲ　サイタマノラッパー|''SR: Saitama no rappā''}}. The movie follows a group of aspiring rap singers in Tokyo's [[Saitama prefecture]].{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1390982/|title=SR: Saitama no rappâ (2009)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-16}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=333026|title=ＳＲ　サイタマノラッパー|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-16|language=Japanese}} The film was awarded the Grand Prix at the 19th [[Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival]] in 2009.{{cite web|url=http://www.variety.com/article/VR1118000724.html?categoryid=13&cs=1|title=Japan's Yubari fest honors 'Rapper'|publisher=[http://www.variety.com/ Variety]|accessdate=2009-07-16}} In June 2009 she was in {{nihongo|''The Grudge: Old Lady in White''|呪怨　白い老女|Ju-on: Shiroi rōjo}}, part of the famous Japanese ''[[Ju-on]]'' series re-made in the US as ''[[The Grudge (film series)|The Grudge]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1422675/|title=Ju-on: Shiroi rôjo (2009)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-16}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=333785|title=呪怨　白い老女|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-16|language=Japanese}} Later, in July she had a part in the action-horror gore-fest by director Kengo Kaji, {{nihongo|''[[Samurai Princess|Samurai Princess: Devil Princess]]''|サムライプリンセス　外道姫|Samurai purinsesu: Gedō-hime}}.{{cite web|url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1412334/|title=Samurai purinsesu: Gedô-hime (2009)|publisher=[http://www.imdb.com/ IMdB]|accessdate=2009-07-16}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allcinema.net/prog/show_c.php?num_c=333026|title=ＳＲ　サイタマノラッパー|publisher=[http://www.allcinema.net/ AllCinema]|accessdate=2009-07-16|language=Japanese}} Also in 2009, she traveled to [[Korea]] to promote a four part dramatic TV series ''Korean Classroom'', a joint Korean-Japanese production which aired on Korean TV in May 2009. The series, which also starred AV Idols [[Sora Aoi]] and [[Tina Yuzuki|Rio (Tina Yuzuki)]], deals with three Japanese girls who travel to Korea and fall for some local men.{{cite web|url=http://www.allkpop.com/index.php/full_story/aoi_sora_and_mihiro_promote_korean_classroom/|title=Aoi Sora and Mihiro promote Korean Classroom|publisher=[http://www.allkpop.com/ AllKPop]|accessdate=2009-07-16}} ==Partial filmography== ===2002-2004=== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! {{Female adult bio |photo= |name = Rena Murakami ||birth= {{birth date and age|1967|11|25}}Infobox data from {{cite web |url= http://i-dic.dorachan.com/data?mrkrin00|title= 村上 麗奈 / むらかみ れいな / Murakami Reina|accessdate=2009-08-08|publisher=[http://i-dic.dorachan.com/ 'Web I-dic' (Idol Dictionary)]|language=Japanese}} |location= [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] |birthname= |death= |measurements= 82-58-83(cm)
32-32-33(inch) |height= {{height|m=1.59}} |weight= |shoe size= |eye color= Brown |hair color= Black |skin color= |natural bust= Yes |blood= O |ethnicity= [[Japanese people|Japanese]] |alias= Tomoko Ino |films= |homepage= |iafd= |imdb= 0409238 |afdb= |afdb name= }} {{nihongo|'''Rena Murakami'''|村上麗奈|Murakami Rena|extra= [[Cantonese]]: Chuen Seung Lai Laoi}} is a [[Japan]]ese actress and former [[AV idol]]. == Life and career == After beginning her career as a [[gravure idol]], Murakami made her AV debut in the March 1988 [[h.m.p. (Japan)|h.m.p.]] Miss Christine release, {{nihongo2|発情感染}}.{{cite web |url= http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/years/years_1988.htm|title= 1988年 （昭和63年|accessdate=2009-08-08|publisher=[http://homepage3.nifty.com/kurokami/index.html AV 研究所 (AV Research Laboratory)]}} In December of her debut year she had a role in [[Toei]]'s mainstream drama release, {{nihongo|''Koiko no mainichi''|恋子の毎日}}.{{cite web |url= http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/searchDetails.php?id=14916|title= 恋子の毎日|accessdate=2009-08-08|publisher=[http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/index.php Japanese Cinema Database] ([[Agency for Cultural Affairs]])}} She also appeared in [[V-Cinema]] films. In 1990 she appeared in pioneering ''[[pink film]]'' director/producer [[Kan Mukai]]'s コードネーム３４８　女刑事　サシバ.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/1990/ov022700.htm|title=コードネーム３４８　女刑事　サシバ|accessdate=2009-08-08|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}} She had another role in a mainstream drama, appearing in [[Bandai Visual|Bandai]]'s {{nihongo|Shin dōtei monogatari: Hong Kong virgin boy|新・童貞物語　ホンコンバージンボーイ}}.{{cite web |url= http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/searchDetails.php?id=1552|title= 新・童貞物語　ホンコンバージンボーイ|accessdate=2009-08-08|publisher=[http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/index.php Japanese Cinema Database] ([[Agency for Cultural Affairs]])}} Following her adult videos' popularity in [[Hong Kong]], she moved there around [[1990]] or [[1991]] to work as a [[stripper]].[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0409238/bio Rena Murakami Biography] She then shifted to [[Cinema of Hong Kong|cinema]]. Her first film was [[Category III]] classic ''[[Sex and Zen]]'' in 1991. Around [[1993]], she moved back to Japan. She worked at the famous [[Asakusa]] strip theatre Rokku-za (ロック座). She caused a minor scandal when news leaked that she had sex with the [[Hassanal Bolkiah|Sultan of Brunei]] during his visit to Japan in 1993.[http://onisukebb.h.fc2.com/av_rist1/jyoyu/rena_m.html Murakami Rena] {{ja icon}}[http://www.videoboy.tv/actress/a1000006200001.html Murakami Rena] {{ja icon}} In 1997 she produced and starred in the ''[[pink film]]'' {{nihongo|''Murakami Rena: kyūkyoku meigizuma''|村上麗奈　究極名器妻}}, through Runa Films.{{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/1997/du002200.htm|title=村上麗奈　究極名器妻|accessdate=2009-08-08|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]}}{{cite web |url= http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/searchDetails.php?id=16331|title= 村上麗奈　究極名器妻|accessdate=2009-08-08|publisher=[http://www.japanese-cinema-db.jp/index.php Japanese Cinema Database] ([[Agency for Cultural Affairs]])}} The film was distributed theatrically by XCes, and directed by [[Satoru Kobayashi (director)|Satoru Kobayashi]],{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/list/1997.htm|title=1997年度ピンク映画公開作品リスト|accessdate=2009-08-08|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P.G. Web Site]}} director of the first ''pink film'', ''[[Flesh Market]]'' (1962).{{cite web |url=http://es.geocities.com/eiga9/articulos/obscenity.html|title=Obscenity and Article 175 of the Japanese Penal Code: A Short Introduction to Japanese Censorship|accessdate=2009-08-08|last=da Silva|first=Joaquín|date=2006-10-24}} The film was re-issued in June 2003 as {{nihongo2|村上麗奈　極上けいれん妻}}.{{cite web |url=http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/data/2003/newmovie2003.htm|title=2003|accessdate=2009-08-08|language=Japanese|publisher=[http://www2u.biglobe.ne.jp/~p-g/menu.htm P.G. Web Site]}} Most recently, Murakami appeared in the November 2008 Japanese release, {{nihongo|''[[Serial Dad]]''|小森生活向上クラブ|Komori seikatsu kōjō kurabu}}.{{cite web |url= http://www.kinejun.jp/cinema/id/39479 |title= 小森生活向上クラブ(邦画 )|accessdate=2009-08-08|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Kinema Junpo]]}} ==Partial filmography== ===JapanJapanese filmography from {{cite web It's up to {{Citation/core}} to stop italicized "'foo' & 'bar'" from becoming "'''foo' & 'bar'''". Citation/core does this by having a <nowiki></nowiki> at both beginning and end of the call to this template. Since this is only needed once, it's more efficient to do it in {{Citation/core}} than here. -->{{documentation}}</noinclude>

Setting include: *"book" which will place the article into [[:Category:Books by Alan Moore]], *"comic" which will place the article into [[:Category:Comics by Alan Moore]], and *"work" which will place the article into [[:Category:Works by Alan Moore]], Please note that: *The sorting will be by the pagename or the default set with {{DEFAULTSORT}}. *With normal placement of the navigation template, the category will ''precede'' "manually" added categories. revision.text:
<!--{{Notability}} begin-->{{Ambox | type = content | text = This article may not meet the {{#switch: {{lc:{{{1}}}}} | notability = '''[[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]]''' | notability (people) | bio | biographies = [[Wikipedia:Notability (people)|'''notability guideline''' for '''biographies''']] | notability (academics) | academics = [[Wikipedia:Notability (academics)|'''notability guideline''' for '''academics''']] | notability (books) | book | books = [[Wikipedia:Notability (books)|'''notability guideline''' for '''books''']] | notability (films) | film | movie | movies | films = [[Wikipedia:Notability (films)|'''notability guideline''' for '''films''']] | notability (companies and corporations) | institutions | companies | org | organisations | organizations = [[Wikipedia:Notability (organizations and companies)|'''notability guidelines''' for '''companies and organizations''']] | products = [[Wikipedia:Notability (organizations and companies)#Products_and_services|'''notability guidelines''' for '''products and services''']] | notability (fiction) | fict | fiction = '''[[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]]''' | notability (music) | music = [[Wikipedia:Notability (music)|'''notability guideline''' for '''music''']] | avoid neologisms | neologisms =[[Wikipedia:Avoid neologisms|'''notability guideline''' for '''neologisms''']] | notability (numbers) | numbers =[[Wikipedia:Notability (numbers)|'''notability guideline''' for '''numbers''']] | notability (web) | web = [[Wikipedia:Notability (web)|'''notability guideline''' for '''web content''']] | '''[[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]]'''}}.
Please help to establish notability by adding [[WP:RS|reliable, secondary sources]] about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be [[Wikipedia:Merge|merged]] or [[WP:DELETE|deleted]]. {{#if:{{{date|}}}|<small>(''{{{date}}}'')</small>}} }}{{DMCA|Articles with topics of unclear notability|from|{{{date|}}}}}{{#if:{{{cat|}}}|{{DMCA|{{{cat}}} articles of unclear notability}}}}<!--{{Notability}} end--><noinclude> {{pp-template|small=yes}} {{documentation}} </noinclude>

<!-- {{Primarysources}} start -->{{Ambox
| type = content
| image = [[Image:Question book-new.svg|50x40px]]
| text = This {{{1|article}}} '''needs [[Wikipedia:Verifiability|references]] that appear in reliable third-party publications'''. [[Wikipedia:No_original_research#Primary.2C_secondary_and_tertiary_sources|Primary source]]s or sources affiliated with the subject are generally not sufficient for a Wikipedia article. Please add more appropriate [[Wikipedia:Citing sources|citations]] from [[Wikipedia:Reliable sources|reliable sources]]. {{#if:{{{date|}}}|<small>''({{{date}}})''</small>}}
}}{{DMCA|Articles lacking reliable references|from|{{{date|}}}|All articles lacking sources}}<!-- {{Primarysources}} end--><noinclude>

{{pp-template|small=yes}}

{{documentation}}

</noinclude>

Contentious material about living people that is unsourced or poorly sourced '''must be removed immediately'''.{{#if:{{{date|}}}|''({{{date}}})''}} ''Find sources:'' ([http://www.google.com/search?&as_eq=wikipedia&as_epq={{urlencode:{{SUBPAGENAME}}}} {{SUBPAGENAME}}] – [http://news.google.com/archivesearch?&as_src=-newswire+-wire+-presswire+-PR+-press+-release&as_epq={{urlencode:{{SUBPAGENAME}}}} news], [http://books.google.com/books?&as_brr=0&as_pub=-icon&as_epq={{urlencode:{{SUBPAGENAME}}}} books], [http://scholar.google.com/scholar?as_epq={{urlencode:{{SUBPAGENAME}}}} scholar])}}{{DMCA|Unreferenced BLPs|from|{{{date|}}}|All unreferenced BLPs}} {{documentation}}

| text  = This {{{1|article}}} '''may contain improper references to [[WP:V#SELF|self-published sources]]'''. {{#if:{{{2|}}}|The source in dispute is: {{{2}}}.}} Please help [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} improve it] by removing references to [[WP:RS|unreliable sources]] where they are used inappropriately. {{#if:{{{date|}}}|<small>''({{{date}}})''</small>}}

<!--{{Which?}} begin-->{{fix |link=Wikipedia:Avoid weasel words |text=which? |title=The material in the vicinity of this tag may use weasel words or too-vague attribution. |date={{{date|}}} |cat-date=Category:Articles with specifically-marked weasel-worded phrases}}<!--{{Which}} end--><noinclude> <!-- TEMPLATE END. The text below has been <noinclude>'d and will not appear in the template when used on pages --> ---- {{maincat|Articles with specifically-marked weasel-worded phrases}} This tag has been created in order to provide for a sleeker alternative for the bloating '''weasel''' tag. It is an alternative for {{t1|who?}} for statements like "In some countries ..." or "In some scientific publications ..." and the like.
This tag will categorise tagged articles into [[:Category:Articles with specifically-marked weasel-worded phrases]]. This template is especially efficient since you know what is needed even without clicking on the link.
[[Category:Neutrality templates|Weasel-who]] [[Category:Inline cleanup templates]] </noinclude>

{{#ifeq:{{{align|right}}}|center|
|}}
{{#ifeq: {{{pos|bottom}}} | bottom |
{{{content}}}
|}}
{{#if: {{{link|}}} |
{{{linkoverride|[[:{{{link}}}|info]]}}}
|}}{{{caption|}}}
{{#ifeq: {{{pos|bottom}}} | top |
{{{content}}}
|}}
{{#ifeq:{{{align|right}}}|center|
|}} This template creates a frame like those surrounding images. This template can be used to put two or more images into a frame together, or as a wrapper for more complicated templates like {{tl|superimpose}}. Sample code for using this template is presented below. 
{{Imageframe|width=|content=|caption=|link=|align=|pos=}}
== Parameters == ;Required *'''width''': the width of the image within the frame, in pixels (though do not add "px" to the width: ie, use width=175 and not width=175px) *'''content''': content of the main section (generally images) ;Optional *'''caption''': content of the caption section *'''link''': link for the "Enlarge" link in the caption (in the future, may also be used as the link for the image field inside the frame, though it would probably require an additional ''height'' parameter) *'''linkoverride''': allows anything to be used instead of the 'info' link *'''align''': Valid values: right ''(default)'', left, center. *'''pos''': Valid values: top, bottom ''(default)'' ==Example== By filling out the parameters as follows, the result will be as shown below the code. 
{{Imageframe|width=200|content=[[Image:Example.png|100px]][[Image:Example.png|100px]]|caption=Example usage|link=Hello world|align=center}}
{{Imageframe|width=200|content=[[Image:Example.png|100px]][[Image:Example.png|100px]]|caption=Example usage|link=Hello world|align=center}} 
{{Imageframe|width=200|content=[[Image:Example.png|100px]][[Image:Example.png|100px]]|caption=Example usage|link=Hello world|align=center|pos=top}}
{{Imageframe|width=200|content=[[Image:Example.png|100px]][[Image:Example.png|100px]]|caption=Example usage|link=Hello world|align=center|pos=top}} [[Category:Graphic templates|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[fr:Modèle:Imageframe]] [[ja:Template:Imageframe]] [[pt:Predefinição:Imageframe]]
#REDIRECT [[Template:Image frame]]

<!--{{Disputed}} begin-->{{ ambox
| type  = content
| text  = This {{{what|article}}}'s '''factual accuracy is [[Wikipedia:Accuracy dispute|disputed]]'''. {{#ifexist:{{TALKPAGENAME}}|Please see the relevant discussion on the [[{{TALKPAGENAME}}#{{{1|Disputed}}}|talk page]].}} {{#if:{{{date|}}}|<small>''({{{date}}})''</small>}}
}}{{DMCA|Accuracy disputes|from|{{{date|}}}}}<!--{{Disputed}} end--><noinclude>{{documentation}}</noinclude>

| type  = content
| image = [[File:Unbalanced scales.svg|50x40px]]
| text  = This {{{1|article}}} '''may be inaccurate in or [[Wikipedia:Neutral point of view#Undue weight|unbalanced]] towards certain viewpoints'''. Please [{{SERVER}}{{localurl:{{PAGENAME}}|action=edit}} improve the article] by adding information on neglected viewpoints, or discuss the issue on the [[:{{NAMESPACE}} talk:{{PAGENAME}}|talk page]]. {{#if:{{{date|}}}|<small>''({{{date}}})''</small>}}
}}{{DMCA|||Articles needing more viewpoints}}<!--{{Unbalanced}} end--><noinclude>{{documentation}}</noinclude>

[http://www.playboy.com/girls/playmates/directory/{{{1|{{{year}}}}}}{{#ifexpr: 1 <= {{{2|}}} and {{{2|}}} <= 9 | 0{{#expr: {{{2}}} }} | {{{2|}}} }}.html {{{3|{{{name|{{PAGENAME}}}}}}}}] at [[Playboy Online|Playboy.com]]<noinclude> [[da:Skabelon:Playmate]] [[no:Mal:Playmate]]
==Usage== '''<nowiki>{{</nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki>|2006|10}}</nowiki>''' will provide: {{playmate|2006|10}} where the word "Playmate" is replaced with the model's name.
This is for use in the external links section of Playmate's articles.
Notes: * The year of their centerfold should be the first value and the month should be the second. Single digit months need not have a leading zero. Thus January would be 1, not 01. * If the article's name has a disambiguator in it such as Christine Smith (adult model) then a third value should be used which would be her name. i.e. <nowiki>{{playmate|2005|12|Christine Smith}}</nowiki> would yield {{playmate|2005|12|Christine Smith}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:{{PAGENAME}}}} [[Category: People and person external link templates]] </noinclude>

<!--{{As of}} begin--><includeonly><!--
## param 1 is the year ## optional param 2 is the month ## optional param 3 is the day of the month ## optional named parameter alt=[text] is alternative display text (may include wiki markup) ## optional named parameter df=US produces American date format in displayed text ## optional named parameter lc=on gives lower-case-first output ## optional named parameter url=[URL] gives statement reference
## displayed text ([A/a]s of [Start date] by default) -->{{#if: {{{alt|}}} | {{{alt}}} | {{#ifeq: {{{lc}}} | {{{lc|}}} | a | A }}s of {{#if: {{{3|}}} | {{Start date | {{{1}}} | {{MONTHNUMBER|{{{2}}}}} | {{{3}}} | df={{#ifeq:{{{df|}}}|US||yes}} }} | {{#if: {{{2|}}} | {{MONTHNAME|{{{2}}}}} }} {{{1}}} }}}}<!--
## ref/update inline banner (hidden by default) --><sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag {{#if:{{{url|}}}|ref|update}}" style="display:none;">[{{#if:{{{url|}}}|{{{url}}} [ref]|{{fullurl:{{PAGENAME}}|action=edit}} [update]}}]</sup><!--
## categorisation disabled outside main namespace -->{{DMCA|Articles containing potentially dated statements|from|<!--
## temporal category for template (word method) -->{{#if: {{#ifexpr: {{{1}}} = 1 }} | {{#ifexpr: {{#time:Y|{{{1}}}}} > 2004 | {{{1}}} | {{#ifexpr: {{#time:Y|{{{1}}}}} > 1989 | {{#time:Y|{{{1}}}}} | before 1990 }}}} | <!--
## temporal category for template (parameter method) -->{{#ifexpr: {{{1}}} > 2004 | {{#if:{{{2|}}} | {{MONTHNAME|{{{2}}}}} }} {{{1}}} | {{#ifexpr:{{{1}}} > 1989 | {{{1}}} | before 1990 }}}}}}|<!--
## global category for template -->All articles containing potentially dated statements}}</includeonly><!--{{As of}} end--><noinclude><!--
## dynamic example (as of today, self ref)
-->As of {{Start date|{{CURRENTYEAR}}|{{CURRENTMONTH}}|{{CURRENTDAY}}|df=yes}}<sup class="plainlinks">[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:As_of [ref]]</sup>
{{pp-template|small=yes}}
{{documentation}}
<!-- Add categories and inter-wikis to the /doc subpage, not here! -->
</noinclude>
